[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/phal po che ka pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D44}{D44-1}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bud+d+ha a ba tang sa ka nA ma ma hA bai pu l+yaM sU tra/_bod skad du/_sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_'di 
[\[1b.2\]]skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_
[\[1b.3\]]dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyi sku mnga' ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skus shin tu khyab pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du dbyangs kyi yan 
[\[1b.4\]]lag dang gsung gi nga ro shin tu bsgrags pa/_mkha' dang nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid mnyam pa nyid du rab tu snang ba'i spyod yul can nam mkha' ltar 'gro ba thams cad kun khyab pa'i snying po 
[\[1b.5\]]byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad kyi nang na rnam par snang ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar shar ba/_sangs 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba bstan pa/_rab tu spros pa dus gsum gyi bsod nams rgya chen po rgya mtsho lta bus spyod yul yongs su dag pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba/_
[\[2a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsgribs pa med pa/_skra'i rtse mo thams cad du mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis 
[\[2a.3\]]rlob pa'i mthu mnga' ba/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la mngon du gyur par yongs su ston pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/_'phos pa med par gshegs pa/_yongs su ston 
[\[2a.4\]]pas khyab par mdzad pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa/_'od zer gyi sgo thams cad du dus gsum rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bskal pa rgya mtsho 
[\[2a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyi rlabs shin tu bsgrubs pa/_yul ma ga ta'i chos kyi dgon pa snying po byang chub rdo rje rin po che thams cad ltar gzhom du mi chom par sra ba'i sa phyogs nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog gis sa gzhi brgyan pa nor bu'i rgyal po dri 
[\[2a.6\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'bar bas rab tu bsgrubs pa/_rin po che mang po thams cad kyis rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/_yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer dang /_sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba dang /_dra ba mang po thams cad rnam par bres pa rin po che'i kha dog zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu bsgrubs pa/_me tog 
[\[2b.2\]]sna tshogs chu bo'i klung lta bus yongs su bstan pas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i shing 'od zer gyi kha dog sdug po dang ldan pa'i yal gas brgyan pa/_rgyan thams cad du snang ba shin du 'bar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa/_yang dag par bstan pa'i sa'i snying po/_rin 
[\[2b.3\]]po che'i 'bru thams cad 'byung bas phyogs kun du sbyangs shing brgyan pa'i snying po byang chub la byang chub chen po'i shing nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'brus/_bsgrubs pa'i sdong po dang ldan pa bai DUr+ya dang /_nor bu thams cad kyi rigs 'byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i lhun can 
[\[2b.4\]]yongs su yon tan mang po mtha' yas pa'i nor bu rin po che mang po'i 'brus shin tu brgyan cing rab tu 'phel ba'i yal ga can rin po che thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'od gsal bas phyogs kyi sprin du gyur pa/_yal ga thams cad kyi rtse mo las me tog dang /_'bras bu'i dra ba yon tan 
[\[2b.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs can rab tu spyangs pa/_rin po che'i 'bras bu'i sna tshogs shin tu 'bar ba'i snying pos/_shing gi rgyan me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas shing rnam par gsal ba/_phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che rgya che zhing mang ba'i 'od zer lta bur rnam par snang ba 
[\[2b.6\]]nor bu'i yon tan zad mi shes pa'i char chen po rnam par sprul pas yongs su bstan pa/_nor bu'i sgo thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprin 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis zad mi shes pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba'i 
[\[2b.7\]]drung na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang phyogs thams cad du mngon par snang ba/_rab tu 'phel ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs yon tan mtha' yas pa'i ka ba bkye ba/_lhun rin po che'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rgyan mtha' yas 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]pas shin tu klubs pa'i 'od zer snang bas sprin ltar khebs pa/_pho brang gi mtshams thams cad nas 'od kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bkye ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa/_rjes su 'dod pa'i snying po can bsam 
[\[3a.2\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_gsung rgya chen po'i dbyangs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'i dra bas thams cad yog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa'i 'phrul pa/_dmigs pa thams cad du byung ba/_sems can thams cad kyi khyim gyi 
[\[3a.3\]]gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa/_sems skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas par 'phro ba'i snying po can seng ge'i khri chen po sangs rgyas kyi gdan du gyur pa/_rin po che thams cad dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i spos sna tshogs kyi snying po 
[\[3a.4\]]can pad+mo'i dra ba 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung bas brten pa/_rin po che dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'khor lo'i 'od kun tu brdal ba/_me tog gi phreng ba bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas klubs pa/_nor bu'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las 'od shin du bkye ba/_rta 
[\[3a.5\]]babs dang /_khri khri 'phang dang /_skar khung khang pa brtsegs pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas legs par brgyan pa nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po'i sprin thams cad du 'phros pa'i rgyan can/_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya chen po'i gtsug gi rin po ches bzung zhing 'od 
[\[3a.6\]]zer rnam par snang ba/_phyogs bcu'i mtshams thams cad du/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi snying po'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi sgra dbyangs rgya chen pos chos kyi dbyings khyab pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa la 
[\[3a.7\]]bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thabs gcig tu spyod spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig ste/_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan 'od mchog kun du sgron ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[3b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'bar ba seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu dbyangs rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[3b.3\]]po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[3b.4\]]dpa' chen po bsod nams [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad dri [{]myed [,]med [}]kun tu gzi brjid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[3b.5\]]sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri [{]myed [,]med [}]'od kyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[3b.6\]]pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[3b.7\]]dpa' chen po spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig gis 
[\[4a.2\]]byung ba pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'khor yongs su rgyas pas snang bar gyur pa/_ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa/_dus gsum gyi dbyings thams cad du snang bas gsal bar gyur pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor thams cad yongs su dag pas snang bar gyur pa/_tha dad pa yang 
[\[4a.3\]]dag par shes pa/_rgya mtsho yangs shing zad mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang mthus snang bar byas pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar brtsam pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis snang bar byas pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po gcig tu 
[\[4a.4\]]tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo'i yul yangs pa la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis snang bar byas pa/_sa gcig las byung ba yongs su gnon pa'i rjes su 'brang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa/_smon lam gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug 
[\[4a.5\]]pa phyi ma'i mtha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes thams cad kyi gnas pas snang bar gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa yongs su shes pas snang bar gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rjes su brtags 
[\[4a.6\]]pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu snang bar gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa kun tu 'od kyi dbyings dang /_gnas su rnam par spyod du dbang ba/_ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i sgo thams cad du rnam par rgyu bas snang bar gyur pa/_ye shes snang ba thams cad kyi rjes su 
[\[4a.7\]]song zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la shin tu gnas pa/_chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bstan pa dang /_yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor gtogs pa thams cad kyis khyab 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]par byed pa'i lus can smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sbyor ba la phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[4b.2\]]thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing snying po byang chub tu nye bar 'dong ba yang dag par ston pa/_kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtshos sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi shes pa yongs su rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus can rnams dang thabs gcig go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul 
[\[4b.3\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag na rdo rje dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od dang /_lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od dang /_lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs dang /_lag na rdo rje dpa' bo 
[\[4b.4\]]shin tu mnga' ba dang /_lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba dang /_lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs dang /_lag na rdo rje seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /_lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug pa'i dpal gyi mig dang /_lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad mo'i 'od dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lag 
[\[4b.5\]]na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang /_sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par smon pas zham 'bring na 'brang bar gyur pa/_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dge ba dang /_bsod nams kyi 
[\[4b.6\]]dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yangs pa la rnam par spyod pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang stobs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas pa khong du chud pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i yul la zhugs pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[4b.7\]]'khor thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i lus can sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du lus shin tu ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyi 'phrul pa rjes su rtogs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang /_gnas bsrung ba la shin tu brtson pa rnams 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dang thabs gcig go_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha khrel dang /_dge ba rgyas pa'i 'od dang /_'od zer phyogs su snang ba dang /_sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal dang /_
[\[5a.2\]]rgyan bzang po me tog gtsug phud dang /_spyod yul mtha' yas dpal dang /_snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal dang /_spos dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa'i 'od dang /_srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa dang /_sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig dang khrel dang 
[\[5a.3\]]dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od dang /_lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa kun kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur bar smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig go_/rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[5a.4\]]zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya dang /_rkang gis 'gro pad mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang /_rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par 
[\[5a.5\]]gnon pa dang /_rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa dang /_rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od dang /_rkang gis 'gro pad mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /_rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od dang /_rkang gis 'gro [{]mye [,]me [}]tog mang po'i 
[\[5a.6\]]dkyil 'khor dang /_de dag la sogs pa rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/snying po byang chub kyi lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[5a.7\]]dag dang yang thabs gcig ste 'di ltar/_snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od dang /_snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog gi char 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig dang /_'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug phud dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /_mthu dam pa spos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_pad mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od dang /_snying po byang chub 
[\[5b.2\]]kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa snying po byang chub kyi lha/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang /_sngon sangs rgyas rgya chen mchod pa'i smon lam gyi yang dag par 'byung ba sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nam mkha'i 
[\[5b.3\]]lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba dang /_rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba dang /_slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong bas rnam par snang ba dang /_
[\[5b.4\]]sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig dang /_'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba dang /_bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od dang /_lus dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pas mnyam pa'i 'od dang /_spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan dang /_grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od dang /_de 
[\[5b.5\]]dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nam mkha'i lha/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang /_bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang rab tu brgyan pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[5b.6\]]dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od dang /_shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_sems can rin po ches rgyas pa dang /_dus dus su dge ba'i mig 
[\[5b.7\]]rab tu ston pa dang /_gser gyi mig gi dpal dang /_spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa dang /_sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa dang /_me tog gi glong sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan dang sa'i lha khyim dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od dang /_de dag 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]la sogs pa sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang bsod nams kyi dbyings gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang rab tu 'brel ba sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/ri'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_
[\[6a.2\]]'di ltar ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin du rgyas par gnas pa dang /_nags tshal sna tshogs kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud dang /_kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rdul thams cad dang /_mi gnas pas dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gtsug phud dang /_
[\[6a.3\]]snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od dang /_stobs la thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snang ba'i 'od dang /_kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor dang kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig dang /_ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig dang /_
[\[6a.4\]]de dag la sogs pa ri'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang tshul dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mig gi sgo rab tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_nags tshal 
[\[6a.5\]]gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /_lo ma dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phreng ba'i dpal dang /_yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid dang /_dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs dang sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /_kun nas spos mang po ldang ba'i 'od dang /_kun nas 
[\[6a.6\]]dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang 'bras bu dang ro'i 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang dga' ba'i shugs mtha' yas pas gsal bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/sman 
[\[6a.7\]]gyi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tsan dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba dang /_'od rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba dang /_mun pa 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]rnam par sel cing rnam par spyod pa dang /_sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /_phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba dang /_sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig dang /_de dag la sogs pa sman gyi lha mtha' 
[\[6b.2\]]yas pa kun kyang snying rje dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal dang /_dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od dang /_
[\[6b.3\]]rtsal dam pa'i stobs dang mdangs kyi ngad mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_sa kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu dang /_gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs dang /_yal ga dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par grub pa dang /_spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa dang /_bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba dang /_lo tog gi 
[\[6b.4\]]lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa kun kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa shin tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/chu klung gi lha mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar chu klung gi lha chu bo 
[\[6b.5\]]kun dang ldan pa dang /_ri dang chu kun la rten pa dang /_rdul thams cad dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par dag pa'i mig dang /_nga ros khyab par byed pa dang /_srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa dang /_gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa dang /_dga' bde kun 
[\[6b.6\]]nas 'byung ba dang /_yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba dang /_chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi lha mu med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i don 
[\[6b.7\]]du yid la byed pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal dang /_rdo rje kun nas sra zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_rdul dang dri ma 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gnas dang ldan pa dang /_kun nas chu dang ri bo dang khyim gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_skyabs rin po che [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi zla ba'i dpal dang /_klu'i dpal pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_chu lta bur ro mthun par 'dzin pa'i 'od dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[7a.2\]]'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od dang /_ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs dang /_de dag la sogs pa rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i mthar phyin par rgyas par byed pa 
[\[7a.3\]]sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/me'i lha grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od dang /_kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[7a.4\]]gyi rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa dang /_gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud dang /_dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig gi dpal dang /_phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab kyi spo dang /_'od drag shul can gyi dbang phyug dang /_mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang 
[\[7a.5\]]bar byed pa dang /_me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug dang /_de dag la sogs pa me'i lha grangs med pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba sel ba'i snang ba ston pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/chu'i phung po'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar 
[\[7a.6\]]chu'i phung po'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_sprin sgra'i shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin dang /_chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_bzang por 'khyil ba grub pa'i dpal dang /_kun nas spos dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i myu gu'i dpal dang /_dba' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams 
[\[7a.7\]]stegs kyi 'od dang /_tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /_sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba dang /_'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /_chu'i phung po'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi nga ro'i 'od dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i chu'i phung po'i lha tshad 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i skyabs su brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba'i 'od dang /_kun tu rgyas par 'byung 
[\[7b.2\]]ba'i mthu'i dpal dang /_kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang ba'i 'od dang /_chu drag po'i snying po skems pa dang /_sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs dang /_shing gi rtse mo me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang /_thogs pa med 
[\[7b.3\]]par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba dang /_rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_rlung gi phung po'i lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi mun pa kun nas snang bar byed pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun kyang sems can thams cad 
[\[7b.4\]]kyi sngon gyi mtha'i nga rgyal rnam par gtor ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nam mkha'i lha mu med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od dang /_mtha' yas shing zag pa kun tu rgyas par byed pa dang /_
[\[7b.5\]]rlung kun nas 'byung ba'i dpal dang /_bsgribs pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rgya chen po kun tu gnon pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_'od zer snang ba'i 'od thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_stobs kyi rgyun thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dpal dang /_phyogs dri ma 
[\[7b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]par snang ba'i 'od dang /_dbyangs shin tu 'phags shing zab pa dang nam mkha'i lha phyogs bcur mngon du ston pa'i 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i lha mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad kyang sems rgya mtsho dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yongs su dag pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/
[\[7b.7\]]phyogs kyi lha mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid la mngon du lta ba dang /_snang ba spyod pa'i rgyan dang /_kun tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rmongs 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa med pa'i gtsug yongs su 'grub pa dang /_nam mkha'i rgyud kun tu spyod pa dang /_rnam par spyod pa'i sprin rgya chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]tha dad pa med pa'i gtsug phud dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba kun nas spyod pa dang /_phyogs kyi lha 
[\[8a.2\]]phyogs su rnam par lta ba phreng ba'i 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa phyogs kyi lha mu med pa kun kyang /_sems can gyi rgyud kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/mtshan mo'i lha tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar mtshan mo'i lha 
[\[8a.3\]]dpal dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od dang /_kun nas skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i mig gis 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang /_sgras zhing rgya mtsho dang ldan pa dang /_mtshan mo thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal dang /_shing thams cad rab tu rgyas par 
[\[8a.4\]]byed pa'i 'od dang /_kun nas skyong zhing srung ba'i dpal dang /_dge ba thams cad kyi dga' ba la dbang sgyur ba dang /_mdud par 'dzin pa thams cad zhi ba bya bas dbang po rab tu dga' ba dang /_mtshan mo'i lha dge ba'i bsod nams 'byung ba'i dpal ston pa dang /_de dag 
[\[8a.5\]]la sogs pa mtshan mo'i lha tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun kyang /_chos kyi dga' ba 'byung ba la mos par gnas pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nyin mo'i lha gzhal du med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar nyin mo'i lha khyim dang /_gzhal 
[\[8a.6\]]med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pa dang /_brtsam pa'i blo gros mtshams sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_kun nas dga' ba'i dpal gyi rgyan dang /_me tog dang spos yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /_kun nas yid du 'ong ba'i sman ston pa sgrub pa'i dpal dang /_dga' 
[\[8a.7\]]ba'i mig bzang pos tshim par byed pa dang /_yul rgya chen po'i phyogs kun nas byung ba'i dpal dang /_snying rje rgya chen po'i gzi brjid kyi 'od dang /_snang ba rgya chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi 'bral ba'i 'od dang /_nyin mo'i lha me tog gi phreng ba kun nas 'phyang ba'i dpal 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dang /_de dag la sogs pa nyin mo'i lha gzhal du med pa kun kyang mos pa'i chos gzhal du med pa'i rgyan la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_
[\[8b.2\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde ba'i mchog dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtshon ca chen po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rdo rje sra ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag 
[\[8b.3\]]dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs rgya chen po'i rgyu'i blo gros dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dpal gyi be'u rab tu 'byung ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtul zhugs bzang po'i dbyangs dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun kyang sgyu dang /_nga rgyal dang kun nas nyon 
[\[8b.4\]]mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po [{]myi [,]mi [}]shigs pa'i sems 
[\[8b.5\]]can rin chen gtsug phud dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs dri ma med pa'i dpal dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rgya mtsho chen po'i 'od kyi tshul 'chang ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chos 
[\[8b.6\]]brten pa dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po cod pan sna tshogs dpal gyi gtsug phud dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhin kun tu khyab par ston pa'i shugs dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dge ba rgya mtsho kun nas lta ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[8b.7\]]dbang po klu'i sgra yangs pa kun tu lta ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs yangs pa rab tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/mi 'am ci'i dbang 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]po du ma dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar mi 'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po nga ro yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[9a.2\]]dbyangs dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po shing rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po mthong na dga' zhing spro bar byed pa dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan gyi dpal gyi 'od dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog tshon dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po sa'i 
[\[9a.3\]]gzhi'i dpal dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po drag shul gyi bdag po dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po du ma kun kyang chos thams cad la dga' bas rtse ba yang dag par bskyed pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'phrul po che 
[\[9a.4\]]sa mtshams med pa dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po'i gzi brjid dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po gzi brjid kyi dbyangs la rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros sna tshogs mchog gi gtsug phud dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po mig bzang po'i bdag po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po sgron ma'i skyabs kyi rgyal po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po snang ba shugs bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po seng ge'i phru gu dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rgyan sna 
[\[9a.6\]]tshogs kyi dbyangs dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po ri rab kyi bu dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'od yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos mtshams med pa kun kyang /_sems can gyi gti mug gi dra ba chen po bstsal ba la rab tu 
[\[9a.7\]]brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/dri za'i bdag po tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang /_dri za'i rgyal po shing mi 'am ci'i 'od dang /_dri za'i rgyal po mig gtsang ma dga' ba rab tu skye ba dang /_dri za'i rgyal po me 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]tog dang /_shing shin tu rgyas pa'i cod pan dang /_dri za'i rgyal po dga' bas spyod pa kun tu sgrog pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ba rgyun tu gnas pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]bzang po dang /_dri za'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dri za'i rgyal po 'od zer kun tu 
[\[9b.2\]]'gyed pa'i 'od dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rdo rje'i shing gi yal ga'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dri za'i rgyal po tshad med pa kun kyang /_mos pa dang dga' ba chen po la rab tu brtson pa sha stag 
[\[9b.3\]]dang thabs gcig go_/grul bum gyi bdag po tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar grul bum gyi dbang po 'phags skyes po dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po klu bdag dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po legs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_grul bum gyi 
[\[9b.4\]]dbang po phan par spyod par 'phar ba dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po 'jigs pa las sgrol sgrol ba dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po sa la sna tshogs bzang po dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po ri rab legs par byung ba dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po sde dpa' ba dang /_
[\[9b.5\]]grul bum gyi dbang po dge ba'i mig gi 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po lha dang lha ma yin sgo mtha' yas pa'i mig dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa grul bum gyi dbang po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun kyang chags pa med pa'i chos snang ba mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu 
[\[9b.6\]]brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/klu'i bdag po mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar klu'i dbang po mig [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzang dang /_klu'i dbang po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i dbang po sprin sgra sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_klu'i dbang po 'od 'phro ba'i sgo 
[\[9b.7\]]rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba dang /_klu'i dbang po kun nas ri'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_klu'i dbang po 'jog po dang /_klu'i dbang po mtha' yas par 'gro ba dang /_klu'i dbang po mdzod spu'i gzi brjid dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i shugs dang /_klu'i dbang po kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po'i dbyangs 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dang /_klu'i dbang po ma dros pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i dbang po mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can gyi nyon mongs pas gdung ba'i tsha ba chen po char pa'i sprin gyis shin tu zhi bar bya ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/gnod sbyin gyi bdag 
[\[10a.2\]]po kun tu mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ngal bso po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dbyangs chen dbang phyug dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sa la shin tu gtum pa'i mtshon cha dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po blo gros chen po dang /_gnod 
[\[10a.3\]]sbyin gyi dbang po mig 'od 'phro ba'i bdag po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde mchog tu dpa' ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde'i rgyan chen pos rab tu gnon pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos dge ba'i tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[10a.4\]]dbang po ri bo'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_yongs su bsrung bar rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/zla ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha du ma dag dang yang 
[\[10a.5\]]thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu zla ba dang /_lha'i bu 'od kyi me tog rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang /_lha'i bu dpal gyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi 'od dang /_lha'i bu 'jig rten dga' ba'i bde ba sna tshogs dang /_lha'i bu shing gi dbang po'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'od dang /_lha'i bu 
[\[10a.6\]]'od bzang po ston pa dang /_lha'i bu kun nas spyod pa mi sgul ba'i 'od dang /_lha'i bu skar ma'i rgyal po'i bdag po dang /_lha'i bu blo dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i zla ba dang /_lha'i bu gzi brjid chen po'i 'od zer mdzes pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lha'i bu zla ba'i ris su gtogs pa du ma kun kyang /_
[\[10a.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems rin po che snang bar bya ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu mu med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_lha'i bu gzi brjid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba'i mig dang /_ri bo'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]gyi 'od dang /_rin chen dri med rmad du byung ba dang /_phyir mi ldog par rab tu gnon pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal dang /_'od kyi dpal snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang rin chen gtsug phud rnam par snang ba dang mig kun tu snang ba dang /_sa'i dpal gyi be'u 'dzin pa dang /_lha'i bu sgo thams cad du skyom 
[\[10b.2\]]pa'i dpal gyi 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa mu med pa kun kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs pa 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa tshad med 
[\[10b.3\]]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha'i bu sgra kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug dkyil 'khor dang /_byams par lta ba'i gtsug phud dang /_rin po che'i 'od kun tu grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dga' bde 'byung ba'i gtsug phud dang /_dran 
[\[10b.4\]]pa yid du 'ong ba dang /_ri bo'i sgra'i dpal dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_me tog dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /_ye shes nyi ma'i mig dang /_lha'i bu yang dag par bskul ba'i 'od kyi dbang phyug dang /_de dag la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad 
[\[10b.5\]]med pa kun kyang chos rgya chen po'i rang bzhin dang /_'gro ba thams cad du skyes shing yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/rab mtshe ma la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe 
[\[10b.6\]]ma dang /_dga' ba bde ba'i 'od dang /_blo gros mi zad pa'i yon tan dpal dang /_'byung ba bzang zhing dge ba dang /_sa dang ri bo'i 'od dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang /_'khor lo'i gtsug dang /_gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba dang /_'od rnam par snang ba dang /_lha'i rgyal po 
[\[10b.7\]]grags pa'i phyogs su rnam par lta ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa kun kyang dga' ba dang spro ba rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan dang /_dga' ba rgya mtsho'i gtsug phud dang /_yon tan mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /_'od zer zhi ba'i 'od dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i mig dang /_rin chen 'od zer zla ba dang /_rnam par gnon pas rab tu 
[\[11a.2\]]brtson pa dang /_rdo rje'i mdog gi 'od bzang po dang /_skar mas rgyan pa'i dpal dang /_lha'i bu dga' ba bzang po sna tshogs dang /_de dag la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang /_sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu 'byung ba thams cad rjes su dran par yid la bya 
[\[11a.3\]]ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' dang /_sgras zhi ba'i 'od dang /_stobs kyi 'phrul pa'i sgra'i 'od dang /_dbang chen sna tshogs dang /_sprin sgra shin tu 
[\[11a.4\]]'phags pa dang /_snang ba'i spyod pa'i dpal dang /_gtsug phud yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /_dga' ba'i blo gros dang /_me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud dang /_lha'i rgyal po phyogs shin tu snang ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa kun kyang rnam par thar pa 
[\[11a.5\]]rab tu zhi bas sems can thams cad gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa bgrang du med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur dang /_lha'i rgyal po mig bzang po'i blo gros dang /_cod pan sna tshogs 
[\[11a.6\]]kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_brtson pa'i blo gros dang /_go 'phang rnam par gnon pa'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang /_'od yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_spyod yul zhi ba'i sgo dang /_'khor lo'i ri mo bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog blo gros seng ge'i dbang phyug dang /_lha'i rgyal 
[\[11a.7\]]po dbang po'i stobs ri mo bzang po'i 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po bgrang du med pa kun kyang /_chos kyi dbang rgya chen po la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshangs pa chen po dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]'di ltar tshangs pa chen po rab tu snang ba dang /_blo gros kyi 'od dang /_blo gros bzang po'i sems snang ba dang /_kun tu dbyangs kyi sprin dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i sgra dang /_mig rab tu zhi zhing 'od shin tu zab pa dang /_phyogs su snang ba 'gyed pa dang /_sprul pa'i sgra dbyangs dang /_
[\[11b.2\]]mig gi 'od zer mngon par snang ba dang /_tshangs pa chen po dbyangs rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa tshangs pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems snang bar bya ba dang /_sim par bya ba la byams pa chen po la gnas pa sha stag 
[\[11b.3\]]dang thabs gcig go_/lha'i bu gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu snang bas dga' ba dang /_dge ba sna tshogs kyi 'od dang /_dbang po'i dbyangs dang /_dran pa'i blo dam pa dang /_dga' ba sna tshogs rnam par dag 
[\[11b.4\]]pa'i dbyangs dang /_legs par bsam pa'i dbyangs dang /_'od 'gyed pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba dang /_dbyangs zab mo'i 'od dang /_grags pa dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pas shin tu 'phags pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs 
[\[11b.5\]]pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba dang dga' ba rgya chen po'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu dge bar grags pa'i blo gros dang mchog tu snang ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i dpal dang /_
[\[11b.6\]]dbyangs kyi ri bo dang /_dran pa dge ba'i mig dang /_dga' ba dam pa rnam par snang ba dang /_'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros dang /_gzi brjid 'bar ba'i bdag po dang /_chos kyi dga' bas 'phrul pa'i sems dang /_'phrul pas shin tu 'phags pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge 
[\[11b.7\]]rgyas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang sgo yangs pa la gnas pas 'gro bar 'byung zhing rnam par 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lha'i bu 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bu chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba dang /_dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang /_shes rab mchog gi 'od dang /_ye shes dbang po'i dpal dang /_dga' ba zhi ba dang /_sgo kun nas shes pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros dang /_yon tan blo gros 
[\[12a.2\]]bzang po'i 'od dang /_'od zhi zhing dri ma med pa dang /_lha'i bu snang ba chen po dri ma med pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba'i chos kyi gzhal med khang la kun nas rab tu gnas pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/lha'i bu 
[\[12a.3\]]dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba dang /_lha'i bu dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa dang /_lha'i bu shes rab chen pos dga' zhing spro ba dang /_lha'i 
[\[12a.4\]]bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug dang /_lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems pa dang /_lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba dang /_lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs 
[\[12a.5\]]bzang po dang /_de dag la sogs pa dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang spyod yul mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de ni sems can gyi 
[\[12a.6\]]ris thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/sems can yon tan mtha' yas pa 'dus pa las yongs su byung ba'o/_/phyogs kyi dbyings kun na shin tu gnas pa'o/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi dbyings su rnam par gnas pa'o/_/phan tshun 'dres pa med 
[\[12a.7\]]cing ji ltar 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la mngon par phyogs pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang /_sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/bsgribs pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'o/_/sangs rgyas blta 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ba la sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas snang bar gyur pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon bskal pa rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag 
[\[12b.2\]]gi drung du bzhud pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung zhing thabs kyi sgo de dag gis yongs su smin par byas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la bkod cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa rab tu bskyed pas bsod nams chen po'i stobs dang shugs rab tu thob pa dag go_/smon 
[\[12b.3\]]lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs shing spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dang gzhan yongs su dag pas/_yang dag par byung ba 'byung ba'i lam gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong bas snang bar gyur pa dag ste/_de 
[\[12b.4\]]dag ni mos pa'i stobs gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas blta ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par 'phrul lo/_/de ni 'di lta ste lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i 
[\[12b.5\]]rnam par thar pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang /_nam mkha' ltar zhi ba'i tshul gyi mthu zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni chos thams cad la dbang ba'i stobs la yang dag par gzhol zhing kun nas rjes su 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[12b.6\]]dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_brjod du med cing sbyar ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu shes rab chen pos dga' zhing spro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi tshul thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa'i shes 
[\[12b.7\]]rab rgya mtshos rnam par dpyod pa la rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni sems can la bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde ba mtha' yas pa la mos pa bstan pa rgya chen po'i tshul yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]par gzhag pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_mi shes pa'i mun nag dang /_'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa'i spyod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam pa'i yul mtha' yas pa'i las srid pa thams 
[\[13a.2\]]cad du mi 'byung ba la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad kyi phyogs su 'gro zhing yongs su gnon pa dang /_brten pa'i phyogs kyi mthu zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar 
[\[13a.3\]]pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu zhi ba la 'jug pa/_kun nas khong du chud pa'i gtsug rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_rang gi gzhal med khang dang /_blo'i yul nas dmigs pa tshad med pa'i sangs 
[\[13a.4\]]rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtshos sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/mi zad chos 
[\[13a.5\]]kyi dbyings ni mtha' yas te/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas sku la rab tu gsal/_/de ni gzugs med dngos med rab tu zhi/_/'gro ba'i skyabs su 'byung ba skyes shing byung /_/chos kyi sgron ma sangs rgyas shin tu ston/_/chos la mnga' rab mdzad pa 'jig rten byung /_/de yi 
[\[13a.6\]]spyod yul mtha' yas mi zad de/_/dbang phyug grags pa 'di 'dra'i chos la 'jug_/bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas snang ba byed/_/de yi mtshan nyid phyogs na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_/rnam dag lam ni skye bo dag la ston/_/shin tu dri med mig gis 'di 'dra mthong /_/'gro ba kun 
[\[13a.7\]]gyis bsam du mi nus te/_/rgyal ba'i shes rab mtha' yas gang mnga' ba/_/gti mug bsgribs pa'i sems can rnam par sbyong /_/de la shes rab chen po rnam par gnas/_/skye dgu kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur/_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'gro ba'i dga' ba rgya chen rab tu skyed/_/mi sgul dbang phyug lha yis de mthong ngo /_/sems can rgya mtsho gti mug mun bsgribs la/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid rab tu zhi ba ston/_/shes rab sgron ma 'gro ba 'di brjod de/_/dge ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug_/sangs rgyas 
[\[13b.2\]]kun kyang rnam dag sku ston cing /_/thams cad phyogs su shin tu 'phags pa'i sku/_/de yang dngos med 'jig rten mi gnas te/_/kun snang sems dpa' 'di ni de ltar blta/_/mtha' yas chags med rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung /_/snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag nyan/_/
[\[13b.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams las 'pho bar mi snang ste/_/'di ni shes pas dga' ba'i rnam thar to/_/thams cad phyogs sgo kun nas sangs rgyas te/_/mi yi dbang po rnam thar zhi la bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang zhing rnam par mdzes/_/'di ni sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam 
[\[13b.4\]]thar to/_/rgyal ba bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas su/_/'gro ba kun don rnam par byang chub cing /_/sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/_/rnam par snang bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/de la lha'i rgyal po chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba'i rnam 
[\[13b.5\]]par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang the tsom rnam par blta ba'i chos kyi sprin la rab tu gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rnam pa thams cad yid la byed pa ston pa sbyor ba zhes 
[\[13b.6\]]bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po shes rab mchog gi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa lus kyi rgyan ces bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po ye shes dbang po'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i sems skad cig 
[\[13b.7\]]tu bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po dga' ba zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod dgu 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po sgo kun nas shes pa'i mig gi rnam 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]par thar pa ni/_chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rnam par blta bas 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang byed pa bskal pa mtha' yas pa mngon par 
[\[14a.2\]]'byin pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po yon tan blo gros bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dmigs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi dgos pa thams cad chos gzhal du med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od zhi zhing dri ma med 
[\[14a.3\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can dang chos dang 'byung ba thams cad kyi sgo la mngon sum du yang dag par spyod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po snang ba chen po dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par 
[\[14a.4\]]blta zhing sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i chos nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po chos dpal rab tu snang ba la mos pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus che ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]che ba dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[14a.5\]]yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas yul rnams kun kyang bsam mi khyab/_/sems can kun kyang rtog par nus pa min/_/sems can mos dang bsam pa yangs pa ni/_/mi zad 
[\[14a.6\]]pa dag sangs rgyas skyed pa mdzad/_/sangs rgyas lta bar sems can snod gyur la/_/rgyal ba rnams ni byin gyi brlabs mdzad de/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong /_/'di ltar sna tshogs rgya mtsho mthong ba yin/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid 
[\[14a.7\]]gnas pa med pa dag_/'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba 'byung med gnas pa yod pa min/_/shes rab mchog gi 'od ni 'di sgom mo/_/sems can snyed kyi tshul dang bsam pa yang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab gzhan dang gzhan gyi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]sgor/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul bas tshul ston te/_/dbang po dpal gyi rnam thar rgya mtsho'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams dang ni/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]zad 'das pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kyang /_/de dag sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu ston/_/
[\[14b.2\]]chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgo mo gcig la yang /_/chos kyi sgo mo mi zad rgya mtsho dag_/sangs rgyas chos nyid rab tu nges sgrogs te/_/shes pa'i mig ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug_/phyogs bcu dag na zhing dbyings ji snyed pa/_/de dag kun tu sangs rgyas chos ston kyang /_/
[\[14b.3\]]rgyal ba de ni gar yang 'pho mi mdzad/_/dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros spyod yul lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra ba ste/_/mgon po chos kyi gzhal med khang snang ba/_/chos nyid rab tu zhi ba yang dag ston/_/yon tan blo gros bzang pos 'di mthong ngo /_/
[\[14b.4\]]rang byung rnams kyi spyod yul rnams la ltos/_/sems can kun gyi dbang po'i tshul bzhin du/_/bsam yas 'byung ba'i sgo mos chos char 'bebs/_/'di ni zhi ba'i 'od kyi lha ston to/_/thugs rje rgya chen rab tu bskyed byas shing /_/sems can phan phyir mgon po 
[\[14b.5\]]rnams 'byung ste/_/snod kyi tshul bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs/_/snang ba chen po'i blo gros 'di ston to/_/de la lha'i rgyal po dge bar grags pa'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad rnam par thar pa'i tshogs kyi tshul la rnam par ltar 'dzud 
[\[14b.6\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i rgyal po mchog tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i bu rang bzhin rnam par rig pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_thabs kyi tshul dang sgo thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[14b.7\]]lha'i bu dbyangs kyi ri bo'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i phyi ma'i mtha' thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sgyur ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dran pa dge ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya'o//_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]lha'i bu dga' ba dam pas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_gzungs rgya mtsho la sgo kun nas rab tu brten pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon 
[\[15a.2\]]pa'i bsam pa bskyed pas mos pa sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzi brjid 'bar ba'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba bskyed cing sgrol ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dga' bas 'phrul pa'i sems 
[\[15a.3\]]kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba mtha' yas pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pa'i sgo rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'phrul pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can gyi nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i snying rje 
[\[15a.4\]]dang /_ye shes kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po dge bar grags pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe 
[\[15a.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chags med spyod pa'i chos nyid 'di la ltos/_/mi zad phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas bkang ste/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas yul yang ston/_/rnam thar tshul gyis rgya mtsho zad mi shes/_/bde gshegs 
[\[15a.6\]]'jig rten kun la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_/chos dbyings dam pa kun nas 'byung ba med/_/mig yor spyod yul zhing rnams thams cad de/_/tshul 'di mchog tu snang ba'i lha yi'o/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor thabs la gnas pas na/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun nas 
[\[15a.7\]]rnam par mdzes/_/chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas/_/de la rab zhi dpal gyi lha 'jug go_/sems can gti mug rab rib sgribs pas bsgribs/_/'khor ba'i spyod yul mdongs gyur de dag la/_/rgyal ba dge ba'i lam rnams rab ston te/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]rnam thar de la dbyangs kyi ri bo 'jug_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul/_/sems can kun gyis bsam par mi nus te/_/rnam pa thams cad rgyal bas rab tu ston/_/de ni dran pa dge ba'i mig gis mthong /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rdul dang mnyam pa yi/_/
[\[15b.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi mgon rtag tu gsung /_/sems can thams cad 'dul ba rnam par ston/_/dga' ba rnam par snang bas de mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa ste/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho dag na bar 'ga' ste/_/de la mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bskyed/_/
[\[15b.3\]]'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros de la 'jug_/rgyal ba chos mthu rgya che bsam yas dag_/sems can kun la rnam par sbyong ba mdzad/_/dngos med chos nyid rgyal ba ston par mdzad/_/gzi brjid 'bar ba'i lhas ni de mthong ngo /_/dus gsum bde gshegs phun sum 
[\[15b.4\]]tshogs pa dag_/de dag sems can yul du bsam mi khyab/_/dran nas bdag gi dga' ba rab skyes te/_/de dag chos dga' sems pa rab tu ston/_/'gro ba rnams ni nyon mongs rgya mtsho la/_/gti mug ltas rnyogs 'jigs pa chen por bying /_/snying rje bskyed 
[\[15b.5\]]cing 'gro ba 'grel pa ni/_/'phrul pas 'phags pa spyod yul de la blta/_/'od zer dra ba rgyal ba rtag tu 'gyed/_/'od zer sgo kun rgyal ba mi zad pa/_/sems can dbyings rnams 'dul ba rab tu 'jug_/sna tshogs dbyangs kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo //_//
[\[15b.6\]]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_dum bu dang po/_bam po gnyis so/_/de la gya nom snang ba'i lha'i rgyal po snang bas dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba dang bde ba rab tu zhi ba myong bar byed cing /_'gro ba'i sdug 
[\[15b.7\]]bsngal rab tu gzhil ba la gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems shin tu yangs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi rnal 'byor yangs pa rgya mtsho snying rje dang /_dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dbang po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]thar pa ni/_bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi mthu sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dran pa'i blo dam pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten 'byung ba dang /_
[\[16a.2\]]'jig pa dang /_gnas pa dang bsod nams sna tshogs nam mkha' lta bu yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dga' ba sna tshogs dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni 'phags pa'i chos thams cad la dga' ba/_mtshungs pa med pa'i shugs rnam par spel bas rab tu tshim par byed pa 
[\[16a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu legs par bsam pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dgod cing shin tu bstan pa'i don du yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od 'gyed pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba'i mchod pa 
[\[16a.4\]]shin tu rgyas pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dbyangs zab mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rdzu 'phrul la rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu grags pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[16a.5\]]yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su thob cing 'gro ba la ston pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi brlabs kyis dga' ba 'byung ba'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya'o/_/de nas gya nom snang ba'i lha'i 
[\[16a.6\]]rgyal po snang bas dga' bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_dga' ba dang snang ba dang /_'od chung dang /_'od gsal dang /_gya nom pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[16a.7\]]sngon gyi rgyal ba'i spyod pa bdag gis dran/_/rgyal ba'i mtha' yas grags pa ces mchod dang /_/ji ltar sngon cad dga' shugs yongs su dag_/de ni rgyal ba'i mthu yis bdag gis mthong /_/rgyal ba dri med mtshan nyid med pa'i sku/_/'gro ba'i mya 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ngan mang po rnam par zlog_/byams dang thugs brtse thugs rje'i sa la bzhugs/_/rnam thar 'di tshul sna tshogs 'od 'jug go_/sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di ni rgya che ste/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po ji lta bur/_/ji ltar 'byung dang ji ltar 'jig pa ston/_/rnam 
[\[16b.2\]]thar 'di ni dbang po'i dbyangs kyi yin/_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnyam med phyogs kun gyi/_/zhing gi dbyings su yangs pa shin tu bstan/_/da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba'i dge ba dag_/dran pa dam pa'i rnam thar tshul 'di'o/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po'i rdul snyed kyi/_/
[\[16b.3\]]bde gshegs de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod/_/de phyir nyan pa rdul med don kyang yod/_/sna tshogs dbyangs kyi rnam thar 'di yin no/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po yangs par yang /_/tshul bzhin gyis ni rgyal ba rgya chen gsung /_/rgyal ba kun la zad med mtha' yang 
[\[16b.4\]]yas/_/legs bsam dbyangs kyi rnam thar 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas dbyangs kyi rnams/_/'pho dang rnam par 'tshang rgya tshul yang dag_/sems kyi skad cig kun la rab tu ston/_/'od 'gyed dbyangs kyi rnam thar sgo 'di yin/_/
[\[16b.5\]]sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen bshad pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul yul ni bde bar gshegs pa ston/_/dbang po bsam pa kun kyang rnam par sbyong /_/dbyangs zab 'od ni 'di la rab tu 'jug_/rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mtha' yas te/_/mnyam med chags med sangs 
[\[16b.6\]]rgyas 'jig rten spyod/_/sems can kun la mchog sbyin mngon par gzigs/_/grags pa dri med tshul 'dir rab tu 'jug_/rgyal ba sngon cad byang chub spyod mdzad tshe/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yang dag mchod pa rnams/_/de dag kun gyi smon lam rab grub pa/_/
[\[16b.7\]]de ni 'od 'phags dga' ba rab tu nyan/_/de la tshangs pa chen po rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spyod yul la gnas shing phyogs bcur thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pa chen po blo gros 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po blo gros bzang po'i sems snang ba rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi snang ba bsam 
[\[17a.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po kun tu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing rtogs pa byed pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen 
[\[17a.3\]]po 'jig rten dbang po'i sgra'i rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can thams cad bsdu ba dang gdul ba rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po mig rab tu zhi zhing 'od shin tu zab pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_las 
[\[17a.4\]]kyis rnam par phye ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dbyings shin tu ston pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po phyogs su snang ba 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad du sems can 'dul ba la mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po sprul pa'i sgra 
[\[17a.5\]]dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo dang rab tu zhi ba'i chos la spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po mig gi 'od zer mngon par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dngos po thams cad la chags pa 
[\[17a.6\]]med cing mtha' yas pa'i brtsam pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen po dbyangs rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_mi zad pa'i chos gzhal du med pa la rjes su dpyad par rtag tu phyogs shing rnam par lta ba dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[17a.7\]]de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po chen po yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rgyal ba sku ni zhi la rab tu zhi/_/'jig rten kun tu dri med snang zhing mdzes/_/mtshan nyid med cing gzugs brnyan med pa'i yul/_/sprin dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa snang /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam du mi nus te/_/sangs rgyas sku dang de bzhin bsam 
[\[17b.2\]]gtan yul/_/thams cad tshul gyi sgo yis bsam du med/_/tshangs pa'i blo gros 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/rgya mtsho'i chos rnams zhing gi rdul snyed kyang /_/sangs rgyas gsung gcig yang dag bka' stsal te/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor gsungs kyang zad pa 
[\[17b.3\]]med/_/snang ba sems dpa'i rnam thar 'di yin no/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag kyang /_/'gro ba snyed de rgyud kun sems can shes/_/rgyal ba de la rtog dang dbyangs mi mnga'/_/tshangs pa kun tu sgra dbyangs 'di la 'jug_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[17b.4\]]dus gsum gshegs pa dag_/byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la gang bzhugs pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i sku la thams cad snang /_/rnam thar 'di la 'jig rten dbang po 'jug_/sems can kun gyi las dbang gang yin dang /_/sna tshogs rgyu yi sgo yis rnam grol ba/_/
[\[17b.5\]]'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas yang dag ston/_/zhi ba zab mo'i mig ni 'di la 'jug_/rnam pa mtha' yas sgo yis rang byung rnams/_/phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu sems can 'dul/_/sangs rgyas rtog dang rnam rtog mi mnga' ste/_/snang ba 'gyed pa'i 
[\[17b.6\]]spyod yul 'di yin no/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni mi zad nam mkha' bzhin/_/mtshan nyid mi mnga' phyogs la chags pa med/_/sgyu mar gtogs pa'i chos nyid rab tu ston/_/kun tu 'phrul dga'i spyod yul 'di yin no/_/bde gshegs sku dang ye shes rnam 
[\[17b.7\]]pa dang /_/de bzhin dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' med de/_/chags med sems can sangs rgyas mngon du blta/_/'od zer yid 'ong rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/chos rje chos kyi gzhal med khang bzhugs shing /_/chos kyi sku yi sangs rgyas rab tu snang /_/
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]chos kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas mtshan nyid med/_/rnam thar 'di la rgya mtsho'i 'od 'jug go_/de la lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_mtha' yas pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo yi dbang dang spyod pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[18a.2\]]lha'i bu mig bzang po'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba dang bde ba la rnam par lta ba 'phags pa'i spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams 
[\[18a.3\]]cad kyi 'byung ba sna tshogs don tha dad pa'i dbyings su yang dag gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu go 'phang rnam par gnon pa'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sgo rjes su dran zhing rang gi yul la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[18a.4\]]lha'i bu 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgo nas rab tu zhi ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu spyod yul zhi ba'i sgo'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi khong khro ba yang dag par 'dul ba 
[\[18a.5\]]rab tu brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'khor lo ri mo bzang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mu med par khebs par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu me tog blo gros seng ge'i dbang phyug gi rnam par thar 
[\[18a.6\]]pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba/_rnam pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dbang po'i stobs ri mo bzang po'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi 
[\[18a.7\]]chos nyid la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin rlabs kyi khyad par zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_lha'i bu dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]'di dag smras so/_/chos dbyings mthar thug bde bar gshegs pa'i sku/_/'gro ba kun na mngon par rab tu snang /_/'byam klas thams cad chos kyis sems can 'dul/_/chos kyi mnga' bdag rgyal ba 'gro la ston/_/'jig rten bde ba sna tshogs ma lus pa/_/
[\[18b.2\]]ji snyed de nang 'phags pa de mchog yin/_/chos nyid yangs pa rgyal ba'i gnas yin te/_/mig bzang bdag po 'di la rnam par lta/_/'jig rten phyogs rnams bkang zhing sangs rgyas kyis/_/bsam pa'i dbyangs kyi tshul bzhin chos ston pas/_/sems can kun 
[\[18b.3\]]gyi nem nur dogs pa gcod/_/cod pan sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam thar to/_/rgyal ba'i gsung gcig ma lus gsung ba ni/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor yangs pa'i chos sgrog ste/_/'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas gsung brjod pa/_/'di ni brtson pa'i 
[\[18b.4\]]blo gros rnam thar to/_/'jig rten byams pa 'byam klas rgya chen kun/_/bde gshegs ba spu gcig gi dper mi rung /_/rgyal ba'i byams pa mkha' bzhin zad mi shes/_/bshad pa sna tshogs blo gros rnam thar to/_/nga rgyal ri dang mun sprin sgo 'joms shing /_/
[\[18b.5\]]stobs bcu 'gro ba kun tu khyab byas nas/_/rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed/_/rnam thar 'di ni 'od bzang rgyal mtshan gyi'o/_/bde gshegs mthong bas gti mug rab tu 'joms/_/'gro la shes rab dkyil 'khor dge ba ston/_/de dag ngan 
[\[18b.6\]]'gro'i tshul rnams rnam 'dul te/_/zhi ba spyod yul sgo yi rnam thar to/_/sangs rgyas spu yi khung nas 'od brjod pa/_/sems can kun dang mthun par bde gshegs mtshan/_/de dag bsam pa ji bzhin mtshan kyang thos/_/'khor lo sna tshogs rgyal 
[\[18b.7\]]mtshan rnam thar yin/_/rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa/_/de dag thams cad 'khor 'dir phyin snang zhing /_/chos dbyings nam mkha' rgyal bas rab rgyas pa/_/me tog seng ge dpal gyi rnam thar to/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po tshad med par/_/zhing 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i yul brjod kyang /_/sangs rgyas gshegs dang bzhud par gyur pa med/_/dbang po dpal thob rnam thar 'di yin no/_/de la lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi rang bzhin sprul par rnam 
[\[19a.2\]]par sgom pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sgras zhi ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phrul pa'i sgra'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi gti mug 
[\[19a.3\]]gis yongs su mi zad cing rmongs pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu dbang chen sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung la yang dag par 'jug cing dga' ba tshad med pas rnam par smin pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dran pa'i 'od kyi 
[\[19a.4\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs la 'jug pa zad mi shes pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sprin sgra shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'das pa'i bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud 
[\[19a.5\]]pa rjes su dran zhing spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu snang ba'i spyod pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi shes rab tshad dang bral ba rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gtsug phud yid du 'ong 
[\[19a.6\]]ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyu bas kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dga' ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_brtsam pa thams cad zad mi shes pa la brtson 'grus kyi stobs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes 
[\[19a.7\]]bya'o/_/lha'i bu me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi las la lta zhing bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal bas kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu phyogs shin tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can gyi tshogs 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par sgrub pa sna tshogs kyi dran pas mngon tu sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_
[\[19b.2\]]'jig rten las kyi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab/_/thams cad 'gro ba 'dir yang shin tu bstan/_/rgyu dang rang bzhin rgyal ba sems can tshul/_/'jig rten 'di kun las kyis rnam par bris/_/thams cad tshul du rang byung dngos po med/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[19b.3\]]kun na'ang bzung ba yod pa min/_/chos kyi sku la dngos med de yang bstan/_/sgra zhi 'od kyis rnam thar 'di yang mthong /_/rgyal bas bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad pa'i tshe/_/'jig rten gti mug mun pa rnam par zlog_/de bas sangs rgyas shin tu dri med snang /_/
[\[19b.4\]]rnam thar 'di ni stobs kyi 'od kyis shes/_/ji snyed 'jig rten sgra dbyangs zhi ba'i rnams/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas sgra las nye bar 'byung /_/phyogs rnams zhing dbyings sna tshogs rnam par sgrog_/'di ni sna tshogs dbang gi rnam thar to/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams 
[\[19b.5\]]mthu rnams kun ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]kyang /_/rgyal ba'i mtshan rab gcig tu mi 'gyur te/_/rgyal ba'i bsod nams nam mkha'i dpe lta bu/_/dran pa'i 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/dus gsum bskal pa mtha' dang mu med pa/_/spu gcig rtse la rang byung rnams 
[\[19b.6\]]ston to/_/de dag 'byung 'jig ji lta ba yang ston/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu shes/_/phyogs rnams nam mkha'i mtha' ni rnyed par rung /_/rgyal ba'i spu gcig mtha' ni thug pa med/_/de ltar sangs rgyas chags med bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[19b.7\]]yid 'ong 'od kyi gtsug gis de mthong ngo /_/sngon gyi rgyal bas bskal pa bsam yas par/_/mi skyo'i thugs kyis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya chen rab tu bskang /_/de ni dga' dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/_/'gro ba rnams kyi las kyi rang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bzhin rgyu/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas ma lus gsung /_/dri med rnam dag chos nyid de yang ston/_/de la me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud 'jug_/rgyal ba'i spu gcig rtse la 'gro ba rnams/_/thams cad snyed kyi gzugs kyi sgo la ltos/_/
[\[20a.2\]]'on kyang 'gro zhing 'ong ba de la med/_/rnam thar de ni phyogs su snang bas mthong /_/de la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo phun sum tshogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[20a.3\]]dga' ba rgya mtsho'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nam mkha'i dbyings dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu yon tan mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_smon lam rgya mtsho dri ma med pas 'gro ba rab tu zhi ba byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[20a.4\]]'od zer zhi ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos rjes su bsrung ba'i sgo kun tu bstan pas snang ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rab tu dga' ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams nam mkha'i dbyings ltar dri ma med par yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[20a.5\]]lha'i bu rin chen 'od zer zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba rnam par gdul ba zad mi shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rnam par gnon pas rab tu brtson pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la brtson zhing yang dag par 
[\[20a.6\]]byang chub mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rdo rje mdog gi 'od bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa mi shigs par brtan pa'i rgyun thams cad dga' bas yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu skar mas brgyan pa'i dpal gyi 
[\[20a.7\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi drung du nye bar 'gro zhing phyogs bcu'i sems can rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dga' ba bzang po sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa sems 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]skad cig gis yongs su bstan pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i snod yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[20b.2\]]bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chos dbyings dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_/sems can kun dang mnyam nyid mnyam par 'gyur/_/bsam pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i chos nyid de/_/dri med bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu 'jug_/sangs rgyas sku ni phyogs la thogs 
[\[20b.3\]]pa med/_/gzung ba med cing chags pa gang yang med/_/'gro ba'i gzugs kyi sgo rnams kun la snang /_/rnam thar de la dga' ba'i gtsug phud 'jug_/smon lam rgya mtshos ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa'i/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i spyod pa rnams la ltos/_/thams cad 
[\[20b.4\]]chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas/_/de yi tshul la yon tan rgya mtsho 'jug_/bde gshegs chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni mig yor mtshan nyid do/_/thams cad chos kyi 'od zer snang ba gtong /_/zhi ba'i 'od zer snang bas 'di 
[\[20b.5\]]ltar mthong /_/'gro ba nyon mongs las kyi mun pas bsgribs/_/'jigs dogs bag med dregs pa'i yul can la/_/rgyal ba zhi ba'i chos nyid rab tu ston/_/dga' ba bzang po'i mig gis dga' bar mthong /_/mgon po 'jig rten thams cad skyabs gyur cing /_/
[\[20b.6\]]gnas dang mgon du gyur pa rab 'byung ste/_/rgyal ba sems can kun la bde ba ston/_/de yi tshul la rtse mo'i zla ba 'jug_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/chos dbyings dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_/thams cad chos dbyings 
[\[20b.7\]]pha rol phyin pa brnyes/_/de ni brtson pa'i blo gros dga' ba'o/_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can snod gyur cing /_/bsod nams rgya mtshos rnam dag spyod yul can/_/sangs rgyas yon tan thos shing byang chub 'jug_/rdo rje rdul gyi 'od ni 'di ltar sems/_/zhing 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mnyam pa yi/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras rtag tu kun 'du zhing /_/rgyal ba mchod cing chos nyid nyan par byed/_/brgyan pa'i dpal ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/'gro ba rgya mtsho'i sems ni bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[21a.2\]]gnas med g.yo ba med cing rten pa med/_/thams cad skad cig gcig la rgyal bas mkhyen/_/dga' ba sna tshogs dga' bar 'di mthong ngo /_/de la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi mya ngan bsal ba dge ba'i sgo yang 
[\[21a.3\]]dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dga' ba bde ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dmigs pa thams cad khyab par byed pa'i yul zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu blo gros mi zad pa'i yon tan dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nad thams cad rnam par sel cing phan par snying 
[\[21a.4\]]rje ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'phrul pa bzang zhing dge ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bud med thams cad 'dul ba'i bsam pa rjes su rtogs pa'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sa dang ri bo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad gzung ba la 
[\[21a.5\]]rmongs pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo bde bar snang ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dmigs pa'i yul thams cad las kyi rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'khor lo'i gtsug 
[\[21a.6\]]gi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bgrang ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzi brjid 'od 'phro'i rnam par thar pa ni/_khams thams cad kyi mthar 'gro bas mig shin tu yangs pa'i dkyil 
[\[21a.7\]]'khor gyis kun tu blta ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_las kyi dmigs pa dang 'grogs pa'i bdud kyi las thams cad zlog pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu grags pa'i phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i gnas 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]thams cad kyi 'khor du dgos pa myong bar bya ba la sems rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab mtshe ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho 
[\[21b.2\]]yangs pa rgya chen du/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs pa'i/_/dri med lam ni ye shes dkyil 'khor rnams/_/yang dag brnyes pa'i sgron mas rab tu bstan/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni mtha' yas rgya che ste/_/phyogs bcur mu mtha' rnyed par yongs mi rung /_/
[\[21b.3\]]tshul rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas tshad med de/_/de la dga' ba bde ba'i 'od 'jug go_/nad dang rga ba 'chi ba mya ngan gyis/_/'jig rten gtses shing rab tu gdung ba rnams/_/de dag kun la thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/sangs rgyas blo gros zad pa med pas 
[\[21b.4\]]mthong /_/ye shes sgyu ma sangs rgyas thugs su chud/_/dus gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ste/_/'gro ba thams cad spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/_/'di ni 'phrul pa dge ba'i spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas dbus dang mtha' med gzugs rnams dang /_/
[\[21b.5\]]tha dad yang dag shes pa rgya mtsho gsung /_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag rab tu bskor/_/'di ni sa yi ri 'od rnam thar to/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin rgya chen ston/_/chos rnams thugs su chud pas rnam par dag_/thams cad chos kyi yul ni bsam 
[\[21b.6\]]yas te/_/blo gros bsam yas tshul las 'di yin no/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi byed pa'i/_/bsam gyis mi khyab tshul gyi 'khor lo bskor/_/byang chub spyod pa rgya chen rnams kyang ston/_/'khor lo lta ba 'di yi sa la 'jug_/rgyal 
[\[21b.7\]]ba'i sku ni sems can grangs bzhin du/_/sprul pas 'jig rten yongs su khyab mdzad de/_/'gro ba kun la mngon par kun na gnas/_/gzi brjid 'od 'phro'i spyod yul 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro ba yi/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bzlog par 'gyur/_/bdud kyi las rnams kun kyang de bzhin spong /_/rnam snang 'od kyi spyod yul 'di yin no/_/rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams thams cad kun tu yang /_/rgyal ba bzhugs pas mngon par rab tu mdzes/_/chos
