[\[22a.2\]]kyi sprin chen char yang rab 'bebs te/_/grags pa kun tu grags pa'i rnam thar to/_/de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa rgya chen po rjes su dran pa 
[\[22a.3\]]yid la bya ba dga' ba chen po'i shugs shes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sgra kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i yon tan tu yongs su spyod pa'i shugs kyi snying po zhes 
[\[22a.4\]]bya'o/_/lha'i bu byams par lta ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_byams pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khyab par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rin po che'i 'od kun tu grags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig 
[\[22a.5\]]rten thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_mthu dang sems can gyi rnam pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dga' bde 'byung ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad gzhal med khang rnam par blta ba'i bsod 
[\[22a.6\]]nams yang dag par 'byung ba'i byin gyis rlabs shes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dran pa yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rjes su dran pa rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu ri bo'i sgra'i dpal gyi 
[\[22a.7\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten 'jig pa dang /_'du ba dang bskal pa'i me yongs su 'pho ba'i ye shes kyi rgyan ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba sems can gdul ba'i rgyu dran pa'i rim 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu me tog dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i bu dga' ba thams cad la rtse ba rjes su dran pa'i rim pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu ye shes nyi ma'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i bu thams cad skye bar rab tu brjod pa'i dge ba 
[\[22b.2\]]la rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu yang dag par bskul ba'i 'od kyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i 'khor thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing phan tshun dogs pa'i the tsom rnam par gdon mi za bar gcod pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[22b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/de dag spyod yul rgya chen de dag dang /_/de 
[\[22b.4\]]dag zhing 'byung 'jig pa ji bzhin dran/_/rgyal ba'i mthu yis de dag dri med snang /_/sangs rgyas sku mang phyogs su rgyas byas shing /_/mnyam med gzugs kun 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/rgyal ba kun nas lham me lhang nge ste/_/grags pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od 
[\[22b.5\]]kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/byams pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rgya che zhing /_/shin tu yangs pas 'gro ba kun bkang nas/_/sngon bsgoms sems can mtha' yas khams kyang btul/_/dri med mig gi gtsug phud 'di mthong ngo /_/bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho de 
[\[22b.6\]]dran pas/_/bdag gi dga' ba yang dag 'byung skyes te/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun na mnyam med mchog_/'di ni grags rgyal dri med rnam thar to/_/las dge rgya mtshos 'gro ba kun bkang zhing /_/dri med ma lus rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad/_/de las 
[\[22b.7\]]bsod nams yangs pa kun byung ste/_/dga' bde gtsug phud tshul ni 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas skye ba yangs pas phyogs bkang zhing /_/bde gshegs 'gro ba rgyas pas mngon tu 'gyur/_/de dag rgya chen sems can 'dul la ltos/_/de yi tshul la dran pa'i rgyan 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'jug go_/bde gshegs ye shes sku mnga' spyan yangs pa/_/'byam klas zhing rnams thams cad kun bzhugs pa/_/'byam klas zhing gi rdul la kun kyang bstan/_/rnam thar 'di la sprin gyi dbyangs 'jug go_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi 
[\[23a.2\]]byang chub spyod pa dag_/ji bzhin yangs pa spu yi rtse mo la/_/rgyal bas de dag tshad med phun sum bstan/_/dran pa'i blo gros 'di yi tshul mthong ngo /_/'gro ba 'di na rtse dga' gang bde ba/_/de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthu yis byung /_/bsod nams 
[\[23a.3\]]mnyam med rgyal ba byung la ltos/_/'di ni me tog sna tshogs dri med kyi'o/_/sems gcig rgyud la rgyal ba'i yon tan gyi/_/bde gshegs shin tu rgya chen sus dran pa/_/de la ngan song kun gyi 'jigs pa med/_/ye shes nyi ma'i mig gi rnam thar to/_/
[\[23a.4\]]rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul chos nyid rgya che zhing /_/bsam pa'i las rnams thams cad kun nas gnas/_/de dag the tsom nem nur thams cad sel/_/rnam thar 'di ni brjod dbang blo gros kyi'o/_/de la lha'i bu zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams 
[\[23a.5\]]cad bsdu zhing rnam par gdul ba'i snang bas chos kyi dbyings kun nas dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od kyi me tog rgyal po'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi yul rnam par lta ba dang /_mtha' yas pa'i chos 
[\[23a.6\]]'byam klas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dpal gyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yongs su bzlog cing phan tshun gyi yul dang dmigs pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[23a.7\]]'jig rten pa'i bde ba sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dga' ba dang rangs pa rgya chen po skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu shing gi dbang po'i mig gi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_lo tog thams cad kyi myu gu 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dang sa bon srung ba dang /_dus yongs su bsgyur ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od bzang po ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sgos yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[23b.2\]]lha'i bu kun nas spyod pa mi sgul ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_zla ba dri ma med pa 'dzin cing spyod pas phyogs yongs su 'dus pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu skar ma'i rgyal po'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar dngos po 
[\[23b.3\]]med pa mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu blo dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi skye ba kun kyang las kyi rang bzhin du yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzi brjid chen po'i 'od zer mdzes pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_lha'i 
[\[23b.4\]]dgos pa thams cad la the tsom yang dag par gcod pa brjod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus zla ba'i gzhal med khang du gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[23b.5\]]smras so/_/'gro ba thams cad kun tu 'od bkye zhing /_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas snang /_/mun pa chen pos rmongs pa'i 'jig rten du/_/bsam yas rgya chen chos kyi snang ba 'gyed/_/sangs rgyas yul ni mi zad mtha' yas te/_/'gro 
[\[23b.6\]]ba 'dir ni mtshungs med bskal par 'jug_/rang byung de dag sems can kun la mngon/_/rgyal ba de ltar snang ba'i gtsug gis mthong /_/rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya chen de la ltos/_/sems kyi rgya mtsho tshad med skad cig la/_/chos kyi 'khor los thams cad tshim 
[\[23b.7\]]par mdzad/_/chu bo dpal gyi rnam thar 'di yin no/_/'phags pa'i bde ba med pa'i 'jig rten rnams/_/mtha' yas sdug bsngal nyam ngas rmongs pa la/_/rgyal ba chos nyid rnam par dag pa ston/_/dga' bde sems dpas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]ba'i thugs rje rnam dag ngo mtshar che/_/srid pa'i rgyud du 'gro la phan phyir 'khod/_/dge ba rnam par mi 'jig ston mdzad de/_/shing gi mig gi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i chos kyis 'od rnams rab bkye ba/_/'jig rten las kyi 
[\[24a.2\]]rang bzhin rnam par 'byed/_/dge dang mi dge'i las rnams 'jig pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'od bzang mthong ba rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/'jig rten kun tu rang byung sa lta bu/_/sems can thams cad bsod nams gzhis bzung zhing /_/chos kyi phyogs rnams mya ngan med pa 
[\[24a.3\]]ston/_/spyod pa mi sgul tshul ni 'di yin no/_/chos dbyings thug pa med par rgyal bas khyab/_/'gro dang mnyam par bsam yas sku bkye ste/_/chos kyi tshul ni sems can kun la ston/_/de yi tshul la gzi brjid bdag po 'jug_/nam mkha'i dngos ltar 
[\[24a.4\]]dngos med 'gro ba na/_/gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams snang ba/_/'gro ba kun la phan pa'i don tu byung /_/dge ba'i dpal gyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas sku yi spu rtse kun nas kyang /_/'gro ba kun la chos sprin ma lus gsung /_/
[\[24a.5\]]thos nas dga' ba rgya chen rab tu bskyed/_rnam thar 'di la dag pa'i sems 'jug go_/de la lha'i bu nyi ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can gyi dgos pa thams cad la phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal pa dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snang bas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed pa'i rgyan 
[\[24a.6\]]ces bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzi brjid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can kun la dbang bsgyur ba/_rjes su bsnyags pa'i yongs su sbyangs pas/_shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_
[\[24a.7\]]sems can thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yongs su sbyong bas shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rin chen dri med rmad du byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad la bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]phyir mi ldog par rab tu gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_nyi ma'i 'od chags pa med pas kun tu rgyas par byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi mdangs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu me tog phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nyi ma'i 'od dri ma med pas 
[\[24b.2\]]sems can gyi dgos pa la snang ba rgya chen po dang dga' ba'i shugs dang mos pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'od kyi dpal snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten thams cad kyi 'od rnam pa sna tshogs bsod nams kyi tshogs/_
[\[24b.3\]]rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rin chen gtsug phud rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rin po che sna tshogs thams cad 'grems shing yul du ma'i gzugs yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i 
[\[24b.4\]]bu mig kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi mig gi dbang po yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par lta ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dpal gyi be'u 'dzin pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chu'i rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong zhing rnam 
[\[24b.5\]]par 'jig pa med pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu sgo thams cad skyom pa'i dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nyi ma'i gzhal med khang gis phyogs su 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la snang ba yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i 
[\[24b.6\]]bu nyi mas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bde gshegs ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i 'od/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[24b.7\]]kun tu thams cad zhing bkang zhing /_/'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas mngon bstan te/_/thabs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams yangs pa/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su bkang bstan zhing /_/'gro ba 'dir ni shes 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rab mnyam med brjod/_/gzi brjid 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas kun tu rab 'phags pa/_/phyogs rnams rgyas par kun nas mdzes shing snang /_/rgyal ba'i sku ni mi mnyam dpag tu med/_/ri rab 'od mchog 
[\[25a.2\]]rnam thar 'di yin no/_/mtha' yas srid par bskal pa rgya mtshor yang /_/rgyal bas 'gro don brtul zhugs spyad pas na/_/de phyir sangs rgyas 'od ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/zla ba'i dpal gyis rgyal ba'i sku mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i gsung mchog chags med 
[\[25a.3\]]rnam grol bas/_/phyogs dang zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rgyan/_/'gro bar chos kyi ro rnams bsags pa'i rgyu/_/'di dag brtson 'grus bzang pos rab tu shes/_/'od kyi dra ba bsam yas btang bas na/_/phyogs rnams kun tu sems can 
[\[25a.4\]]rnam par spyod/_/mos pa rgya chen yangs pa rab tu bskyed/_/phreng ba snang ba'i dpal gyi rnam thar to/_/'gro ba dag na ji snyed 'od yod pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i spu gcig dper mi rung /_/sangs rgyas 'od rnams de ltar bsam mi khyab/_/'di ni snang ba'i 
[\[25a.5\]]'od kyi rnam thar to/_/rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ste/_/thams cad phyogs su byang chub shing dbang drung /_/lam ngan song la lam rnams mngon du ston/_/gtsug phud sna tshogs rnam par snang bas mthong /_/'gro ba gti mug mun par nub gyur pa/_/
[\[25a.6\]]sdug bsngal can la rgyal ba mig skyes shing /_/de dag ye shes sgron mas rab tu bstan/_/rnam thar 'di ni mig bzang snang bas mthong /_/thams cad tshul gyis rnam thar rang byung ba/_/gang du gang tshe mchod pa gzigs pa na/_/thar pa'i 'bras bu rim 
[\[25a.7\]]gyis rab tu ston/_/'di ni snang ba'i dpal gyi tshul dang sa/_/chos rnams gcig gi sgo nas mtha' yas pa'i/_/bskal pa stong du mi mgon rab tu snang /_/chos kyi don yangs phyogs rnams kun tu ston/_/'di ni kun tu dpal gyi rnam thar to/_/de la dri 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]za'i rgyal po gnas srung po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_kun tu rtse ba'i thabs thams cad kyis sems can sdud pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po shing mi 'am ci'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chags pa thams cad kyi yon tan rnam par brgyan pas kun tu snang ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[25b.2\]]dri za'i dbang po mig gtsang ma dga' ba rab tu skye ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi mya ngan rnam par zlog pas dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po me tog dang shing shin tu rgyas pa'i cod pan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba'i lta ba dang nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[25b.3\]]cad rnam par 'jil ba zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po dga' bas spyod pa kun tu sgrog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sprin gyi 'od ces bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po rab tu dga' ba rgyun du gnas pa'i mig bzang po'i rnam 
[\[25b.4\]]par thar pa ni/_dga' ba thams cad rab tu gnas pa yangs pa la mos pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rin po che dgram pas phyogs thams cad khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po 
[\[25b.5\]]'od zer kun tu 'gyed pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dge ba'i lus thams cad yang dag par bstan pas dga' ba shin tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po rdo rje shing gi yal ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_shing thams cad kyi mdangs 'byung bas 
[\[25b.6\]]rab tu dga' ba'i mig kun tu snang ba zhes bya'o/_/dri za'i dbang po rgyan thams cad la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par dpyod cing sems can gyi sgo rab tu brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas dri za'i 
[\[25b.7\]]dbang po gnas srung pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus dri za'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas sgo can yang /_/'gro ba kun gyis 'jug par nus pa min/_/bde gshegs 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]nam mkha'i rang bzhin dri ma med/_/rgyal ba 'gro ba kun tu lam yang ston/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med de/_/ba spu khung bu kun na'ang shin tu yang /_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde don mdzad/_/yid 'ong shing gi 'od ni 
[\[26a.2\]]'di ston to/_/'gro ba'i don ni rgya mtsho yangs mang dang /_/sdug bsngal ma lus rgyal bas zlog pa mdzad/_/thabs dang thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs mnga'/_/dge ba'i mig ni rnam thar 'di ston to/_/phyogs rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas zhing gi rnams/_/
[\[26a.3\]]kun tu rgyal ba'i 'od rab snang bar 'char/_/sems can lta ba'i dri ma rnam par sbyong /_/me tog shing gi gtsug phud cod pan tshul/_/sngon cad rgyal ba rgya mtsho rab mang bar/_/byams pa'i tshul yang yongs su bsgoms pas na/_/rgyal ba 'gro ba kun gyi dbugs kyang 'byin/_/
[\[26a.4\]]kun tu sgra dbyangs 'di yi tshul la 'jug_/rgyal ba mthong bas dga' ba kun dge dang /_/'gro ba 'dir ni mi zad bde ba 'byung /_/thar pa'i 'bras bu rgyu rnams rim gyis ston/_/mu tig cod pan rnam thar 'di ston to/_/sgrib dang rab rib gti mug stug por ni/_/
[\[26a.5\]]sems can 'khor tshe rtag tu shin tu rmongs/_/de la rgyal ba chos nyid yangs pa ston/_/seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'di la rab tu 'jug_/'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa mtha' yas kyang /_/bde gshegs gzugs rnams rab tu yangs pa ston/_/'gro bar thabs rnams 
[\[26a.6\]]sna tshogs sgo nas snang /_/de ltar dbyangs snyan bde bar gshegs pa mthong /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis phyogs mtha' yas/_/sems can dag la rgyas par rgyal bas bstan/_/byang chub spyod mchog 'jug pa'i tshul yin te/_/rdo rje shing gi 
[\[26a.7\]]rgyal mtshan rnam par sems/_/skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brgya mang ba/_/sangs rgyas ston kyang 'pho ba yod med de/_/sems can rnams kyi bde ba thams cad skyed/_/dga' ba mthong ba'i rnam thar tshul 'di yin/_/de la grul bum gyi dbang po'aphags 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]skyes po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_mdud par 'dzin pa byung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po klu bdag gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgo mtha' yas par spyod pa rgya mtsho la spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po legs par spyad pa'i rgyal 
[\[26b.2\]]mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rgyud thams cad du 'jig rten gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho snyed kyi sgo zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po phan par spyod par 'phar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_snang ba dri ma med pa'i bya ba la kun nas spyod par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang 
[\[26b.3\]]po 'jigs pa las bsgral ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i lam 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/grum bum gyi dbang po rtsal sna tshogs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i sred pa rgya mtshos yongs su gdung ba zhi bar byed pa 
[\[26b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po ri rab legs par byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba rgyud thams cad du snang ba'i sprin yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po sde dpa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_kun nas snang bas sgrib pa'i ri yang dag par 'jom pa 
[\[26b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po dge ba'i mig gi 'od zer mtha' yas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_snying rje chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/grul bum gyi dbang po lha dang lha ma yin sgo mtha' yas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_rgyud kun tu lus 
[\[26b.6\]]yang dag par ston par 'gro ba'i yul zhes bya'o/_/de nas grul bum gyi dbang po 'phags skyes pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_grul bum gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten 
[\[26b.7\]]mgon po bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan/_/'gro la phan don bskal pa bsam yas spyod/_/nga rgyal dregs myos spangs pas 'jig rten khams/_/kun na rgyal ba'i sku gsal rab tu mdzes/_/sngon cad rgyal bas spyod pa rgya mtsho dag_/spyad de thabs mang tshogs pas 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]phan bskyed nas/_/phyogs bcur mtha' yas sems can smin par mdzad/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni klu bdag gi'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yangs pa 'gro ba'i mgon/_/de ni sems can bsam pa kun kyang gsal/_/sna tshogs 'phrul 
[\[27a.2\]]sgos sems can rnam par 'dul/_/rgyal ba mthong bas sna tshogs rgyal mtshan dga'/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul dag gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/'jig rten kun na phyi mtha'i bskal par gnas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo mkha' 'dra yang dag dngos/_/
[\[27a.3\]]de ni phan spyod rgyu bas mthong ba yin/_/mi bzad rab rib bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten du/_/rgyal ba'i 'od bstan rnam thar lam dge ston/_/mgon dang skyabs gyur sdug bsngal thams cad spong /_/'jigs las sgrol bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/sred 
[\[27a.4\]]pa rgya mtshos gdungs 'gro sdug bsngal ba/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes 'od kyis ma lus zhi/_/sbyangs shing rgyal ba sangs rgyas chos nyid ston/_/sna tshogs khyim ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/'gro ba 'byam klas kun na sangs rgyas sku/_/thabs sgo tshogs 
[\[27a.5\]]pas sems can 'dul ba snang /_/chos sprin char 'bebs gsung gi 'brug sgra sgrog_/rnam thar 'di ni ri rab blo gros kyi'o/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni dri med 'gro kun tu/_/don yod 'gro ba'i sgrib kun kun nas sol/_/sangs rgyas yon tan snang mdzad sgra 
[\[27a.6\]]yang 'byin/_/rnam thar mtha' yas tshul 'di dpa' sdes mthong /_/bskal pa snga tshe thugs rje'i sgo mang ba/_/'gro kun phan bde'i don tu rgyal bas bsgoms/_/'byam klas sna tshogs thabs kyis sdug bsngal bsal/_/de ni mtha' yas dge ba'i zer gyis mthong /_/
[\[27a.7\]]rgyal ba'i sku ni mtha' yas kun tu rgyu/_/'jig rten kun tu'ang byon dang bzhud mi mnga'/_/kun nas rang byung rnam par 'phrul pa snang /_/de ni lha dbang mtha' yas sgo yis mthong /_/de la klu'i dbang po mig mi bzang gi rnam par thar pa ni/_klu'i 'gro ba'i rgyud thams 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]cad kyi 'bar ba zhi bar byas pas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems skad cig gis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can dang klu rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i lus dang /_kha dog rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po 
[\[27b.2\]]sprin sgra sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du ming gi 'khor lo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dge ba'i nga ror sgrog pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba'i sgo rgya mtshos rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rab tu 
[\[27b.3\]]bkod cing rnam par dbye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa yang dag par ston pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po kun nas ri'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad la bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i dga' 
[\[27b.4\]]ba'i shugs shin tu yangs pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jigs pa'i sgra skad thams cad yongs su skem pa'i skyabs dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas par 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_gzugs kyi sprin rgya chen 
[\[27b.5\]]po shin tu ston cing bskal par byin gyi rlob pa'i brtson 'grus shes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po mdzod spu'i gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la dga' ba'i shugs yangs pa dang yang dag par mos pa rgya mtsho shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[27b.6\]]klu'i rgyal po kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgra thams cad 'byung ba la yang dag par gzhol zhing yid du 'ong bas thogs pa med par kun tu rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug 
[\[27b.7\]]bsngal rgya mtsho la snying rje'i sgo kun nas sprin gyis 'gengs shing rab tu zhi ba dang /_yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_klu'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid de dag ltos/_/drang srong chen po 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs/_/mi bzad klu yi rgyud du lhung ba rnams/_/byams pa'i stobs kyis rim gyis 'don pa mdzad/_/'gro ba kun snyed gzugs 
[\[28a.2\]]kyi sgo rnams kyang /_/rgyal bas spu gcig rtse la mngon par bstan/_/thams cad rdul la 'phrul gyis mngon par 'phrul/_/rgyal ba'i rnam thar rgya mtsho'i klu yis mthong /_/rgyal ba de yi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas te/_/sangs rgyas mtshan kyang 'gro snyed rgya mtsho'o/_/
[\[28a.3\]]de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin nyan/_/sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan de 'dra'i rnam thar ldan/_/khro ba rgya mtshor 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bsgribs shing g.yogs pa'ang khro ba'i rgya mtshor te/_/de la rang byung byams dang thugs rjes 'dzin/_/'di ni 'od 'phro sgo 
[\[28a.4\]]yi klu yis mthong /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams mthu yi rnams/_/sangs rgyas spu gcig rtse la mngon par ston/_/bsod nams 'jug pa rgya mtsho kun kyang bstan/_/'di ni ri bo sprin gyi klu yis mthong /_/'jigs pa ches mnar sems can sdug bsngal ba/_/
[\[28a.5\]]rgyal ba'i 'od chen shin tu yangs pas bskyabs/_/spu yi sgo nas yid 'ong sgra yang 'byung /_/rnam thar 'di ni 'jog po klu yis mthong /_/dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/sku ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku la bstan/_/de bzhin bskal pa brgyud 
[\[28a.6\]]pa'i zhing mang yang /_/mtha' yas goms pa'i klu yis de mthong ngo /_/rgyal bas spu gcig rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas bkang /_/zhing mang mtha' yas kun kyang der zhugs te/_/de na bzhugs par rgyal ba 'khor gyis mthong /_/rnam thar de ni 'od 'bar klu yi'o/_/
[\[28a.7\]]ji snyed rgyal ba rgya mtsho mchod byas pa'i/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i chos nyid rab mthong zhing /_/de la dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par bskyed/_/shugs lam klu ni 'di la rab tu 'jug_/rang byung gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba thams cad chos 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]kyis ngoms par mdzad/_/rgyal ba'i gsung ni zhi zhing dga' 'gyur ba/_/de ni kun tu spyod pa'i klus thos so/_/srid pa kun tu sdug bsngal gzir mthong nas/_/nyon mongs las kyis 'khor zhing mgon med pa/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos rab tu 'grol/_/
[\[28b.2\]]rnam thar 'di ni ma dros klus mthong ngo /_/de la rgyal po chen po ngal bsos po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba'i sgo rnam par blta ba'i yul gyi rgyud kyis phan par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dbyangs chen dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgo thams cad 
[\[28b.3\]]la dbang byed pas rnam par lta zhing /_sems can la phan par sbyor bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sa la shin tu gtum pa'i mtshon cha'i rnam par thar pa ni/_gtum pa dang drag shul gyi rgyun las bsrung ba kun nas mang po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[28b.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi dbang po blo gros chen po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'phags pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su mthong ba la rnam par blta bas dga' ba dang mos par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig 'od 'phro ba'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_
[\[28b.5\]]sems can thams cad la shes rab dang ye shes dang /_snying rje rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sna tshogs su sbyor ba dang /_bsrung ba mngon par bsgrub pa zhes 
[\[28b.6\]]bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde mchog tu dpa' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad kyi don gyi dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde'i rgyan chen pos rab tu gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad lam 
[\[28b.7\]]la dgod par gti mug med pas bsrung ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dge ba'i tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par spel bas kun tu dga' ba myong ba zhes bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]dbang po ri bo'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs yang dag par 'byung ba rjes su ye shes kyi 'od ces bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po ngal bsos pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[29a.2\]]thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/lha dbang sems can ma rung gang dag gis/_/bskal pa brgya mang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing /_/srid pa dag na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal ba/_/de dag yongs su dgrol bar 
[\[29a.3\]]sangs rgyas byung /_/sangs rgyas sems can phan dang bskyab pa'i phyir/_/'gro ba kun la mngon par kun na bzhugs/_/nyam nga 'gro ba'i 'khor lo dag nas 'don/_/'di la dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gnod sbyin 'jug_/mi bzad las kyis bsgribs pa'i sems 
[\[29a.4\]]can la/_/rgyal bas zhi ba'i tshul rnams shin tu bstan/_/'gro ba rnams la chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin/_/rnam thar 'di ni gtum pa'i mtshon chas mthong /_/rang 'byung bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan phyogs bcu kun tu grags/_/
[\[29a.5\]]de bas rgyal ba'i grags pa kun tu grags/_/'di ni blo chen gnod sbyin bdag pos mthong /_/rgyal ba'i shes rab mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te/_/sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/de bas thams cad phyogs su rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[29a.6\]]'od 'phro mig gi bdag po'i rnam thar to/_/mi yi dbang po 'gro ba thams cad du/_/yid 'ong dbyangs sgrog sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/_/phan don skyabs mdzad chos rnams shin tu bstan/_/tshul 'dir rdo rje'i mig legs rab tu 'jug_/don dbyings 
[\[29a.7\]]rgya chen ji snyed de dag kun/_/rgya mtsho'i mdo tshul 'gro ba'i grangs snyed rnams/_/mi yi dbang po dbyings gcig sgo nas bstan/_/'di ni blo gros dpa' bo'i rnam thar to/_/'gro ba lam ngan gnas pa thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab lam 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]ston te/_/snod du gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun na bzhugs/_/'di la slob pa sde yi rgyan yin no/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams rgyu ba ji snyed pa/_/rgyal ba'i 'od la thams cad rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/_/rnam thar 'di ni gnod sbyin nor bdag 
[\[29b.2\]]mthong /_/rgyal ba'i stobs rnams gang du yongs dag ste/_/bde gshegs stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab dran/_/'di ni ri bo stobs 'joms rnam thar to/_/de la mi 'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od kyi rnam 
[\[29b.3\]]par thar pa ni/_bya ba thams cad la yang dag par rdzogs par 'jug pa dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba thams cad kyi bde ba myong ba las bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba 'byung ba zhes 
[\[29b.4\]]bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_yon tan thams cad kyis yang dag par ngoms pas mos pa rgya chen po sbyong ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po nga ro yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgra snyan cing 
[\[29b.5\]]yid du 'ong ba la thogs pa med pas kun tu sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po shing rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_snying rje'i rgyud la 'gro ba dgong cing sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul ba la dmigs pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po 
[\[29b.6\]]mthong na dga' zhing spro bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_gzugs kyi lus dge ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan gyi dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rgyan thams cad kyis mdangs rab tu skyed 
[\[29b.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog tshon bzang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rigs la rnam par lta zhing yang dag par sgrub pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po sa gzhi'i dpal gyi 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad rtsal gyis mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po drag shul gyi bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_mi 'am ci'i 'khor thams cad kyi sems la rnam par blta zhing 'dren pa'i 'od 
[\[30a.2\]]ces bya'o/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_mi 'am ci'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ji snyed 'gro ba dag na bde 'byung ba/_/de dag thams cad rgyal ba mthong 
[\[30a.3\]]bas 'byung /_/mgon po de ni skyabs dang mgon yin te/_/sems can thams cad gnas yin phan mdzad pa'o/_/sems can kun gyi mi zad bde ba'i rnams/_/ji snyed 'byung ba rab tu yod pa kun/_/de dag kun la 'dren pa don yod do/_/de ni dpal 
[\[30a.4\]]gyi dkyil 'khor mi cis mthong /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho mi zad pa/_/de yi mtha' ni 'gro bas mi rnyed de/_/phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par mdzes shing 'bar/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyi rnam thar 'di 'dra'o/_/sems can kun gyi yid du 
[\[30a.5\]]'ong ba yi/_/sgra dbyangs sangs rgyas yang dag rnam sgrog cing /_/mya ngan med pa'i chos nyid ston pa ni/_/sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba mi cis thos/_/sngon cad de bzhin gshegs pas spyad pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bdag gis mthong /_/rgya chen 
[\[30a.6\]]thugs rjes rnam par shin tu sbyangs/_/shing gi 'od kyi mi 'am ci yis mthong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pa ni/_/'gro ba rnams la bskal pa bye bar dkon/_/sangs rgyas mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu brgyan/_/dga' bde mos par byed 
[\[30a.7\]]pas 'di mthong don/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni/_/sems can kun kyi bsam pa gzhal mdzad de/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yang ston/_/'di ni rgyan dbang mi 'am ci yis mthong /_/'byam klas las ni bsam gyis 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]mi khyab ste/_/de phyir sems can bde dang sdug bsngal kun/_/bde bar gshegs pas thams cad rab tu bstan/_/me tog rgyal mtshan 'di ni mi cis mthong /_/sangs rgyas gshegs thabs rnam par 'phrul pa yang /_/sems can kun gyis shes par mi 
[\[30b.2\]]nus te/_/sa rnams thams cad gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur/_/de ltar sa yi 'od kyi mi cis mthong /_/'khor du rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing /_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad ston mdzad de/_/'od zer 'khor gyis bskul ba'ang de bzhin mdzad/_/
[\[30b.3\]]'di ni drag shul bdag po'i spyod yul lo//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gsum mo/_/de la lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[30b.4\]]dbyings thams cad rab tu gnon pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan ces bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po gzi brjid kyi dbyangs la rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bas tshim par byed cing /_yongs su sbyong ba 'byung 
[\[30b.5\]]ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros sna tshogs mchog gi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dpyod pa dge ba la kun nas yang dag par gzhol bas mos par byed ces bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po mig 
[\[30b.6\]]bzang po'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chags pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i sgron ma'i skyabs kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can 
[\[30b.7\]]thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par ldog cing lam gyi phyogs yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po snang ba shugs bzang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa dang /_'phags pa'i yon tan 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]la 'jug pas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po seng ge'i phru gu'i rnam par thar pa ni/_stobs dang brtson pa kha na ma tho ba med pas sems can skyob pa'i bdag po zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[31a.2\]]kyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang dga' ba mtha' yas pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po ri rab kyi bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sgrib pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mi skul bas pha rol tu 'gro zhing dga' ba 
[\[31a.3\]]kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'od yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can gyi rgyud mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi lam gyi phyogs ston pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang 
[\[31a.4\]]po'i gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid rgya chen yangs la ltos/_/sems can kun gyi mdangs dang 
[\[31a.5\]]bde ba 'byung /_/nad med 'chi med lam yang shin tu ston/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab zhi gnas kyang med/_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul chos nyid de yang ltos/_/phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par rab tu 'phags/_/'jig rten kun tu thub pa mngon par 
[\[31a.6\]]mdzes/_/lto 'phye chen po 'od mdzes 'di la 'jug_/nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pas stug bsgribs shing /_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho gting ring nub pa yi/_/sems can rnams la zhi ba'i spyod yul ston/_/gzi brjid rdul med dbyangs kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/
[\[31a.7\]]sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa ma lus thugs su chud/_/de dag kun la rnam dag chos nyid ston/_/lto 'phye chen po'i sna tshogs gtsug phud 'jug_/bsam gyis mi khyab bsod nams rgya mtsho'i dbyings[(,]//[)]
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]mtha' yas yang dag 'byung ba rgyal bas gzigs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bsod nams zhing /_/mig bzang bdag po lto 'phye chen pos mthong /_/sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa rnams/_/ji snyed de dag rgyal bas kun 
[\[31b.2\]]nas skyabs/_/rgyal ba chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/de ni sgron ma skyabs kyi spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas ba spu re re'i yon tan yang /_/'jig rten kun gyis shes par mi nus te/_/mgon po rnams ni mi zad nam mkha' bzhin/_/'di 
[\[31b.3\]]ni shugs kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par mthong /_/thams cad chos dang stobs kyi mthar phyin pas/_/sangs rgyas ri bo lta bur bskyod mi nus/_/de yi chos nyid rgyal ba rab tu mdzes/_/seng ge'i phrug pa dpal ni 'di la 'jug_/rgyal ba rnams kyis 
[\[31b.4\]]rnam thar la dga' ba/_/bskal pa snga tshe rgya che spel bas na/_/de phyir 'gro ba kun bltas yid du 'ong /_/sna tshogs sgra dbyangs rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams/_/yongs bskang chos dbyings sku dang spyod yul med/_/
[\[31b.5\]]'jig rten thams cad skyabs gyur sgron ma ste/_/ri rab bu ni tshul bzang 'di la 'jug_/de la nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_thogs pa med pa'i mig la sgrib pa med pas sems can gyi khams rnam par lta ba zhes 
[\[31b.6\]]bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mi shigs pa'i sems rin chen gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_phyogs bcu'i sems can yongs su smin par bya bas/_chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs dri ma med 
[\[31b.7\]]pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgo kun nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs kyi mthus 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chos brtan pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po cod pan sna tshogs kyi dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi 
[\[32a.2\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer rab tu brgyan pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzhi kun tu khyab par ston pa'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_stobs kun nas yang dag par bsgrub pas thub pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/
[\[32a.3\]]nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dge ba rgya mtsho kun nas lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can gyi ris thams cad rnam par bsgom pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po klu'i sgra yangs pa kun tu lta ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar 
[\[32a.4\]]pa ni/_sems can mtha' yas skye ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba shes pa'i ye shes la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dab ma bzang po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam 
[\[32a.5\]]par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus dbyings bkang zhing /_/'jig rten mgon po rgya chen spyan gyis gzigs/_/sems can 'dul ba de la tshad kyang med/_/rang byung rnam thar rgya chen 
[\[32a.6\]]shin tu yangs/_/'jig rten mgon gyi 'phrul stobs chags pa med/_/phyogs bcu'i snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs/_/rgyal ba'i mdo sde sprin rnams thams cad kyang /_/rin chen sna tshogs gtsug phud mkha' lding nyan/_/sngon gyi bde bar 
[\[32a.7\]]gshegs pa'i spyod pa rnams/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya chen byang ba mthong /_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yang dag byed/_/'dab ma bzang po shugs bzang de brjod do/_/skad cig sems la byang chub spyod mtha' yas/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i spu rtse kun na snang /_/
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rgyal ba'i spyod yul tshad med ci 'dra ba/_/de ni rgyan bzang nam mkha' lding gis mthong /_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul yangs pa bsam mi khyab/_/'gro ba kun gyis bsam par sla ba min/_/ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten mgon/_/rnam thar 'di ni mkha' lding 'gro 
[\[32b.2\]]'dzin gyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mtha' yas 'od/_/'gro ba gti mug dra ba ma lus sel/_/rgyal ba 'jig rten thams cad kun gyi mgon/_/de 'dra chos bstan 'dzin pa 'dab bzang ston/_/chos kyi grong khyer mi zad thams cad nas/_/
[\[32b.3\]]sangs rgyas rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu ston/_/mtha' yas chos kyi sgo mo du ma nas/_/'dab bzang sna tshogs gtsug phud 'di la 'jug_/thams cad stobs la rang byung rab tu zhugs/_/rgyal ba kun dang sku gcig chos kyi sku/_/de bzhin nyid dngos rnam par 
[\[32b.4\]]rtog mi mnga'/_/kun tu rgyu ba'i 'dab bzang 'di brjod do/_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer 'jig rten kun bkye ba/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can khams kyang 'dul/_/srid pa snga tshe bsdus pa rnam par spyod/_/rnam thar 'di ni mig bzang dam pa'o/_/dri med rgya 
[\[32b.5\]]mtsho'i las la gnas pa yis/_/zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus sangs rgyas gzigs/_/de dag kun tu rgyal ba chos char 'bebs/_/rgya mtsho rgyu ba'i mkha' lding 'di ltar lta/_/de la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dbang po 
[\[32b.6\]]chen pos shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgo kun nas byin gyis rlobs pa rnam par gzhog pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde ba'i mchog gi rnam par 
[\[32b.7\]]thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa rdul med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtshon cha chen po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad la gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_phyogs bcu rab tu bskul ba'i yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya'o/_/
[\[33a.2\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po rdo rje sra ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag gi rnam par thar pa ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs rgya chen po'i rgyu'i blo 
[\[33a.3\]]gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'i stobs la gti mug med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po dpal gyi be'u 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyong zhing sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa zhes 
[\[33a.4\]]bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtul zhugs bzang po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'jug cing gti mug med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis sangs 
[\[33a.5\]]rgyas kyi mthus/_lha ma yin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/phyogs rnams rgya che de dag thams cad du/_/rgyal ba'i zil gyis 'byam klas 'khor kyang gnon/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[33a.6\]]mtshan nyid kun tu 'od 'phro ste/_/thams cad sgo nas 'gro bar mngon par mdzes/_/skad cig sems kyis bskal pa brgya mang gi_/sangs rgyas yul rnams ma lus thams cad ston/_/'dul ba kun la 'od rnams rab tu 'gyed/_/rnam thar de ni 
[\[33a.7\]]thags zangs ris kyis mthong /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul gzhal med bdag gis mthong /_/sna tshogs sgo nas sems can don kyang mdzad/_/sdug bsngal thams cad bde gshegs zhir mdzad de/_/rnam thar 'di la bde ba'i mchog 'jug go_/'gro 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]ba'i don du brtul zhugs dka' thub rnams/_/dge ba rgyal bas bskal pa brgyar spyad de/_/de phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes kun tu sgo/_/dra ba bzang po sangs rgyas 'di ltar brjod/_/zhing dbyings thams cad rgyal ba g.yo bar mdzad/_/'jigs pa mi ston skrag 
[\[33b.2\]]pa yod pa min/_/bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul chags med gzhal du med/_/lha min dbang po stobs can de ltar ston/_/sangs rgyas skye ba bde bar 'byung ba rnams/_/'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/_/thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes 
[\[33b.3\]]phyogs kyang ston/_/rnam par snang ba 'di ni rab tu brjod/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams rgya chen dge ba dag/_/rgyal ba'i mthu yis de dag byung ba ste/_/thar pa'i phyogs kyi lam yang rgyal ba ston/_/chos dpal 
[\[33b.4\]]'di mthong 'di la rab tu 'jug_/bde gshegs thugs rje sku ni mnyam pa med/_/chags med spyod pa thams cad kun tu snang /_/'gro ba thams cad mig yor mtshan nyid de/_/rgyu yi blo gros sangs rgyas yon tan brjod/_/sangs rgyas yul ni ngo 
[\[33b.5\]]mtshar mnyam pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings kyi klong /_/byang chub shing drung kun na rab tu bzhugs/_/dpal gyi be'u lha min bdag pos mthong /_/'gro ba kun gyi 'khor lo dbyings dag tu/_/sngan cad bde gshegs spyod pa 
[\[33b.6\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab tu bkrol/_/de ltar lha min sgra dbyangs rab tu brjod/_/de la nyin mo'i lha khyim dang gzhal med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyud la yang dag par 
[\[33b.7\]]'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha brtsam pa'i blo gros mtshams sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can gyi don thams cad yongs su rgyas par byas pas shin tu tshim par bya ba la rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha kun nas dga' ba'i dpal 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba dang mgu ba mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha me tog dang spos yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i mos pa yang dag par rgyas pa la rnam 
[\[34a.2\]]par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha kun nas yid du 'ong ba'i sman ston pa sgrub pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_kun tu 'od kyi stobs yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha lhag pa'i mig bzang pos tshim par byed pa'i rnam par 
[\[34a.3\]]thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal chos kyi dga' bas snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha tshul rgya chen po'i phyogs kun nas byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tha mi dad pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[34a.4\]]nyin mo'i lha snying rje rgya chen po'i gzi brjid kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la bde ba yang dag par ston cing skyob pa'i stobs la shin tu brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha snang ba rgya chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi 'bral ba'i 'od kyi rnam 
[\[34a.5\]]par thar pa ni/_mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' ba'i yon tan kun nas rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/nyin mo'i lha me tog gi phreng ba kun nas 'phyang ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro bas mthong na don yod pa'i grags pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[34a.6\]]nyin mo'i lha khyim dang gzhal med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyin mo'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa rgyal bas mkhyen/_/rgyal 
[\[34a.7\]]ba dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes mi zad nam mkha' bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i 'od kyis phyogs rgyas shin tu snang /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud/_/don gyi tshig rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang /_/rnam phye rgya 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]chen tshig gis rgyal ba gsung /_/phun sum tshogs pa'i blo gros lha yis mthong /_/rgyal ba'i 'od kyis sems can kun dga' ste/_/rgyal ba mthong thos don tu 'gyur ba yin/_/go 'phang dam pa rgya chen zhi ba ston/_/dpal gyi 'od ni de yis rab tu dga'/_/
[\[34b.2\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba 'gro ba rgya chen gyi/_/dga' ba tshad med dge chos kun kyang 'byung /_/chos sprin gzhal med rgyal ba char 'bebs te/_/de la me tog rgyan pa'i lha dga' bo/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor stobs la 'jug pa rnams/_/sems can bsdu ba'i sgo la 
[\[34b.3\]]rnam dpyod cing /_/rab yangs spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal bas sbyangs/_/'di ni yid 'ong 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba mthong zhing thos pa don med min/_/dga' dang bde ba spro ba yangs pa skyed/_/'byam klas thabs rnams kun gyis sems can 'dul/_/
[\[34b.4\]]des ni mig bzang de'i dga' skyed byed/_/chos dbyings 'byam klas phyogs su rab tu 'jug_/'gro bar stobs bcus ma lus bstan mdzad de/_/bde gshegs dngos yod ma yin dngos med min/_/'phags pa'i dpal gyi nyin mo'i lha yis mthong /_/
[\[34b.5\]]sems can mi bde thibs por nub pa rnams/_/gzigs nas rgyal ba 'jig rten mchod pa mdzad/_/sdug bsngal rgyu rnams thams cad rgyal bas bstsal/_/'di la snying rje gzi brjid lha 'jug go/_/'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs las bsgribs par/_/dga' 
[\[34b.6\]]ba 'byung ba'i bde ba rgyal ba gsung /_/chos kyi dga' ba rab kyis sdug bsngal 'jig_/bsod nams shugs ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/mkha' 'dra rgyal ba'i bsod nams dkyil 'khor rnams/_/'jig rten dge bas gtso bo mchog byung ste/_/chos 
[\[34b.7\]]rnams kun la bde gshegs 'khrul mi mnga'/_/me tog phreng gi rnam thar 'di yin no/_/de la mtshan mo'i lha dpal dri ma med cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam gtan rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba kun nas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]lha kun nas skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_snang ba 'jig rten thams cad la mngon tu lta zhing 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha rab tu dga' ba'i mig gis 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_kun 
[\[35a.2\]]nas dga' ba rgya chen po dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha sgras zhi ba rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba yangs pa 'byung ba'i sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan ces bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha mtshan mo thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam 
[\[35a.3\]]par thar pa ni/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra zab mos rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha shing thams cad rab tu rgyas par byed pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba dang smon lam dang mos pa rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha 
[\[35a.4\]]kun nas skyong zhing srung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha dge ba'i thams cad kyi dga' bar rtse ba la dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_byams 
[\[35a.5\]]pa mtha' yas pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha mdud par 'dzin pa thams cad zhi bar bya bas dbang po rab tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_snying rje'i sgo nas char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i lha dge ba'i bsod 
[\[35a.6\]]nams 'byung ba'i dpal ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha dpal dri ma med cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[35a.7\]]gyi rlabs kyis mtshan mo'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul shin tu yangs la ltos/_/stong pa zhi ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/dga' ba rgya mtsho 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]rnam par sbyang byas shing /_/rgyal ba dri med phyogs su rnam par mdzes/_/thub pa 'jig rten kun blta dga' ba ste/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho dag na bar 'ga' snang /_/thugs rje kun tu rgyas byas mgon po byung /_/'gro ba lta ba lha yis 'di mthong ngo /_/'dren pa 
[\[35b.2\]]'gro ba'i skyabs su gyur pa ste/_/'gro ba dag na mngon tu kun na snang /_/lam gyi rgyud rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong /_/skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal ni 'di la sems/_/dga' ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/rab tu yangs pa sngan cad bsgoms pas 
[\[35b.3\]]na/_/de phyir rgyal ba 'jig rten lta na mdzes/_/zhing dbyangs mtshan mo'i lhas ni 'di mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/phyogs rnams bkang zhing zhi ba'i 'brug sgra sgrog_/sems can bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyong /_/mtshan 
[\[35b.4\]]mo 'byung ba'i dpal ni 'di la dga'/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba'i bsod nams skyed/_/bsod nams dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa ston/_/dri med zhi ba'i sa yang ston mdzad de/_/'di la rgyas pa'i 'od ni rab tu 'jug_/sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis 
[\[35b.5\]]phyogs rnams rab bkang ste/_/sems can thams cad rnam par 'dul ba ston/_/thams cad gzugs su sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang /_/mtshan mo'i lha ni dpal gyis 'di mthong ngo /_/'dren pas sems kyi skad cig kun na snang /_/byams pa rgya mtsho'i 
[\[35b.6\]]tshul rnams rnam sbyangs te/_/'jig rten thams cad ma lus rgyas par mdzad/_/bsod nams rtse ba mtshan mo'i lhas mthong ngo /_/sems can gti mug thibs pos 'khrugs pa dang /_/gtum sems 'khon 'dzin dam pos bsgribs gzigs shing /_/
[\[35b.7\]]thugs rje bskyed nas rgyal ba 'byung bar gyur/_/'khon 'dzin zhi ba mtshan mo'i lha dga' 'o/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing /_/mgon po sngan cad spyod pa spyad pas na/_/de phyir rgyal ba yon tan mtshan rgyas so/_/bsod nams blta ba'i bdag 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]po'i spyod yul yin/_/de la phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_kun tu skyob pas 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha mnyam pa nyid la mngon du lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dgos pa 
[\[36a.2\]]thams cad dang rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kyi 'od ces bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha snang ba spyod pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chags pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snang bas dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha kun tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_thams cad 
[\[36a.3\]]kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran pa don yod pa ston pa zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha rmongs pa byed pa'i gtsug yongs su 'grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad ming gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la rnam par lta ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha nam mkha'i rgyud kun tu spyod pa'i 
[\[36a.4\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba thams cad myong bar byed pas dga' ba rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha rnam par dpyod pa'i sprin rgya chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_klu'i sprin 'byung ba dga' ba sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha mig tha dad pa med pa'i gtsug 
[\[36a.5\]]phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi las tha dad pa med pa la yang dag par lta ba'i bdag po'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun nas spyod pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_skye ba sna tshogs dang las rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/phyogs kyi lha 
[\[36a.6\]]phyogs su rnam par lta ba 'phreng ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya bas rab tu dga' ba brtson pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas/_sangs 
[\[36a.7\]]rgyas kyi mthus phyogs kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rang byung 'jig rten spyod pa byung /_/thams cad mkhyen par yongs 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]su smin bya'i phyir/_/chos kyi phyogs la rab tu 'jug pa ston/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam/_/rnam pa du ma sems can bsam pa ston/_/rgyal ba mthong bas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal 'grol/_/kun tu mngon par lta ba'i spyod yul lo/_/sems can 
[\[36b.2\]]rgya mtsho mun pas bsgribs pa la/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi sgron ma snang ba ston/_/rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyang mthong /_/snang ba spyod pa rnam thar 'di la dga'/_/chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor/_/sems can nyon mongs zhi mdzad thogs 
[\[36b.3\]]pa med/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rgyas/_/kun nas 'khyil pa'i dpal gyis rab tu thos/_/'gro ba'i ming gi 'khor lo ji snyed pa/_/sangs rgyas mtshan gyis de dag thams cad 'thon/_/sems can rnams kyi gti mug rnam par 
[\[36b.4\]]zlog_/'di ni gti mug rnam dag spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas mngon sum sems can gang 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad sangs rgyas gsung snyan ni/_/dga' ba rgya chen shin tu yangs pa thob/_/'di ni nam mkha' rgyud kyi rnam thar to/_/skad cig sems 
[\[36b.5\]]rgyud kun la tshad med pa'i/_/chos kyi sprin char rgyal ba 'bebs pa mdzad/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'jil/_/'di la sprin gyi rgyal mtshan lha 'jug go_/sems can kun gyi rgya mtsho'i las rnams kun/_/sangs rgyas rnam pa gzhan min 
[\[36b.6\]]yang dag ston/_/sems can nyon mongs las la rab tu dgrol/_/'jig rten bya ba spyod bdag spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas sngan cad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/sems can don du thugs rje rab bskyed de/_/pha rol phyin pa thams cad rgyas par bkang /_/
[\[36b.7\]]sna tshogs phreng ba'i 'od ni 'di la dga'/_/phyogs rnams sems can rgyal bas snang mdzad pas/_/bsam pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/de dag mtha' yas phyogs kyi chos 'jug go_/mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug phud tshul 'dir rab tu 'jug_/de la 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha mtha' yas shing zab pa kun tu rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_
[\[37a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha rlung kun nas 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_yul mtha' yas pa rnam par bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lus zhes bya'o/_/nam 
[\[37a.3\]]mkha'i lha bsgribs pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha rgya chen po kun tu gnon pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug 
[\[37a.4\]]phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par lta zhing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha 'od zer snang ba'i 'od thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba log par ltung ba thams cad snying rje'i 'od kyis skyob pa zhes bya'o/_/nam 
[\[37a.5\]]mkha'i lha stobs kyi rgyun thogs pa med pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bsod nams thams cad kyi stobs dang /_dga' ba bsdu ba la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha phyogs dri ma med par snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems 
[\[37a.6\]]can thams cad dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems kyis sgrib pa rnam par zlog par gnas pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha dbyangs shin tu 'phags shing zab pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu 'phags pas phyogs kun tu rnam 
[\[37a.7\]]par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i lha phyogs bcur mngon tu ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du 'pho ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]kyi mthus nam mkha'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i spyan ni rgya chen yangs pa yis/_/sems can rgya mtsho ma lus kun gzigs te/_/'gro ba kun la mngon 
[\[37b.2\]]par rab tu bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas dri med nam mkha' rab tu 'dra/_/sangs rgyas sku yi rgya chen 'od kyi rnams/_/phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba khyab cing rnam par mdzes/_/thams cad phyogs su mngon par rab tu gnas/_/kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od 
[\[37b.3\]]kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba med/_/'di la gzung ba snang ba gang yang med/_/thob pa med cing rang bzhin med pa ste/_/rlung gi 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya phrag mang por yang /_/
[\[37b.4\]]sangs rgyas sems can sgrib pa sel bar mdzad/_/lam yangs rnam par thar pa rab tu ston/_/'di ni dpa' bo dkyil 'khor 'od kyi'o/_/sngan cad sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa'i rnams/_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde don du/_/ji ltar byung ba de dag 
[\[37b.5\]]bdag gis mthong /_/'di ni sna tshogs gtsug phud spyod yul lo/_/'khor ba rgya mtsho kun tu rgyu ba yi/_/sems can log par ltung zhing 'khor ba la/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni sdug bsngal zhi ba'i rgyu/_/snang ba'i 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/
[\[37b.6\]]bsod nams dge ba thams cad snying po ste/_/chags med stobs dang ye shes rgya chen mkhyen/_/'gro ba thams cad bsod nams zhing gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas de ltar chags med stobs sems so/_/mun pa stug po spyod yul rnam rgyu ba'i/_/sems 
[\[37b.7\]]can bsgribs pas rab tu slong ba la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rab 'gyed de/_/dri med phyogs snang lhas ni de mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu 'phags pa yi/_/mtha' dang dbus yang dmigs pas mi rung ste/_/zhing kun 'gro la 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mngon par 'od kyang snang /_/zab mo'i 'od kyis de ltar sangs rgyas mthong /_/phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun na spyod pa yis/_/sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas smon lam rgya chen shin tu yangs/_/
[\[38a.2\]]mngon par lta bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/de la rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha kun tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i mthu'i 
[\[38a.3\]]dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas mchod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa ston pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 
[\[38a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsgribs pa'i ri 'joms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha chu drag po'i snying po skems pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bdud kyi 'khor lo 
[\[38a.5\]]sgo kun nas 'joms pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog cing zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha shing gi rtse mo'i me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam 
[\[38a.6\]]par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad kyi tshul tha dad pa med par yang dag par shes pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha thogs pa med par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad mnyam par dgod pa'i tshul gyis 'dul 
[\[38a.7\]]ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i shugs kyi gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi mun pa kun 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]nas snang bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su snyegs pas thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/de nas rlung gi lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_rlung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[38b.2\]]cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid zab mo 'dzin pa ste/_/chags med thams cad tshul gyis de la 'jug_/'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon tu bzhugs/_/de ni mtshan med gzugs brnyan 
[\[38b.3\]]yod pa min/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mthu la rnam par ltos/_/byang chub spyad pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe/_/skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas mchod cing bstod/_/de la rgyas byed 'od kyi lha 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab 'gro ba'i mgon/_/
[\[38b.4\]]tshul rnams kun gyi sbyor ba chud za med/_/sdug bsngal kun las sems can ma lus skyob/_/rgyal mtshan reg pas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/'gebs dang sgrib pa shin tu stug po yi/_/mi bdes bsgribs shing bsod nams med pa yi/_/sems can 
[\[38b.5\]]sdug bsngal kun las dkrol bar 'gyur/_/rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhas ni 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul la ltos/_/rnam pa kun gyis bdud rnams shin tu 'joms/_/tshul gyis 'dul ba de la rab tu sgrogs/_/gzi brjid drag po'i 
[\[38b.6\]]mthus ni 'di mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo rnams thams cad nas/_/'gro ba kun 'gengs sgra yi dbyangs 'byung ba/_/de dag sdug bsngal 'jigs pa thams cad med/_/'di ni sgra sgrogs lha yis rab tu shes/_/'gro ba kun mnyam rgya mtsho'i zhing 
[\[38b.7\]]rnams su/_/tha dad yang dag mkhyen pas bde bar gshegs/_/mtha' yas bskal par rang byung yang dag ston/_/shing gi gtsug phud 'byung ba de la 'jug_/rgyal ba'i ye shes thabs rnams kun sgo nas/_/kun tu chags shing thogs pa med pa ste/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]spyod yul gzhan yang kun tu mtha' yas med/_/'di ni chags med 'gro ba'i rnam thar to/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul mtha' yas dag la ltos/_/rab zhi sku mnga' mtshan med sangs rgyas te/_/thabs sgo kun nas 'od kyang rab tu 
[\[39a.2\]]snang /_/phung po sna tshogs bdag po'i rnam thar to/_/mi mngon bskal pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe/_/de 'dra'i chos kyis 'gro kun tshim mdzad pas/_/thams cad stobs la sangs rgyas rab tu bzhugs/_/'jig rten stobs 'dzin lha yis 'di mthong ngo /_/
[\[39a.3\]]de la me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs thams cad dang mun pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 
[\[39a.4\]]thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs dang rab tu gdung ba rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha 'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bsod nams kyi stobs mi sgul ba dang /_snying rje ba dang /_
[\[39a.5\]]byams pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha rgyal mtshan gyi rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis g.yogs pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nam mkha' 
[\[39a.6\]]mtha' yas pa snang bas gsal bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/me'i lha dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_dge ba dang /_bsod nams sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i 'od rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab 
[\[39a.7\]]kyi spo'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad me ltar 'bar ba'i sems can sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha 'od drag shul gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i brtsam pas rab tu gnon 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chags par lta ba'i gti mug thams cad rnam par spong ba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya'o/_/me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni chags pa thams cad la 
[\[39b.2\]]mi gnas pa'i stobs 'byung ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/de nas me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_me'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[39b.3\]]rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus stobs la rnam par ltos/_/bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas par/_/'gro ba'i don du phan pa rab brtsams te/_/sems can kun gyi mun pa rnam par bsal/_/nyon mongs dba' rlabs ldan pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/lta la gnas shing 
[\[39b.4\]]gti mug bsgribs pa yi/_/nyon mongs me ni mgon pos zhi bar mdzad/_/de la rgyal mtshan dkyil 'khor rab tu dga'/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul rgya chen bdag gis mthong /_/phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang /_/rgyal ba'i byin gyis rlab rnams 
[\[39b.5\]]rab tu 'jug_/mthong nas snang ba'i 'od ni rab tu dga'/_/rgyal ba'i bsod nams mi zad nam mkha' bzhin/_/de yi mtha' ni kun tu mi rnyed de/_/rgyal ba'i thugs rjes bskyod du yongs mi nus/_/'di la dpal gyi sprin sgrar rab tu 'jug_/bskal pa 
[\[39b.6\]]bye bar spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/chos tshul gang rnams bstan pa de dag gis/_/mtha' ni nam yang rnyed par sla ba min/_/rnam thar 'di ni gzi brjid gtsug phud kyi'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams shin tu yang dag par/_/sangs rgyas mgon po thams 
[\[39b.7\]]cad mngon du lta/_/'gro ba kun la thub pa rnam par mdzes/_/'di la dka' thub 'od 'phro dpal 'jug go_/'gro ba kun na thub pa rab tu 'phags/_/khang khyim thams cad dag na bzhugs par snang /_/rnam par yangs pa'i chos kyi char yang 'bebs/_/'di ni 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]phyogs snang byed pa'i spyod yul lo/_/rgyal ba nyid kyi chos rnams zab pa ste/_/thams cad chos kyi 'gro bar rang byung zhing /_/ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid ston pa mdzad/_/de la drag shul 'od ni rab tu dga'/_/lta ba'i mun nag gti mug sgrib 
[\[40a.2\]]pa yi/_/'jig rten bag med 'khrugs pa thams cad la/_/rgyal bas chos ni rab tu bstan mdzad de/_/de la rnam par snang ba'i lha dga' 'o/_/rgyal ba'i smon lam sngan cad byung ba'i rnams/_/ci 'dra bsam gyis khyab par mi rung ste/_/stobs dang pha rol 
[\[40a.3\]]phyin pas rnam par sbyang /_/'od 'phro sprin ni 'di la 'di ltar 'jug_/de la chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/chu'i lha sprin sgra'i 
[\[40a.4\]]shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi sprin mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/chu'i lha chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing /_sdud pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/chu'i 
[\[40a.5\]]lha bzang por khyil ba grub pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo'i 'od kyi char pa'i byin gyi rlab shes bya'o/_/chu'i lha kun nas spos dri ma med pa'i myu gu'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi 'od dri ma med pa rnam par lta ba 
[\[40a.6\]]la yang dag par 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlab shes bya'o/_/chu'i lha dba' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams stegs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid med cing dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/chu'i lha tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su 
[\[40a.7\]]sgrub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_snying rje rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/chu'i lha sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba'i 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]snying po zhes bya'o/_/chu'i lha 'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bsod nams chags pa med pa shin tu rgyas par rab tu snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/_/chu'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi nga ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba 
[\[40b.2\]]thams cad 'dul ba'i sbyor ba nam mkha' lta bus 'dul bar sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_chu'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 
[\[40b.3\]]pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams re re thams cad kyang /_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/_/byams pa mngon du gyur pas byung ba bzang /_/sems can kun gyis bltas shing mi ngoms so/_/'gro ba kun tu rgyal ba rnams drung du/_/
[\[40b.4\]]skyo ba med par spyad cing rnam sbyangs te/_/rnam pa sna tshogs chos kyi sgo yang ston/_/rgya mtsho shugs ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug_/rgyal ba rnams ni 'pho bar mi snang ste/_/phyogs rnams bcu nas byon par snang ba med/_/snod kyi tshul bzhin sems can rnams 
[\[40b.5\]]kyang lta/_/chu yi gtsug phud dkyil 'khor de la lta/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni gzhal du med/_/sems can kun gyis bsam par mi nus te/_/phyogs rnams kun tu khyab par sgra sgrog go/_/'di ni snyan pa'i gtsug phud yul yin no/_/sangs 
[\[40b.6\]]rgyas 'od ni mi zad gnas pa ste/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang /_/sems can thams cad 'dul ba rab tu ston/_/spos kyi phung po sna tshogs lha yis mthong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mnyam pa ste/_/phyogs rnams kun 
[\[40b.7\]]tu dri med mtshan nyid med/_/phyogs rnams kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang /_/dba' rlabs sgra'i bsod nams 'od kyis mthong /_/snying rje'i sgo ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/_/sems can kun dang mnyam par sngon bshad do/_/sprin dang 'dra bar 'gro bar mngon 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]sum mo/_/de ltar de nas dga' ba 'byung bas mthong /_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ci snyed gang yod pa/_de dag kun na sangs rgyas gdan bzhugs snang /_/shin tu rgyas pa'i byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/_/dga' ba rdul med dbyangs 
[\[41a.2\]]kyis de mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul chags pa med pa ste/_/shin tu rgya che phyogs rnams kun tu gnas/_/rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal ba ston mdzad de/_/de la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi lha 'jug go_/sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams la mtha' med de/_/'gro ba kun dbyings 
[\[41a.3\]]thub pa med par 'jug_/rgyal ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra ste/_/nga ros 'gengs pa rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/de la rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho rin po che 'byung ba'i rgyan 
[\[41a.4\]]ces bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha rdo rje kun nas sra zhing mi choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsrung ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha rdul dang dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams 
[\[41a.5\]]cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho mang po rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha kun nas chu dang ri bo dang khyim gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha skyabs rin po che mig gi zla ba'i 
[\[41a.6\]]dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_shugs chen pos gti mug rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i dpal pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rgyud thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed cing bde ba 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rgya 
[\[41a.7\]]mtsho'i lha chu lta bur ro mthun par 'dzin pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang /_rmongs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rin po che'i rigs thams 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]cad 'byung zhing /_byang chub kyi sems rab tu skye ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems rgya mtsho mi sgul ba'i bsod nams la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs kyi rnam 
[\[41b.2\]]par thar pa ni/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya'o/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_rgya mtsho'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la 
[\[41b.3\]]rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen mang mchod cing /_/'gro ba dag la bsod nams mtsho spel bas/_/de phyir rgyal ba lha me lha nge'o/_/'gro 
[\[41b.4\]]ba kun tu rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/_/sems can kun gyi dbang po bsam rgyud du/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho rgya chen ston pa mdzad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sra ba'i dpa' dga' 'o/_/'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten mgon po ni/_/chos kyi sprin las char chen yangs pa 
[\[41b.5\]]'bebs/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zhi mdzad zad mi shes/_/rdul dang dri med 'di'i tshul la 'jug_/sems can thams cad mnyam med nyon mongs bsgribs/_/lam rgyud rgya mtsho'i sdug bsngal nang na 'khor/_/de dag la ni rgyal ba'i yul ston te/_/dpal 
[\[41b.6\]]bcu'i lha ni 'di la rab tu dga'/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po bsam yas su/_/rgyal bas spyod pa mi zad rnams spyad de/_/'gro ba'i gti mug dkyil 'khor rnam par zlog_/rin chen zla ba'i dpal ni 'di la 'jug_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal chen po 
[\[41b.7\]]na/_/sems can 'khor zhing mi bde kun gzigs nas/_/rgyal bas bla na med pa'i lam yang bstan/_/klu dpal pad+mo gtsug phud 'di la dga'/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/_/chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]'gro ba'i gti mug dra ba rnam par sbyong /_/de skad chu 'dzin shugs ni smra zhing brjod/_/sangs rgyas dri med bsam gyis mi khyab spyad/_/'jig rten kun gyi yul du rnam par mdzes/_/spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun la ston/_/sna 
[\[42a.2\]]tshogs dpal gyi me tog spyod yul lo/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad rgya che ba'ang /_/'byam klas thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis brtul/_/rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab mi g.yo ste/_/rdo rje rdul 'dzin tshul ni 'di yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings ni 'byam 
[\[42a.3\]]klas kun bkang zhing /_/phyogs bcu rnams su rgyal ba'i gsung yang grag_/sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes/_/'di ltar 'di la sprin 'byung rab tu 'jug_/de la chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi chu bo mtha' 
[\[42a.4\]]med pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha ri dang chu kun la rten pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig gi rnam par 
[\[42a.5\]]thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang 'grogs pa'i snying rje'i tshul gyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha nga ros khyab par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra yid du mi 'ong ba zlog cing phan pa 
[\[42a.6\]]skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam 
[\[42a.7\]]par thar pa ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung bar mi nus pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel cing gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su spyod pa 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_thams cad tshim par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can 
[\[42b.2\]]thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing /_'khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang /_khro ba'i shugs dang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong 
[\[42b.3\]]bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[42b.4\]]chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa dag_/sngan cad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs/_/'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa'i rnams/_/sprin chen char bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad/_/bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal bas sngon/_/
[\[42b.5\]]smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings shes shing /_/'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen/_/'khyil pa zhes bya chu klung lha dga' 'o/_/'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul bsgoms shing /_/mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong /_/
[\[42b.6\]]yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du lta/_/de la dri med mig gi lha yang mos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni/_/kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi/_/sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu yid/_/rnam 
[\[42b.7\]]thar 'di ni sgra dbyangs sgrog pas thos/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro la phan don du/_/sngan cad byang chub spyod pa spyad mthong na/_/de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzes/_/lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dga'/_/rgyal ba sngan cad spyad pa spyod 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_/sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad/_/de dag bsod nams rgya mtshos sdug bsngal 'jil/_/zhi byed chu klung lha ni des dga' 'o/_/sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang /_/'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing /_/
[\[43a.2\]]rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs pa yongs su bstsal/_/kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar 'di mthong ngo /_/thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na/_/yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung /_/rgyal bas 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de/_/rgya chen sgra 
[\[43a.3\]]dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'/_/sgrib pa'i klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri/_/'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas/_/mkha' mnyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes/_/rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o/_/sangs rgyas rang byung 
[\[43a.4\]]yon tan rgya mtsho ste/_/bsod nams zhing ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor/_/byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad/_/rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no/_/de la lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_ro dang mdangs thams 
[\[43a.5\]]cad skyed cing /_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa 
[\[43a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi [(]dad [,]ngad [)]mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_snying 
[\[43a.7\]]rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing /_sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bskyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can la phan pa'i byams 
[\[43b.2\]]pa dang /_bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par
