[\[43b.3\]]thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing /_'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[43b.4\]]la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[43b.5\]]rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa ni/_/'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te/_/ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med/_/sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin/_/'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 
[\[43b.6\]]mdzad/_/chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu bskyed/_/dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug_/bde gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas/_/'gro ba dag ni chos kyi legs pas mdzes/_/'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam par snang /_/stobs dang 
[\[43b.7\]]gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo /_/sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i/_/thugs rjes rgya mtsho sngan cad rnam sbyangs pas/_/de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnams ni mtha' yas so/_/de ni mdangs mthong lha yis rab tu mthong /_/thabs rnams kun gyi sgo rnams 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]don yod par/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab gyur cing /_/'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad/_/'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to/_/'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa/_/de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus 
[\[44a.2\]]byung ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'o/_/nags tshal rgyan gyis gtsug phud de la 'jug_/'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de/_/sems can rnams la phan phyir rang byung skyes/_/lam rab dge ba zhi ba rab tu ston/_/zhi ba sna 
[\[44a.3\]]tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to/_/phyogs su sems can yongs su smin byed pa'i/_/bde gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa/_/byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung /_/spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so/_/rgyal ba'i 'jig rten yid du 'ong 
[\[44a.4\]]ba spong /_/dge ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu skyed/_/'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong /_/dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo /_/'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags/_/skye bo kun gyi bsam pa de mkhyen te/_/sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba 
[\[44a.5\]]yongs smin mdzad/_/rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to/_/de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha tsan dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 
[\[44a.6\]]'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_blta ba don yod pas sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha ming kun tu 
[\[44a.7\]]grags pa'i glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha spu'i glong kun nas 'od byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba mdongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi/_ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam 
[\[44b.2\]]par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas/_don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par 
[\[44b.3\]]bskul ba zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[44b.4\]]nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[44b.5\]]dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/_/thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas/_/sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grol/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam 
[\[44b.6\]]mi khyab/_/de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod/_/skye dgu rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/_/tsan dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/_/sngan cad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na/_/srid pa kun 
[\[44b.7\]]la chags pa gang yang med/_/de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go_/rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/_/mthong zhing mtshan nyid de bzhin shin tu dkon/_/tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de/_/de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug_/rgyal 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang /_/nad las rab tu grol ba'i 'od bkye bas/_/'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad/_/spu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no/_/sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas/_/
[\[45a.2\]]'gro ba mdongs shing rab tu rmongs gyur rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par spyod/_/de ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i gsung gcig las ni mtha' yas pa'i/_/chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung /_/de ni sems 
[\[45a.3\]]can ma lus kun kyang shes/_/'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/_/srid par sems can yongs su smin byas pa/_/de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang /_/nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong 
[\[45a.4\]]ngo /_/sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste/_/'gro ba kun la phan don de skyes so/_/'gro ba kun la lam rnams shin tu ston/_/de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so/_/sangs rgyas 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[45a.5\]]thams cad ma lus kun tu gang /_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid bskyed/_/mdangs kyi 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_de la 
[\[45a.6\]]nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_ye shes rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni dge ba rgya chen po kun nas 
[\[45a.7\]]spungs pa'i shugs shes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang /_yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu 'chang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[45b.2\]]dmigs shing /_kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gongs pa zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes 
[\[45b.3\]]bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po ldang ba'i 
[\[45b.4\]]'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba la 
[\[45b.5\]]phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyas par yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang 'bras bu dang ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi 
[\[45b.6\]]snying po zhes bya'o/_/de nas nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bsod nams stobs 
[\[45b.7\]]dang ye shes stobs rnams dang /_/sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung /_/stobs rnams kun gyi rang byung pha rol phyin/_/'gro ba kun na 'phags shing rnam par mdzes/_/'gro ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]rab tu sbyangs/_/rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/_/sna tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug_/sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag_/mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba kun gyi 
[\[46a.2\]]lam yang yang dag ston/_/myu gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar yin/_/rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te/_/'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/rnam thar 'di ni phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthong /_/
[\[46a.3\]]sngan cad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams/_/zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran/_/kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs/_/yal ga 'od kyi brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag_/skad cig gcig gis 
[\[46a.4\]]sangs rgyas thugs su chud/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu yangs/_/sna tshogs 'gyur spungs 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/bde gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung /_/dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed/_/sems can mos 
[\[46a.5\]]pa ji bzhin de dag shes/_/'di ni sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyis thos/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing /_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung /_/rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston/_/kun tu dri zhim 'od 
[\[46a.6\]]dpal 'di la 'jug_/ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams/_/myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag_/de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston/_/'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo /_/sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa 
[\[46a.7\]]rnams/_/bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/gzhan ni bde gshegs skad cig gcig gis lta/_/ri'i 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo /_/de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_bsam gtan 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]zhi zhing yangs la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/
[\[46b.2\]]ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug 
[\[46b.3\]]phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsol ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston 
[\[46b.4\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_chags pa 
[\[46b.5\]]thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyi sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha kun 
[\[46b.6\]]tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/ri'i lha kun nas sra ba'i rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_don rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 
[\[46b.7\]]'grogs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i rnam 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos/_/sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod/_/rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed sgom mdzad pas/_/'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang skyed/_/sangs rgyas spu nas dri ma med dpal bkye/_/yan lag mtshan 
[\[47a.2\]]brgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing /_/byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston/_/nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar to/_/sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon/_/'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags/_/dbang po dang ba'i sems 
[\[47a.3\]]can rangs shing dga'/_/rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug_/rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten kun ma chags/_/bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo/_/sna tshogs mkhas 'gro sbyor ba ma lus 'dul/_/dga' ba dri med gtsug 
[\[47a.4\]]phud rnam thar to/_/'jig rten kun ni mdongs gyur mun sdug zhugs/_/thugs rjes der bskyed sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing /_/'gro khams yun ring nyal ba sad par mdzad/_/rigs nas dga' 'od lha'i rnam thar to/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe/_/
[\[47a.5\]]zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas/_/de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod/_/zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug go_/las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing bsgribs pa rnams/_/srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs 
[\[47a.6\]]nas/_/de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bstsal/_/gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems so/_/rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun/_/phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grags/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas/_/
[\[47a.7\]]'od mang rdul gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go_/sems can kun spyad dge ba rgya mtsho kun/_/de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang /_/sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston/_/tshul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos so/_/chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]tshad med pa/_/sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung /_/bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang la ston/_/rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug_/de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_skad 
[\[47b.2\]]cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha bsod nams brten pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs 
[\[47b.3\]]kyi rgyan ces bya'o/_/sa'i lha sems can rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs bsgoms pa rnam par 'byed pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad dga' 
[\[47b.4\]]zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[47b.5\]]cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha me tog gi klong sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi 
[\[47b.6\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyi rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/sa'i lha 
[\[47b.7\]]khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyan bsgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i lha'i 'khor 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sngan cad skad cig skad cig bde gshegs kyis/_/brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang /_/byams pa'i sgo 
[\[48a.2\]]yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/_/de tshe sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra/_/dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang /_/ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag_/rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od/_/bsod nams de mthong 
[\[48a.3\]]rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtsho rab tu zhugs/_/sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston/_/'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no/_/sngan cad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang /_/'gro ba'i 
[\[48a.4\]]sgrib pa rnam par zlog pa ni/_/rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te/_/rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te/_/'jig rten kun tu skad cig gcig la ston/_/dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha/_/dga' bar 
[\[48a.5\]]sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab/_/sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/_/gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' ba/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba ste/_/sangs 
[\[48a.6\]]rgyas sprul pas rnam par kun gzugs su/_/phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad/_/spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha/_/sangs rgyas sems can 'dul ba de la lta/_/phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing /_/'gro ba 'di ni 
[\[48a.7\]]phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa'i lha/_/rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/_/rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi/_/spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang zhing /_/sems can ma lus yongs su smin mdzad 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]cing /_/me tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong /_/de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste/_/mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra/_/'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus/_/rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o/_/de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen 
[\[48b.2\]]rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can la phan pa yang dag par sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi 
[\[48b.3\]]lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong bas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_skyob pa dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[48b.4\]]snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_shes rab kyi kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston 
[\[48b.5\]]pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung ba'i snang ba zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can 
[\[48b.6\]]rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri ma rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par bskyed pa 
[\[48b.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_grong khyer gyi lha'i 'khor gyi 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes/_/sems can mtha' yas 
[\[49a.2\]]yongs su smin mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang /_/sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te/_/de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen/_/rnam thar 'di n-i rab tu thob pa'i phyir/_/sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'/_/rgyal 
[\[49a.3\]]bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad/_/sngan cad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung /_/dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs/_/rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis mthong /_/'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[49a.4\]]pas sngan cad sems can rnams/_/kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par zlog_/nyon mongs yongs su sbyang ba 'di la dga'/_/rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te/_/tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes 
[\[49a.5\]]rab rnam spyod pas/_/mar me'i me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan/_/de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu bsgoms pa yis/_/mngon 'od 'phro ba'i lha de rab tu dga'/_/
[\[49a.6\]]bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa/_/sngan cad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs/_/de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas/_/bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'/_/srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/_/'khor gyur 
[\[49a.7\]]rab rib mdongs pa gzigs pas na/_/de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung /_/dri med 'od kyis rnam thar 'di thob po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos/_/'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus yang med/_/de dag bstan cing 'gro ba 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]rnam par 'dul/_/spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo /_/sems can rmongs pa mun pas mdongs gyur cing /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur/_/rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug_/
[\[49b.2\]]de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par 
[\[49b.3\]]thar pa ni 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston cing rmi lam 
[\[49b.4\]]gyi mthar/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa n-i/_dga' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po che'i char 'beb pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi 
[\[49b.5\]]lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing snying po byang chub kyi phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_
[\[49b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos kyi tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[49b.7\]]snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_snying po byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par 
[\[50a.2\]]ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[50a.3\]]yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bskal pa mang po mtha' dang dbus med par/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sngon spyad dran/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na/_/de phyir de 
[\[50a.4\]]yi bsod nams nam mkha'i tshad/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par/_/mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas/_/ri bo'i spo'i 'od kyi lha de ni/_/bde gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa/_/
[\[50a.5\]]de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/_/'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing /_/sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab tu dga'/_/mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de/_/dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste/_/
[\[50a.6\]]de la me tog mig gi lha dga' 'o/_/yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin/_/'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas/_/rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'/_/sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste/_/
[\[50a.7\]]de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs/_/ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel/_/de yis gtsug phud 'phyang ba dga' ba thob/_/rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis tshad med pa'i/_/chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]pa/_/rgya mtsho tha dad yang dag shes pas 'jug_/zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du/_/'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas/_/de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags/_/de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran/_/mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna 
[\[50b.2\]]tshogs gzugs/_/byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan/_/rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni/_/byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta/_/sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la/_/phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de/_/pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha 
[\[50b.3\]]de ni/_/rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga' 'o/_/sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab/_/snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag_/yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni/_/thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to/_/de la rkang gis 'gro 
[\[50b.4\]]rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed 
[\[50b.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i 
[\[50b.6\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_gom pa 'dor ba thams cad mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_skad cig gcig gis pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang dbyangs dang snang ba kun 
[\[50b.7\]]tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_dga' ba'i shugs dang nyams bde ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]spos kyi ngad sprin du ldang ba zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_pad+mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs 
[\[51a.2\]]kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par skul ba 'byung ba 
[\[51a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/de nas rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis 
[\[51a.4\]]shugs bskyed cing /_/bskal pa mtha' yas sngan cad spyod pa mdzad/_/zhing rnams kun rdul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod/_/skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yangs pa/_/dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sprul 
[\[51a.5\]]mdzad nas/_/zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa/_/snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong /_/'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab/_/'khor rnams kun tu 'byam klas mtha' yas pa'i/_/rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston/_/
[\[51a.6\]]me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/_/thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis/_/sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad/_/shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo /_/sems 
[\[51a.7\]]can snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pas/_/re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs/_/rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong /_/rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te/_/'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'bebs/_/bde gshegs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing /_/dga' sgra dbyangs kyi rnam thar de mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan/_/'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul 
[\[51b.2\]]tsan dan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan/_/spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang /_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams kyi/_/sgra bsgrogs thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te/_/de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis 
[\[51b.3\]]mi khyab ste/_/gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston/_/de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong /_/rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo /_/'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis/_/phyogs bcur sems can yang dag skul ba mdzad/_/me tog 
[\[51b.4\]]'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha/_/mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu 'thob/_/de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa 
[\[51b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam 
[\[51b.6\]]par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod cing yang dag par skul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i 
[\[51b.7\]]mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad gsal ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin 
[\[52a.2\]]las char 'babs pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bdud 
[\[52a.3\]]kyi las dang rmongs pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du 
[\[52a.4\]]ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i shugs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing /_yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas lus 
[\[52a.5\]]kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ri rab rdul 
[\[52a.6\]]phran shin tu phra snyed kyi/_/bskal pa de dag pha snga'i bskal pa ni/_/rdul ces bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal/_/mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran/_/sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba/_/de'i 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu/_/rgyal 
[\[52a.7\]]ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul/_/'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo /_/dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrogs/_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag bskul/_/dbyangs kyis 'dul 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ba de la dga' bas nyan/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi ba ltos/_/sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/_/'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang /_/me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong /_/'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sems 
[\[52b.2\]]can de dag dad pa ci bzhin du/_/la la bzhugs dang bzhengs dang gshegs par mthong /_/de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo /_/rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas/_/dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye bas/_/'gro ba kun gyi nyon 
[\[52b.3\]]mongs zhi bar 'gyur/_/dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung /_/nyon mongs shin tu sdug bsngal gzir ba rnams/_/mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bsal/_/snang ba'i phreng ba 'chang bas 
[\[52b.4\]]'di mthong ngo /_/'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon/_/rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni/_/'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel/_/khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra/_/sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing /_/
[\[52b.5\]]bdud kyi las kyis dkrugs te 'phyen pa'i rnams/_/de dag rgyal ba rnam thar lam ston te/_/srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing /_/'jig 
[\[52b.6\]]rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul/_/kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo/_/de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_yon tan mtha' yas pa dang /_gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[52b.7\]]lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas/_
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul pa zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam 
[\[53a.2\]]par thar pa ni/_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par skul ba zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa 
[\[53a.3\]]la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams 
[\[53a.4\]]kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po'i dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/_sems can ma rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/lag na 
[\[53a.5\]]rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad+mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[53a.6\]]mthus/_lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi/_/chos nyid de la rnam par ltos/_/yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis/_/'jig 
[\[53a.7\]]rten kun tu rnam par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad nas/_/'od zer dra ba bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/_/phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis/_/chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing /_/'gro ba kun 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]la mngon sum du/_/mi zad sku ni shin tu ston/_/sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog_/gsung gis sems can thams cad kyi/_/bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs/_/'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na/_/thub pa rab tu bzhugs 
[\[53b.2\]]par snang /_/de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la/_/'dren pa dag gi chos ston mdzad/_/rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas/_/gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis/_/thams cad chos kyi bye brag don/_/rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston/_/rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la/_/rgya 
[\[53b.3\]]mtsho 'khor rnam rab tu 'jug_/sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas/_/kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhing rnams bye ma'i rdul snyed du/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas/_/bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin/_/kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu 
[\[53b.4\]]mthong /_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa/_/thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad/_/'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du/_/byang chub snying por rnam par mdzes/_/'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/_/'od 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang /_/chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas 
[\[53b.5\]]shing /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su 
[\[53b.6\]]dag par bya ba dang /_'gro ba gdul ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas/_yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[53b.7\]]thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_zhing thams cad du 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba'i thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par 
[\[54a.2\]]ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston 
[\[54a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /_gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa 
[\[54a.4\]]rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing sangs 
[\[54a.5\]]rgyas kyi mthus/_'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs/_/mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med 
[\[54a.6\]]kyis/_/de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab/_/ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba/_/de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun nang skye/_/'on kyang bde gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med/_/zhing rnams kun tu yul yang rab tu ston/_/sa yi tshul la 
[\[54a.7\]]'jug pa tshad med de/_/spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan/_/bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas/_/rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug_/chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste/_/mtha' yas phyogs su mtha' dang dbus 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]med sgo/_/rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul ba spros/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang /_/'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung /_/thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de/_/'dul 
[\[54b.2\]]bas sems can thams cad rnam par spyod/_/rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/_/rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston/_/sngan cad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams/_/ci bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod/_/yangs dus bskal pa ji snyed 
[\[54b.3\]]yod pa'i rnams/_/skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston/_/der ni sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan/_/'jig rten gtso bo ye shes mtha' yas ltos/_/'byam klas mi zad mtha' yas lo grangs pas/_/rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas de lta 
[\[54b.4\]]ste/_/thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/_/rgyal sras kun gyis shes par sla ba min/_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste/_/chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis/_/sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing /_/shing 
[\[54b.5\]]mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan/_/sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas na/_/chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin/_/'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dag nas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[54b.6\]]dge ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam 
[\[54b.7\]]par thar pa ni/_sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing /_chos ston kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro'i rnam 
[\[55a.2\]]par thar pa ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa 
[\[55a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[55a.4\]]sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs 
[\[55a.5\]]kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[55a.6\]]rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba 
[\[55a.7\]]dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gyi zhing /_/rgyal bas de kun skad cig thugs kyis sbyangs/_/'gro ba kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung /_/sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen bskor/_/skad cig thugs kyi chos dbyings kun bkang ste/_/mtha' yas spyod yul dbyings rnams rgyal ba ston/_/
[\[55b.2\]]'gro ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu/_/byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/_/bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sngan cad spyod spyad de/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab bkye zhing /_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab 
[\[55b.3\]]tu sbyangs/_/mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis/_/skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang /_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbus med pa/_/phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs/_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos/_/
[\[55b.4\]]phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa/_/rgyal bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan/_/skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang /_/bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu/_/rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'/_/tshul rnams kun sgor 
[\[55b.5\]]sangs rgyas chags pa med/_/'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes/_/sngon tshe bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen bsnyen bkur bas/_/de bas 'jig rten gtso la chos dbyings rnams/_/kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya 
[\[55b.6\]]chen 'byung /_/phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag_/rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston/_/de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad/_/sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad/_/thugs 
[\[55b.7\]]rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab skyed cing /_/'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi/_/'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs/_/sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral/_/de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste/_/'gro ba kun na mtha' yas 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]gzugs su snang /_/'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang /_sangs 
[\[56a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par 
[\[56a.3\]]lta ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[56a.4\]]dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyun ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi 
[\[56a.5\]]rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang /_mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub 
[\[56a.6\]]par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa 
[\[56a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags 
[\[56b.2\]]pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas pa rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas/_sangs 
[\[56b.3\]]rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang /_/sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas/_/tshad 
[\[56b.4\]]med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te/_/sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa/_/skad cig thugs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dag_/
[\[56b.5\]]mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par ston/_/bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par/_/rgyal ba 'gro la mngon sum kun nas bzhugs/_/mgon pos sngan cad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du/_/rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan/_/chos rgyal de dag ji ltar 
[\[56b.6\]]rnam 'phrul pa/_/phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang /_/snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag_/'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang /_/'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing /_/'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes/_/
[\[56b.7\]]dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs/_/sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de/_/rgyal ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku/_/ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de/_/phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]yang 'bebs/_/chos rje thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag_/bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te/_/rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]bkang zhing /_/rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings 
[\[57a.2\]]kun bkang zhing /_/sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan/_/rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa/_/de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan/_/phyogs rnams kun tu rang byung rnam par mdzes/_/smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston/_/
[\[57a.3\]]ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa/_rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog_/sangs rgyas yul ni phyogs su zad pa med/_/dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings/_/chos dbyings kun tu chags med brnyes pa ni/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams 
[\[57a.4\]]kun na shin tu mdzes/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dang /_pad mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang /_'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang /_me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang /_stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang /_
[\[57a.5\]]rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang /_'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang /_seng ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub 
[\[57a.6\]]sems dpa' mang po 'thon par gyur te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna 
[\[57a.7\]]tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mig 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]brgya pa pad+mo'i sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang /_byang chub 
[\[57b.2\]]sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing /_'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu 'byin/_spos 
[\[57b.3\]]kyi sprin thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/_/rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/_yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin ni rnam par 'gyed cing /_nor bu nyi ma'i snying po 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni rab tu 
[\[57b.4\]]gtong /_sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog_/rin po che 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/_nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par spyod/_rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa 
[\[57b.5\]]zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs shing /_de lta bu dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[57b.6\]]mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhags par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas gang 
[\[57b.7\]]nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so/_/sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so/_/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa thams cad kyis chos rgya 
[\[58a.2\]]mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so/_/sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so/_/
[\[58a.3\]]dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so/_/dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so/_/bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa'i rnams te/_chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing 
[\[58a.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams 
[\[58a.5\]]cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen/_/chags med rnyed pas nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byas nas/_/'byam klas 'khor 
[\[58a.6\]]na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes/_/bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de/_/thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par/_/dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod bskor cing /_/shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[58a.7\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/_/skad cig sems la zad med yon tan gzugs/_/rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor sngan cad spyod pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pas srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa/_/de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to/_/yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag_/thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas/_/pad+mo'i snying po pad+mo gdan bzhugs pa/_/
[\[58b.2\]]tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri/_/rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing /_/spos 'phro sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung /_/snying po du ma'i me tog phreng spyangs pa'o/_/rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin 
[\[58b.3\]]ni rtag tu 'gyed/_/'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar/_/rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes/_/sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed/_/rin chen tshon du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang /_/nor bu'i rgyal 
[\[58b.4\]]pos skar khung kun gnas brgyan/_/sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab tu mdzes/_/zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su bzung /_/rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan/_/gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung /_/sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam 
[\[58b.5\]]par shin tu mdzes/_/phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog_/gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams kun na snang /_/thub pa de 'dra'i seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs 
[\[58b.6\]]kun tu sgrog pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di ni bde gshegs sangs rgyas byin rlabs te/_/byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa dang /_/sangs 
[\[58b.7\]]rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag_/rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang /_/spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po can/_/me tog snying po seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor/_/rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang /_/'khor rnams de dag thams 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]cad kun bkang ste/_/skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun/_/rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang /_/sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang /_/'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lta/_/rin chen lda ldi pad+mo 
[\[59a.2\]]mang btags pa/_/phyi zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams/_/sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing /_/sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la stod pa byed/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin/_/'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu byung /_/
[\[59a.3\]]sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa/_/'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus/_/mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa/_/'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa ste/_/nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram/_/byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor 
[\[59a.4\]]kun to/_/sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan yod pa/_/kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te/_/me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram/_/gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan/_/sa yi lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing /_/skad cig sems 
[\[59a.5\]]kyis mi zad sa yang ston/_/kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing /_/kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo /_/rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal bar 'bar/_/spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung /_/dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing /_/lha 
[\[59a.6\]]rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed/_/phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa/_/de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang /_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung /_/de nas byang chub 
[\[59a.7\]]sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sngan cad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de dag_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams/_/snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang /_/rnam par yangs pa gang na snang ba yi/_/sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkram/_/rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor/_/
[\[59b.2\]]sangs rgyas 'od kyi sprin kyang rab tu snang /_/sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung /_/kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos rgyan byas las/_/bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung /_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod/_/rin chen mang po 
[\[59b.3\]]sgron ma'i char phab cing /_/rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes/_/sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog_/sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston/_/rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang /_/'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu 'byung /_/nor bu 
[\[59b.4\]]dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram/_/rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyi yan lag brgyan/_/sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos/_/rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye/_/'gro ba dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog_/de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong /_/
[\[59b.5\]]ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag_/sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste/_/de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod/_/sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi/_/chos sgo bde bar 
[\[59b.6\]]gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/_/sems can kun kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung /_/dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na/_/de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro ba 'gengs/_/srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs 
[\[59b.7\]]zhi bar byed/_/sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang /_/dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing /_/bskal pa bye ba dag tu 'ang brjod [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//_//
[\[60a.2\]]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa/_'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes/_/'byam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[60a.3\]]'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang /_/rin chen kun gyi snying po rab tu brgyan/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar/_/sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes/_/ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te/_/
[\[60a.4\]]phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bris/_/stegs bu'i phreng ba kun nas rgyan du bkod/_/gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang rnam par brgyus/_/me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos/_/rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres/_/nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng ba 
[\[60a.5\]]'brul/_/de nas ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu mdzes/_/spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste/_/'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs/_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres/_/de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[60a.6\]]kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams/_/dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grag byed cing /_/'byam klas phyogs kyi sems can rnam 'dul ba/_/sangs rgyas pho brang 'di na de dag grag_/me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba/_/'phags pa phyogs rnams 
[\[60a.7\]]kun tu mngon par mdzes/_/de las dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang /_/gzugs brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang /_/phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang bkye ba/_/de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar/_/phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]mdzes par brgyan/_/rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/_/dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi/_/sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te/_/gzhal med khang mang thams cad de la snang /_/de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes/_/phyogs 
[\[60b.2\]]rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/_/rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun bzhugs kyang /_/mtha' med dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]mu yang de bzhin du/_/rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho 
[\[60b.3\]]dpal gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te/_/
[\[60b.4\]]sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung /_/snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes/_/spos zhim thams cad rtsa ba yang dag rgyu/_/yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan/_/rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu'i rgyal po bris/_/shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun 
[\[60b.5\]]las byas/_/rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung /_/lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil/_/snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes/_/yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste/_/'khor rnams snum 
[\[60b.6\]]'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags/_/me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed/_/snying po byang chub rgya chen bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes/_/yal ga'i sgo nas sprin kun char 
[\[60b.7\]]yang 'bebs/_/snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pa byung /_/me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor/_/mu tig nor bu phyogs rnams kun nas brgyus/_/phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de/_/snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin/_/bde gshegs 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]snying po byang chub 'di la ltos/_/pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang /_/rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro/_/dril bu'i dra ba sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin/_/phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa/_/'byam klas 
[\[61a.2\]]zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag_/byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang /_/de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes/_/yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing /_/bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char 
[\[61a.3\]]phab ste/_/phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'dong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sngan cad cir gyur dang /_/byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos/_/yal ga kun nas rin chen nor mi zad/_/sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/de nas 
[\[61a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myig [,]mig [}]brgya pa pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyis/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 
[\[61a.5\]]ba/_/de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grags/_/de ni mtha' dang dbus yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_/snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo /_/me tog mang po'i phreng ba sbyangs bkye zhing /_/'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste/_/byang chub shing la gnas 
[\[61a.6\]]pa'i lha yi rnams/_/sangs rgyas blta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed/_/spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar/_/spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung /_/'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim/_/shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes/_/
[\[61a.7\]]pad+mo 'brul ba stug cing gser mdog 'dra/_/rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing /_/sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel/_/rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste/_/phyogs rnams kun 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]nas snying po byang chub la/_/gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed/_/byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos/_/smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams/_/rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun nas 'bar/_/srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan cad 
[\[61b.2\]]du/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston/_/byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed do/_/de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas/_/thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing /_/rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang de dag ston/_/rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod 
[\[61b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_/sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa/_/de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa/_/thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu 'byung /_/phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa/_/de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste/_/de dag 
[\[61b.4\]]cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang /_/snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do/_/byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag_/mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan pa thams cad kyang /_/sngan cad de bzhin 
[\[61b.5\]]gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[61b.6\]]srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tshe/_/mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing /_/gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i/_/bde gshegs stobs rnams rnam par dag pa mthong /_/bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho'i las sbyangs te/_/
[\[61b.7\]]mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing /_/las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byam klas stobs spyod tshe/_/bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin/_/
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang /_/sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug_/'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /_/bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam spyod pa/_/de dag ji bzhin rgyal ba chos ston te/_/rang byung 
[\[62a.2\]]mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to/_/phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang /_/'byam klas sems can khams dang chos kyi khams/_/nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog_/rang byung spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang bston/_/bde 
[\[62a.3\]]gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro/_/skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs/_/phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing /_/sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan/_/bsam gtan rnam thar stobs mtha' dbus med pa/_/
[\[62a.4\]]ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na/_/sems can bsam pa'i chos kyi nyon mongs sel/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum sgrib pa med/_/skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser bstan/_/zhing dang 
[\[62a.5\]]sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos/_/de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan/_/thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste/_/de nas chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs/_/thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas khang /_/
[\[62a.6\]]brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan/_/'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang /_/'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma lus par/_/thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing /_/rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung /_/de nas byang 
[\[62a.7\]]chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs kun nas sgrog pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]tu/_/sangs rgyas ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba/_/byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang /_/'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing /_/sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngon chad sbyangs pas na/_/de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis 
[\[62b.2\]]rgyas/_/'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba bskyed/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas ston/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas/_/de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing /_/shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel/_/ma 
[\[62b.3\]]log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de/_/sngon chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas/_/'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston to/_/de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyod tshe/_/'gro ba rnams kyi sgrib 
[\[62b.4\]]pa 'thibs po bsal/_/de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste/_/zhing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/_/bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho spyod pa'i tshe/_/bskal pa yangs par rgyal ba rab tu spyad/_/de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba bskyed/_
[\[62b.5\]]nyon mongs dri mas bsgribs pa kun kyang sel/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyad cing /_/shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste/_/'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su bsal/_/de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes/_/'gro ba kun 
[\[62b.6\]]mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis/_/yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas/_/phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par bzhugs/_/phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon du lta/_/smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab spyod tshe/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu 
[\[62b.7\]]rgya che zhing /_/phyi ma'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam par/_/spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes/_/rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/_/bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs/_/de phyir rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i/_/ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas/_/de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin/_/phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par 
[\[63a.2\]]mdzes/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi/_/
[\[63a.3\]]'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang /_/sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa/_/de bzhin kun kyang rin chen sgo nas brjod/_/dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul/_/chos dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong zhing /_/gzhal med 
[\[63a.4\]]bskal par dri med yongs gsungs pas/_/chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab tu byung /_/thams cad chos la dri [{]myed [,]med [}]sa gnyis te/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing /_/rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas/_/'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs 
[\[63a.5\]]pas byung /_/bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum ste/_/snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brten/_/gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas/_/chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos/_/'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa/_/mthu yi 'khor 'od 
[\[63a.6\]]snying po snying rje ste/_/zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o/_/dga' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de/_/zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol/_/sa rnams chos yul kun nas rab tu 
[\[63a.7\]]skyes/_/de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan/_/shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sprin la spyod/_/'byam klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun/_/zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra/_/de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'di las grag_/chos dbyings 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mtha' dang mnyam pa'i lus can te/_/'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed/_/'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag_/ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan/_/thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam 
[\[63b.2\]]rtogs pas/_/bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste/_/gzhal med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog_/tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang /_/rdzu 'phrul chos kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug_/'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros sa/_/bskal pa rgya 
[\[63b.3\]]mtshor byang chub shing las brjod/_/chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste/_/dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra/_/sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu/_/rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam 
[\[63b.4\]]par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni/_/dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems/_/
[\[63b.5\]]rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/_/phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te/_/dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang /_/gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[63b.6\]]gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong /_/bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag_/la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la/_/kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal du med pa yi/_/mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong /_/la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la/_/
[\[63b.7\]]phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing /_/yon tan mtha' yas 'od sprin rab 'bar ba/_/'gro ba ngang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong /_/la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug_/dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku/_/'gro ba kun 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i/_/sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug pa mthong /_/sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste/_/phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing /_/'gro ba snod bzhin bskul bar byed pa yi/_/de bzhin 
[\[64a.2\]]gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug_/la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug_/sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing /_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong /_/ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i/_/
[\[64a.3\]]'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug_/sngan cad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la/_/la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed/_/la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams/_/bde gshegs bsod nams 'byung ba ji bzhin mthong /_/pha rol phyin pa rgya 
[\[64a.4\]]mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe/_/ji ltar dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong /_/sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_/mtha' dang dbus med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing /_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs kun rab brjod pa kun/_/rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las 
[\[64a.5\]]mthong /_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_/
[\[64a.6\]]kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams 
[\[64a.7\]]cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab po/_/'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams cad rab tu phab po/_/rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]thams cad kyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang /_nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang /_rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang /_mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang /_spos dang tsan+dan dang /_rin po che 
[\[64b.2\]]thams cad kyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang /_nor bu'i nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang /_rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang /_rang rang gi 
[\[64b.3\]]lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang /_de lta bu dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab po/_/
[\[64b.4\]]ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin gyi char 
[\[64b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho 
[\[64b.6\]]gzhan dang gzhan dang /_tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang /_chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_de bzhin 
[\[64b.7\]]gshegs pa'i yul dang /_byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_yul dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /_rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa la khong 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]du chud par byed do/_/'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin no/_/'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul 
[\[65a.2\]]rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i ste le'u dang po'o//_//[{D44-2}]de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ji lta bu zhig
