[\[65a.3\]]mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni 
[\[65a.4\]]ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsnyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[65a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[65a.6\]]ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi snyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[65a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rnams la sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu 
[\[65b.2\]]zhig mnga'/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu 
[\[65b.3\]]yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.4\]]thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu 
[\[65b.5\]]zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.6\]]thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig 
[\[65b.7\]]tu yongs su ston/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa 
[\[66a.2\]]mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 
[\[66a.3\]]rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin rlabs kyis/_mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de 
[\[66a.4\]]dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyad de/_/byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes/_/phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs/_/'gro ba ma 
[\[66a.5\]]lus kun gyi the tsom gcod/_/mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu bskyed/_/sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad/_/sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed/_/de bzhin 
[\[66a.6\]]gshegs pa blta zhing kun nas gnas/_/de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du/_/the tsom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs 
[\[66a.7\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug_/rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang /_/ye shes rgya chen mthu stobs rnam par sbyangs/_/rgyal sras kun la yang dag 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]bstan du gsol/_/sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang /_/mi snyems chos nyid ji ltar nam sbyangs dang /_/rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bsgrag tu gsol/_/ji ltar chos rgyal pho brang mnga' 
[\[66b.2\]]mdzad cing /_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang /_/sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang /_/thugs brtse'i slad du yang dag bstan du gsol/_/rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_/snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku/_/sangs 
[\[66b.3\]]rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa/_/'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams/_/chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang /_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/'di dag 
[\[66b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du gsol/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang /_/rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang /_/chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag_/byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66b.5\]]kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_zhal gyi sgo tshems kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas 'od zer/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/_rin po che'i ze ba 
[\[66b.6\]]rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang 
[\[66b.7\]]snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste rin po che rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_
[\[67a.2\]]'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/_'od zer de dag re re zhing 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu 
[\[67a.3\]]phra ba snyed do/_/'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/_de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67a.4\]]de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas/_'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 
[\[67a.5\]]gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de/_/phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas 
[\[67a.6\]]kun kyang mchod/_/sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas/_/rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/_/phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes/_/spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed/_/des ni sems can snod bzhin 
[\[67a.7\]]bskul byas nas/_/byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag_/srid pa'i rgyud na sngan cad 'khor ba'i tshe/_/rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa/_/de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bgrol/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]so/_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang /_/byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'phyang /_/'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan/_/byang chub bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab de sangs rgyas/_/phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog_/sems can kun 
[\[67b.2\]]gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te/_/sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul/_/de las chos nyid zhi sgra rab tu 'byung /_/zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngan cad du/_/spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad/_/stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs 
[\[67b.3\]]kyang /_/rgyal ba de'i zhal ltar kun kyang deng /_/zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas/_/rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags/_/mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs shing /_/thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta/_/gsung 
[\[67b.4\]]dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams/_/rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston/_/'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs kyis/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo de la bltar yang 'dong /_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/_/skad 
[\[67b.5\]]cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste/_/rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyis/_/rgyal ba'i drung du myur du 'dong bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho/_/'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang /_/chos nyid ji lta ci 'dra de dag 
[\[67b.6\]]ltos/_/sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams/_byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 
[\[67b.7\]]dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su/_shar phyogs logs 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 
[\[68a.2\]]chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa/_nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par blta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 
[\[68a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin 
[\[68a.4\]]bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_
[\[68a.5\]]rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas 
[\[68a.6\]]yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_spos dang bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_
[\[68a.7\]]de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan 
[\[68b.2\]]pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri bo'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas 
[\[68b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par snang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_nor bu'i 
[\[68b.4\]]rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor 
[\[68b.5\]]bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' 
[\[68b.6\]]kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer dang /_sangs 
[\[68b.7\]]rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[69a.2\]]khyab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam 
[\[69a.3\]]par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 
[\[69a.4\]]phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_lho phyogs su brten nas/_in dra nI la dang /_'dzam bu nA da dang /_pad+ma rA ga sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas yang 'jig rten 
[\[69a.5\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[69a.6\]]pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_lhan 
[\[69a.7\]]cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_rin po che dang spos dang me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam 
[\[69b.2\]]mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' 
[\[69b.3\]]kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu 
[\[69b.4\]]brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun nas 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog 
[\[69b.5\]]par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin 
[\[69b.6\]]tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_nub phyogs su brten te/_seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i 
[\[69b.7\]]snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas 
[\[70a.2\]]mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros shes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam 
[\[70a.3\]]mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i 
[\[70a.4\]]shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu rin po che'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam 
[\[70a.5\]]par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa 
[\[70a.6\]]dang /_sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam 
[\[70a.7\]]mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_byang phyogs su brten te/_seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas 
[\[70b.2\]]skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang /_shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan can bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[70b.3\]]bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi 
[\[70b.4\]]gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_seng ge'i khri rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam 
[\[70b.5\]]mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon pas/_rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i 
[\[70b.6\]]snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po 
[\[70b.7\]]che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad+mo'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri sangs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu 
[\[71a.2\]]brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri spos 
[\[71a.3\]]dang /_rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa seng ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 
[\[71a.4\]]nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/_seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po 
[\[71a.5\]]can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[71a.6\]]khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun 
[\[71a.7\]]nas sgron ma'i blo gros shes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis 
[\[71b.2\]]brlab pa dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang 'od dang sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par 
[\[71b.3\]]byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu dang gos dang rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas 
[\[71b.4\]]yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' 
[\[71b.5\]]kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 
[\[71b.6\]]pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[71b.7\]]ba der phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/_seng ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas yang 'jig 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 
[\[72a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab 
[\[72a.3\]]tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin 
[\[72a.4\]]bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 
[\[72a.5\]]gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin 
[\[72a.6\]]po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' 
[\[72a.7\]]kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_spos dang gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam 
[\[72b.2\]]mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 
[\[72b.3\]]gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams 
[\[72b.4\]]su brten te/_seng ge'i khri in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na 
[\[72b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[72b.6\]]pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul 
[\[72b.7\]]shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis 
[\[73a.2\]]brlab pa dang /_'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus 
[\[73a.3\]]nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che'i yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 
[\[73a.4\]]rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sems skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par 
[\[73a.5\]]byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i 
[\[73a.6\]]sgra sgrog pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin 
[\[73a.7\]]gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten te/_seng ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 
[\[73b.2\]]seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros shes bya ba/_byang chub 
[\[73b.3\]]sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_
[\[73b.4\]]spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod 
[\[73b.5\]]pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog gi khang 
[\[73b.6\]]pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya bar brjod pa'i 'od 
[\[73b.7\]]zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'od zer gyi sprin 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_'og gi phyogs su 
[\[74a.2\]]brten nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 
[\[74a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang 
[\[74a.4\]]grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/_byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 
[\[74a.5\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/_rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /_nor bu rin po 
[\[74a.6\]]che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_spos thams 
[\[74a.7\]]cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin 
[\[74b.2\]]gyis brlab pa dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab 
[\[74b.3\]]pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[74b.4\]]steng gi phyogs su brten te/_seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas 
[\[74b.5\]]pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po drug pa/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems 
[\[74b.6\]]dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[74b.7\]]snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te/_gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/_seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/'khod 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung thams cad re re nas 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[75a.2\]]rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul 
[\[75a.3\]]shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/_rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang zhing 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur to/_/zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[75a.4\]]ldan 'das thams cad shes shing mthong bar gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten 
[\[75a.5\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang shi 'phos pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[75a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[75a.7\]]bskyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[75b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char bab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag 
[\[75b.3\]]par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba 
[\[75b.4\]]byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang /_'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba 
[\[75b.5\]]byed par gyur to/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/_/de lta 
[\[75b.6\]]bu'i chos kyis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bskul ba byed cing /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu rab tu brdal te zhing re re yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi 
[\[75b.7\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed de/_sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i phung po la rab tu 'god do/_/sems can ri rab kyi 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god do/_/sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god do/_/sems can ri rab kyi rdul 
[\[76a.2\]]shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do/_/zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni sngon chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed do/_/zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab 
[\[76a.3\]]kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/zhing de dag re re dag yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing 
[\[76a.4\]]gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do/_/zhing de dag re re la yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 
[\[76a.5\]]bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do/_/zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[76a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/_/'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste/_/ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang /_/rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod 
[\[76a.7\]]pa'i/_/dbyangs kyi tshogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog_/bskal pa rgya mtshor skyo med spyad pa spyod/_/sdug bsngal kun nas 'gro ba kun 'grol kyang /_/yid la skyo [{]myed [,]med [}]zhum pa gang yang med/_/'di yi tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs/_/
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing /_/tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed/_/mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med/_/de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab tu sgrog_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/_/rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don 
[\[76b.2\]]du/_/de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su spyod/_/de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra'o/_/rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te/_/phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing /_/rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can/_/de dag chos nyid 
[\[76b.3\]]zhing 'jug 'di 'dra'o/_/'od zer sgo rnams re re mtha' yas pa'i/_/bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug_/spyod pas [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni kun nas yongs dag ste/_/rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing /_/
[\[76b.4\]]zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang /_/sems can rnams la 'jigs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag gi'o/_/tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab lus/_/de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul/_/skad 
[\[76b.5\]]cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang /_/rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi'o/_/dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par/_/skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston/_/sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med/_/de 'dra'i 
[\[76b.6\]]chos nyid chags med blos rtogs so/_/bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams/_/'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus/_/rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te/_/'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[76b.7\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]snang bas phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o/_/'od zer rin po che thams cad kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du brdal ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/_tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 
[\[77a.2\]]'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/_phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang 
[\[77a.3\]]po thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/_rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu rab tu spros nas/_sems can thams 
[\[77a.4\]]cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ci lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan 
[\[77a.5\]]nas/_sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir/_mos pa ji bzhin du byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char 
[\[77a.6\]]rab tu dbab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+mo chen po chu 
[\[77a.7\]]ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/_nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'beb pa/_ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/_snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/_'od kyi 'khor rnam par dag cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/_rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas ston pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung 
[\[77b.2\]]ba/_nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo /_/pad+mo chen 
[\[77b.3\]]po de byung ba'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/_
[\[77b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i 'phreng ba de dag la 'khod do/_/
[\[77b.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can/_sangs 
[\[77b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/_zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa dang /_ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs 
[\[77b.7\]]par byed pa/_sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu bsgyur ba/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/_phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'chang ba/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings kyi lus 
[\[78a.2\]]dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal/_/'gro ba kun la rgyal ba 
[\[78a.3\]]mngon sum ste/_/ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas/_/snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs/_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/_/rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis 
[\[78a.4\]]kun nas bskor/_/kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to/_/spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/_/byang chub snying po pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs/_/chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste/_/spu rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa ston/_/
[\[78a.5\]]zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing /_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/_/kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong /_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/_/byang 
[\[78a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni 'khor du nye bar 'dong /_/chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs/_/zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/_/chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul 
[\[78a.7\]]can/_/kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can/_/sangs rgyas chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]na gnas/_/zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod/_/rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod/_/de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba/_/de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug_/
[\[78b.2\]]sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang /_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing /_/de dag rnam 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs/_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi/_/lus 
[\[78b.3\]]kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston/_/sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob/_/bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 
[\[78b.4\]]rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab/_/dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste/_/chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na/_/'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod/_/
[\[78b.5\]]yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/'dres pa med cing gnas pa med/_/sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/_/gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong /_/chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas/_/chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/_/thams 
[\[78b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/_/zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes/_/kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/_/sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang /_/de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong /_/de bzhin 
[\[78b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku dag las/_/mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams/_/zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing /_/chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston/_/spu rnams re re kun nas kyang /_/phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag_/sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing /_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas/_/sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag_/
[\[79a.2\]]mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor/_/ye shes zab mo shes bya ba/_/rgya che phyogs su rab tu ston/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/_/rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing /_/yang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[79a.3\]]ston pa mdzad/_/sku rnams re re kun nas kyang /_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam par/_/sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing /_/rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/_
[\[79a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes/_/rgya chen gsung ni rang byung ba/_/zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu 
[\[79a.5\]]sgrog_/'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par/_/'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing /_/byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon/_/sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin/_/
[\[79a.6\]]thams cad gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi/_/rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong /_/mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas sprin/_/chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog_/ye shes rnam rgyu'i tshul bzhin du/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug_/
[\[79a.7\]]'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med/_/'byung ba yod pa rnam par bstan/_/gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/_/chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin/_/'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste/_/'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang /_/sangs rgyas chos kyi 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dbyings las byung /_/de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod/_/yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med/_/de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste/_/sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med/_/rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o/_/'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin/_/bsam pa 
[\[79b.2\]]kun la rab tu byung /_/yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kun tu/_/sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/_/snying po byang chub kun na snang /_/'khod pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad na/_/zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par 
[\[79b.3\]]mdzes/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la/_/yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/_/de dag yon tan zad pa med/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi 
[\[79b.4\]]rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab sangs rgyas sar/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa/_/de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams 
[\[79b.5\]]cad mthong /_/ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams/_/zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo /_/gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan 
[\[79b.6\]]sngar 'byung /_/kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang /_/rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang /_/spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa/_/de dag zhing rnams thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong /_/kun 
[\[79b.7\]]tu mnyam pa nyid gyur cing /_/kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te/_/ye shes kun gyi rjes song na/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings la rnam par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]sku dag tu/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug_/sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu/_/byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas/_/gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus ngag dang /_/ming gis kun na rab tu gnas/_/byang chub snying por rnam 
[\[80a.2\]]'phrul dang /_/byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag_/skad cig sems kyis ston pa byed/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang /_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams/_/
[\[80a.3\]]skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang /_/mtha' ma rnyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge 'od zer snang ba'i mthus 
[\[80a.4\]]'byin pa'i blo gros kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/chos dbyings tshul rnams thams 
[\[80a.5\]]cad kyang /_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon du yog_/'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dag_/phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa/_/thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor/_/de ni smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/_/gzhan 
[\[80a.6\]]dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis/_/zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/_/rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs kyis/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang /_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag_/brjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung /_/
[\[80a.7\]]zhing kun rdul la sku yi rnams/_/thams cad chos rab rab tu 'bebs/_/'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med/_/'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/_/zhing kun rdul phran sbubs dag tu/_/rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung /_/
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog_/zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi/_/'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas/_/byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul/_/kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis/_/chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te/_/
[\[80b.2\]]'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du/_/gzugs kyi sku yang rab tu mthong /_/dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi/_/mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/_/da ltar byung dang 'das pa 
[\[80b.3\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa/_/de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grag_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur 
[\[80b.4\]]rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing /_/ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa rnams/_/de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam 
[\[80b.5\]]pa'i dbyangs/_/zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod/_/skad cig re re'i sems kun la/_/chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rten/_/chos 
[\[80b.6\]]rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs/_/rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag dang /_/zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod/_/rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang /_/chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung /_/
[\[80b.7\]]zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed/_/ye shes chags med spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du/_/las pa med par kun bkang zhing /_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs/_/sangs 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs/_/chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog pa/_/chos dbyings rjes su shes pa rnams/_/dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par/_/sgra dang dbyangs rnams 
[\[81a.2\]]shin tu sgrog_/dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal/_/dbyangs kyi de dag sa la zhugs/_/sgra yi shes la rmongs pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems can sgra yang spyod yul te/_/thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang /_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so/_/
[\[81a.3\]]sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing /_stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te/_/bskal pa bye bar sbyangs pas na/_/chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[81a.4\]]byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/_/chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/ye shes sa ni thob pa rnams/_/'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong /_
[\[81a.5\]]shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang /_/sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs/_/chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing /_/lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste/_/zab mo'i chos 
[\[81a.6\]]rnams rtogs gyur nas/_/smon lam dag gis yang dag byung /_/bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing /_/ye shes sa la rnam par gnas/_/chos la rnam spyod khong du chud/_/spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams 
[\[81a.7\]]cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu/_/chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na/_/rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mthong /_/zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad du/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams/_/rgya 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]mtsho kun la rab tu spyod/_/bdag mthong bas ni lus dang rdul/_/gcig tu 'dres pa mngon par byas/_/ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste/_/zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes/_/'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun par/_/sems can kun la mngon 
[\[81b.2\]]sum du/_/lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing /_/byang chub don du sems can 'dul/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ste/_/gang gis mgon po mthong ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab/_/
[\[81b.3\]]mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i/_/byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med de/_/chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang bas/_sangs 
[\[81b.4\]]rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas/_/yon 
[\[81b.5\]]tan sprin ni rab tu brjod/_/yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/_/gzugs kyi sku yang rab ston cing /_/chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug_/dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas stobs 
[\[81b.6\]]rnams thams cad la/_/rab tu gnas shing de dag ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug_/shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag_/kun nas shes par mi nus te/_/ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs shing /_/'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[81b.7\]]rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang /_/chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang /_/rab tu 'jug dang ldang ba yi/_/mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/_/chos rnams mtha' yas klong gi rnams/_/chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste/_/kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]shing /_/chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod/_/sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing /_/thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes/_/'ongs pa med cing 'phos pa med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o/_/gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku 
[\[82a.2\]]rnams ni/_/sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang /_/mos pa ci 'dra yod pa rnams/_/de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong /_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang /_/spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa/_/de dag thams cad ba spu la'ang /_/rnam 'phrul gzhan dang 
[\[82a.3\]]gzhan dag mthong /_/lus kyi rnams ni re res kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab/_/'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros kyis/_
[\[82a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas/_/'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur/_/kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od/_/sems 
[\[82a.5\]]can bsam pa kun la 'phro/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/_/snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs/_/bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te/_/'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes/_/thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres par/_/'od zer dkyil 'khor 
[\[82a.6\]]rgyas par 'gengs/_/phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston/_/zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong /_/phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon/_/zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag_/in+d+ra nI lar kun nas gnas/_/
[\[82a.7\]]spyi'u tshugs dag dang snrel zhi dang /_/pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang /_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du/_/gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par/_/thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gram bdal ba/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su/_/shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na/_/'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston/_/tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/_/
[\[82b.2\]]chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/_/tshig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis/_/chos bstan pa ni kun tu 'byung /_/sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/tshul rnams bsam cing rab tu brjod/_/dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis/_/mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan/_
[\[82b.3\]]sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang /_/rgyal ba rnams ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor 'dra/_/snying po byang chub rnams na snang /_/'byung ba dag kyang yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par snang ba'i 'byung ba blo gros kyis/_sangs 
[\[82b.4\]]rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams/_/sku gzugs bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ste/_/dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung /_/chos kyi 
[\[82b.5\]]shugs ni rab tu 'phel/_/mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams/_/phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung /_/rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan/_/skad cig skad cig sems kun la/_/sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[82b.6\]]ni dpal gyis 'bar/_/rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang /_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/_/rgya mtsho'i chos la byung ba rnams/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/_/'di yi yul la rnam 
[\[82b.7\]]par spyod/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la/_/gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa/_/de dang de rnams zhing dag tu/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la blta/_/ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing /_/chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni/_/mos pa rgya 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]mtsho shes pa ste/_/smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung /_/chags pa med la rab tu zhugs/_/spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/_/spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[83a.2\]]kun gyi sku gnas shing /_/ye shes spyod yul gyur pa rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sa gnon to/_/skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa/_/de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du/_/
[\[83a.3\]]rdul gcig steng du rnam par spyod/_/zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad ni/_/zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa/_/chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa rnams/_/zhing gcig tu ni sdud pa byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa 
[\[83a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i blo gros kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du/_/de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung /_/dbyangs kyi yan lag kun 
[\[83a.5\]]rgyas pa/_/chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so/_/brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/_/sems can kun gyi skad dag tu/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang /_/chos rnams bstan pa rab tu 'byung /_/zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par/_/
[\[83a.6\]]sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing /_/sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang /_/byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug_/rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams 
[\[83a.7\]]kun bkang zhing /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed/_/chos kyi sku ni tha dad min/_/nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med/_/gzugs kyi skur ni rnam [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa/_/mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor yul la mi gnas te/_
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas/_/ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te/_/gzung ba med cing 'byung ba med/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs/_/gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]las 'di bstan to/_/
[\[83b.2\]]zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams/_/de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs/_/ye shes [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa yis/_/spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong /_/rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing /_/bla med chos kyi 'khor 
[\[83b.3\]]lo dag_/zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor/_/ji snyed bskal pa bsam yas par/_/spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang /_/de yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'/_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[83b.4\]]rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying 
[\[83b.5\]]po byang chub dag tu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to/_/'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par 
[\[83b.6\]]sprul pa dag tu/_kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang /_chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//[{D44-3}]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems 
[\[83b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par brtags pa'i tshogs/_nam mkha'i dbyings na brdal ba med cing rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i klong mnyam 
[\[84a.2\]]pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu brdal ba'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang 
[\[84a.3\]]bzhin gyi snying po can dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba/_rgya mtsho'i klong phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon tu yang dag par ston pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar 
[\[84a.4\]]pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can/_zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs 
[\[84a.5\]]su grub par byed pa bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/_/ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[84a.6\]]dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam 
[\[84a.7\]]klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/_phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa/_dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ris su gtogs pa shin tu phra zhing sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par gnon pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs 
[\[84b.2\]]thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[84b.3\]]kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang /_zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/_de bzhin 
[\[84b.4\]]gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/_ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[84b.5\]]kun tu bzang pos/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin 
[\[84b.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal te/_rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[84b.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang /_spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i mthus 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams 
[\[85a.2\]]cad kyi rnam par dbye ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa 
[\[85a.3\]]thams cad yongs su gnan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang /_chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas/_thams 
[\[85a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang /_chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang /_sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs 
[\[85a.5\]]yongs su bzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar 
[\[85a.6\]]bsgrubs so/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[85a.7\]]khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang /_'du ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i tshig gi 
[\[85b.2\]]ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i sems kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dang dbyangs kyang nye bar 
[\[85b.3\]]bsgrubs so/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na lus 
[\[85b.4\]]'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_phyag g.yas 
[\[85b.5\]]pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/_'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/_phyogs 
[\[85b.6\]]thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag 
[\[85b.7\]]par ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ston pa/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go_/'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams 
[\[86a.2\]]cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs 
[\[86a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/_dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la/_ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye 
[\[86a.4\]]shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyis rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa thams cad kyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang /_sems 
[\[86a.5\]]can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang /_mnyam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /_ming gi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang /_phyogs dang mtshams thams cad du chos 
[\[86a.6\]]kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byam klas pa'i sgo dang /_chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par gyur te/_byang chub 
[\[86a.7\]]sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/gzungs 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i tshul 
[\[86b.2\]]rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par snang 
[\[86b.3\]]zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i 
[\[86b.4\]]sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab
