[\[86b.5\]]tu zhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang 'byung ba dang /_byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang 
[\[86b.6\]]rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya 
[\[86b.7\]]mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs pa tsam du g.yos te/_
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grags par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang /_nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 
[\[87a.2\]]bab par gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta 
[\[87a.3\]]ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams 
[\[87a.4\]]cad kyi mtshan gyi khams rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed 
[\[87a.5\]]pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grags par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon 
[\[87a.6\]]par bab po/_/'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i 
[\[87a.7\]]sgo thams cad dang 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na kun tu bzang po de/_/dbang po yid du 'ong la rab tu 'jug pa mthong /_/kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam par 'di 'dra ston par byed/_/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de/_/sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs/_/ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang rnam 'phrul pa/_/thams cad dbyangs kyis chags 
[\[87b.2\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgya che sgrog_/ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu/_/rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te/_/zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa mang po ston/_/
[\[87b.3\]]zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin tu/_/de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la/_/ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston/_/rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs/_/kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam 
[\[87b.4\]]mkha'i mtshan nyid do/_/thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas/_/lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye zhing /_/sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston/_/sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa/_/
[\[87b.5\]]mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan/_/rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med/_/'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul phran mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]thams 
[\[87b.6\]]cad lus kyi nang du kun tshud cing /_/dbyings la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya ba ston/_/skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston/_/zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam grags shing /_/rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa ston par rab 
[\[87b.7\]]tu snang /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod/_/kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong /_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs/_/ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan/_/chos rnams 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs/_/rang gi byang chub spyod pas sngon cad spyad pa ston/_/de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul pa/_/phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[88a.2\]]rnams la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon tan legs sgra 'byung /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga 
[\[88a.3\]]ro gcig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/_/smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung /_/de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i snying po ste/_/chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes/_/zhing 
[\[88a.4\]]rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs [{]myed [,]med [}]kyang /_/kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang /_/phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grag pas khyab/_/ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'/_/rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa/_/phyogs 
[\[88a.5\]]bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa'i rnams/_/rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chud byas shing /_/zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes/_/zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/_/rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyad pa dang /_/chos rnams kun la spyod 
[\[88a.6\]]cing gnas pa'i rnams/_/rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang /_/chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing /_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la shin tu zhugs/_/sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing /_/rdul phran kun la chos 
[\[88a.7\]]kyi dbyings su zhugs/_/chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang /_/rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing /_/rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin/_/'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing /_/rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston/_/gang gi don tu bskal pa rgya mtsho dag_/mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa/_/de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams 
[\[88b.2\]]gang byas nas/_/thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod/_/zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_/stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang /_/sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs 
[\[88b.3\]]gtong zhing ston/_/'khor rnams yongs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/kun tu bzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor/_/kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[88b.4\]]dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o//_//[{D44-4}]de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas/_sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par 
[\[88b.5\]]bltas/_chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/_sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par 
[\[88b.6\]]bltas/_dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[88b.7\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye 
[\[89a.2\]]shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]par bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[89a.3\]]las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_dad pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[89a.4\]]thugs kyis skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye 
[\[89a.5\]]shes ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/
[\[89a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par snang ba ni 
[\[89a.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgye ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po che 'phro ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni 
[\[89b.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas sems can rgya 
[\[89b.3\]]mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_'dul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gdul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[89b.4\]]rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi 
[\[89b.5\]]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[89b.6\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89b.7\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' ba chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzung ba dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90a.2\]]thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su 
[\[90a.3\]]bstsab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 
[\[90a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam 
[\[90a.5\]]par sbyang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang 
[\[90a.6\]]shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_
[\[90a.7\]]kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad/_rab tu brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 
[\[90b.2\]]tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//_/sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces 
[\[90b.3\]]bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bdun pa/_yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab/_/mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab/_/sems can bsam la sbyor ba ci bzhin snang /_/rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o/_/
[\[90b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas/_/sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes/_/sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab/_/sangs 
[\[90b.5\]]rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab/_/srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing /_/dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[90b.6\]]kun gyi byin gyis rlabs pa dag_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug_/gang rnams sems dag g.yo med sgyu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_/snying rje'i sems can khong nas byams dga' dang /_/dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni/_/'di dag 
[\[90b.7\]]thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang /_/chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la/_/gnas shing spyad pa rab tu sus spyod pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul de shes so/_/gang gis rgyal ba'i 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' thob bya legs par thob/_/gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_/'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing /_/
[\[91a.2\]]'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na/_/kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/_/rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no/_/bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang /_/rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs zhing rnams kun/_/de dag spu rtse kun tu blta 
[\[91a.3\]]bar gyis/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams/_/mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_/kun tu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi yul dang lus ldan pa/_/de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyid do/_/
[\[91a.4\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'jig rten 
[\[91a.5\]]gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang /_
[\[91a.6\]]'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang /_
[\[91a.7\]]'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[91b.2\]]ba rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo /_/'byung ngo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[91b.3\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang /_sems can 
[\[91b.4\]]rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /_bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas/_rnam par bsgrubs 
[\[91b.5\]]pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gengs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_rgyu 'thun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas 
[\[91b.6\]]kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rgyu dang rkyen la 
[\[91b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo /_/'byung ngo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin tu 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas/_/byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu/_/
[\[92a.2\]]zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med/_/rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi yongs su sbyangs/_/byang chub sems ni kun gyi bsam pa bzhin/_/smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing /_/sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas/_/
[\[92a.3\]]phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos/_/smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing /_/nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing 
[\[92a.4\]]'byung ngo /_/spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]rnams/_/spyod cing tshad med bde gshegs yul la 'jug_/phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhing /_/bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod/_/sems can bsam dbyings 
[\[92a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung /_/nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas/_/mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams/_/rin 
[\[92a.6\]]chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa/_/dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir/_/rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams spyod/_/chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag_/rdul gyi khongs 
[\[92a.7\]]su mtha' yas zhing ston te/_/rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/_/snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/_/pad+mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun/_/de dag zhing 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod/_/skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yi/_/zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa/_/rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad/_/tshul gyi khyad par mtha' 
[\[92b.2\]]yas sna tshogs pas/_/rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams/_/sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob/_/rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[92b.3\]]rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so/_/
[\[92b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po 
[\[92b.5\]]che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyi byung ba lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i 
[\[92b.6\]]lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus 
[\[92b.7\]]rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi byung ba'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan 
[\[93a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos/_/'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 
[\[93a.3\]]rgyu yis dbyings legs 'khor bar rnam par snang /_/de dag gis ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri [{]myed [,]med [}]'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/_/snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs 
[\[93a.4\]]par gnas/_/'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor/_/'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu ba byed pa'o/_/la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan/_/'od zer dra ba'i kun nas 
[\[93a.5\]]sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/_/zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs 
[\[93a.6\]]rgyas byin la gnas/_/yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya chen de dag byang chub sems dpas gang /_/lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor/_/
[\[93a.7\]]nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas/_/chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas/_/la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya chen dag la gnas/_/kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad/_/zhing rnams ring dang thung dang gling gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas/_/
[\[93b.2\]]sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i cod pan rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par gnas/_/de na sangs 
[\[93b.3\]]rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang /_/rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul/_/chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra/_/mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri 
[\[93b.4\]]med sems kyis shin du bskyed pa ste/_/nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang /_/las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan/_/skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro 
[\[93b.5\]]ba'i kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams/_/zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing /_/de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod/_/chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya chen ston/_/rdul rnams 
[\[93b.6\]]kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas/_/ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o/_/rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[93b.7\]]rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra/_/snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba med/_/mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'gyur/_/shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam 
[\[94a.2\]]klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhi'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par phye ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas 
[\[94a.3\]]pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig 
[\[94a.4\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna 
[\[94a.5\]]tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu 
[\[94a.6\]]phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rnam pa 
[\[94a.7\]]sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos/_/rnam phye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su gnas/_/dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/_/phyogs rnams kun nas zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang /_/la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste/_/de dag 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]la la phyogs nang gru bzhir gnas/_/nor bu pad+mo 'khor lo'i yan lag brgyad/_/kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris/_/rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing /_/gser las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te/_/sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas 
[\[94b.2\]]rgyu zhing 'jug_/las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can/_/nam mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin/_/de dag rin chen mang zhing rnam par phye/_/de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 
[\[94b.3\]]mdzes/_/zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags/_/sna tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun nas gnas/_/rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/_/bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar 
[\[94b.4\]]gyur pa ni/_/rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te/_/chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin/_/de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/_/skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/thams cad rdul med sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas/_/
[\[94b.5\]]kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/_/'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston/_/rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams/_/thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan/_/kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par 
[\[94b.6\]]brtags/_/de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor/_/rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa/_/de dag smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa yin/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyis sprul pa ni/_/sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags/_
[\[94b.7\]]sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag_/rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te/_/rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste/_/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyun thams cad kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i 
[\[95a.2\]]rgyan gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi 
[\[95a.3\]]lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i mtshan 
[\[95a.4\]]nyid kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i 
[\[95a.5\]]lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi 
[\[95a.6\]]spos kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog cod pan gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams 
[\[95a.7\]]cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gcig gis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]po che'i dbyibs kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun can no/_/
[\[95b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzud par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[95b.3\]]smras so/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams la ni/_/rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas/_/rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra/_/rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas/_/la la 'od zer rang bzhin te/_/dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung /_/rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od 
[\[95b.4\]]zer gyis/_/sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med/_/la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te/_/dag cing 'od gsal gzer la gnas/_/'od kyi sprin can sna tshogs 'od/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni/_/
[\[95b.5\]]mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste/_/brjod du med cing gzung du med/_/smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung /_/la la nor bu mu tig rgyu/_/snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar/_/mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag la/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang /_/
[\[95b.6\]]rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing /_/'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing /_/rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan/_/thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin/_/la la mtshan las byung ba ste/_/gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris/_/cod 
[\[95b.7\]]pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul/_/rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi/_/zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas/_/yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin/_/yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyed/_/sangs 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]rgyas sku yi 'od zer gyis/_/nor bu sna tshogs kun tu gnas/_/sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sprul nas/_/la la kun tu bzang po yis/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul/_/
[\[96a.2\]]nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang /_/smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/_'di ltar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[96a.3\]]pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[96a.4\]]kyi rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par 
[\[96a.5\]]dmigs pa'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste rin 
[\[96a.6\]]po che dang spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang /_spyod pa yongs su ston 
[\[96a.7\]]pa'i rgyan dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya che mtha' yas te/_/rnam 
[\[96b.2\]]dag las kyis rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/_/phyogs bzhi zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang /_/sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/_/kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams/_/rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung /_/
[\[96b.3\]]rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin/_/sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams/_/de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grags/_/sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams/_/
[\[96b.4\]]de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin/_/'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag_/rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te/_/sems can de dag rnam smyin ci 'dra ba/_/sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog_/dus gsum 'byung 
[\[96b.5\]]ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang /_/dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun/_/de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos/_/'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /_/phyogs bcu'i da 
[\[96b.6\]]ltar 'byung ba ji snyed pa'i/_/bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang /_/dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams/_/'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs/_/rnam par 'phrul 
[\[96b.7\]]zhing sems can rnam par 'dul/_/'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to/_/spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog klung /_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang /_/rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung /_/'di ni zhing rnams rgya 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mtsho'i rnam thar to/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams/_/sna tshogs rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par/_/thams cad rgya mtsho'i zhing 'di dbyings dag na/_/nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang /_/rgyal 
[\[97a.2\]]sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams/_/'gro ba'i grangs snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na rab tu snang /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[97a.3\]]mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la bsten pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[97a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[97a.5\]]thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_yongs su sbyangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa 
[\[97a.6\]]thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu 'god cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang /_'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub 
[\[97a.7\]]pa rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par 
[\[97b.2\]]bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyan/_/smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun 
[\[97b.3\]]gyis byung /_/kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtsho dag_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed/_/sngan cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing /_/bskal pa mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te/_/snying rje byams pas dgongs yangs 
[\[97b.4\]]kun bkang zhing /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs/_/chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yangs sbyangs te/_/bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang zhing /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung /_/
[\[97b.5\]]mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing /_/rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas/_/bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing /_/rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung /_/bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam 
[\[97b.6\]]bskyed cing /_/'gro ba kun phan bde don spyod spyad de/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas/_/'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i/_/pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te/_/
[\[97b.7\]]smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms byas pas/_/dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung /_/'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang /_/chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te/_/sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can sbyangs pas na/_/'di 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]'dra yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung /_/rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing /_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas/_/'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho bskams pas/_/zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag 
[\[98a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing /_/'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnams sbyangs te/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig 
[\[98a.3\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chung ngur kun tu ston to/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni chos kyi 
[\[98a.4\]]dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad mi ring ngo /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/_/
[\[98a.5\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob po/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[98a.6\]]par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob po/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob po/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob ste/_/
[\[98a.7\]]de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi/_/sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung /_/de dag sems can bsam pa 
[\[98b.2\]]ji bzhin mkhyen/_/sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o/_/sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ste/_/mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs/_/gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu/_/sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin 
[\[98b.3\]]ston la ltos/_/sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston/_/la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob/_/chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo/_/rab tu mdzes par 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs/_/la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag_/sbyong 
[\[98b.4\]]zhing 'byam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang /_/la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong ba mdzad/_/smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go_/la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan/_/sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/_/la la theg 
[\[98b.5\]]pa gcig kyang rab ston te/_/rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so/_/rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad/_/la la skad cig gcig gis sems can rnams/_/rgya mtsho bsam 
[\[98b.6\]]yas byang chub don du 'dul/_/la la spu yi sgo nas bsam yas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed/_/'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing /_/thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad/_/la la sangs rgyas gsung gis 
[\[98b.7\]]kun bkang zhing /_/zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog_/bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing /_/sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul/_/la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/'khor rnams yang dag kun 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]nas 'khod bcas pas/_/zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing /_/sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs/_/de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing /_/
[\[99a.2\]]'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste/_/sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[99a.3\]]snyed du shes par bya ste/_'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya 
[\[99a.4\]]mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa 
[\[99a.5\]]kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa byin 
[\[99a.6\]]gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan 
[\[99a.7\]]pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten rgya mtsho'i bskal pa tha dad de/_/sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang /_/bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med/_/bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam/_/phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang /_/bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung /_/bskal pa 
[\[99b.2\]]sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings snang /_/byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan/_/la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug_/la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung /_/
[\[99b.3\]]bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can/_/la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par dag_/bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung /_/sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug_/bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngon cad spyod spyad pas/_/'jig 
[\[99b.4\]]rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag_/de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med/_/'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams/_/bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs/_/bcom ldan dbyangs dang 
[\[99b.5\]]'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba/_/snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/_/bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung /_/dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o/_/bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo mtha' yas 
[\[99b.6\]]'byung /_/bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes/_/smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur/_/bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus/_/bskal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu/_/
[\[99b.7\]]bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin/_/bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rkyen kyang 'byung /_/ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod/_/bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'phrul mthu yis 'byung /_/bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin/_/zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag_/zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med/_/skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs 
[\[100a.2\]]kyis bskal par 'gyur/_/'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par byung /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/_
[\[100a.3\]]'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang /_
[\[100a.4\]]'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna 
[\[100a.5\]]tshogs kyi spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang /_'di lta ste sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du dag par gnas pa dang /_'di lta 
[\[100a.6\]]ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu 
[\[100a.7\]]mang por kun nas gnas pa dang /_'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang /_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[100b.2\]]rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs 
[\[100b.3\]]su bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos/_/chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar/_/de dag 'byung zhing 'jig 
[\[100b.4\]]par 'gyur ba yang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang /_/sems can nyon mongs mi zad ldan pa dang /_/las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams/_/de dag bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/_/kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin/_/
[\[100b.5\]]sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan rnams dang /_/bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can/_/rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams/_/de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na/_/bskal 
[\[100b.6\]]pa de ni rnam par dag par snang /_/sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang /_/de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi/_/byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang /_/de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas/_/de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang 
[\[100b.7\]]po dag_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong /_/bye ba mang po mtha' yas mi zad pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang /_/rgyan la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min/_/bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bye brag snang /_/rdul rnams re re 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]sbubs su dus kun tu/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/_/rgyal sras ji tshul 'dod pa de bzhin du/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par 'gyur/_/gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skyer 'gyur na/_/zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan 
[\[101a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/bsam pa yongs su dag bzhin rgyas 'gyur te/_/'di na zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na/_/de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur/_/sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs 
[\[101a.3\]]ldan/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag_/bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na/_/de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag_/kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i tshul 
[\[101a.4\]]ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni 
[\[101a.5\]]'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang /_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[101a.6\]]khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi 
[\[101a.7\]]khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang /_mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste/_
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang /_
[\[101b.2\]]'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang /_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul 
[\[101b.3\]]rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[101b.4\]]khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/_/kun na rgyan mang 
[\[101b.5\]]rnam dag kun yod kyang /_/gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang med/_/'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos/_/rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho 
[\[101b.6\]]thams cad khyab byas kyang /_/de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med/_/rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa/_/sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs te/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang /_/de dag tha dad 'gyur ba 
[\[101b.7\]]nam yang med/_/rdul phran rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la/_/mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing /_/'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang /_/gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i nyes pa med/_/rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/_/
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing /_/bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang /_/rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med/_/rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab/_/sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang 
[\[102a.2\]]byas te/_/sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnam 'dul yang /_/'byam klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med/_/rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de/_/de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing /_/thabs dang mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis/_/
[\[102a.3\]]thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med/_/rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyi gsung /_/'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas te/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang /_/de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas 
[\[102a.4\]]rgyan gyi rnams/_/thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos/_/las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min/_/rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag_/ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang /_/de dag 
[\[102a.5\]]gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med/_/'gro ba kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ste le'u bzhi pa'o//_//[{D44-5}]sangs rgyas 
[\[102a.6\]]rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po brgyad pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub 
[\[102a.7\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/_bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu 
[\[102b.2\]]bzung ba ste/_de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[102b.3\]]nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/_rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba 
[\[102b.4\]]yod de/_nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/_'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 
[\[102b.5\]]'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/_me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/_mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal 
[\[102b.6\]]mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glong gi gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs 
[\[102b.7\]]shes bya ba yod de/_spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to/_/de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/_rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to/_/kye rgyal 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ba'i sras dag rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/_nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to/_/
[\[103a.2\]]spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+mo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang ze ba sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/_pad+mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[103a.3\]]pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa rnam par dag pa shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/_rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 
[\[103a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[103a.5\]]gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de/_/rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te/_/rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan cad sangs rgyas kyi/_/drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri med pa/_/rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun 
[\[103a.6\]]bkang zhing /_/zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas/_/sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na/_/'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de/_/'od snang 
[\[103a.7\]]btang ba mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni/_/rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste/_/nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o/_/me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin/_/sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha'i dbyings la 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]gnas/_/rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong /_/nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/_/byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu gtong /_/
[\[103b.2\]]'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs/_/phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed/_/rin chen kun gyi 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed/_/sdug bsngal thams 
[\[103b.3\]]cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la bgrod/_/'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar/_/'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams/_/rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed/_/brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor 
[\[103b.4\]]lo sgyur 'dra dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas/_/sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa/_/'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas/_/tshul 
[\[103b.5\]]rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/_/'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na/_/rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi/_/rin chen 'od kyi sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang /_/rnam par snang mdzad chos 
[\[103b.6\]]dbyings rnam 'phrul zhing la ltos/_/bskal ba rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bstsal byas te/_/smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang /_/bzang po spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i/_/dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag 
[\[103b.7\]]byung ba yin/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ste/_le'u lnga pa'o//_//[{D44-6}]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/_nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan+dan thams cad las grub pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin 
[\[104a.2\]]tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa nor bu spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/_nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan 
[\[104a.3\]]thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa/_spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/_/
[\[104a.4\]]de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan dang yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs 
[\[104a.5\]]rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yod pa/_/mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can/_/nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mchog_/
[\[104a.6\]]de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung /_/dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/_/nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang /_/mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas/_/kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brten/_/snying po nor bu'i sprin 
[\[104a.7\]]can sna tshogs sra/_/'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs/_/'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher/_/khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes/_/nor bu'i rdo rjes byas shing sra zhing brtan/_/mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul/_/mtshan 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ldan nor bu'i rin chen rnam bkod pa/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang /_/spos chu'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas te/_/rin chen tsan+dan me tog kun tu gram/_/pad+mo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog_/rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang 
[\[104b.2\]]ldan/_/sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan/_/nor bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar/_/'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas/_/spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa gdugs 'chang ba'i/_/
[\[104b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang /_/sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin/_/'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo/_/rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang /_/nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing /_/kun la rnam 
[\[104b.4\]]par snang mdzad sku gsal ba/_/gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang /_/thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te/_/sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pas/_/thams cad phyogs dang chos dbyings kun bkang zhing /_/sems can 
[\[104b.5\]]mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/_/thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste/_/rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa/_/de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grags/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[104b.6\]]khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/_le'u drug pa'o//_//[{D44-7}]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la khor yug chen po de'i nang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad 
[\[104b.7\]]kyis brgyan pa/_rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa/_rin po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa/_rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can mi mtho ba mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/_nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kha dog dang /_'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/_rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[105a.2\]]pad+mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam par bdal ba/_nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyis 
[\[105a.3\]]sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[105a.4\]]rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_
[\[105a.5\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam/_/'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pa mi shigs sra/_/rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing /_/rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu yang /_/
[\[105a.6\]]yid 'ong sa ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi/_/rin chen chu ba ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs/_/pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa/_/tsan+dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram/_/'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams/_/'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs 
[\[105a.7\]]su sprin kyang 'bar/_/sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram/_/sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog_/thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas/_/mi zad yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug_/zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]kun bkang zhing /_/sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog_/rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun/_/shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston/_/sngan cad spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dag_/kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang /_/de yi rgya mtsho 
[\[105b.2\]]nor bu sna tshogs bting /_/de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams/_/rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang /_/me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs/_/der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 
[\[105b.3\]]'dong zhing /_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog_/snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo/_/rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag_/sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung /_/sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston/_/chos 
[\[105b.4\]]dbyings nam mkha' lta bu'i kun tu 'gengs/_/sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang /_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa/_/de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug_/'jig rten 
[\[105b.5\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzhi rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o//_//[{D44-8}]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul 
[\[105b.6\]]shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis rlung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas 
[\[105b.7\]]bres pa'o/_/rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o/_/rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs glong du 'khyil pa'o/_/tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]dang smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o/_/rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu rab tu 'gyed pa'o/_/kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' 
[\[106a.2\]]yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o/_/dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o/_/phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu bkye ba'o/_/mu tig rin po che thams 
[\[106a.3\]]cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/_/rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o/_/'di lta ste nor bu dang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa 
[\[106a.4\]]bcus kun nas bskor ba'o/_/'di lta ste nor bu thams cad kyi pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o/_/'di lta ste nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba'i gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs 
[\[106a.5\]]pa'o/_/rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun+da ri ka dang /_spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o/_/'di lta ste rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[106a.6\]]snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/_/tsan+dan dang spos dang nor bu mang po sgra thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o/_/'di lta ste rin po che dang gos dang rgyal 
[\[106a.7\]]mtshan dang /_dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o/_/rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun nas bskor ba'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yi/_/rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnams brjod de/_/
[\[106b.2\]]gzhi rnams rin chen gos kyi kun bting ba/_/mi shigs rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes/_/spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang /_/nyi ma'i nor bu'i 'od 'phro stug sprin dang /_/pad+mo'i rin chen 'phreng ba'ang kun nas bres/_/gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o/_/
[\[106b.3\]]spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste/_/rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong /_/sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog_/them skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan/_/gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos 
[\[106b.4\]]brgyan/_/stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad+mo yi/_/sprin stug dra ba rnam par bres pa ste/_/rin chen nor bu'i shing gi 'phreng ba dag_/rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar/_/'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang /_/rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su 
[\[106b.5\]]rab tu sgrog_/spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste/_/me tog pun+da ri kas kun nas bskor/_/spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed/_/de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can/_/gos dang 
[\[106b.6\]]nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing /_/rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag_/thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog_/pad+mo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor/_/kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan/_/phyogs rnams kun nas mu 
[\[106b.7\]]tig sprin bkye zhing /_/grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan/_/dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste/_/rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyab kyi bar/_/rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i/_/rgya mtshos bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan/_/sngon 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]cad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_/sna tshogs rgya mtsho zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa/_/shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa 'ang /_/de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu 
[\[107a.2\]]klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor bar byas pa ste/_spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o/_/nor bu'i 'khor lo dang nor bu'i 'od rnam par 
[\[107a.3\]]dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po 
[\[107a.4\]]che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/spyod pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur 
[\[107a.5\]]snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu yog par byas pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/dus gsum du 
[\[107a.6\]]gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/_/spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang /_'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba ste/_chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'jig 
[\[107a.7\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang /_yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing /_/gzhi ni nor bu rdo rje'i pad+mos byas/_/rin chen mang po sil bus gzhi bkram zhing /_/kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong /_/them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor/_/pad+mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor 
[\[107b.2\]]can te/_/me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang /_/me tog lda ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres/_/nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni/_/rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab/_/rin chen nor bu'i me tog mdzes par bkod/_/sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod/_/de dag rnyog 
[\[107b.3\]]pa nor bu zla ba ste/_/rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' klad do/_/phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang /_/spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo /_/chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi/_/'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung /_/me tog 
[\[107b.4\]]nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang /_/rin chen kun gyis gzer du rab tu 'bar/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang /_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang /_/rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las/_/
[\[107b.5\]]spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab/_/rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis/_/yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab/_/rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang /_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[107b.6\]]smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag_/rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas/_/sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang /_/chu bo thams cad dba' glong dag las kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[107b.7\]]sprin chen 'bar ba dag_/chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa/_/'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang /_/chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing /_/nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa/_/mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]'bar/_/nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang /_/spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste/_chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog pun+da ri ka'i phreng ba/_gling 
[\[108a.2\]]bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/_/chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o/_/shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad
