[\[108a.3\]]kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/_nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang /_'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/_spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal 
[\[108a.4\]]po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od gzer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o/_/spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong 
[\[108a.5\]]ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o/_/gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin 
[\[108a.6\]]gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o/_/nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/_
[\[108a.7\]]de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag_/rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bres/_/yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang 
[\[108b.2\]]lding ba'i/_/shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab/_/shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas/_/rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung /_/me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can/_/phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed/_/gzhi rnams 
[\[108b.3\]]nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste/_/me tog rnam bres rin chen 'bru dang ldan/_/kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste/_/rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang /_/sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis/_/sa rnams thams cad kun nas 
[\[108b.4\]]rnam par gang /_/phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin/_/rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang /_/nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas/_/mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye/_/nor bu'i 'khor los kun nas rab tu bkod/_/
[\[108b.5\]]kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang /_/'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang /_/sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing /_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog_/rin chen sna tshogs 
[\[108b.6\]]pun+da ri ka yis/_/chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos/_/de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho'i rnams/_/rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo sna tshogs 'byung /_/dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang /_/nor bu de dag 'bru yi nang na ste/_/'byung ba 
[\[108b.7\]]med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu/_/rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du/_/rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed/_/sngon cad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis/_/de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ba med/_/rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang /_/rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de/_/rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams/_/bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs 
[\[109a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs 
[\[109a.3\]]pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing yon tan mtha' 
[\[109a.4\]]dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams 
[\[109a.5\]]cad kyang /_/rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste/_/sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog_/rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar/_/mu tig nor bu'i sprin rnams zad mi shes/_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par 
[\[109a.6\]]snang /_/zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed/_/sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog_/rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod 
[\[109a.7\]]pa rnams/_/rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od/_/rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang /_/'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang /_/sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]gang /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra/_/de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med/_/sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/zhing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing /_/ji snyed zhing du 
[\[109b.2\]]de dag kun rgyu ba/_/de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang /_/de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs/_/sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste/_/thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang /_/'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te/_/smon lam rnam par 'phrul 
[\[109b.3\]]las byung ba'o/_/bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can/_/de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gis/_/rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du/_/
[\[109b.4\]]bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su/_/de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong bas na/_/skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston/_/zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste/_/de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med/_/smon lam stobs 
[\[109b.5\]]kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/_/sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas 
[\[109b.6\]]kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs 
[\[109b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/_dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/_phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]lta ba/_rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/_rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/_gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/_gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba/_rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa/_rnam par 'phrul ba dang /_byin gyi 
[\[110a.2\]]rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab 
[\[110a.3\]]tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[110a.4\]]khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 
[\[110a.5\]]'od gzer gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 
[\[110a.6\]]sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so/_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas 
[\[110a.7\]]pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/
[\[110b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni [{]myig [,]mig [}{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[110b.3\]]'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten 
[\[110b.4\]]gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/_khang ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[110b.5\]]'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[110b.6\]]khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun nas yod pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/
[\[110b.7\]]'jig rten gyi 'byam klas pa la la ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 
[\[111a.2\]]'od kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog_/kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[111a.3\]]tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 
[\[111a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra 'i 
[\[111a.5\]]lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra 'i lhun 
[\[111a.6\]]can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rgya mtsho'i sgra 'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra 'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[111a.7\]]khams kyi tshul la la ni zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra 'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra 'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra 'i lhun can no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra 'i lhun 
[\[111b.2\]]can no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dge de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[111b.3\]]kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan 
[\[111b.4\]]par grub/_/dri med dri bral 'od 'gyed snying po can/_/nor bu pad+mo rgya mtsho kun la gnas/_/la la gang+gA'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/_/rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyis gzhi gnas shing /_/dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang /_/ri rab grong khyer shing 
[\[111b.5\]]gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs kun lta/_/la la 'od lus me tog snying po can/_/nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu/_/la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus/_/nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shigs sra/_/'byam 
[\[111b.6\]]klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal/_/'od 'dra 'od 'phro me mar sprin gyi mdog_/la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus/_/de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung /_/la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra yi lus/_/spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra yi lus/_/
[\[111b.7\]]la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra/_/la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa/_/kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug_/rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams/_/tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'gengs/_/phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te/_/yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par/_/phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang /_/'gro ba med cing 'jug pa yod pa min/_/tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams 
[\[112a.2\]]kun kyang 'gengs/_/thams cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'du/_/de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te/_/gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus yang med/_/zhing rnams tshul gyis rgyud la rnam 'phrul ba/_/sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang /_/
[\[112a.3\]]smon lam sgra ni rgya mtsho rab brjod cing /_/zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul/_/zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpas gang /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston cing /_/sems 
[\[112a.4\]]can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/_/zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ste le'u brgyad pa'o//_//[{D44-9}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dgu pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 
[\[112a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings de ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings 
[\[112a.6\]]kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/_de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs 
[\[112a.7\]]pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo chen po bzhi spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can ces bya ba mngon par byung ste/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/_de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig 
[\[112b.2\]]rten gyi khams te/_de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyun dang /_'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang nor bu'i rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[112b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/_rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[112b.4\]]de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can rin po che'i pad+mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i 
[\[112b.5\]]dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba 
[\[112b.6\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba 
[\[112b.7\]]zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dbal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[113a.2\]]steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rin 
[\[113a.3\]]po che pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa gcig tu dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba 
[\[113a.4\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[113a.5\]]'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_phyogs thams cad nas grwa du 
[\[113a.6\]]ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[113a.7\]]gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_rin po che shi la'i rgyal mtshan gyi sa mtshams can/_rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs 
[\[113b.2\]]su 'dug pa 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_
[\[113b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_me tog 
[\[113b.4\]]pad+mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can rin po che thams cad kyi 'od gzer dang rin po che'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang mu tig dang stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i 
[\[113b.5\]]shugs dang /_yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 
[\[113b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo 
[\[113b.7\]]la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/_'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]mtshan ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul 
[\[114a.2\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/_nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra yi rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/_tshangs 
[\[114a.3\]]pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_seng ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[114a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rgyan mtha' yas pa dang /_mu tig gi 'bru 
[\[114a.5\]]rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_spos dang nor bu dang me tog 
[\[114a.6\]]sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[114a.7\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_lha rdzas rin po che'i bla res kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba 
[\[114b.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam 
[\[114b.3\]]par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can/_spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi glong can gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_me tog 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog 
[\[114b.4\]]pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs 
[\[114b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa/_rdo rje'i gzhi yi sa mtshams can/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can gyis shin tu bzung ba/_pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas 
[\[114b.6\]]pa/_kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa nam mkha' lha yi khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de/_de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs 
[\[114b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/_rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 
[\[115a.2\]]shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul 
[\[115a.3\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can/_me tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas 
[\[115a.4\]]yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes 
[\[115a.5\]]bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/_spos dang 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad mo'i rgya 
[\[115a.6\]]mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs ru sbal gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan+dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[115a.7\]]de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/_nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs yan lag brgyad du 'dug par 'khor 
[\[115b.2\]]yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang /_me tog dang /_shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs 
[\[115b.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/_
[\[115b.4\]]me tog gi seng ge'i khri'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs mu tig gi phreng ba skyil ba ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal 
[\[115b.5\]]gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul 
[\[115b.6\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/_spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs nor bu'i 
[\[115b.7\]]ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbang po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[116a.2\]]'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu rnam par dag pa rin po che nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i sa mtshams can dbyibs lha'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad dang rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis 
[\[116a.3\]]sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_nor bu'i sgron ma'i 'bru yi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 
[\[116a.4\]]'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/_lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/_phyogs 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 
[\[116a.5\]]'jug pa/_rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/_gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par ma 'dres pa/_rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyis rlabs gzhan can/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin 
[\[116a.6\]]tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra 
[\[116a.7\]]ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig 
[\[116b.2\]]rten gyi khams kyi phung po/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byam klas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i 
[\[116b.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul 
[\[116b.4\]]shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang /_lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[116b.5\]]mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[116b.6\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sa la mngon par blta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[116b.7\]]'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa rnam par gdags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su 
[\[117a.2\]]bskor ba'o 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/_spos chu'i 
[\[117a.3\]]rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa/_chu klung gi glong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos 
[\[117a.4\]]chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od gzer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+mo chen po la rab 
[\[117a.5\]]tu gnas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can yod do/_/de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[117a.6\]]gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/_pad+mo 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[117a.7\]]rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba/_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa mu tig gi grong khyer dpal gyi seng ge'i khri sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 
[\[117b.2\]]rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[117b.3\]]gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas 
[\[117b.4\]]yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 
[\[117b.5\]]'ong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/_mu 
[\[117b.6\]]tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par 'byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[117b.7\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa spos dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa/_'od zer rdul dang bral ba dang spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyi dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin 
[\[118a.2\]]tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[118a.3\]]thams cad kyis brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang /_'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu 
[\[118a.4\]]snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[118a.5\]]'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa pad+mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan 
[\[118a.6\]]rnam par dag pa me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag par bstsags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/_sangs 
[\[118a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin 
[\[118b.2\]]tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_dga' ba 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod 
[\[118b.3\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi 
[\[118b.4\]]khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu yi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs 
[\[118b.5\]]kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po 
[\[118b.6\]]che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'jug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu 
[\[118b.7\]]gnas pa/_nyi ma'i sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyibs su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun 
[\[119a.2\]]nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu 
[\[119a.3\]]snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum 
[\[119a.4\]]gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/_rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_me tog gi ze ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa 
[\[119a.5\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 
[\[119a.6\]]snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_gling bzhi'i dbyibs 
[\[119a.7\]]ltar 'dug pa/_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun 
[\[119b.2\]]nas nyon mongs pa rdo rje'i pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprin rin po che'i cod pan 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[119b.3\]]pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[119b.4\]]rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i tsan+dan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa yan lag brgyad du bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_mu tig gi me tog 
[\[119b.5\]]mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig 
[\[119b.6\]]rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas 
[\[119b.7\]]nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/_rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_spos chu'i glong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan 
[\[120a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas dran pa'i klong gi 
[\[120a.3\]]dbyibs su 'dug pa/_sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[120a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas 
[\[120a.5\]]nyon mongs pa/_gser gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_seng ge'i khri pad+mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam 
[\[120a.6\]]par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[120a.7\]]kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/_rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma nam mkha' kun tu snang ba bzhugs so/_/de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[120b.2\]]de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra yi lhun can la rab tu gnas so/_/de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[120b.3\]]rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin 
[\[120b.4\]]gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyan 'thun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 
[\[120b.5\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba 
[\[120b.6\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan zhes 
[\[120b.7\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 
[\[121a.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i 
[\[121a.3\]]dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[121a.4\]]shes kyi me tog pad+mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[121a.5\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[121a.6\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_
[\[121a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glog gi phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121b.2\]]pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshon gyis kun nas khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[121b.3\]]gdul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang /_yon tan yangs pa'i 
[\[121b.4\]]dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan 
[\[121b.5\]]rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[121b.6\]]nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_pad+mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa 
[\[121b.7\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba pad+mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes 
[\[122a.2\]]bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i glong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rgyan gyi dmigs pa dang khang pa 
[\[122a.3\]]brtsegs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gzi 
[\[122a.4\]]brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de 
[\[122a.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med 
[\[122a.6\]]pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par shin tu phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs thugs 
[\[122a.7\]]su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[122b.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i 
[\[122b.3\]]mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byam klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[122b.4\]]khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[122b.5\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu brgyan pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[122b.6\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad 
[\[122b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu rab tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zabs 
[\[123a.2\]]mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes 
[\[123a.3\]]mchog gi chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi pad+mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig 
[\[123a.4\]]rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa rgyan dang /_spos dang nor bu dang shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 
[\[123a.5\]]rab tu gnas pa dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas dpal chen po'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che iN+Da nI 
[\[123a.6\]]las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/_de nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba phyogs rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi pad+mo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang gsung mtha' dang dbung med pa'i lhun can mngon par 'byung ba yod de/_de 
[\[123a.7\]]thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad pad+mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i 
[\[123b.2\]]tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng ge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i gdan yongs su 'byung ba 
[\[123b.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byam klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[123b.4\]]shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba 
[\[123b.5\]]yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 
[\[123b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs ri rab kyi gzi 
[\[123b.7\]]brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang /_dbyibs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so//_//
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu pa/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i 
[\[124a.2\]]smon lam rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi glong gis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[124a.3\]]steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sra zhing mi shigs pa'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[124a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bsrungs pas spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten 
[\[124a.5\]]gyi khams in+d+ra nI la dang /_tsan dan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba zab pa 'od zer rnam par snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba 
[\[124a.6\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od rab tu 'gyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i sprul pa shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi 
[\[124a.7\]]gzi brjid dam pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad mo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa spos dang /_nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa kun nas 
[\[124b.2\]]zlum pa rgyan dang theg pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje brtan pas bsgrubs pa gzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[124b.3\]]rgyud mig 'phrul gyi rnam par bye ba'i dra ba'i bye brag ces bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi lhun can yod de/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i dra ba 'khor lo'i sprin ces bya ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas 
[\[124b.4\]]kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/_man shel gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtshos brtan pa ri rab kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul mig 'phrul lta bu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na 
[\[124b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kun nas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer phra mo mi zad pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs dam pa'i mchog shin tu yangs pa'i blo 
[\[124b.6\]]gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi chu bo kun nas snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po bla na med pa'i sprin mi zad pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[124b.7\]]shing dang me tog nye bar gyur pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang /_chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gis yog pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ge pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus shin tu 
[\[125a.2\]]thugs su chud pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mdzes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs par 'gro ba mngon du ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[125a.3\]]seng ge'i dpal gyi 'od dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od dri ma med pa nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che mang 
[\[125a.4\]]po rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i blo gros kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi snang zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[125a.5\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid kun tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro 
[\[125a.6\]]mthon po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sprul pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa med par mkhas pas 
[\[125a.7\]]spyod pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi klong rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba bsam gyis 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]mi khyab pa la thugs brtse ba'i rnam par thar pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim dga' bas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[125b.2\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyan pa dang /_rnam par rig pa dang mthong ba don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang nor bu mang po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[125b.3\]]gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun tu lta ba'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul 
[\[125b.4\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa lus dang khyim sna tshogs kyi spos kyi chu bo la rab tu gnas pa rnam par rgyal ba rab tu phye ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de 
[\[125b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i sa dang mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dra ba'i dbang po shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su yongs su gzhol ba'i 'od ces bya ba spos dang 
[\[125b.6\]]rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_pad mo la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul kyi 'od dang dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtsho sems can gang chen mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi 
[\[125b.7\]]khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa mu tig gi sbubs kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_nor bu thams cad kyi phreng ba bskyil ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs kyi sprin rab tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_rnam par snang ba dam pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 
[\[126a.2\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes par snang ba'i tshon gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[126a.3\]]so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od phyag bzang po rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[126a.4\]]pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi rgyan gyi spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[126a.5\]]seng ge'i khri tshul rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer tshad med pa'i stobs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mtshan nyid kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[126a.6\]]gshegs pa chos thams cad yongs su dag par ston pa'i rig byed mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me du ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang rnam par bral ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 
[\[126a.7\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la mngon sum zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing dri ma med par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]pa gser gyi pad ma snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kun gyi dbyings su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu gzigs pas bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 
[\[126b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dpal shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shing mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[126b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi mar me shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi chun po tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[126b.4\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas dge ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[126b.5\]]phyogs su sprul pa yangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi ze ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings grol ba'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[126b.6\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i seng ge'i khri'i ri bo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten 
[\[126b.7\]]gyi khams kha dog mtha' yas par rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/_shing dang me tog dang nags tshal gyi gzhi rgya 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]mtsho la rab tu gnas pa nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa'i mig 'phrul gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang spos kyi 
[\[127a.2\]]mdzod rab tu bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dang 'od thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 
[\[127a.3\]]'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/_rdo rje dang rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas 
[\[127a.4\]]yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i ze ba 'phags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams blta na dga' ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[127a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang spro ba yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[127a.6\]]nyid kyi spyod yul dang spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i ze ba sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med cing zhi ba'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 
[\[127a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dri ma med pa'i ye shes zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sprin stug po'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa'i gtso bo sprin gyi dbyangs 
[\[127b.2\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i tshal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan ces 
[\[127b.3\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs pa'i spyan gyi mthu rnam par phyung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs bzang po'i ze ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dpal zhes 
[\[127b.4\]]bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i grong khyer gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan nyi ma'i snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi phung po tshad med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[127b.5\]]gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'brug sgra'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rol pa brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[127b.6\]]de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i 'dab ma la rten pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rlung mnyam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[127b.7\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po nyi ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gsal ba sku yi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]khams spos kyi sgra rdo rje rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pas dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_
[\[128a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi rgyan la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/_stegs bu rgya mtsho'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu 
[\[128a.3\]]gnas pa/_'od gzer gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzang pos mi bzhengs pa ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang ldan pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig 
[\[128a.4\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing yongs su gsal ba zhes bya ba rdul thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa dri ma med par rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya 
[\[128a.5\]]ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_gcig tu dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_tsan dan dang nor bu dang mu tig 
[\[128a.6\]]gi gdugs sna tshogs kyi kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa med cing mnyam pa med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi
