[\[128a.7\]]khams rab tu 'bar ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo gros pad mo mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi mtshan nyid 'khor lo'i 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur yon tan rgya chen po rnam par grags pa'i 'od gzer mi zad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba rab tu brtan pa rin po che'i snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[128b.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po blta na dga' ba mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi me tog legs par bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs dang ye shes tshad med pa'i gtso bo 
[\[128b.3\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi tshon 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprul pa kun tu 'od 
[\[128b.4\]]ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i gtsug ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa shin tu grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[128b.5\]]steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'phrul pa las mngon par byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[128b.6\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi mar me'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi sgron ma shin tu chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshul bzang po'i sgo sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[128b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gsung tshad med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi dra ba shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yongs su dag pa'i glong gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nyi ma'i 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten 
[\[129a.2\]]gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mo'i nags tshal yang dag par gnas pa 
[\[129a.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rin po che ltar gzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal gyi 'od gzi brjid 
[\[129a.4\]]kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu phra ba 
[\[129a.5\]]'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs gzhal du med pa'i dbyangs kun tu brjod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams brtan par bsgrubs 
[\[129a.6\]]pa phyogs thams cad du rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rin po che'i yid bzhin gyi rgyal po yan lag brgyad du rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho la rab tu 
[\[129a.7\]]gnas pa/_rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongs su gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che rdo rje ltar brtan pa zhes 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang /_sa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba 
[\[129b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa mu tig bskyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu tig gi phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub 
[\[129b.3\]]sems dpa'i gtsug phud rab tu snang ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 
[\[129b.4\]]du 'ong bas khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa klu 'brug 
[\[129b.5\]]chen pos gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri pad+mo gnon pa'i lte ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 
[\[129b.6\]]dbyangs pad+mo can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi phung po rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin gzi brjid bzang po'i 
[\[129b.7\]]rgyan ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba dang /_bde ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yang dag par gnas pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi nor bu'i 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa blta na don yod cing dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro ba'i tshogs 
[\[130a.2\]]kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi spyod pa dag par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par bres pa zhes 
[\[130a.3\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi sprin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i zla ba'i blo zhes bya ba 
[\[130a.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dam pa'i gser gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams klu'i grags pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[130a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par gzigs pa tha dad pa med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i go ca yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[130a.6\]]steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs kyi dpal rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi na bun gyi 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[130a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pas dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kho na med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi dpal blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa pad+mos kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mdzod spus 
[\[130b.2\]]bsgrubs pa'i mtshan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa rin po che'i me tog gi ri rab la rab tu gnas pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad 'bar ba'i 'od kyi sprin 
[\[130b.3\]]gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer rin po che'i shing tags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mar me'i 'od zer snang ba 
[\[130b.4\]]zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad gzhan dang gzhan thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can rab tu gnas te/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i zla ba 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[130b.5\]]'khor gyis bskor ba/_gcig tu dag pa rgyan thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rin po che'i rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa/_bai DUr+ya dang dngul gyi seng ge'i khri sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ltar bdag po 
[\[130b.6\]]med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi ri bo 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[130b.7\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan gyi sgo sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'byung gnas rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog shin tu 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rgyas pa'i nor bu rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra skad sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[131a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mi 'am ci'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i grags pa bsod nams tshad med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[131a.3\]]steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dag pas 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i ze ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[131a.4\]]gshegs pa stobs kyi rgyan thams cad kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rnam par phye ba rab tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i ri'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig 
[\[131a.5\]]rten gyi khams yongs su snang ba'i gtsug gi ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad kyi 'od shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi char pa phra mo'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/_
[\[131a.6\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi dra ba seng ges rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgo'i rgyal 
[\[131a.7\]]mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i me tog shin tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]khams chos thams cad kyi sa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi don shin tu yangs pa'i gtsug ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gi phye mas gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[131b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi dra ba mchog gi blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i ze ba shin tu 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[131b.3\]]so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od tshad med pa'i 'khor lo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la thub pa med pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs rmongs pa med par blta ba zhes 
[\[131b.4\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[131b.5\]]kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/_rgyan thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la 
[\[131b.6\]]thogs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i lus bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 
[\[131b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje mig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]mngon par byung ngo /_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i tshul rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur sprul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo /_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i 
[\[132a.2\]]rgya mtsho rin po che'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad+mo'i lo ma sprin stug po zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo /_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i spos kyi 'od 'phro bas kun tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig 
[\[132a.3\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo /_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gram bu 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi yul zhes bya ba mngon par 
[\[132a.4\]]byung ngo /_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od dam pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo /_/de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan 
[\[132a.5\]]thams cad kyi yul brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i lce rab tu snang ba shin tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra 
[\[132a.6\]]ba snyed kyi phyi rol shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po shel ces bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste/_
[\[132a.7\]]de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 
[\[132b.2\]]rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[132b.3\]]zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba 
[\[132b.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams/_lus dam pa'i spos kyi nom pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin 
[\[132b.5\]]tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dri zhim po mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs 
[\[132b.6\]]logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid bzang po dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi gsal zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba dang gzi brjid kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[132b.7\]]de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan mtha' yas pa la gzhol ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spos dang rin po che'i chos yang dag par gnas pa 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/
[\[133a.2\]]de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing yongs su gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan shin 
[\[133a.3\]]tu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi glong gi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho byin gyi rlabs kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[133a.4\]]rgyud rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'dal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho brgya byin gyi gdong dang lus shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig gi rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu 
[\[133a.5\]]gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i gnas shin tu mnyam par yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bai DUr+ya'i gram bu sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos 
[\[133a.6\]]chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol lho phyogs logs kyi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yangs pa'i zhing yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[133a.7\]]bdud kyi 'khor yongs su 'dul ba'i gsung gi lhun can zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda' 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi mchod pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po 
[\[133b.2\]]che'i sprin seng ge'i stobs shes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[133b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba seng ge rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[133b.4\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan rnam par bres pa thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig 
[\[133b.5\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dam pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gis rnam par snang ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan gyi rgyan dang /_dpal rab tu 
[\[133b.6\]]'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i ze ba me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rin po che'i cod pan shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 
[\[133b.7\]]'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos kyis yun ring po nas bkab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig rnam par dag pa rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang po yid 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba'i sprin 'od zer rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nam mkha'i phyogs dang mnyam par rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 
[\[134a.2\]]yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che kun tu snang ba rnam par dmigs pa'i don shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gser 
[\[134a.3\]]gyi mig zla ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang mu tig dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi dpal gyi kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 
[\[134a.4\]]'khor los bsgrubs pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sprul pa bzang po 'byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[134a.5\]]snyed kyi phyi rol lho phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi 'khor lo tshad med pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tshad med pa snrel zhi zhes bya ba zhing gi rgyud yon tan sna tshogs thams cad shin tu ston pa'i sgra'i lhun 
[\[134a.6\]]can rab tu gnas te/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i me tog gis khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mi zad pa'i 'od zer sgo kun nas sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul 
[\[134a.7\]]shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi sprin kun tu dpal 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa mi mjed ces bya ba yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par gyi blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 
[\[134b.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i mig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma pad mo'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+d+ra nI las rab tu brgyan 
[\[134b.3\]]pa'i rgyan can de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i gzhung las lha ma yin gyi gnas shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer chu'i shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho seng ge'i rin po ches 
[\[134b.4\]]bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che thams cad kyi phyogs khyab par byed pa rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog gi sprin gyi gnas 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 
[\[134b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ri bo'i spo la dkyil 'khor rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang sgo pad+mo rnam par bkram pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings 
[\[134b.6\]]bde ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me'i tshul bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sprul pas phyogs rnam par lta zhing kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 
[\[134b.7\]]'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs thams cad du snang bas legs par rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]po che'i phung pos shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rnam par dag pa'i 'od rab tu 'gyed 
[\[135a.2\]]pa'i shugs shes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rlung chags pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dang stegs bu'i rgyud ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de bzhin 
[\[135a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku shin tu snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de las 'jig 
[\[135a.4\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud [{]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul lta bur shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rab tu gnon pa'i sgra yi lhun can mngon par byung ste/_de thams cad kyi 'og na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[135a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[135a.6\]]bam po bcu gcig pa/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[135a.7\]]khams rin po che'i shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal kun tu ston cing sgrib pa med par rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]yi rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug zil gyis mi non pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi legs par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[135b.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor lo brtan par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi sprul pa'i pad mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig 
[\[135b.3\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing la yongs su 'du ba rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa la rmongs pa med pa 
[\[135b.4\]]zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang nor bu'i nyi ma sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yongs su gzhol bar rnam par dmigs pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags 
[\[135b.5\]]su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spyod pa kun nas rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbyangs zab mo mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 
[\[135b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snying po dang ldan zhing shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha mi dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba 
[\[135b.7\]]rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su dag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan gyi dbyangs shin tu 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]rnam par phye ba'i stegs bu'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgrengs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal po 'od zer gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes 
[\[136a.2\]]bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi stobs kun tu snang ba yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dbang po mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dngul gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyis 
[\[136a.3\]]bsgrubs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud yongs su gsal bar kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su 
[\[136a.4\]]dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho phyogs kun tu gzi brjid kyis rgyal ba'i phung po 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs rnam par phye bar 'phrul pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags 
[\[136a.5\]]su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser gyi rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal po'i dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rdo rje'i rtse mo zhing gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tha dad pa med pa'i sprin 'bar ba zhes bya ba 
[\[136a.6\]]yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par gnon pa'i gtsug ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i me tog zad mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 
[\[136a.7\]]'od mtha' yas pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgya che zhing gser ltar yongs su dag pa grags pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi tshon tu bstan pa'i gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud las kyis kun tu brgyan cing rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra dbyangs zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 
[\[136b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu brgyus pa la mngon du blta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol 'khor yug gi mtshams na/_spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba stug po'i sprin 
[\[136b.3\]]gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba snying po byang chub thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yi lhun can rab tu gnas so/_/de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig 
[\[136b.4\]]rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig sna tshogs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par snang ba rdo rje'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[136b.5\]]steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog uta pa la dang /_dpal gyi 
[\[136b.6\]]be'u zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshams rdo rje ltar sra ba sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[136b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag pa/_sna tshogs 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi non par mngon par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi mdzod shin tu bstsags pa zhes bya ba de dang /_'dab chags 
[\[137a.2\]]su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od snang bas rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grags pa dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che tshad med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas 
[\[137a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten 
[\[137a.4\]]gyi khams kyi rgyud thogs pa med pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan dan gyi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas par 'khyil pa'i phyogs su rab tu 'jug pa zhes 
[\[137a.5\]]bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su gser rin po che'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la zhing gi 'khor lo rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 
[\[137a.6\]]'khor kun na/_rdo rje'i me tog gi 'byung gnas yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal 
[\[137a.7\]]po 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par rig pa chags pa med pas sangs rgyas blta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi rin po che'i phreng bas bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud blo gros dge ba mtha' yas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul dang smon lam gyi rgyu mthun 
[\[137b.2\]]pa las byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi 'tshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces 
[\[137b.3\]]bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun tu sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang /_gzhan gyi sgor rab tu 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ngo /_/de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 'od 
[\[137b.4\]]'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bas gsol pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[137b.5\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad mo rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[137b.6\]]'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par 'phags pa'i sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten 
[\[137b.7\]]gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams stobs bcu'i rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/_
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par 'byung ba'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la/_'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya 
[\[138a.2\]]ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po ches mthun par rnam par brgyan pa/_de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od gzer gyi mdzod kyi ri bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/_/
[\[138a.3\]]de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha'i sprin yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing sgrib pa med 
[\[138a.4\]]par rnam par phye ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i pad mo 'dab ma stug po rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus kyi rgyan dam pa'i mar me zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 
[\[138a.5\]]'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang dag par 
[\[138a.6\]]bsgrubs pa shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ze ba byin gyi brlabs kyi gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che shin tu gtsang ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig 
[\[138a.7\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus dam pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs kyi phung po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid dag cing yangs pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in+d+ra nI la'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa skar mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 
[\[138b.2\]]yid du 'ong bar gram bu'i nor bu mu tig rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbyangs kyis kun tu sgrog pa'i nga ro la dga' ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[138b.3\]]phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun tu snang zhing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'byung bar nga ro sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu 
[\[138b.4\]]gnas te/_de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog gi blo gros dam pa zhes bya 
[\[138b.5\]]ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138b.6\]]pa 'od lhag par 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yas bsgrubs pa kun nas 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[138b.7\]]ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa mi zad pa'i sprin gyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra rdo rje ltar shin tu brtan pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing tags kyis bskor ba shin tu 
[\[139a.2\]]'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'greng ba zhes bya ba rab tu bzhugs so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 
[\[139a.3\]]snang ba thams cad shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i sprin dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 
[\[139a.4\]]rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi ze ba'i kha dog gi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dge ba'i tshogs kyi gzi brjid rmad ga cad ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po 
[\[139a.5\]]che'i gos dam pas shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi yal ga brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[139a.6\]]khams kyi rgyud rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin la shin tu rten pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'i rdo rje kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba 
[\[139a.7\]]rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kun nas pad mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i ngogs mtha' yas pa'i glong zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]che'i yan lag dam pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi gzhi rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi 
[\[139b.2\]]rol 'khor yug gi mtshams na/_spos chu'i rgya mtsho mi phyed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jug pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can 
[\[139b.3\]]rab tu gnas te/_de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu zhim pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang sprul pa tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[139b.4\]]rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang tshul gyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[139b.5\]]mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i phyogs me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i spyan 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thog 
[\[139b.6\]]ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer dang nor bu'i shing tog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 
[\[139b.7\]]snang ba'i 'khor los rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshon gyi srang rnam pa sna tshogs shes 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brgyud pa du mas 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 
[\[140a.2\]]rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i dra ba rnam par phye ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de 
[\[140a.3\]]dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa rgya mtsho'i sgra zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gnas yongs 
[\[140a.4\]]su sbyong ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul gyis rgyas par 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[140a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud glong thams cad kyi gting du rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan dam pas bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i sprin stug po 
[\[140a.6\]]'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me 'od 'phro bas kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi dbyibs tha dad pa byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/_/de dag la 
[\[140a.7\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na/_spos chu'i rgya mtsho phreng ba dang gos kyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun nas 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]snang ba'i gos bzang po shin tu sprul pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ngo /_/de thams cad kyi 'og na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbang po'i me tog ze ba 'khyil pa'i snying po zhes 
[\[140b.2\]]bya ba yod de/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu sgrol bas dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyis pham pa med 
[\[140b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[140b.4\]]rin po che'i 'bru'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba tshad med pas dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng na 
[\[140b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdan pad+mo dang seng ge zhes bya ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul 
[\[140b.6\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri ma med cing mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[140b.7\]]snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi steng na/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klu'i rin po che'i kha dog gi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/kye de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[141a.2\]]kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag la nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[141a.3\]]gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang ldan pa'i pad mo la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhan dang gzhan can mang po dang /_mtshams 'dab chags su gnas pa sha stag go/_'od rin po che gzhan dang gzhan gyi kha dog tu 'gyed pa sha stag go/_/
[\[141a.4\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun nas yog pa sha stag go/_/rgyan rnam par bres pa'i 'od gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go/_/bskal pa'i grangs dang tshul gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa sha stag go_/sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing 
[\[141a.5\]]gshegs pa sha stag go/_/chos rgya mtsho'i sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu bsgrags pa sha stag go_/sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa sha stag go_/phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres pa sha stag go_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam 
[\[141a.6\]]par 'phrul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba rgyan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa thams 
[\[141a.7\]]cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo /_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyud nas byung ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]khams kyi rgyud rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa mtshams dang sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sna tshogs thams cad las byung ba kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di 
[\[141b.2\]]thams cad yongs su gang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas 
[\[141b.3\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho'i rnams/_/yangs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]yangs sna tshogs pa/_/nam mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas/_/chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad/_/
[\[141b.4\]]'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho na/_/zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/_/tha dad med par rnam par gnas/_/rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go/_/rnam phye sna tshogs shin tu gnas/_/kha dog tha dad rab tu 'dug_/zhing gi rgyud dag rnam phye ba/_/'jig rten khams 
[\[141b.5\]]kyi gang chen mtsho/_/lhun dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul ba/_/zhing gzhan rgyud rnams rab tu snang /_/las kyi de dag shin tu bris/_/ri rab rgya mtsho'i dra ba dang /_/'khor lo klong gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/pad+mo'i dbyibs 'dra 'byam 
[\[141b.6\]]klas pa/_/de dag de yis kun nas bskor/_/rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dang /_/rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa/_/'byam klas bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/de dag rgyud ni kun nas bskor/_/'od kyi dra ba bsam mi khyab/_/mu tig mdog kyang rgya mtsho 
[\[141b.7\]]ste/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams kun kyang 'bar/_/pad+mo la yang kun gnas so/_/re re dag gi rgyud las kyang /_/'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab/_/'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing /_/rgya mtsho'i phyogs rnams kun tu 'gengs/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams thams 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]cad kyi/_/dmigs pa kun gyi sgo nas kyang /_/thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yi/_/mi zad tshul rnams rab tu snang /_/zhing gi rnams ni bsam mi khyab/_/rgyud rnams mi zad shin tu 'byung /_/rgyan rnams bstan pa tha dad 
[\[142a.2\]]de/_/drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs so/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag na/_/'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab khams/_/kun nas 'du zhing rnam par 'jigs/_/'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur/_/ji ltar shing la lo ma rnams/_/'byung zhing lhung bar 'gyur ba ltar/_/de 
[\[142a.3\]]bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/_/'jig rten khams na 'byung ba yin/_/ji ltar shing gi skye gnas nas/_/shing tog sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar/_/de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/_/sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/_/ji ltar sa bon khyad par gyis/_/'bras bu sna tshogs 
[\[142a.4\]]snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin las kyi khyad par gyis/_/sems can rnams dang zhing byung ngo /_/yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/_/kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar/_/sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/_/de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang /_/klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi rnams/_/
[\[142a.5\]]nam mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/_/zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/_/sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo /_/
[\[142a.6\]]ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams/_/ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/_/de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun/_/sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/_/sems can lus kyi rnam pa dag_/ji ltar sems kyis brtags pa ltar/_/de bzhin zhing gi rnam pa yang /_/thams cad las kyis 
[\[142a.7\]]rnam par bris/_/ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/_/mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/_/pad+mo'i dra ba'i phyi rol gyi/_/sems can zhing gi mtshams dag na/_/dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]gzhan/_/dri ma med pa sna tshogs snang /_/pad mo'i dra ba de dag la/_/zhing gi dra ba rab tu gnas/_/rgyan dang bstan pa sna tshogs te/_/sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas/_/zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas/_/sems can rnams kyi 
[\[142b.2\]]nyon mongs las/_/chos nyid de dag nang na snang /_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag tu/_/zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/_/sems can bsam pas rab tu byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'khod/_/la la rnam dag nyon mongs can/_/zhing gi dbyings ni rnam pa mang /_/byang chub 
[\[142b.3\]]sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul/_/rgya mtsho'i las las byung ba yin/_/zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba/_/rin chen rang bzhin dri ma med/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dri med dag_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs/_/zhing gi rgyud rnams la la na/_/bskal pa'i [{]mye [,]me [}]ni bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[142b.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs rnams la ston/_/zhing gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sra/_/rlung gi phung po smon lam dang /_/chu yi phung la rab tu gnas/_/zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang /_/sems can las kyis bsags pa yin/_/zhing na gzhan dang gzhan dag gi_/zhing gi chos nyid snang la 
[\[142b.5\]]ltos/_/de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/_/de dag la ni 'jig pa'ang med/_/skad cig skad cig sems kun la/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/_/zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba rnams/_/shin tu dri med dag la ltos/_/zhing rnams la la sa yi dngos/_/sra bar de 
[\[142b.6\]]dag byung gyur cing /_/snang ba med cing 'ong ba'ang med/_/sdig pa'i las kyi gnas yin no/_/zhing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngos/_/kun nas nyon mongs 'jigs pa che/_/bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang /_/bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin/_/zhing rnams la la lcags 
[\[142b.7\]]kyi dngos/_/la la zangs kyi dngos su gnas/_/sdig pa'i las kyis kun tu gang /_/ri dang brag gis mnyam pa med/_/'jig rten de na dmyal ba yi/_/sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa/_/mun pa rjes su rnyed gyur cing /_/[{]mye [,]me [}]lce rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar/_/'on kyang byol 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]song skye gnas su/_/lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur te/_/bdag gi las kyi nyes pa yis/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba rab tu myong /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams na'ang snang /_/skom dang bkres pas rab tu mnar/_/[{]mye [,]me [}]yi ri yi gdung ba yis/_/
[\[143a.2\]]sdug bsngal tshor ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/_/la la rin chen bdun las byung /_/la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas/_/dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste/_/sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan/_/mi dang lha rnams la la ni/_/mtho ris dag gi 'jig rten na/_/dge ba'i bsod nams 
[\[143a.3\]]'bras bur ldan/_/dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos/_/spu'i rtse mo gcig la yang /_/zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de/_/de dag 'dres pa gang yang med/_/rang rang so so'i las kyis na/_/sems can khams rnams bsam mi khyab/_/'du 
[\[143a.4\]]shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams/_/bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong /_/zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od/_/sems can mang don kun nas gnas/_/yongs 'byung rdo rje ut+pa la/_/sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med/_/zhing rnams la la 'od zer dngos/_/'od kyi 'khor la kun 
[\[143a.5\]]nas gnas/_/tsan dan gser las yongs su byung /_/'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam/_/zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos/_/spos kyi gos kyis kun nas yog_/la la pad mo gcig la ste/_/byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas/_/la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od/_/
[\[143a.6\]]zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med/_/mig 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed/_/'od zer dra bas snang bar byas/_/zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang /_/pad mo'i dngos su spos la gnas/_/la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yin/_/zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos/_/me tog glong las la 
[\[143a.7\]]la byung /_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing la ltos/_/sangs rgyas sprul pas kun tu khyab/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam/_/la la me tog shing rnams dang /_/lo ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs te/_/nor bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab/_/zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]dag_/zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i dngos/_/snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i gsung yang yin/_/zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/_/rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang /_/gdan las de bzhin la la byung /_/'od 
[\[143b.2\]]dang sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed/_/tsan dan phye ma sna tshogs dang /_/mdzod spu'i rnam par snang ba'i 'od/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer rnams/_/zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod/_/la la rgyan dang 'od gcig par/_/zhing rnams dri ma med pa snang /_/la la rgyan rnams thams 
[\[143b.3\]]cad kyis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan/_/la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi_/rgyan gyis mngon par rab tu brgyan/_/la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang /_/rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas/_/zhing gi rgyan mang bya ba yis/_/zhing rnams la la rnam par bres/_/rgyan dang tshul 
[\[143b.4\]]rnams tha dad par/_/sna tshogs mig yor lta bur snang /_/brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams/_/rgyan gcig la yang rab tu snang /_/'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye ba/_/sangs rgyas smon lam mthu las byung /_/smon lam rgya mtsho rnams mang bas/_/zhing rnams la la rnam 
[\[143b.5\]]par sbyangs/_/de dag rgyan mang thams cad du/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho shin tu snang /_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis/_/zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa/_/de dag kun la dus gsum gyi/_/zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang /_/zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa/_/
[\[143b.6\]]kye ma rgyal sras khyed ni ltos/_/ma 'ongs pa yi zhing rnams kyang /_/rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang /_/ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/_/'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang /_/zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang /_/mig yor bzhin du sprul pa yin/_/dus 
[\[143b.7\]]gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rnam sprul zhing rnams gang yod pa/_/zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang /_/kun kyang nang na yod par gnas/_/zhing gi rdul gyi rtse mo la/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/_/shong ba de dag kun nas snang /_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/la la rgya mtsho'i dbyibs su 'dug_/zhing brgya mang po de dag ltos/_/ri rab ri yi dbyibs 'dra dang /_/'jig rten khams ni bsam mi khyab/_/zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor 
[\[144a.2\]]dbyibs su gnas pa ste/_/sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs su gnas/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab/_/zhing rnams nor bu 'khor lo'i dbyibs/_/la la pad ma'i dbyibs su gnas/_/yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang /_/sna tshogs kha dog dri ma 
[\[144a.3\]]med/_/la la khri yi dbyibs lta bu/_/grwa yi dbyibs dang khyad khyud de/_/la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug_/tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas/_/lha yi dbang po'i gtsug phud dbyibs/_/zla ba kham ltar la la gnas/_/nor bu'i ri yi 
[\[144a.4\]]dbyibs su 'khod/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra/_/spos chu mtsho yi klong lta bu/_/'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs/_/'khor lo bkra shis 
[\[144a.5\]]dbyibs lta bu/_/'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor de/_/mdzod spu spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu/_/la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra/_/sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu/_/la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug_/'od 'phro ri yi dbyibs kyang 'dra/_/byang chub 
[\[144a.6\]]sems dpas kun tu gang /_/zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyibs/_/nor bu'i go car mngon par bsgrubs/_/gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste/_/gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/_/zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang /_/zhing gi dbyibs rnams mi 
[\[144a.7\]]zad pa/_/rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang /_/sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung /_/zhing rnams la la bskal pa tsam/_/la la bskal pa bcu pa ste/_/zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam pa'i/_/bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin/_/la la 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bskal pa gcig la yang /_/zhing rnams mang po 'byung ba snang /_/tshad med grangs kyang med pa ste/_/'jig pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab/_/zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med/_/zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcas/_/la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas 
[\[144b.2\]]gcig_/la la sangs rgyas mang po'o/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams dang /_/'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing /_/rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/_/'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang /_/byang chub 
[\[144b.3\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya dang /_/bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/'jig rten kun na tha mi dad/_/sangs 
[\[144b.4\]]rgyas zhing rnams re rer yang /_/rgyal ba gcig ni skyer 'gyur te/_/lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du/_/chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston/_/sems can snod du ma gyur la/_/sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni/_/de nyid gcig kyang 
[\[144b.5\]]kun tu mthong /_/sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams/_/zhing rnams re re dag tu yang /_/sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye/_/rgyal ba so so de dag na/_/sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing /_/chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas/_/
[\[144b.6\]]sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/_/zhing rnams la la 'od med de/_/mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che/_/reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra/_/blta na mi bzad skyi yang g.ya'/_/zhing rnams la la lha 'od can/_/la la khyim gyi 'od can te/_/la la nyi zla'i 
[\[144b.7\]]'od dang ldan/_/zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/_/zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od/_/shing gi 'od can dri ma med/_/gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/_/de dag sems can dge las byung /_/la la ri yi 'od can te/_/zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/_/la 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]la mar me'i 'od can te/_/sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung /_/zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od/_/byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang /_/zhing rnams la la pad mo'i 'od/_/'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes/_/zhing rnams la la 
[\[145a.2\]]me tog 'od/_/spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod/_/spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro can/_/smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs/_/zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can/_/nor bu'i go ca'i 'od kyis gsal/_/sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis snang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs 
[\[145a.3\]]ldan/_/rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan/_/rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang /_/yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can/_/de dag na ni sdug bsngal med/_/thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang /_/zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/_/la la snying po byang chub 'od/_/'khor rnams 
[\[145a.4\]]kun tu rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog_/kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang /_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/zhing rnams la la me yi 'od/_/zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can/_/mi zad 'jigs 
[\[145a.5\]]pa'i nga ro can/_/rtsub cing brlang ba'i sgra rnams dang /_/yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog_/dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams/_/mya ngan rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams/_/nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung /_/la 
[\[145a.6\]]la dag na yid 'ong sgra/_/dga' bar byed cing ston 'dems pa/_/bde ba'i las rnams 'bras bu'i dbyangs/_/zhing gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog_/la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs/_/gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/_/'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang /_/
[\[145a.7\]]la la'i zhing na rab tu grag_/zhing rnams la la sprin gyi sgra/_/rin chen rgya mtsho 'od zer dang /_/nor bur shing gi gzugs sgra dang /_/rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab/_/'od zer klong gi sgra rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]pa'i sgra dag dang /_/'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung /_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang /_/kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i/_/smon lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang /_/spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan par 'byung /_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/mtshan gyi 
[\[145b.2\]]dkyil 'khor mang po dang /_/de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i sgra/_/zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang /_/tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin/_/chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang /_/kha cig zhing na rab tu grag_/kun tu bzang po'i 
[\[145b.3\]]smon lam gyi/_/sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin/_/bskal par gnas shing rab tu sgrog_/sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes/_/zhing gi dbyings rnams la la na/_/sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi/_/sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/_/de dag kun nas 
[\[145b.4\]]rab tu grag_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/_le'u dgu pa'o//_//[{D44-10}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_/rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das 
[\[145b.5\]]pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus na/_'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[145b.6\]]khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni/_rin po che'i pad mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/_kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_gzhi rgyan 
[\[145b.7\]]mtha' yas pas brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_ri rab dang grong khyer dang /_khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa/_zas dang 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]skom dang /_gos kyi longs spyod yid kyis bsams pas 'byung ba rgyan gyi rnam pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/_'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/_spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[146a.2\]]de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/_spos kyi 
[\[146a.3\]]rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgrengs pa'i rgyan can/_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa/_nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa/_rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun tu brgyan pa/_rin po 
[\[146a.4\]]che'i me tog pun da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba dag gis kun nas bskor ba/_spos dang /_rin po che'i pad mo mang po dpag tu med pas kun tu brgyan pa/_rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun tu rgyas pa/_spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 
[\[146a.5\]]dpag tu med pas kun tu snang bar byas pa/_grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/_'di ltar nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/_de'i shar phyogs logs na 
[\[146a.6\]]grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba mi yi rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/_rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tags dang /_phru ma'i ra ba bdun gyis brgyan cing 
[\[146a.7\]]kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i 'obs spos kyi chus gang ba/_rin po che'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_me tog pun da ri kas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/_shing ta la'i phreng ba rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i rgyan dang khang bu brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/_steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang /_dril bu'i dra ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang /_in+d+ra nI la'i dra ba dang /_rdo rje pad mo'i dra bas kun nas yog la/_rin po che'i shing drung me 
[\[146b.2\]]tog gi dra ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/_spos dang phreng ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/_de'i 'khor kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/_sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna 
[\[146b.3\]]tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/_sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che rdo yi rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/_/bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/_bza' shing gi ra ba de 
[\[146b.4\]]dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las spos kyi dri kun tu byung ba bya sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/_/grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/_nam 
[\[146b.5\]]mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/_yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag go_/de nas lho phyogs logs na lha yi grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/
[\[146b.6\]]de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/_/de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do/_/de dang 'dab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya 
[\[146b.7\]]ba yod do/_/de dang 'dab chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do/_/de dang 'dab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/_/grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du ste/_nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas 
[\[147a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/_snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing /_yal ga stug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang /_dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa 
[\[147a.3\]]mang po shin tu rgyas pa spos dang mar me rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkram pa/_rin po che'i 'od thur du 'phro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa/_phyogs bcu 'od zer 
[\[147a.4\]]mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa/_rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/_nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/_phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang 
[\[147a.5\]]po rab tu 'byung ba yod de/_de'i mdun du pad mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/_rtsa ba spos dang rin po che dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa/_chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna 
[\[147a.6\]]tshogs su gyur pa/_rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can/_rin po che 'od 'phro ba dang /_spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba pad mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa 
[\[147a.7\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/_phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/_ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der/_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas 
[\[147b.2\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ste/_des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes 
[\[147b.3\]]bya ba der lo brgya na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/_nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/_de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur te/_'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bsam gyis 
[\[147b.4\]]mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/_phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/_gzhal med khang dang khang khyim gyi grong rdal thams cad kyang rab 
[\[147b.5\]]tu snang bar byed/_rin po che'i me tog dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/_sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu mthong ba'i sgra 
[\[147b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /_spyod pa dang 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[147b.7\]]pa skye ba'i ltas te/_rgyan de dag byung ba 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas blta bar mos 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]pa dang snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas mngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos 
[\[148a.2\]]kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa/_sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/_gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par dag pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags 
[\[148a.3\]]shing zil gyis gnon pa/_mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/_'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyis dra ba rab tu 
[\[148a.4\]]'gyed pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/_'od zer kyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de pad mo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to/_/ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu 
[\[148a.5\]]gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la/_nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/_de bzhin du 'jig 
[\[148a.6\]]rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun na snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
