[\[148a.7\]]'byam klas pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od gzer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/_'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[148b.2\]]thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu/_de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/_sgrib pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal/_sangs rgyas blta ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams 
[\[148b.3\]]cad kyang rnam par bcom/_sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag_/dge ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung /_mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag_/mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa dang /_'jigs 
[\[148b.4\]]pa thams cad kyang rnam par bstsal/_lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/_sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/_de dag 'od gzer des yang 
[\[148b.5\]]dag par bskul ba dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba 
[\[148b.6\]]shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba/_grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/_de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/de la bu gzi brjid chen po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lnga brgya yod do/_/rgyal 
[\[148b.7\]]po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa stong phrag bcu yod do/_/de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste tshul 
[\[149a.2\]]yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste/_'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste sgra yi sprin gyis kun tu rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 
[\[149a.3\]]khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dga' ba chen po khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste tshul gyi gzhi 
[\[149a.4\]]rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 
[\[149a.5\]]'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do/_/de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[149a.6\]]'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams/_/mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin/_/snying po byang chub dri med la/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang /_/bskal pa bye ba stong dag gi/_/mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni/_/sangs 
[\[149a.7\]]rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams/_/rgyal ba kun na rab tu snang /_/ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab/_/gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag_/'od 'phro sprin rnams rab 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bkye ba/_/'od zer sprin la zad mi shes/_/'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las/_/'od gzer rnams ni dri med pa/_/sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus/_/phyogs 
[\[149b.2\]]dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba/_/'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags/_/'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yi/_/sems can kun kyang 
[\[149b.3\]]bde bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi/_/'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/_/rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing /_/bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung /_/phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ong /_/
[\[149b.4\]]snying po byang chub 'di la yang /_/sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grag_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/_/kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te/_/dga' shing shin tu mos byas shing /_/chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir/_/
[\[149b.5\]]'jig rten mgon po'i drung du 'dong /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun 
[\[149b.6\]]tu shin tu grag par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/_/rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang /_/
[\[149b.7\]]rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang /_/tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du/_/yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig_/grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang /_/rnga sgra dag gis myur du sgrogs/_/kun kyang 'thun par lhan cig tu/_/rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir dengs 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]shig_/srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang /_/dge ba'i dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig/_/bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa/_/rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'dong /_/grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis/_/rgyan rnams kun tu bla re bres/_/rgyal 
[\[150a.2\]]mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams/_/nor bu sna tshogs brgyan par sgreng /_/rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du bre bar gyis/_/nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du/_/sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung /_/lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis/_/rin chen char 
[\[150a.3\]]yang kun tu phob/_/bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis/_/rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis/_/sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob shig_/rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab par gyis/_/
[\[150a.4\]]spos dang pad mo 'od kyi sprin/_/me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang /_/se mo do dang phreng sprin dang /_/gos kyi sprin gyi char phob shig_/ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri/_/nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis/_/dri med tsan dan phye ma rnams/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[150a.5\]]dkyil la rab tu ston/_/nor bu'i phreng ba me tog phreng /_/rin chen phreng ba dri med dang /_/rin chen sgron gyi phreng ba rnams/_/nam mkha'i dbyings la bsgrub par gyis/_/thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la/_/dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de/_/
[\[150a.6\]]bu dang 'khor du bcas pa'i rnams/_/rgyal ba blta phyir kun 'dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu 
[\[150a.7\]]lnga brgya dang /_blo gros kyi stobs las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun tu bdar te grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]su mngon par 'phags te/_rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/_nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[150b.2\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba nas kyang lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 
[\[150b.3\]]'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig_/dri za'i 
[\[150b.4\]]grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig_/lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems pa zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag 
[\[150b.5\]]lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang lhan cig nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas 
[\[150b.6\]]kyang mi 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig_/lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[150b.7\]]stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig_/tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas 
[\[151a.2\]]sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 
[\[151a.3\]]kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang 
[\[151a.4\]]bcas pa bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon 
[\[151a.5\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/_/'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste/_thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang 
[\[151a.6\]]chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho rab tu snang 
[\[151a.7\]]zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste sgo yangs pa nas snang ba 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par sprul pas 
[\[151b.2\]]brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing mos 
[\[151b.3\]]pa rgya mtsho sprin gyis rgyan yang dag par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/_/'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad mngon du bstan pa dang 
[\[151b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang /_mi 'jig pa thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs 
[\[151b.5\]]pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos nas/_/bdag gi ye shes 
[\[151b.6\]]snang ba skyes/_/des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa/_/rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong /_/sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur/_/phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang mthong /_/mtshan gyi rnam pa rnams dmigs dang /_/gang gi sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes/_/
[\[151b.7\]]sngon chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/_/sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag_/rgya chen yongs su kun btang zhing /_/spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de/_/rgya 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs/_/snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang /_/phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te/_/rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing /_/zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/_/zhing rnams so so re re 
[\[152a.2\]]la/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/byang chub spyod pa rab spyod de/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho kun spyad nas/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu 
[\[152a.3\]]sbyangs/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang bas/_/sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong /_/byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yin/_/chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i/_/zhing gi 
[\[152a.4\]]rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams/_/dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams/_/de ltar bdag gis sbyang bar bya/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe 
[\[152a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/_'jig 
[\[152a.6\]]rten thams cad ni snang bar byed/_sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni rab tu brjod/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu brjod/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang 
[\[152a.7\]]dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston/_snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu brjod/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa dang /_ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin tu 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]brjod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu brjod/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ston/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston 
[\[152b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam ni mngon par bsgrub pa byed cing /_sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang 
[\[152b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin du btsud do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa/_/gzi 
[\[152b.4\]]brjid chen po legs so legs/_/bsod nams snying po grags pa che/_/snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non/_/chos kyi dbyings ni khyab byas shing /_/bsod nams chen po'i sprin ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchod par gyur/_/bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 
[\[152b.5\]]du/_/zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing /_/nga yi ye shes ji lta bur/_/khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur/_/tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni/_/brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te/_/brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i rnams/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 
[\[152b.6\]]dag par byed/_/thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams/_/de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur/_/sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad cing /_/'khor kyang skyo ba 
[\[152b.7\]]med pa'i rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/_/bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa/_/rgyal ba re re mchod byed kyang /_/gang gi sems la skyo med na/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]khyod kyi smon lam dbang gis gsal/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams ni/_/khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag_/mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la/_/blo chen gang rnams 'jug 
[\[153a.2\]]pa na/_/de dag tshul 'di gnas par 'gyur/_/nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang /_/gzi brjid chen po stobs chen gyis/_/sems can ri rab rdul mnyam pa/_/byang chub yongs su smin par byas/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag_/kun 
[\[153a.3\]]tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing /_/zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/_de'i dus na mi rnams 
[\[153a.4\]]kyi tshe yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/_rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[153a.5\]]pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po'i rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas 
[\[153a.6\]]pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob po/_/ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos kyi klong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo/_/kun gyi rjes su 
[\[153a.7\]]song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo/_/dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po yang rab tu thob bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyi 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/_/chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo/_/rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[153b.2\]]tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob po/_/chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob po/_/rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa yang rab tu thob 
[\[153b.3\]]bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba yang rab tu thob bo/_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te/_de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[153b.4\]]gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu/_/'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin tu dkon/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob/_/de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang 
[\[153b.5\]]mthong /_/sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba/_/kha dog mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam par dag_/'od zer spyan gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab/_/kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed/_/'od kyis rig pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye/_/'gro ba de dag 
[\[153b.6\]]kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/phan tshun srid zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong /_/sprul pa'i dra ba sprin rnams bsam mi khyab/_/rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun 
[\[153b.7\]]kyang gang byas shing /_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas/_/dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing /_/mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel/_/
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po na/_/sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams/_/thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/_/sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya 
[\[154a.2\]]mtsho rgya che ba/_/mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung /_/de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul/_/tshad med rnam par 'phrul pa dag la ltos/_/zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs/_/
[\[154a.3\]]de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med/_/sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas/_/dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'dod par gyis/_/bde ba'i yid dang srid zhu spro ba yis/_/bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/de mthong sdug bsngal 
[\[154a.4\]]thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing /_/'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te/_/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing /_/chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[154a.5\]]kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/_de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to/_/de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang /_sems can bye ba 
[\[154a.6\]]khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams cad kun nas yog par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po 
[\[154a.7\]]brgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to/_/des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug par 'byung 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]ba rab tu skyes so/_/ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya bar yang zhugs par gyur to/_/zhing thams cad du yang yang dag 
[\[154b.2\]]par 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas par mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so/_/spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/rjes su 
[\[154b.3\]]rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to/_/'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so/_/rang 'byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs 
[\[154b.4\]]kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to/_/smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par 
[\[154b.5\]]bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_/legs so yon tan ye shes 
[\[154b.6\]]rgya mtsho can/_/sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas/_/sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i/_/rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung /_/chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas 
[\[154b.7\]]te/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i/_ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur/_/pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul/_/grags pa 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]chen po yongs su rgyas par byed/_/gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang /_/tha dad yang dag shes tshul mi zad dang /_/spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas/_/gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro/_/
[\[155a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur/_/smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te/_/rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab/_/chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/
[\[155a.3\]]bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te/_/sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par blta bar gyis/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs/_/nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug par gyis/_/sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi/_/spyod pa ngas ni ji 
[\[155a.4\]]ltar rnam sbyangs pa/_/de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/zhing rnams re rer sangs rgyas mang po ngas/_/rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas/_/sngon spyod de yi 'bras bu 'di yin to/_/'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos_/
[\[155a.5\]]las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang /_/smon lam bsam yas go ca bgos pas na/_/'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing /_/zhing rnams rgya chen rgya 
[\[155a.6\]]mtsho sbyangs byas nas/_/bskal pa 'byam klas kun tu sbyangs byas shing /_/rgyal ba yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas blta na 
[\[155a.7\]]dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/_rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/_/nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang de bzhin 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa byung bar gyur te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/_'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs dang /_
[\[155b.2\]]rin po che bdun dang /_grong gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang yul mir bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/_des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_spos dang nor 
[\[155b.3\]]bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu blta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad 
[\[155b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/_bsod nams chen po'i rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/_/ting nge 'dzin de thob nas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du 
[\[155b.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs 
[\[155b.6\]]pa/_/yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can/_/byang chub mchog gi smon lam yid ldan pa/_/'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis/_/nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs/_/snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams/_/sdug 
[\[155b.7\]]bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pas/_/'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur/_/byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa rnams/_/skyo med yid kyis spyod pa spyad pa dag_/mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]med pa'i/_/ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi/_/mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na/_/bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/_bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams 
[\[156a.2\]]mchog kyang yin/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag_/mtha' dang dbus med pa ni khyod kyis shes/_/mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas/_/de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi/_/rgyal 
[\[156a.3\]]ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong /_/de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang /_/sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong /_/'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing /_/ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing /_/
[\[156a.4\]]thams cad gzigs par gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar 'gyur/_/khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa rab spyod nas/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams/_/bslabs nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ongs/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho 
[\[156a.5\]]yongs su dag pa rnams/_/phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/_/khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te/_/smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur/_/'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'/_/
[\[156a.6\]]kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis/_/byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]zhing rnams 'byam klas par/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_/smon lam rnams kyang yongs 
[\[156a.7\]]su rdzogs par gyis/_/nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas/_rgya mtsho'i 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas shes bya bar phyin te/_der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to/_/de nas de lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/_rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 
[\[156b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo /_/der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/_/'jig 
[\[156b.3\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par ston to/_/des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/_/chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[156b.4\]]rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/_bcu pa'o//_//[{D44-11}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu gsum pa/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 
[\[156b.5\]]gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[156b.6\]]rten gyi khams ni yongs su 'dzin pa/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lhan cig spyod pa/_'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun tu spyod pa/_dga' ldan 
[\[156b.7\]]gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnas kyi dam pa/_mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_grong rdal ni 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_bza' shing gi ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[157a.2\]]gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming 
[\[157a.3\]]mthun pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /_gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po 
[\[157a.4\]]la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang /_nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /_gzhung de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi 
[\[157a.5\]]dang mi ma yin pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 
[\[157a.6\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa/_rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra 
[\[157a.7\]]ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o/_/snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[157b.2\]]snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi brla dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten pa'i 
[\[157b.3\]]rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[157b.4\]]rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu 
[\[157b.5\]]phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/_/byang chub kyi lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 
[\[157b.6\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[157b.7\]]pa snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[158a.2\]]sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 
[\[158a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skra dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang nyan thos 
[\[158a.4\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi 
[\[158a.5\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o/_/chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[158a.6\]]snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sa kun nas yog par 
[\[158a.7\]]khebs pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]tu bres pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[158b.2\]]kun tu khengs par bkang ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[158b.3\]]mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul 
[\[158b.4\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu ta dang /_pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/_
[\[158b.5\]]me tog ut+pa la de dag re re dang /_me tog pun da ri ka de dag re re la 'ang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang /_me tog pun da ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/_me tog ut+pa la dang /_me tog pun 
[\[158b.6\]]da ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi pad mo'i tshal dang /_'jig 
[\[158b.7\]]rten gyi khams kyi smyig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la/_kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/_chu 'thung ba 'am khrus byas pa de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byung ba'am nang gi'am phyi'i'am/_che ba'am/_chung ba'am/_bzang ba'am ngan pa'am/_rgyang ring po 'am thag nye ba'ang rung ste/_gang ji 
[\[159a.2\]]snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas/_de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la/_kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/_de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /_chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o 
[\[159a.3\]]ci'i phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi chu rgya mtsho la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/_de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/_chu 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na gzugs 
[\[159a.4\]]su snang ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am che ba'am chung ba'am bzang ba'am ngan pa'am/_rgyang ring po'am thag nye ba'ang rung ste/_gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi 
[\[159a.5\]{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_gzhan gyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/_de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang /_lus dang yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi 
[\[159a.6\]]khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/_sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par 
[\[159a.7\]]gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no/_/chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]tu phra ba snyed du/_rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o/_/ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi 
[\[159b.2\]]snying po la/_rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya 
[\[159b.3\]]mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/_/de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyangs rgya mtshos 
[\[159b.4\]]mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/_/de dag gi steng na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/_/de 
[\[159b.5\]]dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/_/de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[159b.6\]]snyed rab tu gnas so/_/de dag gi steng nas me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/_me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig 
[\[159b.7\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste/_de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[160a.2\]]rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i 
[\[160a.3\]]lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spos mngon par 'phags 
[\[160a.4\]]pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 
[\[160a.5\]]ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[160a.6\]]gyi khams gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu 
[\[160a.7\]]bzang po zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]tu bzang po de na yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[160b.2\]]khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 
[\[160b.3\]]rab tu gnas so/_/de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so/_/sangs 
[\[160b.4\]]rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab 
[\[160b.5\]]tu gnas pa'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa med do/_/skye gnas tha dad pa med do theg pa tha dad pa med do/_/
[\[160b.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 
[\[160b.7\]]'jigs pa med/_theg pa dma' bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]rnam par 'khrugs par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_shes rab 'chal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'ang med pas/_de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes 
[\[161a.2\]]bya'o/_/de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni stong 
[\[161a.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba/_'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibs su 
[\[161a.4\]]'dug pa/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya 
[\[161a.5\]]mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu de bzhin gsheg 
[\[161a.6\]]gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu mu 
[\[161a.7\]]stegs kyi gnas thams cad phu dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/_sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[161b.2\]]la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang 
[\[161b.3\]]po/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de dag las sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod 
[\[161b.4\]]pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do/_stong gnyis 
[\[161b.5\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor 
[\[161b.6\]]gyis bskor ba yod de/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu mtha' yas kyi 
[\[161b.7\]]chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/_chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang /_shes rab 
[\[162a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas/_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten 
[\[162a.3\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul 
[\[162a.4\]]shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir zhe na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/_chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[162a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khams rgya mtsho dang /_sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar 
[\[162a.6\]]de dag la sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni/_yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na 
[\[162a.7\]]yod do/_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyad pa zhes bya ba de na/_gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]yod de/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten 
[\[162b.2\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/_seng ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas 
[\[162b.3\]]kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/_sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par bsgrub pa'i mdo/_/
[\[162b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la 
[\[162b.5\]]gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/_sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na/_de'i phyir gling bzhi 
[\[162b.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de dag las sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 
[\[162b.7\]]spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yod do/_/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]su 'dug pa/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/_gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de ni rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/_rgya mtsho 
[\[163a.2\]]mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi 
[\[163a.3\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/_gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[163a.4\]]mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa/_chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod 
[\[163a.5\]]pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/_gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten zhes bya ba/_byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de der skad cig 
[\[163a.6\]]skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/_de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de dag las sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon 
[\[163a.7\]]tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na/_gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yod do/_/gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/_grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[163b.2\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[163b.3\]]pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad mo dang 
[\[163b.4\]]ku mu ta dang pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/_/grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[163b.5\]]las brtsigs pa/_sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste/_grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de 
[\[163b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/_skad cig skad cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi 
[\[163b.7\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]zhe na/_grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/_chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/_me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/_rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/_nam mkha'i khams kyi 
[\[164a.2\]]rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[164a.3\]]de ltar de dag las sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do/_/grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa 
[\[164a.4\]]de na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/_bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na/_
[\[164a.5\]]nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 
[\[164a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o/_/rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyobs 
[\[164a.7\]]pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can gyi 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[164b.2\]]mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o/_/rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/_/dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[164b.3\]]dang /_ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgreng ba'o/_/bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/_rdzing de dag re re zhing yang 
[\[164b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad mo dang /_pun da ri 
[\[164b.5\]]ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/_/bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang 
[\[164b.6\]]mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/_dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 
[\[164b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la/_mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/_de 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/_yon 
[\[165a.2\]]tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na grong rdal mdzod pa mtha' yas pa na/_yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do/_/bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med 
[\[165a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/_khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[165a.4\]]thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[165a.5\]]snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o/_/khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bcom 
[\[165a.6\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/_ye shes sgyu ma rgya 
[\[165a.7\]]mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]thams cad kyis/_sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go_/ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/_
[\[165b.2\]]de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan 
[\[165b.3\]]ni khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do/_/de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/_
[\[165b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas 
[\[165b.5\]]bskor cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi 
[\[165b.6\]]rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing /_de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang 
[\[165b.7\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so rnam par spyod do byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin gyi 'khor 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa 
[\[166a.2\]]rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/_nyan thos 
[\[166a.3\]]'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/_de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen 
[\[166a.4\]]po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang /_de ltar 'khor dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 
[\[166a.5\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang 
[\[166a.6\]]lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/_lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang /_mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten 
[\[166a.7\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po 
[\[166b.2\]]rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las dbang po re re la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/de 
[\[166b.3\]]bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya 
[\[166b.4\]]mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/ye shes rnam pa tha dad 
[\[166b.5\]]pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[166b.6\]]rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin du nyan thos dang de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin 
[\[166b.7\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la 'ang shes par bya ste/_ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho 
[\[167a.2\]]ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 
[\[167a.3\]]'gengs pa de dag ni/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo //_//sangs rgyas 
[\[167a.4\]]rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o/_/
[\[167a.5\]]'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/_sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad 
[\[167a.6\]]pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon to/_/de dag las yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[167a.7\]]gyi khams re re dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba re re la 'ang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang /_nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su bskul ba byed do/_/shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang de bzhin te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho 
[\[167b.2\]]ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te/_gnang nas byang chub 
[\[167b.3\]]sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na 
[\[167b.4\]]ba der 'dong bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa dang mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus 
[\[167b.5\]]rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/_lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/_lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin 
[\[167b.6\]]tu phra ba snyed yod pa/_mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/_kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[167b.7\]]dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/_lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin du mar me dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang phye ma dang 
[\[168a.2\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/_lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas/_rang rang gi stobs dang rdzu 
[\[168a.3\]]'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to/_/'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho 
[\[168a.4\]]rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de 
[\[168a.5\]]dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o/_/rnam par bkrol lo/_/gsal bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par bstan to/_/de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig
