[\[168a.6\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_thog mar yang dge bar du yang dge_/
[\[168a.7\]]tha mar yang dge ba'i chos don bzang po/_/yi ge bzang po dag pa yongs su gsal ba/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ston pa mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /_
[\[168b.2\]]sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /_sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /_chos bstan pa'i yon tan 
[\[168b.3\]]rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te/_bstan 
[\[168b.4\]]kyang zad par mi rung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[168b.5\]]rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]dbang po yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin 
[\[168b.6\]]chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang /_shangs dang ljags dang sku dang 
[\[168b.7\]]thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[169a.2\]]kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_nam mkha' rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_zla ba'i zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[169a.3\]]ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi bltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_/thams cad du 'gro ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par gzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[169a.4\]]rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_chos gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi klong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /_de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_rin 
[\[169a.5\]]po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan rgya 
[\[169a.6\]]mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/_'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/_lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[169a.7\]]snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/_phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/_sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 
[\[169b.2\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud [{]myed [,]med [}]rin po che dang 'dra bar yid kyi lus 
[\[169b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 
[\[169b.4\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[169b.5\]]smin tshugs can/_shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid 
[\[169b.6\]]du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_sdom pa chen po yang dag par blangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/_chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[169b.7\]]lce dang ldan pa/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa 'dzud par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye 
[\[170a.2\]]shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/_chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad yongs su bstsal 
[\[170a.3\]]ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa/_
[\[170a.4\]]'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis 'brel pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu 
[\[170a.5\]]phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa/_sangs 
[\[170a.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu 
[\[170a.7\]]byugs pa/_dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_/de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo /_
[\[170b.2\]]spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/_de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang /_thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang 
[\[170b.3\]]ji snyed yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob po/_/sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa 
[\[170b.4\]]rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gi gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[170b.5\]]rab tu 'thob bo/_/gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag 
[\[170b.6\]]thams cad kyang byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/_/gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 
[\[170b.7\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/gang dang stan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/gang gis pang du khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 
[\[171a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/gang dang chos kyi dbyings su bsten par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/_sems can gyi 
[\[171a.3\]]khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs 
[\[171a.4\]]par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so/_/de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya 
[\[171a.5\]]mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la 
[\[171a.6\]]mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas/_chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu 
[\[171a.7\]]phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang 
[\[171b.2\]]chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/chos ston to/_/yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po rin chen 
[\[171b.3\]]mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/_de bzhin 
[\[171b.4\]]gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[171b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na 'gro la rag ste rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams/_rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs 
[\[171b.6\]]pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/_der 'gro ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang /_de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan par ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ma gtogs par/_
[\[171b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/_rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/de khyod kyis sngan cad mthong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye'am ring /_de na da ltar de 
[\[172a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/_rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis 
[\[172a.3\]]pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang /_de ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang /_'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa ni smos su 'ang ma mchis te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sngon tshe bdag gis 
[\[172a.4\]]ma thos so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[172a.5\]]rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang /_de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa legs par soms shig_/de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting 
[\[172a.6\]]nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye'am ring ba dang 
[\[172a.7\]]de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa yang ma shes te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/_de bzhin 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang /_
[\[172b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ring ngam nye ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo /_/
[\[172b.3\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[172b.4\]]phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par/_ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[172b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/_de la phyag bya ba 'am/_bsnyen bkur ba 'am/_de las chos mnyan pa bde blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 
[\[172b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bstan tu gsol/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[172b.7\]]mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig na mchis/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa bstan du gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khams 'di'i nub phyogs logs kyi sa mtshams kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams klong 
[\[173a.2\]]gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da 
[\[173a.3\]]ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/_/de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang /_rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad 
[\[173a.4\]]par [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas/_de ltar rjes su bsams te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 
[\[173a.5\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag go_/de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la/_rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed 
[\[173a.6\]]bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin 
[\[173a.7\]]gyis brlabs pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang /_mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[173b.2\]]dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa/_rgya mtsho la sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so/_/dus gsum 
[\[173b.3\]]kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/_'di ltar dper na lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa'am/_me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la 
[\[173b.4\]]ngo snang ba bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 
[\[173b.5\]]mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i slad du 
[\[173b.6\]]mchi'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_rgyal po rin chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dul 
[\[173b.7\]]ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho/_rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig_/de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang /_bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/_bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los 
[\[174a.2\]]sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[174a.3\]]dang lhan cig_/'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[174a.4\]]gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 
[\[174a.5\]]stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur 
[\[174a.6\]]ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig_/gling gcig 
[\[174a.7\]]gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig_/khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa dang 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang /_bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/_lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol/_/bdag cag kyang 'jig rten 
[\[174b.2\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[174b.3\]]slad du mchi bar gsol lo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rin chen mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang /_bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gnyer/_chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa 
[\[174b.4\]]ni tshor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni tshol bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer nyan thos kyi byang 
[\[174b.5\]]chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/_yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni bgrod par 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[174b.6\]]rgyas thams cad dang /_chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas/_sems can thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam byams pa la mi gnas/_mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba 
[\[174b.7\]]rgya mtsho la 'jug cing /_spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam/_yang dag pa'i ye shes la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas/_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na deng la rag go_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/_chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang /_bu mo re res kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i 
[\[175a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/_/rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten 
[\[175a.3\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/_/sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho las sogs pa rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/_/lce'i 
[\[175a.4\]]khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 
[\[175a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/_/yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[175a.6\]]rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang /_bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas/_spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 
[\[175a.7\]]gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/_rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong /_/yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis/_/'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho chos ma thos/_
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur/_/da ni sangs rgyas sprin las bsgrub pa yi/_/sa mang rgya mtsho dmyig kyang thob par gyur/_/byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su/_/rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyod par bgyi/_/sna yi khams 
[\[175b.2\]]kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/_/rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur/_/lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob/_/des ni zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur/_/lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/_/bsgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi/_/yid 
[\[175b.3\]]kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams/_/'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rmad ga cad kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//[{D44-12}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bco lnga pa/_bcom ldan 'das thog 
[\[175b.4\]]ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/_blo shin tu rnam par dag pa/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/_chos mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la shin tu gzhol ba/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_
[\[175b.5\]]mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba/_pho brang kun tu 'od na seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i 
[\[175b.6\]]snying po can la bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa/_sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/_'jig 
[\[175b.7\]]rten gyi khams la dpyod pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa/_bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa/_don dang yi ge la dpyod pa/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa/_'dus byas dang /_
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la dpyod pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse 
[\[176a.2\]]bar dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid 
[\[176a.3\]]yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung /_
[\[176a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu ji ltar rnam par dgod pa de dag 
[\[176a.5\]]yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams 
[\[176a.6\]]yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang 
[\[176a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcad pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba dang /_'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_the tsom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang /_nem 
[\[176b.2\]]nur thams cad shin tu bstsal ba dang /_gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul 
[\[176b.3\]]bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung /_
[\[176b.4\]]gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[176b.5\]]pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung /_
[\[176b.6\]]gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung /_gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog par thugs kyis thugs su chud 
[\[176b.7\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi/_
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[177a.2\]]dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_shar phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/lho phyogs logs 
[\[177a.3\]]su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub 
[\[177a.4\]]sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_lho phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par 
[\[177a.5\]]sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi 
[\[177a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_nub phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i 
[\[177a.7\]]khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i/_'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]ces bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong 
[\[177b.2\]]ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_byang phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[177b.3\]]bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams uta pa la'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[177b.4\]]dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[177b.5\]]mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub 
[\[177b.6\]]sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par 
[\[177b.7\]]sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[178a.2\]]'das la phyag 'tshal te/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin 
[\[178a.3\]]tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa/_rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu 
[\[178a.4\]]phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas/_seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_
[\[178a.5\]]'og gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal 
[\[178a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_'og gi phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon 
[\[178a.7\]]par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_steng gi phyogs su brten 
[\[178b.2\]]nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la bltas te 'di skad 
[\[178b.3\]]ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni ngo mtshar thob pa sha stag ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni bsam 
[\[178b.4\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[178b.5\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178b.6\]]rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu ba ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab po/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyogs 
[\[178b.7\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud cing /_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]mjed 'di nyid dang /_de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag na'ang sku gzhan dang gzhan mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/_kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/_chu zheng gzhan dang gzhan/_sku tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan/_skye mched 
[\[179a.2\]]brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/_dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/_'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan/_sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten 
[\[179a.3\]]gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/seng ge'i nga ro can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_shAkya thub pa zhes 
[\[179a.4\]]bya bar rab tu shes so/_/drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/go'u ta ma'i rigs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu 
[\[179a.5\]]shes so/_/mu stegs byed ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i

[\[179a.7\]]thub par dka' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thugs dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i

[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la thub pa chen

[\[180b\]]

[\[181a.1\]]'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rin po che'i gtsug phud ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dran par bya ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/shin tu bzhad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes

[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]byin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dgongs pa grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye [,]me [}]zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/gcig la brten pa

[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[182b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la sdug bsngal dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thams cad las grol ba 
[\[182b.3\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/grol zhing mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'das pa'i gter zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rin po che'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'jig 
[\[182b.4\]]rten ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/gnas med pa'i sa thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag 
[\[182b.5\]]la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su shar lho'i phyogs mtshams 
[\[182b.6\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/byang ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/gsung snyan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rtsa ba khyad du 
[\[182b.7\]]'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rgyun gyi gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rgyu shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rnam par phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dam pa'i bsam gtan mnga' ba 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/ran par gsung pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/blo rgya mtsho zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de 
[\[183a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'dab chags su lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu song ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la thub pa'i 
[\[183a.3\]]dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/mngon par sel ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dus las shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/ngo bo nyid yongs su mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/bka' nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/
[\[183a.4\]]bskal pa mnyam pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbang phyug gi dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/drang srong ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'phrin las brtsams pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rdo rje seng ge zhes bya bar rab tu shes 
[\[183a.5\]]te/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu song ba na/_mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su nub byang gi phyogs 
[\[183a.6\]]mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog yang dag par bstsags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/tsan dan gyi gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/pad mo'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes 
[\[183a.7\]]so/_/shin tu 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi ldum bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/spyan shin tu yangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]shes so/_/tshul bzang po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/chos rtse gcig ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dra ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur 
[\[183b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'od 'phro 'gyed pa zhes 
[\[183b.3\]]bya bar rab tu shes so/_/shin tu 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbang po'i mtshon cha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/mi rtag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rtsa ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'phro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rlung 
[\[183b.4\]]dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/gtong ba la mos pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/lam shin tu brtags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'joms pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che 
[\[183b.5\]]ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag_/bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[183b.6\]]gshegs pa la dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rin po che tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/mchod sbyin la brtson pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/lha'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/
[\[183b.7\]]'khor los 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'khor lo mi ldog pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/bya ba dang bzhud pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]tu shes te/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/_mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ji ltar 'jig 
[\[184a.2\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/_dpag tu med pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa 
[\[184a.3\]]mtshams med pa brjod du med pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/_/gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub 
[\[184a.4\]]phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi 
[\[184a.5\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/_dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa mtshams med pa brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas 
[\[184a.6\]]gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes te/_sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/_yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag gis ni spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_
[\[184a.7\]]gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_nga ro rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/_/sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//[{D44-13}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin 
[\[184b.2\]]tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu drug pa/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[184b.3\]]zhes bya ba de la/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gnod pa zhes bya'o/_skal ba mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/gnas 
[\[184b.4\]]kyi rtsal ba zhes bya'o/_/gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/_/shu ba'i gzebs zhes bya'o/_/byis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'di na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang yongs 
[\[184b.5\]]su 'brel ba zhes bya'o/_/chud za ba zhes bya'o/_/tshor bar gcen pa zhes bya'o/_/myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o/_/nges pa zhes bya'o/_/dran pa can zhes bya'o/_/brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyi phyi bzhin snyegs pa 
[\[184b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/phyin ci log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/_/rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba zhes 
[\[184b.7\]]bya'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/_/mi nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/_/so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/nub par 'grol ba zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]dag gang yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na theg pa gcig ces bya'o/_/zhi bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/dgra dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[185a.2\]]yongs su rtog bzang ba zhes bya'o/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/'phags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/_/drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gter bcu zhes bya ste/_/
[\[185a.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[185a.4\]]dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la/_'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na/_tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa zhes bya'o/_/bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[185a.5\]]rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o/_/rnam par phye ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/_/kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o/_/'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/dngos po'i gzugs brnyan ces bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 
[\[185a.6\]]'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang /_'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na las su rung ba zhes bya'o/_/ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/srid pa zhes bya'o/_/'jigs pa zhes bya'o/_/'jigs pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[185a.7\]]sdig pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/[{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]na ba zhes bya'o/_/sgal ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang /_'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o/_/
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o/_/yon tan thob par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul bzang po zhes bya'o/_/'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o/_/sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/rtogs 
[\[185b.2\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/_sde'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba dang ldan 
[\[185b.3\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/mtha' las grol ba zhes bya'o/_/rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rjes su brtul ba zhes bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phyogs su snang ba zhes bya ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 
[\[185b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug 
[\[185b.5\]]bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/_/skal ba gcod pa zhes bya'o/_/smad pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/nye bar bsrabs pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par sred pa zhes bya'o/_/khon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/nad 
[\[185b.6\]]dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/dka' bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/_/rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o/_/mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig 
[\[185b.7\]]rten gyi khams lhag pa na rab tu 'jigs pa zhes bya'o/_/gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/dgra dam pa zhes bya'o/_/bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/ro med pa zhes bya'o/_/kun skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/bkur bar bya ba 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/mun par khyer ba zhes bya'o/_/blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang /_'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na don chen po zhes 
[\[186a.2\]]bya'o/_/phan pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/don gyi don ces bya'o/_/tshad med pa zhes bya'o/_/mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/mchog tu dul ba zhes bya'o/_/rtag tu mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/yan lag 
[\[186a.3\]]byas pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na me'i tsha ba zhes bya'o/_/yan lag dang po zhes bya'o/_/rnam par gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186a.4\]]mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul zab mo zhes bya'o/_/'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/mi dma' ba zhes bya'o/_/rtogs pa khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/_/grol ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/rab tu 'grel ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 
[\[186a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i 
[\[186a.6\]]bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na 'gyod pa zhes bya'o/_/kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gcig la gcig ces bya'o/_/kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/ro gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes 
[\[186a.7\]]bya'o/_/log pa la gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/grangs med pa zhes bya'o/_/dgra'i dpung zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]rdul bstsal ba na 'dod chags pa zhes bya'o/_/smra ba zhes bya'o/_/mi dkar ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhi las skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/gzung ba zhes bya'o/_/sdig pa'i kha ba zhes bya'o/_/lhag pa zhes bya'o/_/khur zhes bya'o/_/skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/sra ba 
[\[186b.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa na mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/bral ba zhes bya'o/_/dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186b.3\]]bsgrims pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/bag la nyal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/phyi ma zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig 
[\[186b.4\]]rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na dngos po'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/skal ba sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/grol ba'i don gyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/mi smad pa zhes bya'o/_/mchog tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/srid pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186b.5\]]sba ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/mthar thug par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/yongs su rtogs pa dag pa zhes bya ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi 
[\[186b.6\]]bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na 'dod chags kyis 
[\[186b.7\]]rgyas pa zhes bya'o/_/gtum pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/yang dag pa las 'das pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/skal ba med pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/'phro ba zhes bya'o/_/skye zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o/_/sgrib pa zhes bya'o/_
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ral gri'i dngo zhes bya'o/_/tshal stug po zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na nor bu sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'dud 
[\[187a.2\]]par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/bskal pa zhes bya'o/_/chags pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/seng ge zhes bya'o/_/dngos po len pa zhes bya'o/_/'brel ba zhes bya'o/_/snod ces bya'o/_/g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug 
[\[187a.3\]]bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na mtshams bral ba zhes bya'o/_/phye ba zhes bya'o/_/yi ge med pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/mthong ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/bya ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[187a.4\]]nye bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/_/sred pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhol ba zhes bya'o/_/skyid de ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na zhi bar byed 
[\[187a.5\]]pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/khyab par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/mngon du bya ba la sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_tshe tshad med pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/lam gyi dam pa zhes bya'o/_/thob par dka' ba'i 
[\[187a.6\]]yan lag ces bya'o/_/pha rol gyi mtshams zhes bya'o/_/brgal dka' ba zhes bya ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems 
[\[187a.7\]]can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na 'phrog par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/smon pa'i bshes 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gnyen zhes bya'o/_/mi brtan zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o/_/brjod pa sna tshogs shes bya'o/_/nyam nga bas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/_/don 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba zab pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin sems pa zhes bya'o/_/nam 
[\[187b.2\]]mkha'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na sred par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/nyes pa'i skyon can du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[187b.3\]]rlabs shes bya'o/_/'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/'du shes can zhes bya'o/_/'bras bu la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/brjod du mi rung ba zhes bya'o/_/tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes 
[\[187b.4\]]bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na bzlog pa zhes bya'o/_/smra ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/'jigs pa bstsal ba zhes bya'o/_/shin tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gti mug med pa zhes bya'o/_/nub pa 
[\[187b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/sel ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na brjod du med pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul 
[\[187b.6\]]nyams pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par rig pa'i lam zhes bya'o/_/bsngo ba dge ba zhes bya'o/_/rgya chen po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par phye ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/zil par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/ye shes 
[\[187b.7\]]kyi bdag po zhes bya'o/_/don yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'ang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na khur tsa ba'i khur zhes 
[\[188a.2\]]bya'o/_/snying po med pa zhes bya'o/_/rkun po lta bu zhes bya'o/_/rga shi zhes bya'o/_/chags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/shin tu mched pa zhes bya'o/_/ngal bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/ngom zung gnag pa zhes bya'o/_/kun tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/_/ral gri dang 'dra ba zhes bya'o/_/kye 
[\[188a.3\]]rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang /_'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/_/'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/bskyod pa zhes bya'o/_/nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/_/'phrog pa zhes bya'o/_/bral ba 
[\[188a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/mi ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/thab mor gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsod par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/gnas su gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[188a.5\]]phan pa na kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/yan lag g.yogs pa zhes bya'o/_/smad pa spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/rjes su mthun pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhir 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/yan lag spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/tha 
[\[188a.6\]]dad pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/glag med pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na snang ba brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/thams cad kyi rgya zhes bya'o/_/
[\[188a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi gter zhes bya'o/_/snang ba yod pa zhes bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can zhes bya'o/_/dngos po zad pa zhes bya'o/_/lam yangs pa zhes bya'o/_/dul ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/dge ba yod pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ste/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[188b.2\]]mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na bsam pa thibs po zhes bya'o/_/gnas sna tshogs su bkram pa zhes bya'o/_/skye gnas su skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/rim pas 'dug pa zhes bya'o/_/ngo tsha med pa 
[\[188b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/shes par bya ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/'ga' 'ga'i ro zhes bya'o/_/rtseg pa zhes bya'o/_/rtag tu 'jig pa zhes bya'o/_/'gal [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i sgo zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i 
[\[188b.4\]]bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na shin tu g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/rig pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros dang ring ba zhes bya'o/_/'phongs par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/'jigs pa zhes bya'o/_/kun tu 'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[188b.5\]]rten du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/dngos po'i bdag po zhes bya'o/_/mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na ngoms pa zhes bya'o/_/bdud rtsi zhes bya'o/_/
[\[188b.6\]]rgyu ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/rang gi med pa zhes bya'o/_/rtog pa byang ba zhes bya'o/_/yang dag par gzhog pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyu ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/mched pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/lam med pa zhes bya'o/_/mi gnyis pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug 
[\[188b.7\]]bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/bstan pa rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/don rnam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/_/chos dang phrad pa zhes bya'o/_/'khor ba med pa zhes 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bya'o/_/'brel pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/lam rgya chen po zhes bya'o/_/yang dag par phyin par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba dag pa zhes bya'o/_/mthong ba'i bdag po zhes bya ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig 
[\[189a.2\]]rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i 
[\[189a.3\]]bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na skye bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/_/chags shing zhen pa zhes bya'o/_/khur khyer ba zhes bya'o/_/mi sdug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/nad thibs po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[189a.4\]]sdig pa byed pa zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na gzhir gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba dang ldan 
[\[189a.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/tshod las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/chos 'phel ba zhes bya'o/_/rtogs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_sdud pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/sdud par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/lang du red pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/lta ba chung ba zhes bya'o/_/mthong ba chung ba 
[\[189a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na/_gnas zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/des shin tu rtogs pa zhes 
[\[189a.7\]]bya'o/_/dge bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/'khor ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/_/bdag nyid rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/ma skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na sa mtshams nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/sel ba dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/_/skal ba mi mnyam pa'i don can zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o/_/yongs su rtog pa zad 
[\[189b.2\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/byin gyi rlabs kyi lam zhes bya'o/_/tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o/_/dran pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o/_/grol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs 
[\[189b.3\]]su dga' ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes 
[\[189b.4\]]bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/_'tshog pa zhes bya'o/_/rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o/_/nad dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/lus la yod pa zhes bya'o/_/rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/_/[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i sgo zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o/_/
[\[189b.5\]]rtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/_/rang la gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'tshe ba zhes bya'o/_/mdud par 
[\[189b.6\]]'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/a na sems pa zhes bya'o/_/rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o/_/'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o/_/shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o/_/kye hud na zhes 
[\[189b.7\]]bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/'grogs pa 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]med pa zhes bya'o/_/tshad med pa zhes bya'o/_/yangs pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi yan lag zhes bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/ma chags pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog 
[\[190a.2\]]par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na brtan pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/_/bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o/_/don rab tu chud pa zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin 
[\[190a.3\]]la gtugs pa zhes bya'o/_/lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/dran pas bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/_/grol ba sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/skyobs pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/_/'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 
[\[190a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags 
[\[190a.5\]]pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/yan lag gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/g.yo sgyu che ba zhes bya'o/_/'brel pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]du mi 
[\[190a.6\]]rung ba zhes bya'o/_/skye gnas ma rung ba zhes bya'o/_/nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/dngo skam pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la/_yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gdul 
[\[190a.7\]]ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/_/sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o/_/bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/nges par rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rnal 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/_/brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/_/sgo zhes bya'o/_/rtog par 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bsgribs pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas med pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyin bsreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o/_/phyir 
[\[190b.2\]]log pa zhes bya'o/_/mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/kun tu song ba zhes bya'o/_/chen po zhes bya'o/_/du ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/yangs pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 
[\[190b.3\]]'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/_mthong bas mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/spang ba'i don ces bya'o/_/rnam par bsgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o/_/mtshan nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[190b.4\]]rnyed par dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o/_/mkhas pas brtag pa zhes bya'o/_/'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o/_/mi g.yo ba la mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la 
[\[190b.5\]]sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[190b.6\]]mjed 'di na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mu 
[\[190b.7\]]med pa sa mtshams med pa/_brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba de bzhin du/_lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_
[\[191a.2\]]de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[191a.3\]]khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang /_'phags 
[\[191a.4\]]pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[191a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs shes bya ba nas/_phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/_'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal 'phags 
[\[191a.6\]]pa'i bden pa'i ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu bcu yod de/_de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/_/kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang /_lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i 
[\[191a.7\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//[{D44-14}]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkye ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/shar gyi lus 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]'phags bye ba phrag brgya dang nub kyi ban lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/khor yug rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/
[\[191b.2\]]mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/ri rab 
[\[191b.3\]]ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[191b.4\]]bstan to/_/'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[191b.5\]]bstan to/_/'bras bu chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar 'di na bcom ldan 'das
