[\[191b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/_bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[191b.7\]]bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de dag thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas dpal dang /_nor dpal dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_yon tan dpal dang /_mig gi dpal dang /_brtson 'grus dpal dang /_chos kyi dpal dang /_ye shes dpal dang /_bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag 
[\[192a.2\]]go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang /_pad mo'i mdog dang /_tsam pa ka'i mdog dang /_ud pa la'i mdog 
[\[192a.3\]]dang /_sa le sbram gyi mdog dang /_rin po che'i mdog dang /_rdo rje'i mdog dang /_shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na 
[\[192a.4\]]tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang /_rig byed mi skyod pa dang /_rig byed bcings pa med pa dang /_rig byed kun spyod pa dang /_rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang /_rig byed mtha' rgal dang /_rig byed dam pa dang /_rig byed dbang 
[\[192a.5\]]phyug dang /_rig byed tshangs pa dang /_rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/_gcig ji 
[\[192a.6\]]lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/
[\[192a.7\]]'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing /_/bral bar gyur te dngos med pa'i/_/yang dag sangs rgyas sus shes pa/_/de dag [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi lam mi gnas/_/shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing /_/dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la/_/rnam par bsgoms shing shes 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]gyur pa/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs par gyur/_/'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te/_/sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la/_/gang gi sems ni mi g.yo ba/_/de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams/_/mnyam pa'i sems 
[\[192b.2\]]su rab 'jug cing /_/mi gnyis mngon gyur brtan pa rnams/_/de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag_/rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing /_/mi gnas len pa med pa rnams/_/de dag bde bar gshegs par 
[\[192b.3\]]'gyur/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/rnam par shes dang sems pa dag_/grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur/_/blta bar bya las 'das pa dang /_/rnam par blta las de bzhin te/_/chos la gang 
[\[192b.4\]]dag rmongs med pa/_/de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur/_/gang gis shes rab chen po rnams/_/sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing /_/thams cad mthong yang skye med pa/_/de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la skye ba med/_/'jig 
[\[192b.5\]]pa'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/de ltar gang gis shes pa ni/_/de dag bla na med par 'gyur/_/gang gis gcig la mang shes shing /_/mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te/_/gnas kyi rnams su'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/de nas 'od 
[\[192b.6\]]zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'das te/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/_/byang shar gyi phyogs 
[\[192b.7\]]mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og gi phyogs dang steng gi phyogs dag tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du yang bstan te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci'ang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar 
[\[193a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[193a.3\]]bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/_thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam 
[\[193a.4\]]dpal dang /_sangs rgyas dpal dang /_nor dpal dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_yon tan dpal dang /_mig gi dpal dang /_brtson 'grus dpal dang /_chos kyi dpal dang /_ye shes dpal dang /_bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go_/byang 
[\[193a.5\]]chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang /_pad mo'i mdog dang /_tsam pa ka'i mdog dang /_uta pa la'i mdog dang /_
[\[193a.6\]]sa le sbram gyi mdog dang /_rin po che'i mdog dang /_rdo rje'i mdog dang /_shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring 
[\[193a.7\]]na/_tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang /_rig byed mi skyod pa dang /_rig byed bcings pa med pa dang /_rig byed kun spyod pa dang /_rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang /_rig byed mtha' rgal dang /_rig byed dam pa dang /_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rig byed dbang phyug dang /_rig byed tshangs pa dang /_rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 
[\[193b.2\]]tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[193b.3\]]kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gtses gyur cing /_/sred pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas/_/rang 'byung kun mkhyen yon tan tshol ba rnams/_/de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no/_/chos kyi rang bzhin gnas 
[\[193b.4\]]pa mthong gyur nas/_/mtha' gnyis gang gis rab tu spangs gyur cing /_/ldog pa med cing dgos pa kun shes pa/_/de dag nga yi 'khor lo mtshungs med skor/_/gang rnams chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yis/_/'khor ba'i skye dgu kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/
[\[193b.5\]]bskal pa bsam yas rgya chen go gyon pa'i/_/drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o/_/gzhan gyis mi pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can/_/bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams/_/byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/_/
[\[193b.6\]]de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no/_/'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar/_/nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu/_/thams cad shes pa su yi rgyud skyes pa/_/de dag rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag ston/_/gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing /_/
[\[193b.7\]]byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa/_/rang byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/_/gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can/_/zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing /_/nam yang dngos po dag 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]la mos med pa/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul/_/gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pa/_/rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra rjes dran pa/_/de dag la ni 
[\[194a.2\]]smon lam 'di yang btab/_/sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing /_/re re dag gis mnar med sdug bsngal ba/_/bskal pa dpag med smin par bya dad pa/_/de dag skyon med pham med shin tu srung /_/gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing /_/sangs 
[\[194a.3\]]rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te/_/mkhas pa bdag med rnam par su spyod pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'od thob po/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas pa 
[\[194a.4\]]nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang 
[\[194a.5\]]ci yang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin du 
[\[194a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/_thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[194a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal dang /_sangs rgyas dpal dang /_nor dpal dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_yon tan dpal dang /_mig gi dpal dang /_brtson 'grus dpal dang /_chos kyi 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dpal dang /_ye shes dpal dang /_bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang /_
[\[194b.2\]]pad+mo'i mdog dang /_tsam pa ka'i mdog dang /_ut+pa la'i mdog dang /_sa le sbram gyi mdog dang /_rin po che'i mdog dang /_rdo rje'i mdog dang /_shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams 
[\[194b.3\]]cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang /_rig byed mi skyod pa dang /_rig byed bcings pa med pa dang /_rig byed kun spyod pa dang /_rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang /_
[\[194b.4\]]rig byed mtha' rgal dang /_rig byed dam pa dang /_rig byed dbang phyug dang /_rig byed tshangs pa dang /_rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[194b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_/gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang 
[\[194b.6\]]brjod de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/_/thugs su chud pas bsgribs pa med gzigs te/_/zil gyis mi non chags pa mi mnga' bar/_/skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu 
[\[194b.7\]]snang /_/la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de/_/sku cher skye bar gyur pa rab tu mthong /_/skyes bu zla ba rnam par mdzes pa de/_/tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong /_/yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing /_/dgongs pa mkhyen bzhin shin tu mkhas 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]gyur pa/_/skye dgu'i seng ge don yod gshegs pa ste/_/la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong /_/phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par snang ba de/_/la la mthon thing spyan du de bzhin mthong /_/'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i 
[\[195a.2\]]skye dgu rnams/_/gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong /_/gzi brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis/_/seng ge'i nga ror gsung ba de bzhin mthong /_/zil gyis mi non ma log gsung mnga' ba/_/sku yi tha mar ston pa la las mthong /_/bcings 
[\[195a.3\]]pa kun las rnam par grol ba de/_/la las khab nas 'byung bar rab tu mthong /_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams/_/gzigs shing zhi ba der gzhol la las mthong /_/la las byang chub snying po dam pa la/_/chos rnams thams cad mngon par sangs 
[\[195a.4\]]rgyas shing /_/yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang /_/mun pa rdul bstsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong /_/la las chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang /_/thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo /_/la las skye dgu tshad med rnam 'dul bar/_skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de 
[\[195a.5\]]bzhin mthong /_/la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de/_/'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad de/_/rdzu 'phrul chags med bla med stobs mnga' ba/_/seng ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong /_/la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba/_/'jig rten sgron 
[\[195a.6\]]ma mya ngan 'das par mthong /_/rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang /_/stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de 
[\[195a.7\]]bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs 
[\[195b.2\]]rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo /_/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam 
[\[195b.3\]]dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/
[\[195b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[195b.5\]]re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig 
[\[195b.6\]]na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos zab pa/_/zil gyis non pa brjod pa med pa rnams/_/gang la 'jig rten rtag tu myos 'gyur ba/_
[\[195b.7\]]de dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston/_/gal te bdag gcig med du zin na ni/_/de yi spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med/_/rang byung rdul rnams shin tu bstsal ba yi/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung /_/mkhyen dang rnam grol 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhabs dang ldan pa rnams/_/mtshungs pa med la grangs kyang nam yang med/_de ni 'jig rten 'di na la la dag_/rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro/_/gang la phung po med cing khams med de/_/skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi 
[\[196a.2\]]med pa/_/de yi grangs ni 'jig rten 'di brnyes pas/_/skyes bu seng ge rnams su rab tu brjod/_/nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa rnams/_/de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid stong pa ste/_/rtog pa med cing rnam rtog de bzhin med/_/gzhal du med pa'i chos 
[\[196a.3\]]nyid 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med/_/snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med/_/'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyen/_/mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/_/zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa rnams/_/rtse 
[\[196a.4\]]gcig gnyis la spyod pa ma yin te/_/yid kyis bstsags pa'ang de bzhin gang yang med/_/'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnam dag dang /_/las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes 
[\[196a.5\]]mi ldog ste/_/bde gshegs chos 'di de ltar bsam mi khyab/_/phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa yi/_/'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing /_/sems can tshad med yongs su 'grel mdzad kyang /_/skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi 
[\[196a.6\]]mnga'/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mdog_/de yang kun na rnam par kun tu gnas/_/de dag bsam pa ji 'dra ji bzhin du/_/thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/_
[\[196a.7\]]shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/_/gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci'ang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub 
[\[196b.2\]]sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/_thams cad du yang sangs rgyas 
[\[196b.3\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems 
[\[196b.4\]]dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs 
[\[196b.5\]]pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas/_rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig 
[\[196b.6\]]ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/lha 
[\[196b.7\]]dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te/_/snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing /_/'gro ba thams cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dad bskyed cing /_/gang gi 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]sems ni nam yang mi ldog par/_/sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong bar/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yongs med cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/_/
[\[197a.2\]]shin tu brtan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe/_/nyin mtshan rgyun tu rjes su sems byed cing /_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid che la sems spel ba/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur 
[\[197a.3\]]bar 'ong /_/dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang /_/gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob mos pa/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su gzhal byas shing /_/thams 
[\[197a.4\]]cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang /_/bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing /_/rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad rab spangs te/_/spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang 
[\[197a.5\]]ldan gyur pa/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'jal zhing /_/sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de/_/blo che rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur pa/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gang gis zhing 
[\[197a.6\]]rnams rnam par bsams pas na/_/gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med pa/_/thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/gang rnams zhing ni rdul du gzhig byas shing /_/thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing 
[\[197a.7\]]bgrang byas te/_/de dag nang du rgyal ba 'dzud byed pa/_/de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas pa nas/_steng gi phyogs kyi 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci 'ang rung ste gtogs par 
[\[197b.2\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams re re'i 
[\[197b.3\]]gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/_thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub 
[\[197b.4\]]sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar 
[\[197b.5\]]gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes 
[\[197b.6\]]bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams 
[\[197b.7\]]cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]chen la/_/gang dag kha dog rigs kyis blta 'dod pa/_/mig nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs dag ni/_/'jig rten kun na'ang shes par 
[\[198a.2\]]nus pa med/_/gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang /_/mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do/_/de bzhin gshegs la mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben/_/yan lag kun ldan blta na mnyam med pa/_/bsam 
[\[198a.3\]]pa ji bzhin kun na rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min/_/gang rnams ci yang 'di yi tshul bshad de/_/ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po 
[\[198a.4\]]'jig pa med/_/'byung dang 'jig par spro bar mi mdzad de/_/mnga' brnyes mnga' bsgyur rnam par gdon mi za/_/brjod du med par bstan pa rnam par spyod/_/lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur cing /_/nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na/_/gnyis 
[\[198a.5\]]po bgrang du mi rung shes pa rnams/_/chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'od mdzad pa/_/spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te/_/thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs/_/skye dgu'i 
[\[198a.6\]]don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad/_/gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu gyur/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing /_/thams cad tshul dang 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur/_/sku med de la chags pa gang yang med/_/
[\[198a.7\]]byon pa med cing bstsags pa yod min yang /_/kha dog mtha' yas rnam par dgod byas shing /_/'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de dag snang /_/'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin/_/sems ni rtog pa nam yang ma yin te/_/bde gshegs ye shes 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]de 'dra'i rang bzhin no/_/de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang /_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcur snang bar byas nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[198b.2\]]khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de 
[\[198b.3\]]dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba 
[\[198b.4\]]phrag brgya dag na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[198b.5\]]thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog 
[\[198b.6\]]ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshang pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs 
[\[198b.7\]]shes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/'jig rten rang byung de las 
[\[199a.2\]]mchog med pa/_/mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnams/_/drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel ba/_/yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no/_/'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' la/_/'du shes dngos med gnas pa med pa rnams/_/phun 
[\[199a.3\]]sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba/_/mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'/_/shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa rnams/_/brgal du glags med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams/_/g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi/_/bde gshegs 
[\[199a.4\]]rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin/_/lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing /_/bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la/_/nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro ba/_/'jig rten dag na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[199a.5\]]pa gang yod pa/_/de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste/_/gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang /_/rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang med/_/dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par/_/the tsom thams cad rnam par 
[\[199a.6\]]spangs byas te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe/_/sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med/_/mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag_/byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa/_/sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brang 
[\[199a.7\]]byas na/_/gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no/_/mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te/_/mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do/_/mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgom byas na/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'gyur/_/'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang /_/shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te/_/mi gnas sems la rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yis/_/dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams/_/de dag 
[\[199b.2\]]rang bzhin ji bzhin brtag byas na/_/gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te/_/de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas pa 
[\[199b.3\]]nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/_
[\[199b.4\]]gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i 
[\[199b.5\]]gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo /_/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[199b.6\]]chub sems dpa' de dag kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi 
[\[199b.7\]]mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[200a.2\]]thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/shes rab dpag med chos 
[\[200a.3\]]rnams mtha' yas pa/_/srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag_/tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od/_/yon tan che mnga' 'di dag sbyor 'di'o/_/gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing /_/dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te/_
[\[200a.4\]]dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa/_/bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di yin/_/sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med/_/'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral/_/bsam gtan nang dang sems la bcings pa med/_/chags med 
[\[200a.5\]]yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin/_/rtog mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams/_/mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag_/thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa/_/zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/_/ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog_/thams 
[\[200a.6\]]cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing /_/bde 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnams 'don pa/_/bde gshegs bsam can de dag sbyor 'di'o/_/sangs rgyas don tshig rjes su shes bya zhing /_/chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed/_/kun 
[\[200a.7\]]tu 'gro bar song las rtsol spyod pa/_/rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams/_/gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag_/mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams/_/thob dka' thob pa 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o/_/zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub bgrang zhing /_/lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/_/'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /_/grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o/_/zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba/_/gzugs 
[\[200b.2\]]dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med/_/de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di'o/_/'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la/_/ngag gis lam gyis gang na rtogs byed cing /_/dus gsum rang bzhin ji bzhin 
[\[200b.3\]]rtogs gyur pa/_/mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas pa nas/_steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag 
[\[200b.4\]]bcu'i bar du snang bar byas nas/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/_gtogs par gyur pa de dag 
[\[200b.5\]]thams cad ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[200b.6\]]dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo /_/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[200b.7\]]thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi 
[\[201a.2\]]g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de 
[\[201a.3\]]bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/'das dus gang gis 
[\[201a.4\]]bsgrub dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing /_/nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de/_/brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun gdul zhes/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 
[\[201a.5\]]'jug pa dang /_/ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mun bsgribs 'jig rten rnams/_/sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di/_/'jig rten sems can mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba/_
[\[201a.6\]]med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing /_/bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul 'di/_/sngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing /_/bdag rten sems 
[\[201a.7\]]can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa/_/de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bkod/_/bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo/_/sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing /_/ngan song gzhol ba 'dod chags zhe sdang 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gti mug gdungs/_/me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa/_/mthong nas sgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o/_/lam gol lam ma yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing /_/mun pa chen por rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas/_/
[\[201b.2\]]snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos ston ces/_/'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag_/mtha' mi mthong zhing skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba/_/mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed 
[\[201b.3\]]chos kyi gru sbyar cing /_/pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di'o/_/sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun/_/g.yang sa chen por ltung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas/_/snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su 'god cing /_/dran 
[\[201b.4\]]par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di'o/_/shin tu dog pa'i btson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams/_/nad dang rga bas gzir cing mtshams kyis mnar ba dag_/mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te/_/sems can kun dgrol 
[\[201b.5\]]sems pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tsom med/_/chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste/_/'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi 'jigs shing /_/sems can kun la snyoms byed de 
[\[201b.6\]]yi spyod yul lo/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/_/'jig 
[\[201b.7\]]rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so/_/de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[202a.2\]]mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa/_mu med pa sa mtshams med pa dpag tu med pa brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/_/gzhung de 
[\[202a.3\]]bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs 
[\[202a.4\]]mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas pa nas/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 
[\[202a.5\]]bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/_/de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgyas par byas pa nas/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/_
[\[202a.6\]]gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /_
[\[202a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo /_
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar 
[\[202b.2\]]dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[202b.3\]]mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dag ste/_'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/_rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing 
[\[202b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/_gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/_/thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/_gcig na ji 
[\[202b.5\]]lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/_/bskal pa gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la/_gang gis mthong yang bstsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i/_/lam 
[\[202b.6\]]du 'jug pa de ni thams cad kun gyis shes 'gyur te/_/stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing /_/bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 
[\[202b.7\]]'di la dgar spyad de/_/tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas/_/de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di ston to/_/dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste/_/'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]la mchod pa yongs byas shing /_/de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par ye shes rnams bsgoms pas/_/sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'drar phyogs bcur ston/_/thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des 
[\[203a.2\]]byas shing /_/rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtogs bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa/_/bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom sems tshim byed/_/chos nyid de 'dra spyad pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur/_/snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams 
[\[203a.3\]]rgyas byed rtse gcig thob byed cing /_/rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi zlog spyod pas tshim byed pa/_/dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa/_/sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin/_/bzang po'i spyod yul can 
[\[203a.4\]]gyi sems kyi phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing /_/zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa/_/ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tsom med pa'i rnams/_/stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go_/bcom 
[\[203a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod de la 'jug byed cing /_/chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs/_/de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu 
[\[203a.6\]]sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong /_/mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med/_/rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs bcu mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba min/_/shin tu chags med 
[\[203a.7\]]yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin/_/sems can las mang bstsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste/_/nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med/_/de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa/_/shes par dka' ba 'dren 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pa chen po sgrib pa med pas brnyes/_/nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang /_/de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med/_/gcig cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/_/de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings 
[\[203b.2\]]rtag tu 'gengs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa/_le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//[{D44-15}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu bdun pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 
[\[203b.3\]]gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/_bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan song du 'gro ba dang /_dbang po tshang ba dang 
[\[203b.4\]]dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_skye ba 'thun pa dang /_skye ba mi 'thun pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_bde ba myong ba dang /_sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/_las kyis ni sems mi shes so/_/sems kyis ni las mi shes so/_/tshor bas 
[\[203b.5\]]ni rnam par smyin pa mi shes so/_/rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes so/_/sems kyis ni tshor ba mi shes so/_/tshor bas ni sems mi shes so/_/rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so/_/rkyen kyis ni rgyu mi shes so/_/dngos pos ni dmigs pa mi shes so/_/
[\[203b.6\]]dmigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/gang 'di yongs su dri ba dang /_/chos 
[\[203b.7\]]rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba/_/'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/_/chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med/_/shin tu dngos po med pa ste/_/de phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dag gi_/ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so/_/ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams/_/
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang /_/gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/_/chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can/_/'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang /_/gcig gis 
[\[204a.2\]]gcig ni mi shes te/_/chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rlung ni sten tshul gyis/_/gzhan dang gzhan gyi bar du rgyu/_/gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/_/chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams/_/
[\[204a.3\]]gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang /_/gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/_/chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/_/mig dang rna ba sna dag dang /_/lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams/_/'di dag lam ni rgyu 'khod kyang /_/byed pa po ni gang yang med/_/'byung ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[204a.4\]]med pa yis/_/'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang /_/bstan par byas pa gang yang med/_/bstan pa la ni dngos po med/_/mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong /_/rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis/_/lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang /_/med de yongs su brtags pa yin/_/gang 
[\[204a.5\]]zhig rang bzhin dngos med par/_/tshul bzhin rab tu rtogs byed pa/_/de yi mig la 'khrul pa med/_/chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/yang dag pa dang yang dag min/_/bden nam 'on te rdzun yang rung /_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun/_/tshig gi las 
[\[204a.6\]]kyis brjod pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar 
[\[204a.7\]]'bab pa dang /_sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang lus ji lta ba dang spyod pa ji lta ba dang /_mos pa ji lta ba dang mtshan ma ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta ba dang sbyor ba ji lta ba dang sems ji lta ba dang /_spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can gdul ba'i phyir mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]sems dpa' nor dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing /_thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/_/'di don ji 'dra de bzhin du/_/'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/_/bdag gi 
[\[204b.2\]]lus la su gnas zhes/_/gang gi nang ni rab shes pa/_/yang dag yod dam med pa'i don/_/des ni rab tu shes pa yin/_/lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni/_/phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin/_/de bas shes pa de gnas la/_/nam yang chags par mi byed 
[\[204b.3\]]do/_/lus ni rnam par spyad pa yis/_/dngos po kun kyang rnam par bsgoms/_/sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/_/dngos po kun nas brtags pa'o/_/gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang /_/gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur/_/ji ltar mgal me 'khor lo yi/_/
[\[204b.4\]]thog ma tha ma bskor ba bzhin/_/dngos po thams cad mi rtag par/_/skye bo gang rnams rtogs pa yang /_/lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir/_/'du shes phyir yang ldog par 'gyur/_/bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi/_/las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung /_/rnam par 
[\[204b.5\]]smin pas rab tu 'byung /_/phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/_/sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad/_/dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/_/tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log_/'jig rten thams cad ston par byed/_/ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa/_/de dag thams 
[\[204b.6\]]cad brtags pa ste/_/chos nyid de ni nam du yang /_/chos gcig la yang mi gnas so/_/rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te/_/chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung /_/phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/_/de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub 
[\[204b.7\]]sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang /_'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang /_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang /_nang du byed pa dang phyi rol du byed pa dang /_tshor ba chung ba dang /_tshor ba che ba dang /_tshe 'di la myong ba dang /_tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la/_chos kyi dbyings la ni yid 
[\[205a.2\]]du 'ong ba'am/_yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa/_/tshor ba de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyis/_/
[\[205a.3\]]'di la byed pa gang yang med/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/_/shin tu phyis pa'i me long la/_/ngo ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin/_/de la de ni de bzhin snang /_/chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag_/gcig gi gcig ni 
[\[205a.4\]]mi shes kyang /_/rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig_/lam po cher ni song 'dug ste/_/gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ji ltar shing gi 'khrul 
[\[205a.5\]]'khor rnams/_/sna tshogs sgra mang brjod byed kyang /_/de ni bdag dang bdag med min/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ji ltar bya rnams mang po yis/_/sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las/_/sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba/_/las kyi rang bzhin de 
[\[205a.6\]]bzhin no/_/ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang /_/bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/_/'on kyang dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na/_/gshin rje'i ris gtogs sdug bsngal ba/_/de dag la ni 'ong 
[\[205a.7\]]ba med/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang /_/lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang /_/'pho bar snang ba gang yang med/_/de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'jig rten la la dag_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]kyang /_/de dag 'ong ba gang yang med/_/las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par 
[\[205b.2\]]sangs rgyas na 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/_zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/_sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/_/gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog_/sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/_/bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugs 
[\[205b.3\]]su chud/_rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/_/'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyong /_rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlobs/_/spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig_/de nas 
[\[205b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris/_/de ni mkhas pas rnam par shes/_/yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed/_/
[\[205b.5\]]ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang /_/sems can mang po rab tu rgyu/_/de la gcig dang tha dad med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar [{]mye [,]me [}]ni gcig pu yang /_/'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud/_/de la [{]mye [,]me [}]lce tha dad med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de 
[\[205b.6\]]bzhin no/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu las/_/chu klung tshad med 'bab gyur kyang /_/de la chu yi bye brag med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang /_/'jig rten kun na rgyu zhing ldang /_/de la gcig dang tha dad med/_/sangs 
[\[205b.7\]]rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing /_/sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed/_/de yi char la bye brag med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang /_/myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston/_/sa la 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bye brag 'byed pa med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma ni/_/phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed/_/de la 'od zer tha dad med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni/_/'jig 
[\[206a.2\]]rten kun la rab tu snang /_/gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag_/stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi/_/de la lus ni bye brag med/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[206a.3\]]dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba bskyed pa gcig kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams gzugs sna tshogs dang /_kha 
[\[206a.4\]]dog sna tshogs dang /_rigs sna tshogs dang /_dbang po sna tshogs dang /_longs spyod sna tshogs dang /_dbang sna tshogs dang /_'khor sna tshogs dang /_yon tan sna tshogs dang /_phyug dbul sna tshogs dang /_shes rab sna tshogs su yang snang la de bzhin 
[\[206a.5\]]gshegs pa ni gang la yang mi mnyam pa'am/_tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang /_
[\[206a.6\]]sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston/_/byams dang sdang bar sems pa med/_/sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/_/ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang /_/snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/_/rgyud kyi rnams la rnam par 
[\[206a.7\]]'gyur/_/ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni/_/rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/_/shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed/_/ji ltar mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag_/'gro ba mang po shes par byed/_/de bzhin sangs 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]rgyas yon phul ba/_/ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed/_/ji ltar dri med me long la/_/ji 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang /_/de bzhin sems can bsam tshul de/_/sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'byung /_/ji ltar dug phan sman gyi 
[\[206b.2\]]rnams/_/dug nad thams cad sos par byed/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/_/nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel/_/ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni/_/'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed/_/mun pa dag kyang rnam par sel/_/sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/_/ji 
[\[206b.3\]]ltar zla ba dri med pa/_/kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te/_/sa ni rab tu snang bar byed/_/sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/_/ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis/_/sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/_/srid gsum 'gro ba 
[\[206b.4\]]rnams kyang skyod/_/'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i me/_/thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/_/'du byed thams cad sreg par byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' brtson 
[\[206b.5\]]'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad lta ba mthun pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/_de dag kun la'ang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/_tshor ba ni tshor ba nyid du 
[\[206b.6\]]zad/_'du shes ni 'du shes nyid du zad/_'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/_rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/_'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/_gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/_
[\[206b.7\]]gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/_ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/_sred pa'ang sred pa nyid du zad la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang phan par byed pa 'am/_gnod par byed pa ma yin na/_de ci'i phyir/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_de ltar khyod kyis dris pa gang /_/la la myur du rnam grol zhing /_/la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur ba/_/
[\[207a.2\]]sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon/_/'di 'dra dpag tu med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin/_/dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis/_/rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin/_/ji ltar rtsa dang shing gsher ba/_/mer bcug shin tu nyams chung zhing /_/ring 
[\[207a.3\]]por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/ji ltar gtsub mas gtsubs pa'i tshe/_/ma byung bar ni myur bteg na/_/myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de ltar le lo bstan pa la/_/nyi ma'i nor bu'i lci ba la/_/yang dang yang bzhag bteg 
[\[207a.4\]]pa la/_de la me 'byung mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/_/byis pa rnams ni mig brtsums shing /_/mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/rkang lag med par skyes pa'i mis/_/ji 
[\[207a.5\]]ltar smyug mda' kha bug gis/_/sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin/_/de ltar le lo bstan pa la/_/ji ltar byis pa rgya mtsho las/_/yang du yang du bcus byas shing /_/skam par la la 'dod pa ltar/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/ji ltar bum pa chus 
[\[207a.6\]]bkang zhing /_/bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe/_/la la gsad par 'dod pa ltar/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yis/_/nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i/_/gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba/_/de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/_/
[\[207a.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skems pa 'di nyid blangs kyang /_sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/_la la zhe 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]sdang gi dbang du 'gro/_la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/_la la nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/_'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/_khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/_phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro/_ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/_sgyu'i dbang du 'gro/_g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la 
[\[207b.2\]]chos de dag kyang sems med par yang gzung du 'ang mi nus te/_nyon mongs par gdags pa kun kyang rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud tu zad na de ji lta bu/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad 
[\[207b.3\]]de smras pa/_/gang gis don de dris pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas sras po nga la nyon/_/yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/_/thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub po/_/la la stobs med chu klung gis/_/nan gyis khyer bar gyur pa dag_/skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin/_/
[\[207b.4\]]ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la/_/zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang /_/bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar/_/de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/_/ji ltar sman pa la la zhig_/sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du/_/lto 
[\[207b.5\]]ba'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu/_/rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang /_/nam phyed tsam yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'thob pa/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[207b.6\]]'khor skyes kyang /_/zas dang gos dag mi bdog pa/_/de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/_/ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi/_/sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig_/gzhan zhig de yid dga' byed pa/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/ji ltar dmus long 
[\[207b.7\]]ri mo mkhan/_/tshong dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang /_/bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig_/skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang /_/bdag nyid de nang 'chir 'gyur ba/_/chos la ma bskyoms de 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bzhin no/_/ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang /_/phun sum tshogs pa kun brjod cing /_/bdag gis thob par mi 'gyur ba/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub 
[\[208a.2\]]sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/_de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa brjod/_la la la ni tshul khrims/_la la la ni 
[\[208a.3\]]bzod pa/_la la la ni brtson 'grus/_la la la ni bsam gtan/_la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzad/_la la la ni byams pa/_la la la ni snying rje/_la la la ni dga' ba/_la la la ni btang snyoms brjod par mdzad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[208a.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/_/de ltar 
[\[208a.5\]]gang gis don dris pa/_/sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon/_/smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung /_/chos gcig gis ni 'byung ba med/_/gang yang 'byung ba yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med/_/bskal pa gang la gnas pa yi/_/bsam pa 
[\[208a.6\]]mkhyen nas don mdzad cing /_/gang la ji dag tshul 'thun pa/_/de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad/_/ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod/_/tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams/_/mi bzod pa ni bzod pa des/_/brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o/_/
[\[208a.7\]]rnam par 'khrug la bsam gtan brjod/_/shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o/_/gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad/_/'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste/_/zhum pa la ni dga' ba bshad/_/'khor ba'i sems la btang snyoms te/_/sangs 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang /_/rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin/_/ji ltar sa la las byas pa/_/khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin/_/de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro/_/rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams/_/
[\[208b.2\]]rung ba'i phyir ni ra ba ste/_/de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rung phyir ro/_/ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni/_/sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed/_/de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no/_/
[\[208b.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/_/bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar/_/de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di 
[\[208b.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can 
[\[208b.5\]]gdul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnams rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_chos 
[\[208b.6\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i 
[\[208b.7\]]dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po chos nyid ni/_/'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste/_/sgrib pa med pa gzigs pa yi/_/'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]sku gcig ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/_/shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste/_/mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no/_/sngon cad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe/_/ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/_/'khor du chos 
[\[209a.2\]]rnams bstan pa dang /_/de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub/_/sems can ji snyed sbyangs pa'i rnams/_/de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong /_/ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du/_/kun 
[\[209a.3\]]gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/_/sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang /_/'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no/_/gang rnams smon lam mthun ldan zhing /_/sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas/_/thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams/_/ji lta bzhin du 
[\[209a.4\]]thams cad mthong /_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang /_/las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa/_/de lta de ltar mthong gyur te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo/_/sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'/_/de dag byams sdang yod pa min/_/bsam pa'i 
[\[209a.5\]]tshul ni ji bzhin du/_/srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong /_/rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams/_/de ltar snang bar gyur pa ste/_/drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i/_/nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med/_/gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi/_'jig 
[\[209a.6\]]rten khams rnams thams cad du/_/skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang /_/de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[209a.7\]]sras/_bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na/_da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang /_
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/_sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[209b.2\]]yul shes par bya ba ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ci tsam du yangs/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs 
[\[209b.3\]]su bcad de smras pa/_/nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste/_/kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med/_/sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste/_/chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med/_/tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni/_/bskal pa bye bar mi nus te/_/ji snyed rgyal ba'i 
[\[209b.4\]]tshogs mnga' ba/_/de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/_/blo gros sems kyang ji bzhin du/_/sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug_/de la bstan pa thogs pa med/_/de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/_/'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang /_/'jig rten rgyu ba 
[\[209b.5\]]gang yod pa/_/de dag kun la ye shes gnas/_/gzugs su snang ba ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas ye shes chags med pa/_/dus gsum kun la chags pa med/_/nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin/_/de ni ye shes yul yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings ni tha 
[\[209b.6\]]mi dad/_/sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen/_/dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes/_/de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/_/sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang /_/sems can kun gyi sgra skad du/_/sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang /_/rnam par 
[\[209b.7\]]rtog pa gang yang med/_/rnam shes rnam par shes bya med/_/sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te/_/ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag_/sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad/_/nyon mongs med cing las med do/_/dngos po med cing gnas pa med/_/snang 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]ba med cing rgyu ba med/_/'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod/_/sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams/_/dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/_/sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 
[\[210a.2\]]'jug_/de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sems can kun gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_skye ba'i rgyud ji 
[\[210a.3\]]snyed pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /_yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab 
[\[210a.4\]]tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/_sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[210a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar 
[\[210a.6\]]gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang 
[\[210a.7\]]gi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/_sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad 
[\[210b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//[{D44-16}]de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di 
[\[210b.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_lus kyi las rnam 
[\[210b.4\]]par ma nyams pa yin/_ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/_yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/_lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/_ngag gi las ma smad pa yin/_yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/_lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/_ngag gi las 
[\[210b.5\]]mi 'phrogs pa yin/_yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/_lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/_ngag gi las mi zlog pa yin/_yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/_lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/_ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/_yid kyi las mi 'khrugs 
[\[210b.6\]]pa yin/_lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/_ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/_yid kyi las bsngags pa yin/_lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/_ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/_yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/_lus kyi las nye bar nyon 
[\[210b.7\]]mongs pa med pa yin/_ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/_yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/_lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/_ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/_yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ba yin/_rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/_dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_blo gros 
[\[211a.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/_blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/_blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/_blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/_blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/_blo gros tshad med 
[\[211a.3\]]pa yin/_blo gros grangs med pa yin/_blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/_blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/_blo gros brjod du med pa yin/_rgyu'i stobs can yin/_bsam pa'i stobs can yin/_sbyor ba'i stobs 
[\[211a.4\]]can yin/_rkyen gyi stobs can yin/_dmigs pa'i stobs can yin/_dbang po'i stobs can yin/_rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/_zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/_lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/_nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can yin/_
[\[211a.5\]]phung po la mkhas pa yin/_khams la mkhas pa yin/_skye mched la mkhas pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/_gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/_'das pa la mkhas 
[\[211a.6\]]pa yin/_ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/_da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi 
[\[211a.7\]]yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_rab tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_btang snyoms yang dag 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/_stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/_mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/_smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[211b.2\]]pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gnas dang gnas ma yin par shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[211b.3\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/_khams sna tshogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_mos pa sna 
[\[211b.4\]]tshogs dang /_mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba 
[\[211b.5\]]dang ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_lha'i mig chags pa med par shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par gcad pa shes par 
[\[211b.6\]]bya ba khong du chud pa yin/_lha yi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_klu'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung 
[\[211b.7\]]ba yin/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_tshangs pa'i dbang pos 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]yongs su bzung ba yin/_lha yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_klu yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_nam 
[\[212a.2\]]mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_mi 'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/_mi yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/_tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/_sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa 
[\[212a.3\]]yin/_skyabs su gyur pa yin/_dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/_mgon du gyur pa yin/_sgron mar gyur pa yin/_snang bar gyur pa yin/_'od du gyur pa yin/_'dren par gyur pa yin/_rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/_yongs su 'dren par 
[\[212a.4\]]gyur pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/_gtso bor gyur pa yin/_thu bor gyur pa yin/_rab tu gyur pa yin/_dam par gyur pa yin/_phul du gyur pa yin/_bla na med par gyur pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras ji 
[\[212a.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod skye bo mang po la 
[\[212a.6\]]phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang /_bde ba dang bde bar rnam par gzud pa'i phyir zhugs shing /_de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni/_kye 
[\[212a.7\]]rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong pa'i sems 
[\[212b.2\]]kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_kun tu bzang zhing kun tu 
[\[212b.3\]]mdzes pa dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi 
[\[212b.4\]]las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/_yon tan kyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang du 'dug 
[\[212b.5\]]pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab 
[\[212b.6\]]pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/
[\[212b.7\]]'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/glu dang gar dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyis tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/_

[\[213a.3\]]khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/khang thog du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad

[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bstan pa'i tshe/_/byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can

[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/_'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang

[\[215a\]]

[\[216a.1\]]me tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems

[\[216b.6\]]can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems

[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/sems can sdu gu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mi 
[\[217a.2\]]sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 
[\[217a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/drin gzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig 
[\[217a.4\]]ces sems bskyed do/_/dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems
