[\[217a.5\]]dpas sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur te sdig pa spong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu 
[\[217a.6\]]gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/go 
[\[217a.7\]]gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rang 'byung gi chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur 
[\[217b.2\]]cig ces sems bskyed do/_/'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spyod lam bcos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams 
[\[217b.3\]]cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa'i chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/
[\[217b.4\]]khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/_grong gi chos spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/blon po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa 
[\[217b.5\]]thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/_mthu bo che'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rgyal 
[\[217b.6\]]po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar 'thun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/nags tshal gyi 'dab mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang 
[\[217b.7\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/slong du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/sgor phyin pa'i tshe byang chub 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/nang du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin 
[\[218a.2\]]par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing phyir spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas 
[\[218a.3\]]sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stongs par 
[\[218a.4\]]gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rim gror byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs 
[\[218a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la/_rim gror byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/
[\[218a.6\]]khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po ldan pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can 
[\[218a.7\]]thams cad byams pa la gnas shing /_ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/kha zas bsod par thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/kha zas mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems 
[\[218b.2\]]can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med 
[\[218b.3\]]pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/kha zas za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/ro myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[218b.4\]]dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/zan zos pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[218b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/chos ston pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/
[\[218b.6\]]phyir 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/_khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/chu 'bog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum 
[\[218b.7\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/khrus byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par phyin pa ste yongs su gdung ba bsil bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar 
[\[219a.2\]]gyur te/_bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig ces sems bskyed 
[\[219a.3\]]do/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mig mi 'gebs par lta ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu 
[\[219a.4\]]mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/lta ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can 
[\[219a.5\]]thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/spyi bos 'thug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed 
[\[219a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang 'thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces 
[\[219a.7\]]sems bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpas sems 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur 
[\[219b.2\]]cig ces sems bskyed do/_/lus myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/gnyid sad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs 
[\[219b.3\]]bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed 
[\[219b.4\]]pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang /_bdud du bcas pa dang /_tshangs par bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang skye dgur bcas pa dang /_lha 
[\[219b.5\]]dang dri za dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so/_/spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/_
[\[219b.6\]]bcu drug pa'o//_//[{D44-17}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa/_/de skad smras nas sems can dri med pa/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs 
[\[219b.7\]]kyis byang chub yon tan rnams/_/sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/_/spyod yul yongs dag rgyal ba'i spyod pa'i rnams/_/bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do/_/yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa/_/rgyal sras rnams la da ni 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]khyod kyis shod/_/bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/_/yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las/_/mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig_/mgo smos tsam du cung zad brjod par bya/_/byang chub don du rang byung 
[\[220a.2\]]'gyur bya zhes/_/thog mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi/_/yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med/_/dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad mi 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la/_/bskal pa bzang por spyad pa ji bzhin smos/_/de dag 
[\[220a.3\]]yon tan chu bo thams cad ni/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur/_/yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/_/dpe tsam cha shas cung tsam brjod par bya/_/mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung /_/sa chen lhun las rdul phran 
[\[220a.4\]]gcig dang 'dra/_/byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems skye ba/_/rgyu med ma yin rkyen las 'byung ba yin/_/rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang /_/dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye/_/de yang 'dod pa'i sred pa rgyal srid dang /_/bdag 
[\[220a.5\]]bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten phan bskyed sems ni yongs su skye/_/de ni sems can rtag tu bde don btang /_/zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur/_/yongs su 
[\[220a.6\]]chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing /_/ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems skye'o/_/rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la/_/dad dang mos dang dga' ba bskyed byas te/_/sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang 
[\[220a.7\]]skye/_/rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas/_/rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te/_/byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing /_/skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o/_/dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/_/yon tan 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]thams cad yongs su skye zhing 'dren/_/nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol/_/dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed/_/dad pa sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/_/nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin/_/dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te/_/lag 
[\[220b.2\]]pa lta bu dge sdud rtsa ba yin/_/yongs su gtong la dad pa dga' bar byed/_/rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed/_/yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed/_/sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed/_/dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang /_/gzhan gyis 
[\[220b.3\]]mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs/_/nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te/_/dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin/_/dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te/_/mi khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed/_/dad pa bdud kyi lam las bzlog pa ste/_/thar lam 
[\[220b.4\]]dam pa yongs su ston pa yin/_/yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin/_/dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par spyod/_/ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed/_/dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin/_/de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la/_/spyod pa rim 
[\[220b.5\]]gyis rnam par brjod par bya/_/chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon/_/rin chen seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no/_/dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/_/de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba/_/de 
[\[220b.6\]]dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan/_/tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste/_/bslab pas sa yi yon tan legs la brtson/_/tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os/_/dad pas 
[\[220b.7\]]sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed/_/rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab/_/dad pas chos la phu dud gang byed pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan/_/rgyal 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa/_/de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos/_/dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa/_/de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/_/mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa/_/de dag dad 
[\[221a.2\]]pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog_/dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa/_/de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno/_/gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba/_/des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/_/gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa/_/de 
[\[221a.3\]]dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin/_/chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba/_/de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su [{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthun ldan/_/bdag nyid che ba rgyu 'thun gang ldan pa/_/de 
[\[221a.4\]]dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thob/_/mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa/_/de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs/_/rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa/_/de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/_/byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa/_/de 
[\[221a.5\]]bzhin drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/_/drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes/_/sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa/_/de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs/_/'du dang 
[\[221a.6\]]'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa/_/de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag_/gang gis dang zhing bsam pa rnam dag pa/_/de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog_/lhag bsam dam pa'i mchog dang su ldan pa/_/de dag rtag tu pha rol 
[\[221a.7\]]phyin la spyod/_/pha rol phyin la rtag tu sus spyod pa/_/de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod/_/theg pa chen po 'di la sus spyod pa/_/de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod/_/nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rjes dran phyed pa med/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs min/_rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma 
[\[221b.2\]]yin/_/de la chos ni nub pa nam yang med/_/gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med 'gyur ba/_/de dag spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang ldan/_/spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa/_/de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas/_/gang gi chos rab bstan pa mtha' 
[\[221b.3\]]yas pa/_/de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshol/_/'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba/_/de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/_/snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su brtan pa/_/de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po dga'/_/chos kyi dga' bas dbang po 
[\[221b.4\]]gang dga' ba/_/de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so/_/'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa/_/de dag nga rgyal rloms sems bag med spangs/_/nga rgyal rloms sems bag med sus spangs pa/_/de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don 
[\[221b.5\]]brtson/_/bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa/_/de dag 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med/_/gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo med pa/_/de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan/_/brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/_/de dag mngon 
[\[221b.6\]]shes rnam dag mngon par skyes/_/gang gi mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa/_/de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs/_/spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa/_/de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas/_/'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas 
[\[221b.7\]]pa/_/de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas/_/'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa/_/de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/_/bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson 'grus pa/_/de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed/_/'gro ba'i don mang 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]mtha' yas su byed pa/_/de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan/_/shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa/_/dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/_/bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa/_/de dag bdud kyi 
[\[222a.2\]]dpung gis thub pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/_/de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das/_/bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su 'das pa/_/de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin/_/mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa/_/de dag 
[\[222a.3\]]mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin/_/mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa/_/'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan/_/'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa/_/de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du gnas/_/rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/_/de dag 
[\[222a.4\]]rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul gsang la mkhas/_/rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul gsang la su mkhas pa/_/de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/_/gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 
[\[222a.5\]]yongs kyis su brgyan pa/_/de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/_/bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa/_/de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/_/gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/_/de dag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/_/
[\[222a.6\]]mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan pa/_/de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris/_/dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa/_/de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so/_/gang gi lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa/_/de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang 
[\[222a.7\]]bsam mi khyab/_/gang la 'od gzer bsam yas rgyan yod pa/_/de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung /_/gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba/_/de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs te/_/ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang /_/don yod 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul/_/gang rnams rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/_/ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang /_/don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed pa/_/de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/_/gang gi mngon 
[\[222b.2\]]shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/_/de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing /_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing ni rnam par spyod/_/gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing /_/bsam yas sems can dga' 
[\[222b.3\]]bar sus byed pa/_/de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na/_/tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul/_/tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus/_/bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba/_/de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/_/
[\[222b.4\]]ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung /_/gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/_/ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab 'byung ba/_/de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar/_/sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston/_/smon lam stobs kyis 
[\[222b.5\]]gang rnams ci dga' bar/_/sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed pa/_/de dag tshig tu brjod cing ci smra yang /_/sgra la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab/_/tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang /_/gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa/_/
[\[222b.6\]]de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/_/bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam par shes/_/gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa/_/de dag skye dang 'chi 'pho nam yang med/_/nyon mongs rgyu 
[\[222b.7\]]ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med/_/skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing /_/nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa/_/de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/_/chos kyis smos par 'jig rten kun tu spyod/_/yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing /_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa/_/de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi/_/pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod/_/gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi/_/pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa/_/
[\[223a.2\]]de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par 'phrul/_/ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob/_/mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing /_/ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa/_/de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/_/dbang 
[\[223a.3\]]bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod/_/gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/_/dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa/_/de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur/_/
[\[223a.4\]]gang rnams spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba/_/de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed/_/gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang 
[\[223a.5\]]zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa/_/dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so/_/dpe med gang gis spyod yul shes bya bar/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus pa/_/de dag brtson 
[\[223a.6\]]'grus thams cad don kyang yod/_/mthong dang ming thos spobs pa'ang don yod do/_/gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing /_/mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod pa/_/skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba yi/_/sbyin pas gnas te 
[\[223a.7\]]thams cad don kyang yod/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag byin mthu yis/_/dam chos tshul ni mi 'jig brten par gnas/_/dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang /_/rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu shing gnas/_/rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pas/_/de yi mthu yis rgya mtsho'i rin chen rnams/_/mi zad 'phel zhing 'grib pa gang yang med/_/de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho/_/sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang yod pa/_/de dag kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/_/
[\[223b.2\]]phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa/_/de dag kun tu chos kyi gter ston to/_/de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_/lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing /_/thabs mang stong gis sems can 
[\[223b.3\]]'dul ba byed/_/de dag skad cig re re byang chub tu/_/rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston/_/'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang /_/sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston/_/mkhas pa de bzhin nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/_/sangs 
[\[223b.4\]]rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa/_/yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su/_/theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul/_/khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus/_/skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen 
[\[223b.5\]]po'i gzugs/_/mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston/_/ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i brgya yi sgo dag nas/_/'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang /_/cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams/_/thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston 
[\[223b.6\]]pa byed/_/de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed/_/de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab/_/sems can 'brel pa'i ye shes mtha' yang yas/_/de dag tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul 
[\[223b.7\]]dang /_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_/bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul dang /_/thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas/_/yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/_/de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin rnams/_/rdul phran kun la mngon par bsgrub byed cing /_/rdul phran rtse gcig 
[\[224a.2\]]bsam yas zhing rnams la/_/ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing dang /_/sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston/_/la la nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang /_/yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/_/zhing 
[\[224a.3\]]rnams la la 'jig cing 'du ba dang /_/la la spyi tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston/_/la la snrel zhi smyig rgyu lta bu ste/_/de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston/_/de dag rdul gcig rtser ston ji bzhin du/_/ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te/_/drang srong ting 
[\[224a.4\]]'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/mtha' yas grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin/_/rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing /_/lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing /_/skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa 
[\[224a.5\]]byed/_/phyogs bcu kun na me tog phreng ba dang /_/spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba/_/de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed/_/na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna 
[\[224a.6\]]tshogs dang /_/gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla re dag_/lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs/_/phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams/_/drang srong che la mchod pa gang 'os pa/_/de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs/_/byang chub shing 
[\[224a.7\]]drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed/_/rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa/_/rnga chen rnga dang pi wang sgra snyan dang /_/rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams/_/de dag lag mthil de nas sgra yang sgrog_/phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi/_/bde gshegs 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang /_/bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrubs pa sna tshogs dang /_/lag mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung /_/de dag 'od gzer las dges yongs bstsags pa/_/lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing /_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[224b.2\]]zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par/_/kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod/_/'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing rgyan ldan pa/_/lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab/_/pad mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs/_/mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod 
[\[224b.3\]]pa byed/_/'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang /_/me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang /_/
[\[224b.4\]]sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang /_/phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od 
[\[224b.5\]]zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/nam bza'i rgyan dang na bza'i bla re dang /_/na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re 
[\[224b.6\]]dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer pad mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/pad mo'i rgyan dang pad mo'i bla re dang /_/pad mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag 
[\[224b.7\]]rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /_/phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang /_/phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing /_/bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing /_/de dag rgyal mtshan dkar 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]dmar ser po dang /_/sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis/_/rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed/_/de dag bde gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog_/rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa/_/dar gyi lda ldi ba dan 
[\[225a.2\]]yongs sbyangs shing /_/dril phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed/_/de dag lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar/_/ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/de 
[\[225a.3\]]dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing /_/bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du/_/thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed/_/la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang /_/sbyin pa bsam gyis 
[\[225a.4\]]mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo/_/bzod pa mi zad mi sgul sgo dag dang /_/la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo/_/bsam gtan rab tu zhir gnas sgo dag dang /_/don dam rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo/_/
[\[225a.5\]]tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang /_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/_/bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang /_/bsod nams yongs su bstsags dang ye shes sgo/_/bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang /_/la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo/_/
[\[225a.6\]]nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang /_/rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo/_/theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang /_/la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo/_/la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang /_/mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo/_/la la 
[\[225a.7\]]zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu/_/'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba/_/de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs de/_/de dag kun gyi chos nyid sgo dag nas/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/_/gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas/_/bsam pa ji 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]bzhin sems can 'dul ba byed/_/de dag mtshan mar bzung bar mi nus te/_/ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o/_/de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyis ting 'dzin mchog_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin byed 'thun/_/dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/_/
[\[225b.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul/_/gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa/_/de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams/_/thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed/_/de dag zas mchog skom 
[\[225b.3\]]dang rgyan mchog dang /_/gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas/_/sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed/_/de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing /_/gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te/_/
[\[225b.4\]]phreng bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bsku byas pa'i/_/gzugs rnams yongs su btang bas sems can 'dul/_/mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la/_/de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes/_/gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing /_/
[\[225b.5\]]gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed/_/de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang /_/ko kil kun la ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang /_/rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras/_/mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston/_/de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/
[\[225b.6\]]gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/_/de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/_/don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te/_/sems can dgos la 
[\[225b.7\]]grogs su 'gyur byas shing /_/grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/_/grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed/_/'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/_/de dag grogs don mi bde nyams su len/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de/_/dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa/_/de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing /_/zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung /_/de dag khyim gyi btson ra srid gnas pa'i/_/
[\[226a.2\]]'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/_/'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/_/mngon par byung zhing thar pa yongs su brjod/_/de dag spyod pa bcu rnams spyod byed cing /_/skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod/_/drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus 
[\[226a.3\]]par/_/yongs su bsgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed/_/gang na sems can tshad med che ldan pa/_/bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa/_/de dag kun tu nad gzer nad bu can/_/bdag la dbang byed tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston/_/'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 
[\[226a.4\]]'bar gyur te/_/gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing /_/rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i/_/'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed/_/de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi/_/chos kyi khyad par [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams kyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[226a.5\]]bdag nyid che ba brjod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/_/de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyis/_/gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing /_/rdzu 
[\[226a.6\]]'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/_/de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyis/_/'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed/_/'jig rten mi chags chu la pad mo bzhin/_/dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod/_/de dag rjod 
[\[226a.7\]]byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed/_/gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/_/mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gad byed pa dang /_/sgyu mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston par byed/_/grong dang grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang /_/ded dpon tshong dpon 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]khyim bdag de bzhin te/_/rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang /_/sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed/_/de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur/_/sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang /_
[\[226b.2\]]lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur/_/'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing /_/sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa/_/de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang /_/sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang brjod pa byed/_/'tshe med 
[\[226b.3\]]gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams/_/sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/_/rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams/_/kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod/_/drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog_/gang la lhar bcas 
[\[226b.4\]]'jig rten dad gyur dang /_/brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' ba mchog gi rnams/_/kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par byed/_/de dag rgyud dang kun rgyu mu stegs can/_/dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang /_/sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la/_/mu stegs 
[\[226b.5\]]can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed/_/de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang /_/bla na yod dang bla na med pa rnams/_/ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/de dag du yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur/_/nyi ma'i rjes spyad dka' thub lnga ldan dang /_/khyi dang ba 
[\[226b.6\]]lang brtul zhugs [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]spyod/_/gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams/_/de dag kun na'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/_/lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang /_/mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang /_/rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i 
[\[226b.7\]]rnams/_/chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur/_/gnas brteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang /_/tsher ma rtswa dang thal ba'i mal can dang /_/dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams/_/de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas nas/_/bsgrub dka' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyi/_/mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spangs pas 'dul/_/'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes 
[\[227a.2\]]byas nas/_/lta ba ngan la zhen pa'i mu stegs can/_/kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis/_/bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed/_/la la dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu/_/shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston/_/la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig 
[\[227a.3\]]gis/_/la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis/_/la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang /_/don des rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang /_/rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang /_/bstan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang /_/kun 
[\[227a.4\]]la 'jug pa'i tshig des tshig rnams dang /_/la la dag la lha'i tshig des tshig dang /_/klu yi tshig des gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis/_/la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang /_/dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig_/mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis/_/bden pa bstan cing thar par 
[\[227a.5\]]'dren pa byed/_/de dag bden pa'i tshig des tshul shes bzhin/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/_/chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/_/de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/_/'gro ba 
[\[227a.6\]]kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing /_/'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/_/'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul/_/'od zer mthong na legs pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/_/de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/_/
[\[227a.7\]]bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/_/sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas/_/dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te/_/rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na/_/des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer grub/_/lha yi 'od zer zil 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]gyis gnon pa yi/_/'od zer 'od byed rab tu dgye byas shing /_/mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bstsal te/_/'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang /_/'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba/_/de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin/_/
[\[227b.2\]]rgyal ba mchod phyir [{]mye [,]me [}]mar bzung byas pas/_/'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang /_/shing dang rtswa dang smig ma spa yi sgron/_/spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag_/rgyal ba rnam gsol 'od byed de thob bo/_/'od 
[\[227b.3\]]zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/de dag sred pa rnam yangs sred pa'i mtshor/_/sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon/_/gang rnams sred pa'i rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor/_/sems can bsgral phyir go cha 
[\[227b.4\]]brtan gyon pa/_/de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed/_/mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston/_/stegs dang zam pa gcig smin byas pa dang /_/chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te/_/'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na/_/des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub 
[\[227b.5\]]bo/_/'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing /_/chos kyis rnam grol ro la don du gnyer/_/'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/_/chos kyis grol 
[\[227b.6\]]ba'i ro la don gnyer bas/_/sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel/_/rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lu ma dang /_/mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/_/'dod pa rnams smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na/_/
[\[227b.7\]]skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub po/_/'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/_/rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/_/thugs rje mnga' rnams sku 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/_/pad mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na/_/dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des grub bo/_/'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can 
[\[228a.2\]]ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'/_/chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste/_/chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas/_/sangs rgyas chos dang de 
[\[228a.3\]]bzhin dge 'dun dang /_/rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/_/sems can mang po bskul zhing dran byas te/_/byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na/_/des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub/_/
[\[228a.4\]]'od zer bsod nams bstsags pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing /_/sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong /_/de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe/_/slongs mo pa yi bsam pa 
[\[228a.5\]]rdzogs byas te/_/bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na/_/des ni 'od zer bsod nams bstsags grub bo/_/'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi/_/chos kyi sgo 
[\[228a.6\]]rnams yud kyis rjes dran nas/_/chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de/_/des rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing /_/chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pa nas/_/des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/_/'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing /_/sems can 
[\[228a.7\]]ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba/_/rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug_/bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/_/sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos/_/rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams/_/bstan pas shes 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rab sgron ma de grub po/_/'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/mi zad gzugs kyi bang mdzod rnams thob cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/_/chos 'chad rnams la yongs su 
[\[228b.2\]]phan btags te/_/drang srong rnams la chos kyi bsrung byas shing /_/'gro ba kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas/_/'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul de grub po/_/'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba/_/skyid pa mi 
[\[228b.3\]]brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas/_/de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur/_/'jungs pa gdul dka'i sems can ma dul dang /_/nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas/_/gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des 
[\[228b.4\]]bsgrub po/_/'od zer yongs su gdung med rab bkye zhing /_/tshul ngan sems can ci snyed des bskul ba/_/tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te/_/rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/_/dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang /_/tshul 
[\[228b.5\]]khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul zhing /_/byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas/_/yongs su gdung med 'od zer de grub po/_/bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing /_/mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/_/khro ba'i tha 
[\[228b.6\]]ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing /_/de dag bzod mos rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te/_/byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing /_/bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas/_/des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub 
[\[228b.7\]]po/_/'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/le lo'i sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/_/rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/rigs par brtson par dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/_/de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te/_/myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob/_/sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te/_/dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas 
[\[229a.2\]]nas/_/tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs su bzung /_/des ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub po/_/'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing /_/rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/_/de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/nyams su mi 
[\[229a.3\]]gnod mnyam bzhag sems su gyur/_/sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang /_/'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/_/bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas/_/des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub po/_/'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan 
[\[229a.4\]]rab bkye zhing /_/shes rab 'chal pa ji snyed des bskul pa/_/bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang /_/dbang po'i rgyus la rtog par shes gyur cing /_/nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/_/shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[229a.5\]]rgyal srid nor dang bdag phongs yongs btang ste/_/byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba/_/de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas/_/shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub po/_/'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 
[\[229a.6\]]'od zer des bskul ba/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang /_/pad mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong /_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[229a.7\]]stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/_/sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub po/_/'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing /_/'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa/_/'byung po gza' dang bsad cing brdeg pa dang /_/nad kyis 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'jigs pa kun las rab tu grol/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyabs pa dang /_/srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing /_/'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas/_/'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub po/_/
[\[229b.2\]]'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing /_/nad pa na ba ji snyed des reg pa/_/thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par 'grol/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/_/nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang /_/rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang /_/
[\[229b.3\]]bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang /_/'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub po/_/'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing /_/tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 
[\[229b.4\]]'gro/_/'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/_/dga' 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bsten byas shing /_/'chi ka sangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas pas/_/sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob po/_/'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing /_/
[\[229b.5\]]sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/chos nyan brjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed/_/chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de/_/chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing /_/mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis 
[\[229b.6\]]zhes/_/brjod pa chos rab brjod pa des thob po/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag_/kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/_/gsal ba'i 
[\[229b.7\]]dbyangs sgrar drang srong cher brjod de/_/rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams/_/'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du/_/yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob/_/'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/bag 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len/_/'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/_/sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang /_/'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes/_/
[\[230a.2\]]brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo/_/'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang /_/shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams las nyan/_/tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 
[\[230a.3\]]'dzin 'phags pa ste/_/shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes/_/byang chub don du bsngags shing bstod byas pas/_/des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob/_/'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/
[\[230a.4\]]rin chen gter mang mi zad thob gyur te/_/drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la/_/rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin btang bas/_/rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub/_/
[\[230a.5\]]'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/_/mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/_/mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/_/mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/_/
[\[230a.6\]]spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag_/byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub/_/'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog_/rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis/_/pho brang dam pa 
[\[230a.7\]]yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs/_/sngon chad rgyal ba rol mos bstsu byas te/_/me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis/_/mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub bo/_/'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing /_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/_/mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/_/des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub/_/'od zer chen po sprin ldan rab bkye zhing /_/spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas/_/mchod rten gam yo spos 
[\[230b.2\]]chus yongs btab pas/_/'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob/_/'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing /_/gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag_/yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub/_/
[\[230b.3\]]'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing /_/bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur/_/zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams/_/byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob/_/'od zer nor ston rab tu dgye byas shing /_/phongs pa rin chen gter rnams 
[\[230b.4\]]thob par 'gyur/_/gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum/_/gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo/_/'od zer mig sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs 'thob 'gyur/_/rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/mar me 
[\[230b.5\]]gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/_/rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing /_/rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam sbyong thob/_/'od zer sna sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/sngon 
[\[230b.6\]]chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/_/'od zer lce sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas ston/_/mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnam spangs te/_/'jam 
[\[230b.7\]]par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/_/'od zer lus sbyong rab tu bkye byas shing /_/dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/lus kyis rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob/_/'od zer sems sbyong rab tu bkye byas shing /_/myos pa 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gror rab byas pas/_/des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub po/_/'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/bsam yas sku mnga' mi'i dbang po mthong /_/
[\[231a.2\]]sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang /_/mchod rten rgyas byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur/_/'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu bkye byas shing /_/sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes/_/rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra'o zhes/_/sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po/_/'od 
[\[231a.3\]]zer dri sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/_/spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag_/khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin/_/'od zer bro mchog rab tu dgye byas shing /_/dug can dug [{]myed [,]med [}]ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/
[\[231a.4\]]sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/_/bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/_/'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing /_/reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur/_/tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char/_/phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 
[\[231a.5\]]'gyur/_/gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams/_/rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du bting bkram ste/_/me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang /_/phreng ba bla re gsol bas 'od de yin/_/'od zer chos spyod rab tu dgye byas shing /_/ba spu kun 
[\[231a.6\]]nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i/_/bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur/_/mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed/_/rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te/_/chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du 
[\[231a.7\]]rtag gnas shes/_/brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob po/_/'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/_/drang srong rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer byung /_/kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no/_/ji ltar ba spu gcig 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]sgo sgo gcig_/'od zer gang+gA'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba/_/de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub 'gyur ba'i/_/yon tan de la bstang grogs sus byas pa/_/de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung /_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/
[\[231b.2\]]de dag bsod nams bstang grogs byas pa la/_/rjes su yi rangs smon lam sus btab pa/_/gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/_/de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes/_/gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te/_/sangs rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan 
[\[231b.3\]]'dod cing don gnyer ba/_/de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/_/dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang /_/de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char/_/mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/_/kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug_/
[\[231b.4\]]de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang /_/med pa ma yin kun tu 'phro ba ste/_/de dag mos pa log pas mnar ba yi/_/phal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mod/_/rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang /_/rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa rnams/_/
[\[231b.5\]]de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi/_/nyon mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min/_/gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te/_/dad la yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na/_/bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du/_/mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed/_/de dag 
[\[231b.6\]]'khor gyi rgyan du rnam 'phrul bas/_/ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing /_/phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi/_/rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed/_/de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam/_/'od kyi rnam brgyan byin gyis brlabs byas shing /_/
[\[231b.7\]]lus gcig skyil mo krung gi pad+mo de/_/yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul/_/de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad mo gzhan/_/'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing /_/rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ting 'dzin med par spyod/_/drang srong des ni yongs su smin byas te/_/rgyal ba'i legs pa yongs su gang bsgrubs pa/_/de dag pad mo chen po 'khor byed cing /_/kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta/_/skyes bu chen po'i chos 
[\[232a.2\]]nyid de 'dra ste/_/gang rnams ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa/_/kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te/_/zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin/_/de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing /_/sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa/_/
[\[232a.3\]]de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon sgrub cing /_/phyogs kyi dra ba snrel zhir spyod pa byed/_/la la mnyam bzhag la la nam langs par/_/rang rang lus kyang 
[\[232a.4\]]phyogs rnams kun tu ston/_/de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing /_/dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang /_/nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing /_/shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang /_/de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de/_/phyogs 
[\[232a.5\]]rnams gzhan tu mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan nas ldang /_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/shar phyogs zhing grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi_/spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la/_/
[\[232a.6\]]zhi bar rnam par spyod pa de dag snang /_/der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/_/nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams/_/langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/_/mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang /_/nub kyi zhing grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/
[\[232a.7\]]ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi/_/spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la/_/zhi bar rnam par spyod pa de dag snang /_/der ni mnyam bzhag sems can brtan byas nas/_/shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams/_/langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang /_/phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste/_/phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo rnams/_/la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam par longs/_/'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang /_/de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[232b.2\]]bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang /_/'jig rten lhar bcas mos par 'gyur ba yi/_/bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang ston par byed/_/gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang /_/mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin 
[\[232b.3\]]te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/_/de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid che ba sgra yi lam las ldang /_/sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du shes/_/'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/_/sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang 
[\[232b.4\]]ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang /_/rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/_/de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid che ba dri yi lam las ldang /_/dri rab mchog la 'jug par rab tu zhugs/_/'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 
[\[232b.5\]]'gyur/_/dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang ldan pa sna yi lam las ldang /_/sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/_/de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang bar byed/_/bdag 
[\[232b.6\]]nyid che ba de dag blo mchog shes/_/'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/_/bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang ldan pa lce yi lam las ldang /_/lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/_/de dag lus kyi 
[\[232b.7\]]lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid che ba reg pa'i lam las ldang /_/'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i reg la zhugs/_/'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/_/reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ldang /_/lus ni ma byung ma skyes rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed/_/de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang /_/chos sgrub 'jug par bya la rab tu zhugs/_/'jig rten lhar 
[\[233a.2\]]bcas de la mos par 'gyur/_/chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang /_/sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed/_/byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/gzhon nu 
[\[233a.3\]]dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang /_/gzhon nu dar la bab par mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgan zhing 'khog pa'i lus su rnam par ldang /_/rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus su rnam par ldang /_/dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/
[\[233a.4\]]dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang /_/dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/dge slong ma yi lus su rnam par ldang /_/dge slong ma yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus su ldang /_/dge slong mang thos lus la 
[\[233a.5\]]mnyam bzhag cing /_/slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang /_/slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang /_/rang rgyal lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam par ldang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[233a.6\]]sku mchog phul la mnyam bzhag cing /_/lha yi lus su de dag rnam par ldang /_/lha yi lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/'phrul chen klu yi lus su rnam par ldang /_/'phrul chen klu yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam 
[\[233a.7\]]par ldang /_/'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par ldang /_/'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing /_/spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang /_/spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas mnyam bzhag cing /_/spu rtse kun 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang /_/spu rtse kun gyi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing /_/skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang /_/skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas mnyam bzhag cing /_/skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang /_/skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing /_/rdul phran gcig las de dag rnam 
[\[233b.2\]]par ldang /_/rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang /_/rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang /_/rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing /_/rin chen shing gi 
[\[233b.3\]]'bras las rnam par ldang /_/rin chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni rnam par ldang /_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang /_/rgya mtsho chu klung kun nas mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag 
[\[233b.4\]]nyid che ba me yi lam las ldang /_/me yi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang /_/rlung gi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing /_/bdag nyid che bas yi ge zhi las ldang /_/sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/lha yi gzhal 
[\[233b.5\]]med khang nas rnam par ldang /_/lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam bzhag cing /_/dran dang ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang /_/yon tan mtha' yas bstsags pa de dag gi_/ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bskal pa bsam yas su/_/
[\[233b.6\]]bstan par mdzad kyang zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang /_/bsam gtan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/de dag kun la'ang dpe bstan brjod 
[\[233b.7\]]par bya/_/de la 'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te/_/mkhas shing gsal ba'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/_/bstan na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur/_/sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i/_/nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur/_/mang por gyur cing de 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bzhin gcig gyur te/_/nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar/_/'og nas me 'bar steng nas chu'i rgyun/_/steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu'i rgyun/_/'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te/_/skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/de ni snying rje chen po 
[\[234a.2\]]ldan ma yin/_/byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog_/'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ston/_/'jig rten phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston/_/nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang /_/ldeng ka khron pa rin 
[\[234a.3\]]chen rgya mtsho'i snod/_/chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston pa byed/_/de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang /_/skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal/_/mtsho 
[\[234a.4\]]gsal dang bar yan lag bzhi'i dpung /_/so so rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong /_/ral gri shang lang sogs ka mde'u thung mda'/_/bzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas pa mthong /_/gang gi gzugs dang cha byad ci 'dra ba/_/chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong /_/
[\[234a.5\]]chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa/_/sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa rnams/_/de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyangs tshul shes/_/sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod/_/dbyangs 
[\[234a.6\]]ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can/_/'on kyang sgra dbyangs las kyi tshul la mkhas/_/gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob pa/_/'jig rten lhar bcas ci phyir mgur mi byed/_/dga' byed chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo/_/tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung 
[\[234a.7\]]ba ste/_/dam tshig bden bsgrub mi 'tshe dga' ba yin/_/sems yid dag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed/_/sgra snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can/_/brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang /_/'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed/_/ye shes 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]yon tan mang ba cir mi ston/_/sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma mkhan po yang /_/sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed/_/nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang /_/khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/_/'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po 
[\[234b.2\]]yang /_/sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed/_/bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab byang ba/_/spyod pa tshul mkhas ci phyir dga' mi byed/_/lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/_/lha min lha yang rung ste gang pham pa/_/de dag bzhon pa 
[\[234b.3\]]theg pa gdugs bcas par/_/go ca gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer/_/lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang /_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ston/_/dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul gnas pa'i dpa' bo rnams/_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston 
[\[234b.4\]]mi byed/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa/_/'phrul chen glang po'i dbang po'i 'khor gyur pa/_/mgo mang sum bcu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed/_/mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/_/so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams/_/bdun 
[\[234b.5\]]bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed/_/rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad mo rnams/_/bdun bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/_/pad mo rer yang lha yi bu mo dag_/sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/_/sum 
[\[234b.6\]]cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/_/glang po de yang glang po'i lus btang zhing /_/lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang mthun/_/glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos/_/de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti 
[\[234b.7\]]mug can/_/'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/_/shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang gyur rnams/_/ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ji rob 'phrul mi byed/_/sgra gcan ci dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na/_/rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing /_/rgya mtsho'i zab ring 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]lte bar phyin tsam byed/_/ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/_/de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/_/'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/_/'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs 'dul ba/_/rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ji rob ston mi byed/_/bsam 
[\[235a.2\]]yas brgya byin 'phrul la'ang ltos shig dang /_/lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe/_/lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed pa/_/de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed/_/lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis/_/brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/_/de ni rdo rje 'chang bas gzung 
[\[235a.3\]]'gyur ces/_/lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo rmongs so/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mig stong rab bstan te/_/rdo rje me lce 'bar ba rab gzas shing /_/lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i/_/brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/_/de'i bsod nams phal gyi 
[\[235a.4\]]stobs dang mthus/_/lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i/_/bsod nams mi zad rnams ko cir mi 'phrul/_/lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yod pa/_/lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung /_/lha rnams bag med spyod 
[\[235a.5\]]par shes gyur nas/_/mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog_/'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan te/_/'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin/_/srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos/_/bag med thams cad gcugs can mya 
[\[235a.6\]]ngan ldan/_/tshems kyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin/_/ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa rnams/_/bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin/_/yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngal rtsa/_/skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 
[\[235a.7\]]mthar zad rang bzhin gyis/_/chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis/_/brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas/_/kun kyang chos bzang mdun sar dong phyin te/_/lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams/_/'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]brjod/_/rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang /_/don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na/_/bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/_/'gro ba kun gyi don chen cir [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_/lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe/_/lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/_/lha 
[\[235b.2\]]rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog_/lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog_/rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga' ba skye/_/'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur/_/lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur nas/_/de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 
[\[235b.3\]]'byer/_/de bzhin rnga 'dra 'jigs med stobs pa'i rnams/_/'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung gyur te/_/bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can/_/zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab tu sel/_/dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te/_/dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' 
[\[235b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/_/gcig ltas lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/_/lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang /_/chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug_/lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang /_/brgya byin skad cig 
[\[235b.5\]]gcig gis rnam par 'phrul/_/brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/_/sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/_/'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci'i phyir/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed/_/bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang bsgyur ba/_/de yi dbang 
[\[235b.6\]]du sems can 'di kun 'dong /_/las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis/_/so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrugs des kyang bcings/_/de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/_/'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na/_/dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ji rob ste/_/'gro ba thams 
[\[235b.7\]]cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog_/stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang /_/stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na/_/ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang /_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog_/de ni 'jig rten pa yi lam gyis ni/_/bsam 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul/_/'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi/_/bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul/_/dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos/_/rgya mtshor sprin gyi char rnams rab bkye 
[\[236a.2\]]ba/_/skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'grang ba byed/_/thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus nges shes na/_/bskal pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab tshul bslabs te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams/_/ji rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/_/skad cig gcig la sems bsam 
[\[236a.3\]]shes mi 'gyur/_/sems can las smin bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas/_/rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung /_/rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang /_/sa bon rnams mang kun kyang de las byung /_/rlung las sprin byung char pa kun tu 'bab/_/sprin mang zhi bar 
[\[236a.4\]]'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur/_/lo tog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te/_/'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed/_/de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslabs te/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs min na'ang /_/'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na/_/
[\[236a.5\]]rang nyams thob pa ji rob ston mi byed/_/rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/_/bya skad rnams dang ji snyed [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skad/_/khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad/_/thams cad skad bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog_/de bzhin sgra brnyan rang bzhin sgra shes 
[\[236a.6\]]nas/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas/_/'gro ba kun tu sgra brnyan brjod byas shing /_/'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgras tshim byed/_/rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing /_/chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi 
[\[236a.7\]]zad/_/chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med/_/de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar stsal te/_/bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes/_/shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun/_/bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med/_/rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]par rtse byed na/_/sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/_/gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs/_/de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan/_/de ni dbang bsgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi_/gser gyi mdog du sprin mang rnam par bsgrubs/_/'phrul dga' mu 
[\[236b.2\]]tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/_/dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog_/mtshe mar mthon ting bai D+'uR+Ya yi mdog_/sum cu gsum du a sma gar b+ha 'dra/_/rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/_/rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro/_/mi yi gnas su spos mchog 'dres 
[\[236b.3\]]par te/_/klu yi gnas su pad mo'i mdog lta bu/_/gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog_/ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su'o/_/byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te/_/gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te/_/sprin rnams 
[\[236b.4\]]gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin/_/dbang sgyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan nas/_/nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/_/'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang /_/dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston/_/kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar 
[\[236b.5\]]te/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu/_/rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog_/mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]ci'i gnas su mthon ting bai D+'uR+Ya/_/klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog_/gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog 
[\[236b.6\]]ste/_/a sma'i mdog du lha min gnas su'o/_/byang du ngang gis snang ba'i rin chen mdog_/gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an+da rnyil/_/sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul mthun klog kyang 'gyed/_/de ni tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gnas 
[\[236b.7\]]su tshangs dbyangs su/_/'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dgar rnga yi dbyangs/_/rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste/_/lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu'o/_/sum cu gsum du mi ci'i skad du ste/_/rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du'o/_/ri 'thab dbyangs 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]su rgya mtsho kun tu ste/_/mi 'am ci'i gnas su gling bu'i sgra/_/klu yi gnas su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra/_/gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/_/lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra/_/rgya mtsho'i shugs sgras mi yi gnas 
[\[237a.2\]]su'o/_/dbang bsgyur gnas su lha rdzas bsung zhim pa'i/_/me tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs/_/zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te/_/me tog man+da ra ba'i phreng char 'bebs/_/dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po'i char/_/rgyan gyi 
[\[237a.3\]]dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang /_/gser 'od bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs/_/rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang /_/phreng ba byug pa rgyan gyi dam pa dang /_/mu tig dmar po la ltar 
[\[237a.4\]]btags mdog tu/_/rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs/_/sum cu gsum du rin chen sna tshogs te/_/tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang a ga ru/_/gur gum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la/_/spos chu'i rgyan dang me tog 'dres par 'bebs/_/nyam du 'gyur ba'i 
[\[237a.5\]]kha zas skom gyi rnams/_/kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang /_/de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang /_/rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs/_/de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun tu yang /_/char rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam/_/mi zad rin chen 
[\[237a.6\]]shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i/_/rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun tu 'bab/_/mi ci'i gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang /_/pad+mo ut+pal dngos dang rin chen dang /_/me tog par shi ma la'i phye ma spos/_/pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro/_/klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po 
[\[237a.7\]]ste/_/gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dang snang ba/_/lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung /_/dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so/_/byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang /_/me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i/_/phreng ba bzang po kun ran mug ta ka/_/gling rnams 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so/_/'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dong rab gsal gyi/_/char rnams sna tshogs shin tu phra bar 'bebs/_/me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing /_/lo las de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed/_/de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dang /_/
[\[237b.2\]]glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnams byed kyang /_/khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/_/klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab/_/de ltar chu yi rgya mtsho gnas pa yang /_/klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag_/
[\[237b.3\]]mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang por cir mi ston/_/dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam/_/skyes bu de dag brjod byas yangs pa ste/_/dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral/_/de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sgyur ro/_/mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can/_/ma nor blo 
[\[237b.4\]]gros mtha' yas blo gros can/_/ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i/_/rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad/_/gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas/_/yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni/_/ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te/_/mi yul kun na de ni dga' ba 
[\[237b.5\]]byed/_/'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa/_/so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon/_/dge bstsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni/_/rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur/_/gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i/_/mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste/_/
[\[237b.6\]]de bas rang rgyal theg la dad pa dkon/_/theg chen dad byed de bas shin tu dkon/_/theg chen 'di la zhugs pa med pa ste/_/'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon/_/'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te/_/yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/_/la la stong gsum 
[\[237b.7\]]ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang /_/'di 'dra'i chos la dad par byed pa las/_/de 'dra dka' bar rtsi ba ma yin no/_/la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur na'ang /_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/_/bsod nams ci 'dra thob pa de la min/_/la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa/_/lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang /_/'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/_/
[\[238a.2\]]dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min/_/la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang /_/'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/_/bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/_/la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/_/
[\[238a.3\]]bskal par bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkur te/_/la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas na/_/bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags/_/rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par 'gyur/_/lha dang 
[\[238a.4\]]bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan/_/'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/_/thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te/_/phyag [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]tha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa/_/bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag 
[\[238a.5\]]par gyur/_/phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/_/sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod pa/_/rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyis/_/legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so/_/bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/_bcu bdun 
[\[238a.6\]]pa'o//_//[{D44-18}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_
[\[238a.7\]]byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gling bzhi pa 'di 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes 
[\[238b.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma brtul bar byang chub kyi shing gi drung du ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba ga la ba der gshegs par snang ngo /_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i/_
[\[238b.3\]]ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba/_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/_byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam 
[\[238b.4\]]par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin seng ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can pog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba stong 
[\[238b.5\]]phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/_gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa/_gdugs stong phrag bcu shin tu bzung ba dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu spyangs pa/_mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag bcu dga' dga' ltar byas pa/_gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab
