[\[238b.6\]]pa/_lha'i bu mo stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/_tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/_'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so/_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal bar lha'i dbang 
[\[238b.7\]]po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu 'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas/_zhe sa dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/_/bde 
[\[239a.2\]]bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas/_rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so/_/
[\[239a.3\]]de ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thams cad du glu dang rol mo dang /_sil snyan brgya 
[\[239a.4\]]phrag mang po dag btang ste/_zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srungs rigs 
[\[239a.5\]]skyes pa/_/rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/_/rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs 
[\[239a.6\]]gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/_/rtse mo mchog du gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/_/
[\[239a.7\]]mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/_/rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/_/rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan pa de/_/
[\[239b.2\]]ma la ya'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/_/dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis 
[\[239b.3\]]dam pa gang zhig gis/_/grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla/_/dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de/_/'od zer dra bar gshegs 
[\[239b.4\]]gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glur blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[239b.5\]]mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas 
[\[239b.6\]]te bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_rnam par rgyal ba'i 
[\[239b.7\]]khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang /_lha'i ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/_'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na'ang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtser gshegs pa'i le'u ste/[ {]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]{D44-19}]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/_byang 
[\[240a.2\]]chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang /_thams cad blo gros dang /_
[\[240a.3\]]dpal gyi blo gros dang /_yon tan blo gros dang /_brtson 'grus blo gros dang /_dge ba'i blo gros dang /_ye shes blo gros dang /_bden pa'i blo gros dang /_mchog gi blo gros dang /_dam pa'i blo gros dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[240a.4\]]khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/_'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang /_pad mo'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i me tog dang /_ut+pa la'i me tog dang /_rdo rje'i me tog dang /_spos kyi me tog dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang /_'od zer gyi me tog dang /_ldum 
[\[240a.5\]]bu'i me tog dang /_nam mkha'i me tog dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang /_zla ba ma nyams pa dang /_zla ba mi g.yo ba dang /_
[\[240a.6\]]zla ba mi sgul ba dang /_zla ba chu'i lha dang /_zla ba thogs pa med pa dang /_zla ba'i 'od zer dang /_zla ba rdul med pa dang /_zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[240a.7\]]phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/_seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]lhags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go_/'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go_/de bzhin 
[\[240b.2\]]gshegs pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkye ste/_phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 
[\[240b.3\]]bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang /_ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas byang 
[\[240b.4\]]chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/snang ba dri ma med la ltos/_/ri rab rtse mo thams cad la/_/mgon po dag ni rab tu snang /_/rnam par rgyal ba kun 
[\[240b.5\]]na bzhugs/_/lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/_/spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gi_/rab tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod/_/kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags/_/phyogs 
[\[240b.6\]]bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing /_/yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod/_/kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de/_/ji ltar ded la btags pa bzhin/_/'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang /_/de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/_/
[\[240b.7\]]drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de/_/de na tshangs spyod bla med la/_/the tsom med par de dag spyod/_/kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig_/drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/_/'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na/_/rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs snyam byed/_/bdag 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]cag rnams ni 'di snyam du/_/ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam/_/'jig rten khams ni kun na yang /_/sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re che/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/_/byang chub mchog tu sems btang 
[\[241a.2\]]zhing /_/de dag smon lam 'di btab ste/_/byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod/_/kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas/_/gang zag mchog ni bskyod byed kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te/_/de dag sus kyang mi shes so/_/gang gis 'jig rten mun bstsal zhing /_/
[\[241a.3\]]thams cad dus su rnam snang ba/_/de la 'dra ba gang yang med/_/de ni shes par ji ltar rung /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas 
[\[241a.4\]]kyang /_/bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te/_/'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gis/_/chos nyid de ni shes pa min/_/mtshan ma dag la spyod pa rnams/_/gti mug dra ba 'phel bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba/_/'khor ba'i btson rar mdongs pa 
[\[241a.5\]]yin/_/chos rnams 'di dag brtag byas na/_/rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste/_/skye dang shi 'phos gyur pa rnams/_/ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin/_/chos rnams gang yang 'gro ba med/_/gang yang de bzhin skye ba med/_/chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na/_/sangs 
[\[241a.6\]]rgyas kun na rab tu snang /_/gzung du med cing bltar med cing /_/chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med/_/dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na/_/sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang med/_/tshad med pa yi chos rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa/_/de ni ci zhig 
[\[241a.7\]]yod ces par/_/mthong bar gyur pa gang yang med/_/gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba/_/de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de/_/de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo /_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i thub pa rnams/_/mtshan rab 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]kun dang ldan pa ste/_/mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin/_/chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med/_/la la dag gi chos nyid shes/_/la la dag ni chos kyang brjod/_/gang la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i/_/yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[241b.2\]]'di/_/chos kyi blo gros 'di brjod do/_/de thos nas kyang bdag cag gis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[241b.3\]]bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i/_/ye shes shes rab shin tu che/_/de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs/_/sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis/_/byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas/_/de phyir 
[\[241b.4\]]'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab chung ba thams cad ni/_/phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas/_/phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo /_/dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni/_/bdag gi dngos 
[\[241b.5\]]shes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad shes gyis shing /_/rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos/_/sngon chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du/_/ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba/_/ma 'ongs pa yi tshul shes pas/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/_/ji ltar snang ba med pa yi/_/mun pa'i nang na 
[\[241b.6\]]gzugs mi snang /_/de bzhin chos rnams bshad pa ni/_/mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo /_/ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis/_/gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba/_/de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pas/_/sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar nyi ma 
[\[241b.7\]]bsgribs med pa/_/rab rib can gyi mi mthong ba/_/de bzhin phug na gnas sems kyis/_/sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo /_/de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/_/chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis/_/'od mdzad 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]rab tu mthong ma yin/_/ji ltar sngon blos kun bshad cing /_/bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mi bsnyengs pa/_/rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[242a.2\]]kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gnas med pa yi chos rnams la/_/gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na/_/de phyir srid pa'i btson ra na/_/byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor/_/brjod pas brjod du mi 
[\[242a.3\]]rung chos/_/blo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags/_/des ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas/_/bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byas/_/shes rab chung la lam nor cing /_/bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa/_/phyin ci log gi blo dag gis/_/mi bzad lus ni 
[\[242a.4\]]'phel bar byed/_/gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba/_/de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga /_/chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/mig kyang de la yod pa min/_/de bas mig ni sbyang bar gyis/_/bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par sems/_/gang phyir bdag cag 
[\[242a.5\]]sngon cad du/_/bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos/_/yang dag sangs rgyas mthong de 'ang /_/gang gi sems la chags med pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i/_/chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong /_/gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba/_/chos su bde gshegs 
[\[242a.6\]]mthong ba rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten mig can te/_/gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya/_/lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni/_/chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste/_/lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na/_/thams cad mthong ba med pa yin/_/kye ma chos kyi 
[\[242a.7\]]chos nyid ni/_/yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/_/de ni rang bzhin thams cad du/_/shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/_/dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te/_/de las bdag gis thos nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yi/_/mig ni shin tu 'khrul ba yin/_/'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste/_/sangs rgyas la ni log 
[\[242b.2\]]mi mnga'/_/gang gis log par shes gyur te/_/yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la/_/yang dag ma yin bden shes na/_/sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin/_/mthong ba dag gis dri mar 'gyur/_/rnam par mthong na de med de/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral/_/de 
[\[242b.3\]]bas rnam par gzigs shes bya/_/de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste/_/'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags/_/'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na/_/snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni/_/'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste/_/yang dag ji bzhin bsam 
[\[242b.4\]]byas shing /_/de ltar mthong ba mthong ba'o/_/de ltar mthong ba nyon mongs med/_/dbang du gyur cing zag pa med/_/gang gis tha dad med mthong ba/_/dngos por brtags pa ma yin no/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste/_/de dag yod pa ma yin 
[\[242b.5\]]pas/_/rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin/_/de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag_/nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med/_/de dag la ni ston pa med/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos/_/chos rnams la ni mos [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_/chos kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing /_/
[\[242b.6\]]shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa/_/des ni thub chen mthong ba yin/_/ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa/_/de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong /_/de mthong bas na 'du byed kun/_/rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par zhi/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis 
[\[242b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kye ma sangs rgyas dpal chen rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do/_/rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'/_/'jig rten mthar phyin brgal ba'o/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar/_/bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas/_/ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin/_/'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs/_/'du byed thams cad skad cig ma/_/so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs/_/nam mkha'i khams ni 
[\[243a.2\]]gzung byas shing /_/de dag de phyir khom pa med/_/khom pa med ces bya ba ni/_/ci yang brjod pa med pa ste/_/khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/khom pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab thob/_/gang la dngos po med pa yi/_/mi zad khom pa med par bshad/_/yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na/_/
[\[243a.3\]]des ni grags chen mthong ba yin/_/mthong ba med pa mthong zhes bya/_/yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya/_/mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni/_/ma bsgoms na ni rnam par bsgoms/_/ji ltar lta ba sus mthong ba/_/de dag gis ni lta ba bshig_/gang las sangs rgyas smos pa yi/_/de dag chos 
[\[243a.4\]]rnams zhig pa med/_/ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba/_/de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed/_/rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/_/chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan/_/des ni brtson blo brtan pa de/_/
[\[243a.5\]]chos mang bye ba rab tu ston/_/yod dang med pa shes bya ste/_/gang gis 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/_/yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par 
[\[243a.6\]]bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/_/snang ba bdag cag shes par gyur/_/phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi/_/yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong /_/sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa/_/de ni sems can g.yang sa 
[\[243a.7\]]ste/_/'di la ci yang yod pa min/_/tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o/_/byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams/_/bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la/_/sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med/_/yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing /_/gang rnams mig 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]yod ma yin pa/_/de dag bskal ba grangs med du/_/srid pa'i gang chen mtsho na 'khor/_/nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad/_/nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang /_/rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo /_/'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[243b.2\]]pa brjod pa yin/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa/_/bla ma dag ni mi shes so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di/_/'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can/_/de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/_/tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar/_/gang gis zhi ba 
[\[243b.3\]]shes gyur pa/_/des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i/_/yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong /_/chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa yin/_/rab tu brjod pa bstan pa med/_/'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du lta/_/rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam/_/yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/_/
[\[243b.4\]]thog ma dag dang tha mar yang /_/'gal med rtsa ba med pas na/_/de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs 
[\[243b.5\]]rgyas rnams ni mnyam pa'i phyir/_/bskal pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab par/_/sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla/_/de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab/_/ci phyir zhe na bskal pa rnams/_/grangs med sdug bsngal sngan cad byung /_/'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas/_/bdag cag 
[\[243b.6\]]'khor las ma grol lo/_/de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams/_/yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te/_/gang la 'grogs pa med pa rnams/_/de dag byang chub bla na med/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa/_/sngon cad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos/_/
[\[243b.7\]]de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du/_/gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa ni/_/de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa/_/yang dag blta bas shin tu mthong /_/yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs/_/yang dag min par yang dag min/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya/_/khong du ma chud chos bstan te/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bsgom pa ste/_/gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no/_/de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa/_/mang po 
[\[244a.2\]]dag tu rnam par shes/_/gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/_/bstsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas/_/byas pa med cing byed pa med/_/las kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing /_/las 'di ci bzhin shes byas na/_/rnam par dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/_/nges pa'i 
[\[244a.3\]]gnas ni dmigs med pas/_/gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sems can 
[\[244a.4\]]chen po bla na med/_/sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/_/'jug par bya ba gang yang med/_/de bas bla na med ces bya/_/gang la phra ba yod min pa/_/de la sbom pa'ang yod pa min/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes/_/rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/de la 
[\[244a.5\]]bgrang ba yod pa min/_/yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral/_/de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/_/mun pa rnams ni rnam bsal cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang /_/de la snang ba gang yang med/_/mi snang ba yang ci yang med/_/thams cad chos la kun nas dga'/_/skyes pa med cing gnas pa med/_/'dod chags med cing rten pa med/_/chos 
[\[244a.6\]]nyid de yang sbed pa med/_/gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing /_/gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas/_/ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi/_/shes rab chen pos legs par mthong /_/mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med/_/gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste/_/stong pa de yang khams gsum kun/_/de ni sangs rgyas 
[\[244a.7\]]mthong ba'o/_/byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang /_/de dag de la rab tu gnas/_/gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/_/rang gi lus ni rjes su blta/_/lus med pa ni lus su bshad/_/'byung ba med cing bstan du med/_/'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa/_/sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med/_/sangs 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid/_/de skad bden pa'i blos smras te/_/de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs/_/shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/drin gzo 
[\[244b.2\]]med pa'i sems can phyir/_/skyes bu drang srong mchog gi rnams/_/dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dang /_/'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung /_/thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de/_/sems can khams la rnam gzigs kyang /_/srid pas bcings pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i/_/sems can rnams ni de 
[\[244b.3\]]nas gzigs/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na/_/yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba/_/sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par/_/skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med/_/gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag_/med na 'jig rten khams kun na/_/sems can bde ba 
[\[244b.4\]]gcig mi 'byung /_/sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag_/'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba/_/de dag 'thob pa legs par 'thob/_/gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba/_/
[\[244b.5\]]de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no/_/gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa/_/bdag cag rnams kyis 'thob legs thob/_/'di 'dra ba yi tshul thos pas/_/kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[244b.6\]]cad kyis/_/shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas/_/spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas/_/da dung phyir zhing dad pa skye/_/de yi ye shes mtha' yas pas/_/da dung brjod du yod pa min/_/gang zhig mchog gi blos smras pa/_/rgyal sras gzhan gyis 
[\[244b.7\]]bshad pa rnams/_/de dag da rung bdag gis kyang /_/bskal pa bsam yas bshad par bya/_/ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste/_bcu dgu pa'o//_//
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]{D44-20}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu pa/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/_sbyong ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[245a.2\]]'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/_de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[245a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[245a.4\]]ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so/_/legs so/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[245a.5\]]pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang /_khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brten pas 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad bstan par bya ba 
[\[245a.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang /_bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang /_kun nas sbyor 
[\[245a.7\]]ba thob par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /_chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang /_dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa bskyed cig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[245b.2\]]gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/mchod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/tha dad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad 
[\[245b.3\]]do/_/kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/'phrogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[245b.4\]]de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag gis reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las 
[\[245b.5\]]langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i rigs shes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthasagatugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'das pa'i 
[\[245b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' brtson 
[\[245b.7\]]par byed pa gang las bsams te/_de skad du smras pa de dag gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang 
[\[246a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_tshe ra skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_
[\[246a.3\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /_dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye 
[\[246a.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[246a.5\]]dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas/_mdzes pa dang bzang ba dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]tu 'ong ba dang /_kha dog rgyas pa dang /_thub par dka' 
[\[246a.6\]]ba dang /_mthu che bar mthong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'am/_sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[246a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_sems bskyed pa dang po des ni thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smyin pa shes pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa dang /_dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang /_
[\[246b.2\]]mos pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa du ma shes pa dang /_khams tha dad pa dang khams du ma shes pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[246b.3\]]rnam par byang ba dang /_rjes su bsgribs pa med pa shes pa dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]shes pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shes pa'o/_/thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su zin par gyur te/_de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[246b.4\]]chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang de la brjod par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la 
[\[246b.5\]]brjod par bya'o/_/phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/_/zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba'ang de la bstan par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o/_/rab tu 
[\[246b.6\]]zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la brjod par bya'o/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o/_/sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la de 
[\[246b.7\]]bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang /_gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar gzhog ste/_bcu 
[\[247a.2\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go_/snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_gnas pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang /_yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang /_mnyam pa'i sems dang /_
[\[247a.3\]]slob dpon gyi sems dang /_ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go_/rnam pa bcu po de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar gzhog ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247a.4\]]las dang po pa de ni thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas 
[\[247a.5\]]da lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_da lo bde bar gyur nas dus shes la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/don shes 
[\[247a.6\]]nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/rmongs pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 
[\[247a.7\]]thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par bya ba dang /_gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam pa bcus chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_

[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la yongs su smyin pa bcus skyes pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang /_
[\[248a.2\]]sangs rgyas la shes pas mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang /_chos nges par rtogs pa dang /_sems can rnam par bsgoms pa dang /_zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang /_las rnam par bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par smyin pa

[\[249a.1\]]dang /_gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i

[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /_chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang /_chos thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa dang /_chos thams cad dben

[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]zhe'am/_sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes so zhe'am/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad shes so zhes na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog go_/dus

[\[250a.6\]]thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang 
[\[250a.7\]]chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la gnas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba bsgrub pa yin/_sems can gzhan gyi bsam pa shes pa yin/_gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa rtogs pa yin/_sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/_las kyi byin gyi rlabs tha dad pa rab tu rtogs pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang /_'jig pa yongs 
[\[250b.2\]]su 'jal ba yin/_gar dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu brjod 
[\[250b.3\]]par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyed pa brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyi rlabs brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par rgyu ba brjod par 
[\[250b.4\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gnan pa brjod par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/_/chos grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su dri ba brjod par bya'o/_/yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa brjod par 
[\[250b.5\]]bya'o/_/dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye ba brjod par bya'o/_/sems bskyed pa gcig las sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bas kyang shas cher chos thams cad la mngon par bsgrub pa'i mkhas pa 
[\[250b.6\]]'byung bar bya ba dang /_gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[250b.7\]]ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_spyod yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_
[\[251a.2\]]spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas 
[\[251a.3\]]pa yin/_don dam pa'i bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab de la ni gnas bcu brjod par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[251a.4\]]rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i gnas kyi tshul brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i gnas su spyod pa brjod par bya'o/_/chos kyi rgyal por dbang 
[\[251a.5\]]bskur ba brjod par bya'o/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod par bya'o/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o/_/chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ci nas kyang de'i 
[\[251a.6\]]sems bsgribs pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang /_gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems 
[\[251a.7\]]dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]grangs med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sems mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i 
[\[251b.2\]]sems mang ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sems mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin/_
[\[251b.3\]]sems can grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbang po rtogs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa yongs su gzung ba'i sems mang ba yin/_sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/_de'i lus ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la 
[\[251b.4\]]gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te lus kyi las shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rdzu 'phrul shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'das pa lta ba 'am shes par mi nus so/_/ma 'ongs pa lta ba 'am shes 
[\[251b.5\]]par mi nus so/_/da ltar byung ba lta ba 'am shes par mi nus so/_/zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus so/_/sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so/_/sems kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis shes par 
[\[251b.6\]]mi nus te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba de la ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[251b.7\]]'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/_/chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]cad rgyas par dgang ba brjod pa mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba brjod pa mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa 
[\[252a.2\]]mdzad do/_/chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[252a.4\]]mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug du g.yos so/_/g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go/_/rab tu ldeg go_/
[\[252a.5\]]kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas/_lha rdzas kyi me tog 
[\[252a.6\]]gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/
[\[252a.7\]]lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to/_/lha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grags par gyur to/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par byung ste/_chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[252b.2\]]rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te/_phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa 
[\[252b.3\]]legs so/_/legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag cag kun kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag gi zham ring 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag nas 'dir phyin 
[\[252b.4\]]te/_thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang /_yi ge 'di dag dang /_khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing lhag chad [{]myed [,]med [}]par ston te 
[\[252b.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dir phyin to/_/ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re 
[\[252b.6\]]re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas 
[\[252b.7\]]te/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rang byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba/_/sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing /_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]mtshan bzang thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas/_/byang chub don du bstan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang /_/yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste/_/srid lam kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong 
[\[253a.2\]]zhing /_/byang chub don du bstan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mnga' ba/_/kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing /_/nam mkha' dbyings mnyam rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yi/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/_/
[\[253a.3\]]khams gsum kun na gnas ni 'di dag yin/_/gnas [{]myin [,]min [}]rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes/_/ma nor dngos po khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang /_/dkar nag las rnams ji 
[\[253a.4\]]snyed yod de dag_/de kun mnyam nyid rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang /_/mnyam gzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/rnam byang rnam par khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/
[\[253a.5\]]brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/_/sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang /_/brtson 'grus stobs dang de bzhin ci 'dra ba/_/rnam pa sna tshogs de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/sems can kun gyi mos pa 
[\[253a.6\]]ci 'dra dang /_/'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams/_/rnam pa kun tu thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang /_/'jig rten kun gyi khams mang du ma dang /_/
[\[253a.7\]]khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/kun tu 'gro ba'i sems rnams ci 'dra dang /_/lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi/_/ma nor rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/byang chub don du 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang /_/sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces/_/chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/'das pa'i dus su gang rnams ci 
[\[253b.2\]]byung yang /_/mtshan nyid gang yin ci 'dra ci dgongs pa/_/sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/'jig rten kun na kun sbyor ji snyed dang /_/don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin 
[\[253b.3\]]te/_/nyon mongs zad bya mthar thug shes bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/_/'gro ba rnams kyi tha snyad gdags pa dang /_/tshig lam skad du brjod pa ji snyed pa/_/brda yi bden pa rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa 
[\[253b.4\]]byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/chos rnams ji ltar brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_/stong pa byed [{]myed [,]med [}]rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams/_/de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa 
[\[253b.5\]]dang /_/rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bskyam bya bar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/spu rtse re re'i sgo nas 'od gzer rnams/_/phyogs bcu kun tu ji ltar dgye bya ba/_/de 'dra'i rang bzhin 
[\[253b.6\]]khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/bdag gi lag pa'i mthil du gzhag bya bar/_/sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur 
[\[253b.7\]]ro/_/ji ltar zhing gi sems can yangs pa kun/_/gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par skra rtser gzhog byed par/_/srog [{]myed [,]med [}]chos rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa/_/skra rtses 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar/_/mthar thug ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/ji ltar bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab zhing gi rnams/_/phra rab rdul blags ma lus bgrang bya bar/_/rdul phran 
[\[254a.2\]]grangs rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /_/'jig rten tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te/_/bskal pa zad cing gnas pa shes bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don 
[\[254a.3\]]du sems bsgyur ro/_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos thams cad kyi/_/chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi 
[\[254a.4\]]rnams/_/skra'i nyag mas bcings shing tshad gdab par/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/brjod [{]myed [,]med [}]'khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag_/ba spu'i khung bu ji ltar gzung bya bar/_/
[\[254a.5\]]phra dang yangs pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/_/ji ltar dbyangs gcig kun tu grags 'gyur bar/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir/_/
[\[254a.6\]]brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/sems can kun gyi sgra skad ji snyed pa/_/dbyangs gcig brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar/_/sgra yi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/'jig rten thams 
[\[254a.7\]]cad ma lus shes byed cing /_/ji ltar 'gro kun zhi zhes ston 'gyur bar/_/lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams thams cad rab tu tshig pa dang /_/kun nas gnas pa ma lus 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mthong 'gyur bar/_/rnam rtog chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar/_/rang byung chos ni ji ltar rtogs bya'i phyir/_/
[\[254b.2\]]brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phra blags pa/_/de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar/_/thams cad yid kyis dngos su shes bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/kun gzigs 'das pa 
[\[254b.3\]]ji snyed byung ba dang /_/ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa rnams/_/skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/tshig gcig brtsams te brjod cing bshad byas kyang /_/bskal pa brjod [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[254b.4\]]thams cad zad 'gyur bar/_/chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud bya'i phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams/_/'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag_/sems kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i 
[\[254b.5\]]phyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang /_/phyogs kun spyod tshe chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar/_/dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'iphyir/_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/_/de ltar byang 
[\[254b.6\]]chub don du bskyed byed pa/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun/_/mchod par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go_/'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod tshe/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba ji snyed pa/_
[\[254b.7\]]de dag de la yongs su brjod par bya/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go_/'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ji snyed pa/_/phyogs bcu'i tha dad tshad med yod pa rnams/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]go/_/mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos/_/'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan/_/'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go_/gzhan gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub ji snyed gnas yod pa/_/
[\[255a.2\]]'jig rten kun gyi zil gyis mi non rnams/_/de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun ldan pa/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag nyid che ba kun/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[255a.3\]]dpa' de bzhag te/_/'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go_/sangs rgyas grangs med brjod du med pa dang /_/ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go_/
[\[255a.4\]]ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa/_/de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya/_/'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go_/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 
[\[255a.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_/'jig rten kun gyi chags par mi 'gyur ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya/_/sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba ji snyed dang /_/ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi/_/skyabs dang mgon dang rten du 'gyur bar yang /_/
[\[255a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya/_/rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang po de/_/byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te/_/de ltar gdams ngag rjes su bstan par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par bkod pa'o/_/de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang 
[\[255a.7\]]po pa/_/thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la/_/sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon byed pa/_/'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go_/phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems/_/snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sems/_
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bsrung ba'i sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems/_/slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems/_/de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa la/_/kha ton lung la yongs su bskul bar bya/_/mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul/_/
[\[255b.2\]]dben par gyur pas dge bshes bsnyen 'gyur bya/_/dge bshes gyur nas ngang bder 'gyur bar bya/_/ngang tshul bde bas dus tshul shes par bya/_/dus rnams shes nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 'gyur bar bya/_/mi 'jigs gyur nas don la brtson par bya/_/
[\[255b.3\]]don shes gyur nas chos rjes shes par bya/_/chos shes gyur nas rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya/_/rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]gyur legs par bshad chos la/_/rgyal sras de ni rnam par gnas par bya/_/de tsam gyis ni las kyi dang po pa/_/byang chub don zhugs 
[\[255b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'o/_/gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te/_/sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed/_/gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsung brjod pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag sdug bsngal 
[\[255b.5\]]de bzhin stong pa nyid/_/bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]de bzhin byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang /_/'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_/ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_/kun la byang chub sems dpa' dpyod pa byed/_/
[\[255b.6\]]de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang /_/de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya/_/'jig rten khams yangs ma lus mthar thug pa/_/brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/_/sa dang me dang de bzhin chu khams dang /_/
[\[255b.7\]]de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang /_/'dod pa gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/_/khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing /_/khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa/_/des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no/_/cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di las skyes pa ste/_/dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs dran pa can/_/
[\[256a.2\]]chos kyi rjes 'byung rigs ldan legs par skyes/_/de yi gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin/_/chos rnams de bzhin nges par rtogs pa ste/_/sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par sgom/_/chos dang 'jig 
[\[256a.3\]]rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang /_/rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/rnam sgom rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa/_/thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras shes bya/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par 
[\[256a.4\]]bsgom bya'i phyir/_/yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug pa/_/de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing /_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas/_/mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[256a.5\]]shing /_/dus gsum kun la tha dad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug_/de tsam gyis na rgyal sras bzhi pa ste/_/de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de 'dra'o/_/de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrubs byas shing /_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung /_/de las 
[\[256a.6\]]gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni/_/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs zhes brjod pa ni/_/thabs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing /_/bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed/_/'jig rten dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang /_/sems 
[\[256a.7\]]can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang /_/phan tshun de bzhin bde ba bskyed pa dang /_/snying rjes skye dgu grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_/'jig rten rnams kyi gtse ba bstsal ba dang /_/dran zhing de bzhin dad par bya ba dang /_/sems can mang po thams cad 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gdul mos shing /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che/_/sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang /_/de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang /_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab gzhal med dpag med pa/_/de 'dra'i chos rnams de la brjod 
[\[256b.2\]]par bya/_/de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste/_/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can/_/de yi gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste/_/yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa yin/_/gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir/_/chos kyi ngo bo 
[\[256b.3\]]nyid kyis rmongs med cing /_/rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis bslu mi nus/_/sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang /_/spyod pa bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung /_/sems can nyung zhe'am 'on 
[\[256b.4\]]tam mang ngo zhes/_/thos par gyur kyang bsam pa zhum [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs [{]myed [,]med [}]ce 'am/_/gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang /_/chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang /_/kun nas 'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig ce 
[\[256b.5\]]'am/_/chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ces kyang /_/byang chub sems dpas thos gyur dus gsum tshul/_/nges par rtogs byed thams cad rnam rtog cing /_/sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges/_/mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[256b.6\]]dang /_/dngos nyid yod [{]myin [,]min [}{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang bden pa dang /_/sgyu ma rmi lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog rang bzhin [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang /_/spyod pa yod [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[256b.7\]]rtag tu rnam par bsgom/_/'byung ngam [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe 'am ma 'das dang /_/ma byon to zhe 'am ma byon ma yin dang /_/skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]mtshan de bzhin/_/gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang /_/don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos rnams dang /_/thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byed pa/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya/_/mtshan ma med la mtshan 
[\[257a.2\]]ma yod pa dang /_/mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]la mtshan gyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_/rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba rnams/_/thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa/_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid 
[\[257a.3\]]kun gyis/_/kha na ma thor 'gyur ba nam yang med/_/ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye ba byed/_/gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes/_/de dag mos pa yongs su rtogs par byed/_/phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa/_/kun tu mngon shes 
[\[257a.4\]]myur ba yid bzhin 'thob/_/bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thob cing /_/de la zhum pa bskyed pa gang yang med/_/zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang /_/de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su 
[\[257a.5\]]gnan pa dang /_/grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya/_/grangs med chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba dang /_/ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing /_/dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang /_/sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]bsnyen 
[\[257a.6\]]bkur brjod/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa ni/_/sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu shes/_/nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes/_/de 'dra spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can/_/chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang /_/sngon mtha' phyi 
[\[257a.7\]]mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye dang /_/brde yi bden pa don dam bden pa dag_/ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin/_/de'i rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul/_/der yang ji ltar yongs su spyad bya dang /_/'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ba dang /_/rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod/_/de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang /_/byin gyi rlabs dang de bzhin mthu chen dang /_/chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag_/brjod par bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra yin/_/de tsam gyis na de yi 
[\[257b.2\]]mthar thug ste/_/gdams ngag des kyang rlom sems byed pa med/_/khong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de/_/rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob pa byed/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po dbang bskur ba/_/thu bo mchog dang dam par gyur pa ni/_/'jig rten 
[\[257b.3\]]khams mang grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]bskyod pa dang /_/yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang /_/byin gyi rlabs dang yongs su 'da' bya dang /_/yongs su sbyong ba'i sems kyang rab tu mang /_/grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang /_/dbang po phun 
[\[257b.4\]]ldan rnam par spyad la mkhas/_/de dag gzung cing rnam par 'dul ba dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyang shin tu mang /_/zhing mang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro byas shing /_/dam chos mkhas rnams ma lus rnam par dpyod/_/de'i lus dang 
[\[257b.5\]]lus kyi las rnams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te/_/dus gsum zhing du rgyal ba'i sems dag kyang /_/rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyis shes mi nus/_/de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang /_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[257b.6\]]shes chags med de bzhin brjod/_/chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod par mdzad/_/ci nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par/_/yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang /_/sems can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang /_/
[\[257b.7\]]sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa mdzad/_/rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrang ba/_/rnam par dgod la gnas pa de dag kun/_/rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa/_/'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'/_/'on kyang 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]sems bskyed dang por mtha' yas pas/_/phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad rgyas par bya/_/dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong ba/_/de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur/_/zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod 
[\[258a.2\]]pa min/_/sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin/_/las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te/_/byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin/_/skad cig sems la byang chub gzhol ba'i sems/_/gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis 
[\[258a.3\]]shes mi nus/_/rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min/_/de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod/_/gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/_/spu gcig srang la tshad du 'jal byed pa/_/des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes/_/
[\[258a.4\]]'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol/_/phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun/_/spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa/_/de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag_/sems kyi skad cig gcig la bsgrub par byed/_/ji ltar 
[\[258a.5\]]zhing rnams rdul rab phrar blags shing /_/sems can la la ma lus bgrang byed de/_/'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa/_/de 'drar rgyal sras spyod pa brjod pa'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang /_/gang rnams phyogs 
[\[258a.6\]]bcur byung bar gyur pa dang /_/rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mang ba/_/rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing byang chub sems skye'o/_/sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas gang zhing /_/byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa/_/de yang bgrang bar 
[\[258a.7\]]nus pa ma yin na/_/de las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//[{D44-21}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_de nas lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pas byang 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba de dag gis/_
[\[258b.2\]]tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa 'di dag las 'das te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba/_de ji ltar yid la bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_
[\[258b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/_lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa bcu rnam par bsgom ste/_
[\[258b.4\]]gong du chos bcu yid la bya'o/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa bcu rnam par bsgom pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus dang lus kyi las dang /_ngag dang ngag gi ngag dang /_/yid dang yid kyi las dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang /_bslab 
[\[258b.5\]]pa yang dag par blang ba dag ste/_ci tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus sam de ste tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus yin na ni/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang bar 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa chos ma yin par 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'khrugs par 
[\[258b.6\]]'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa dri nga bar 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa gtsang ba ma yin par 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa smad par 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi mthun par 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur/_
[\[258b.7\]]tshangs pa'i spyod pa keng rus su 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa srin gyi tshad du 'gyur/_de ste lus kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/_nyal ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_'dug pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_'greng ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'gyur/_'gro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_bskum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_brkyang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_'khor ba tshangs 
[\[259a.2\]]pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_'gres pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ste ngag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/_dbyangs tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_ngag tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_smra ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 
[\[259a.3\]]'gyur/_smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_thong kha nas rtsol ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_lce bsgyur ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_mchu sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_tshig sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ste ngag gi 
[\[259a.4\]]las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/_brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_brdar bya ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_shin tu bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_/bstan pas rnam par bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_legs pa brjod pa tshangs pa'i 
[\[259a.5\]]spyod par 'gyur/_ngan du brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par gdags pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_yongs su smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_de ste yid tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin 
[\[259a.6\]]ni/_dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_phyir dran pa tshangs 
[\[259a.7\]]pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rnam par sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_sgyu ma tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_rmi lam tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ste yid kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ni/_'du shes tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_yid la byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_grang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_dro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_bde ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_sdug bsngal tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_bkres 
[\[259b.2\]]pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_bskom pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_dga' ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/_zhum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ste sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin ni/_gzugs sangs rgyas sam/_'on tam tshor 
[\[259b.3\]]ba sangs rgyas sam/_'du shes sangs rgyas sam/_'du byed sangs rgyas sam/_rnam par shes pa sangs rgyas sam/_mtshan rnams sangs rgyas sam/_mngon par shes pa sangs rgyas sam/_las sangs rgyas sam/_'on tam rnam 
[\[259b.4\]]par smin pa sangs rgyas sam/_de ste legs par bshad pa'i chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni/_'gog pa gnas su 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'das pa gnas su 'gyur ro/_/bral ba gnas su 'gyur ro/_/ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur 
[\[259b.5\]]ro/_/ma byung ba gnas su 'gyur ro/_/grags pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro/_/rtog pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro/_/rgyu ba med pa gnas su 'gyur ro/_/phrad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gnas ni tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de ste dge 'dun sdom 
[\[259b.6\]]pa'i nan tan can/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir/_dge 'dun nam/_'on tam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir/_dge 'dun nam 'on tam/_phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[259b.7\]]'bras bu dge 'dun/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam/_'on tam phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam/_'on tam dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/_gsum rig pa nyid 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dge 'dun nam/_drug mngon par shes pa dge 'dun nam/_'on tam khong du chud par nan tan du byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa/_de ste bslab pa yang dag par blang ba tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/_tha dad du gnas pa bslab pa yang dag par 
[\[260a.2\]]blang ba'am/_yongs su dag pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_slob dpon gyi tshig bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_lan gsum du bzlas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_mkhan po bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_skra bregs pa dang /_
[\[260a.3\]]ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_slongs mos 'tsho ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/_'on tam de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa'am/_zhes de ltar chos de dag la rnam par sgom na/_bdag gi lus la mngon par chags 
[\[260a.4\]]pa med pa dang /_sgom pa la zhen pa med pa dang /_chos rnams gnas pa med pa dang /_'das pa rgyu ba med pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa ma phyin pa dang /_da ltar byung ba stong pa dang /_las la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[260a.5\]]dang /_'jig rten 'di 'phos pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin/_de gang las byung de su'i de ci zhig_/de sus byas/_de yod dam/_de med dam/_de gzugs sam/_de 
[\[260a.6\]]gzugs ma yin nam/_de tshor ba'am/_de tshor ba ma yin nam/_de 'du shes sam/_de 'du shes ma yin nam/_de 'du byed dam/_de 'du byed ma yin nam/_de rnam par shes pa'am/_de rnam par shes pa ma yin nam/_tshangs par spyod 
[\[260a.7\]]pa'i chos de gang zhig ces de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du nam mkha' yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya ba dang /_sems la bsgribs pa med par dang /_gnyis su med par shin tu spyod pa dang /_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]bsgrubs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sbyor ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos gzung ba dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs 
[\[260b.2\]]su dag par yid la bya'o/_/gong du yang chos bcu dang ldan pas yid la bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang rnam par smin 
[\[260b.3\]]pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_rnam par ldang ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po dang brtson 
[\[260b.4\]]'grus tha dad pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_mos pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_khams tha dad pa dang /_khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i 
[\[260b.5\]]lam shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_bsgribs pa med pa rjes su dran pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[260b.6\]]stobs re re la yang rnam par dbye ba shin tu rgya che bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/thams cad kyang tshad med par blta bar bya'o/_/thos nas kyang snying rje chen po la brtan par bya'o/_/sems can rnam par bsgom pa yang mi gtang bar bya'o/_/chos la shin tu 
[\[260b.7\]]brtags pa yang mi gzhig par bya'o/_/bla na med pa'i chos la yang dag pa'i yi dam yang shin tu brtsam par bya'o/_/rnam par smin pa la yang re ba med par bya'o/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang rjes su rtogs par bya'o/_/rmi lam gyi rang bzhin du 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]yang yang dag par sbyang bar bya'o/_/mig yor gyi rang bzhin dang yang tha mi dad par bya'o/_/sgra brnyan gyi rang bzhin yang spyod yul du bya'o/_/sprul pa'i rang bzhin du yang mos par bya ste/_de de ltar zhugs pas nyon mongs pa chung bar sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[261a.2\]]thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/des chos de dag gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtogs pas/_sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i gnas yod do/_/chos thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du shes 
[\[261a.3\]]pas/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par shes rab kyi phung po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//[{D44-22}]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad 
[\[261a.4\]]ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig dang ldan na/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad 
[\[261a.5\]]ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gnas 'di ni yid ches par shin tu dka' ste/_shes par dka' brtag par dka'/_mngon par dad par dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/_kun nas bsgrub par dka'/_yang dag par spyad par dka'/_brjod par 
[\[261a.6\]]dka'/_bskyed par dka'/_brgal bar dka'/_khong du chud par dka' 'on kyang ci tshul du sangs rgyas kyi mthus bshad par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/_gang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can 
[\[261a.7\]]de dag la la zhig gis bskal par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_bslab pa'i tshig lnga po dag kyang 'dzin du btsud par gyur la de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang /_bskal par 
[\[261b.2\]]bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_bslab pa'i tshig lnga po dag kyang 'dzin du btsud na/_rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_
[\[261b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/_/smras pa kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 
[\[261b.4\]]po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la ni/_de dag gi bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_
[\[261b.5\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe snga ma de lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[261b.6\]]sras phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag_/bskal pa brgyar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la yang dag par sbyar bar gyur la/_gzhung 
[\[261b.7\]]de bzhin du bskal pa stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bskal pa bye bar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod par gyur pa dang /_bskal pa bye bar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[262a.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bskal pa bye ba stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_
[\[262a.3\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_dgra bcom pa la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/_
[\[262a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu gzhag par gyur na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to/_/
[\[262a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang /_
[\[262a.6\]]bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[262a.7\]]grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas shing /_bslab pa'i tshig lnga la gzhag pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar ba dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dgod pa dang /_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab 
[\[262b.2\]]tu dgod pa de tsam gyis ni sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur te/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sems skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs
