[\[262b.3\]]pa'i sems can thams cad yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du ba dang /_'jig pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi kun nas 
[\[262b.4\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_bag chags 
[\[262b.5\]]kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang /_sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/
[\[262b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de ni 'di ltar 
[\[262b.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_yul mnyam pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe snga ma dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig byung ste/_de sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]pa 'da' la sems bskyed pa de dang 'dra bas/_shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad zad du 'das par byas kyang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa zad par ma rung nas/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu 
[\[263a.2\]]gnyis pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma des bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa snyed sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu gsum pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu de gnyis kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyis 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das 
[\[263a.3\]]te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu bzhi pa zhig byung nas/_snga ma gsum gyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das la/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu lnga pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma bzhis bskal pa grangs med par 'das 
[\[263a.4\]]pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das nas/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu drug pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu bdun pa zhig skyes la/_
[\[263a.5\]]skyes bu snga ma drug gis bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu brgyad pa zhig skyes te/_skyes bu snga ma bdun gyis bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das 
[\[263a.6\]]la/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu dgu pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma brgyad kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das par byas te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu bcu pa zhig byung nas/_skyes bu snga ma dgus bskal pa grangs med 
[\[263a.7\]]par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das la/_sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'da' bas/_shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med par bgrod kyang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' ni 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]shes par mi rung ngo /_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs 
[\[263b.2\]]mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du yang de bzhin du rgya che bas te/_skyes bu de dag gis phyogs bcur ji snyed du 'das pa de dag skyes bu re re phyogs bcur rnam par dgod pas sems bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa 
[\[263b.3\]]grangs med pa 'da' ba 'di'i tshul du bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag_/skyes bu brgya dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dgod pa'i tshul du phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni mthar rnyed par rung yang srid 
[\[263b.4\]]kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mtha' med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skye ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'gro 
[\[263b.5\]]ba'am/_grangs yongs su shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin gyis/_'di ltar phyogs bcu tshad med par yongs su shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skye ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams phra ba 
[\[263b.6\]]yangs par yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa phra bar yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi 'jig rten gyi khams spyi bo tshugs su rgyu bar yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs 
[\[263b.7\]]su rgyu ba/_'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhir yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu 'jig rten gyi khams chen por yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur yongs su shes pa dang /_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dog par yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dog pa 'jig rten gyi khams yangs par yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par 
[\[264a.2\]]yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dang /_gcig tu zad pa yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[264a.3\]]brjod du med par gzud pa yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs par yongs su 
[\[264a.4\]]shes pa dang /_skra'i rtse mo 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa skra'i rtse mor yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsgrub pa yongs su 
[\[264a.5\]]shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus med pa'i rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad sems bskyed pa gcig gis thogs pa med par yongs su shes pas/_byang chub sems 
[\[264a.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' ba'i dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi_/kye rgyal ba'i sras skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig 
[\[264a.7\]]gis shar phyogs su 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bgrang la/_sems bskyed pas bgrang ba 'di'i tshul du shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad zad du bgrangs kyang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'du ba'i bskal 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa'i mtha' shes par ma rung nas/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/_skyes bu snga ma des bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrang ba de dag thams cad skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/_
[\[264b.2\]]de'i 'og tu skyes bu gsum pa zhig byung la/_skyes bu snga ma gnyis kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bgrang ba de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis bgrangs te/_de'i 'og du skyes bu bzhi pa zhig byung nas/_skyes bu snga ma gsum gyis 
[\[264b.3\]]bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu lnga pa zhig byung nas/_skyes bu snga ma bzhis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs par gyur la/_
[\[264b.4\]]de'i 'og tu skyes bu drug pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma lngas bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/_de'i 'og du skyes bu bdun pa zhig byung nas/_skyes bu snga ma drug gis bskal 
[\[264b.5\]]pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs par gyur la/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu brgyad pa zhig byung ste/_skyes bu snga ma bdun gyis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrang 
[\[264b.6\]]ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs par gyur te/_de'i 'og du skyes bu dgu pa zhig skyes la/_skyes bu snga ma brgyad kyis bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/_
[\[264b.7\]]de'i 'og du skyes bu bcu pa zhig byung nas/_skyes bu dgu po snga ma rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrang ba de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs par gyur na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras skyes bu de dag grangs 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]med pa'i tshul du phyogs bcur rnam par bkod pa dang /_skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang /_'jig pa grangs med par bgrang ba'i tshul du bskal pa grangs med par bgrangs na/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag 
[\[265a.2\]]gi 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni/_phyogs bcur mtha' thug par rung yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar 
[\[265a.3\]]thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten 'ga'i 'du ba dang /_'jig pa bgrang ba rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[265a.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu mi skye'i/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa shes par bya ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ste/_
[\[265a.5\]]'di ltar bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_bskal pa thung ngu la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[265a.6\]]byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[265a.7\]]bcas pa'i bskal pa/_sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas brjod 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]du med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas gcig gi bskal pa yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas gcig gi bskal pa sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_'di lta ste bskal pa rnam 
[\[265b.2\]]pa tha dad pa la bskal pa rnam pa tha mi dad par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_bskal pa zad pa la bskal pa ma zad par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_bskal pa ma zad pa la bskal pa zad par khong du chud pas yang 
[\[265b.3\]]dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_'di lta ste bskal pa brjod du med pa sems bskyed pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_sems bskyed pa gcig bskal pa brjod du med par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_
[\[265b.4\]]'di lta ste bskal pa thams cad bskal pa med par rab tu 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang /_bskal pa ma yin pa bskal par 'jug pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/
[\[265b.5\]]'di lta ste sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa sems 
[\[265b.6\]]bskyed pa gcig gis yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su sems skye ste/_'di ltar bskal pa thams cad kyi rgyus mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir/_de thog mar 
[\[265b.7\]]go cha chen po mngon par bsgrub po/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrang ba'i dpe de dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_der sems bskyed pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gcig gis/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dad pa sna tshogs thams cad shes pa tshul de lta bur sems bskyed pa re re zhing shes pas shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad pa byas kyang 
[\[266a.2\]]sems can rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' zad par mi rung ba nas/_gzhung de bzhin du bcu'i bar du ste/_shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi bar gyi phyogs bcu thams cad du rgya cher byas na 
[\[266a.3\]]de dag gi mos pa tha dad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni mthar thug par rung yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/
[\[266a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam gyi mos pa tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 
[\[266a.5\]]thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dad pa sna tshogs mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste mos pa mtha' dang dbus med 
[\[266a.6\]]pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi mos pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste sems can gcig 
[\[266a.7\]]sems can grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_dad pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyis mos pa gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa ma lus pa dang /_'gro ba rgya mtsho mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dge ba dang /_mi dge ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad kyi 
[\[266b.2\]]mos pa sna tshogs dbang gis yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste skal ba mnyam pa'i 
[\[266b.3\]]mos pa dang /_skal ba mi mnyam pa'i mos pa shes pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_mos pa thams cad mos pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_mos pa gcig mos pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[266b.4\]]gshegs pa'i stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste mos pa bla ma dang bcas pa dang /_mos pa bla na med pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas 
[\[266b.5\]]pa dang /_lhag ma med pa dang /_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i mos pa'i bye brag shes pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste gnas pa'i 
[\[266b.6\]]mos pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i mos pa dang /_thun mong gi mos pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i mos pa dang /_'dres pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mos pa dang /_mos pa thams 
[\[266b.7\]]cad kyi bye brag shin tu shes pa'i dam pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste/_dge ba'i mos pa dang /_yangs pa'i mos pa 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dang /_mos pa bar ma dang /_tha dad pa dang /_nges pa'i mos pa ma lus pa thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_chags pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub 
[\[267a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste rnam par dag pa'i mos pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mos pa dang /_yangs pa'i mos pa dang /_dog pa'i mos pa dang /_phra ba'i mos pa dang /_rgya 
[\[267a.3\]]che ba'i mos pa dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang /_sems can gcig gi mos pa sna tshogs 'byam klas pa bcu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[267a.4\]]rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste/_rgyud stug po'i mos pa dang /_sbyor ba'i mos pa dang /_yongs su brtags pa'i mos pa dang /_ngang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i mos pa dang /_rgyu'i tshogs dang 
[\[267a.5\]]ldan pa'i mos pa dang /_rkyen gyi tshogs las byung ba'i mos pa dang /_mos pa'i dra ba ma lus pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'i yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na 
[\[267a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras mos pa sna tshogs kyi dpe tha dad pa snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_de'i sems gcig bskyed pas 'jig 
[\[267a.7\]]rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbang po sna tshogs rab tu shes par gyur la/_de lta bu'i tshul du sems bskyed pa re re la shes pas/_shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zad par byas kyang /_shar phyogs 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]kyi sems can rnams kyi dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthar thug bar ma rung la tshul de bzhin du mos pa la ji skad brjod pa bzhin dbang po tha dad pa la yang shes par byas te/_de dag gi dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni/_phyogs 
[\[267b.2\]]bcu mthar thug par rung yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mtha' med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/sems can de tsam dag gi dbang po 
[\[267b.3\]]sna tshogs shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su 
[\[267b.4\]]shes par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/gzhung de bzhin du ji ltar mos pa la brjod pa de bzhin du dbang po rnams la yang shes par bya ste/_thibs por gyur pa'i dbang po dang /_
[\[267b.5\]]sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_yongs su brtags pa'i dbang po dang /_ngang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i dbang po dang /_rgyu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_rkyen gyi tshogs las byung ba'i dbang po dang /_dbang po'i dra ba thams cad ma lus pa la mnyam pa 
[\[267b.6\]]nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dbang po sna tshogs kyi dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/_kye 
[\[267b.7\]]rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su shes par gyur la/_tshul de lta bur sems bskyed pa re rer shes 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]pas/_shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad par byas kyang sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi mthar phyin par ma rung la/_gzhung de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs ni shes par rung yang srid 
[\[268a.2\]]kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam dag gi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su shes par 
[\[268a.3\]]bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su shes pas 
[\[268a.4\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/gzhung de ltar mos pa la ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du ste/_bsam pa'i thibs por gyur pa dang /_sbyor ba dang 
[\[268a.5\]]ldan pa'i bsam pa dang /_yongs su brtags pa'i bsam pa dang /_ngang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa dang /_rgyu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa dang /_rkyen gyi tshogs las byung ba'i bsam pa'i bar du/_bsam pa'i dra ba ma lus 
[\[268a.6\]]pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bsam pa sna tshogs kyi 
[\[268a.7\]]dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes te/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sbyor ba yongs su shes la/_gzhung de ltar mos pa 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]la ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du ste/_phyogs bcu'i sbyor ba sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag ni mthar thug par rung yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge 
[\[268b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam dag gi sbyor ba sna tshogs shes pa'i don du ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i/_
[\[268b.3\]]'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/
[\[268b.4\]]gzhung de ltar mos pa la ji skad du brjod pa bzhin te/_sbyor ba'i dra ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bar du mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[268b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi dpe de dag lta 'ang zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes te/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs 
[\[268b.6\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems bskyed pa sna tshogs rab tu shes la/_tshul de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yongs su shes pas/_gzhung de bzhin du ste/_phyogs bcu'i sems bskyed pa sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni mthar thug par rung yang 
[\[268b.7\]]srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam dag gi sems sna tshogs yongs su shes 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]par bya ba'i don du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_sems can gyi khams kyis gtugs 
[\[269a.2\]]pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems sna tshogs thams cad yongs su shes pas/_mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[269a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/gzhung de ltar mos pa la ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du/_sems bskyed pa'i dra ba ma lus pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[269a.4\]]dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sems bskyed pa'i dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_de'i sems bskyed pa 
[\[269a.5\]]gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs rab tu shes la/_sems bskyed pa shes pa'i tshul de lta bus shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med par zad par byas kyang /_sems can rnams kyi las 
[\[269a.6\]]sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthar thug par ma rung la/_de bzhin du skyes bu bcu pa'i bar du skyes par gyur te/_skyes bu dgu po de dag gis sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[269a.7\]]bskal pa grangs med pa zad par byas pa/_de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis shes par gyur kyang /_phyogs bcur las sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag ni mthar thug par rung yang srid kyi byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam dag gi las sna tshogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[269b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_dus gsum ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[269b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste las sna tshogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_las kyi bye brag thams cad la mkhas pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[269b.4\]]sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste sems can gcig grangs med cing /_rnam pa tha dad par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_las kyi tshul brjod pa'i snang ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_las 
[\[269b.5\]]thams cad ma lus pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba rgya mtsho mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste 'das pa 
[\[269b.6\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa la rab tu 'jug cing dus gsum thams cad kyi las sna tshogs dbang gis yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[269b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste/_skal pa mnyam pa'i las dang /_skal ba mi mnyam pa'i las shes pa'i mchog thob par bya ba dang /_las thams cad las gcig tu yang 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dag par 'jug pa dang /_las gcig las thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste bla ma dang 
[\[270a.2\]]bcas pa'i las dang /_bla na med pa'i las dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa'i las dang /_mnyam pa'i las dang /_mi mnyam pa'i las kyi bye brag ye shes kyi rgyud chen pos mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /_shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[270a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste gnas pa'i las dang /_mi gnas pa'i las dang /_thun mong gi las dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i las dang /_mtha' yas pa'i las dang /_mu med pa'i las dang /_ma 'dres pa'i 
[\[270a.4\]]las dang /_dge ba'i las dang /_mi dge ba'i las dang /_'jig rten pa'i las dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i las dang /_las kyi bye brag thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyud chen pos mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[270a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste shes pa'i las dang /_mi shes pa'i las dang chen po dang /_'bring dang /_tshad med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par chags pa med pas 
[\[270a.6\]]shes par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste rnam par dag pa'i las dang /_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[270a.7\]]pa'i las dang /_rgya chen po'i las dang /_rgya chung ngu'i las dang /_kun tu 'brel pa'i las dang /_kun tu ma 'brel pa'i las dang /_phra ba'i las dang /_sbom pa'i las dang /_las ma lus par sems can gyi khams kyi las kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_sems can gcig gis las sna tshogs 'byam klas pa bcu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste thibs por gyur pa'i las dang /_
[\[270b.2\]]sbyor ba can gyi las dang /_chung ba'i las dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa'i las dang /_rgyu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i las dang /_rkyen gyi tshogs las byung ba'i las dang /_las kyi dra ba thams cad ma lus pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su rig cing shes pas mngon par 
[\[270b.3\]]'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras las sna tshogs kyi dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[270b.4\]]sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes te/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems bskyed pa'i shes par gyur la/_tshul de ltar sems bskyed pa re rer yongs 
[\[270b.5\]]su shes pas/_shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med par zad par byas kyang /_sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa sna tshogs mthar thug par ma rung la/_de bzhin du de'i 'og tu skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes zhes bya ba nas/_skyes bu bcu pa skyes 
[\[270b.6\]]pa'i bar du ste/_skyes bu dgu po de dag gis bskal pa grangs med par nyon mongs pa sna tshogs rab tu shes pa de dag_/sems bskyed pa gcig gis yongs su shes par gyur la/_tshul de 'dra bar sems bskyed pa re rer yongs su shes pas/_
[\[270b.7\]]gzhung de bzhin du ste/_phyogs bcu'i nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag ni mthar thug par ra rung yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]mthar thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam dag gi nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[271a.2\]]skye ba ma yin gyi/_'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[271a.3\]]byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste nyon mongs pa yang ba dang /_nyon mongs pa lci ba mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[271a.4\]]skye'o/_/'di lta ste bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_sems kun nas 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[271a.5\]]dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa sna tshogs rang dbang med par byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam par gcad pa'i ye shes yongs su/_shes par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[271a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271a.7\]]rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste ma rig pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_srid pa dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_srid pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa kun tu sbyor ba rnam par gcad 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]pa'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste 'dod chags kyis ye rngam pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_zhe sdang gis khong khro ba dang /_gti mug 
[\[271b.2\]]gis mngon par khebs pa dang /_cha mnyam pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas te/_rnam par gcad pa'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[271b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste bdag tu bya ba shin tu bsgoms pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_bdag gi bya ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis bslang ba dang /_nga rgyal gyis mngon par sbrel ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon 
[\[271b.4\]]mongs pa thams cad ma lus par khong du chud cing yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba'i 
[\[271b.5\]]yongs su rtog pa rtsa bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i shugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul sna tshogs 
[\[271b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/'di lta ste/_bsgribs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[271b.7\]]kun nas bsgribs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad shes pas rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bskyabs pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]skye'o/_/bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad rnam par gcod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o/_/
[\[272a.2\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi dpe de dag lta yang zhog gi_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur la/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 
[\[272a.3\]]pas/_shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag_/mnabs stsal bro ba'i mchog tshad med pa dang /_bdug spos tshad med pa dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan tshad med pa dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]pho brang tshad med pa dang /_bla re tshad med pa dang /_gzhal med khang tshad med pa dang /_rin po che'i dra ba dpag tu med pa dang /_seng ge'i gdan dpag tu med pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub tshad med pa dang /_mchod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas 
[\[272a.5\]]mnyes par bya ste/_bskal pa tshad med par bsnyen bkur la/_rim gro dang bkur stir byas te/_rjes dang mchod pas btud cing phyag 'tshal te/_spyi bos gtugs nas snyan par brjod de 'khor zhing zhal du lta la/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang mi de 
[\[272a.6\]]dang 'gro ba phal 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa de dag gis shin tu dad par mar me grangs med pa dag kyang bus te/_skyes bu des ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed po de dag nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba dang 
[\[272a.7\]]yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang /_phyogs thams cad snang bar byed pa dang /_me'i 'od dang /_brgal dka' ba dang /_chu'i zla ba'i 'od dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_bsod nams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu yid du 'ong ba dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa rin po che tshad med pas yongs su bkang ste/_yon du gsol la de bzhin du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_pho brang dang /_gnam yol dang /_
[\[272b.2\]]sil snyan dang rol mo brdung ba dang /_glu dang rin po che'i dra ba dang /_gser gyi dra ba dang /_nor bu'i dra ba dang /_dril bu'i dra ba dang /_seng ge'i khri dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa brtsams pa rgya cher te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[272b.3\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i tshe/_mchod pa'i rnam pa de lta bus mchod nas mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mi de dang /_'gro ba phal 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa de snyed kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang mchod rten 'jig rten 
[\[272b.4\]]gyi khams tshad med pa dang mnyam par yangs shing rgya che ba rin po che tshad med pa las brtsigs te/_rgyan dang rin po che tshad med pas brgyan pa la mchod rten gcig ji lta ba bzhin du/_mchod rten dpag tu med pa mang po la yang de bzhin du byas te/_
[\[272b.5\]]thams cad kyi tshad kyang de tsam la/_mchod rten re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mang po tshad med par byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams mang po yang snang bas rgyas par gyur la/_rnam grangs de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[272b.6\]]mchod pa dang /_rim gro'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag byed cing /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang mchod pa bya bas/_bskal pa tshad med pa zad par gyur te/_shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs 
[\[272b.7\]]dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu thams cad du yang rgya 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]cher te/_skyes bu bcu sngon du 'gro bas phyogs bcu re re la skyes bu re re zhing yang phyogs bcur byas na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa 
[\[273a.2\]]bcur gtogs pa de dag la de'i rgyus bsod nams kyi phung po cher 'phel lam/_smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud par zad do/_/smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[273a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bskal pa tshad med par mnyes par byas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_rim gro las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni brgya'i char 
[\[273a.4\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe snga ma 
[\[273a.5\]]de dag lta yang zhog gi/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu gnyis pa zhig byung ste/_de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis/_skyes bu snga ma de dang 'gro ba phal 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa snga ma rnams kyis/_bskal pa 
[\[273a.6\]]tshad med par sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_rim gror mngon par 'du byas pa de de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis mngon par 'du byed la/_tshul de lta bur sems bskyed pa re rer mnyes par byed pas/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten 
[\[273a.7\]]gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa mnyes par byas te/_gzhung de bzhin du/_thog ma la ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du gnyis pa la dpag tu med pa 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gsum pa la grangs med pa/_bzhi pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_lnga pa la mtshungs pa med pa/_drug pa la kun tu mtha' yas pa/_bdun pa la mu med pa/_brgyad pa la sa mtshams med pa/_dgu pa la gzhal du med pa'i bar du ste/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[273b.2\]]sras dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu bcu pa zhig skyes te/_skyes bu snga ma dgu po de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa bcur gtogs pa'i sems can phal de dag gis/_bskal pa dpag tu med 
[\[273b.3\]]par sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_rim gros mnyes par byas pa de tsam du sems bskyed pa gcig gis mnyes par byed cing /_tshul de ltar sems bskyed pa re rer mnyes par byed pas/_shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par 
[\[273b.4\]]gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig pas/_zhal zas ro bro ba'i mchog brjod du med pa zhes bya ba nas/_gzhan yang rgya cher te de lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa mnyes par byas pa nas/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub 
[\[273b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la bskal pa brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_rgyu'i 
[\[273b.6\]]bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyes pa de tsam nyi tse zhig mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de tsam dag gi phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[273b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/_phyogs bcu tshad las 'das pa 'byam klas pa/_phyogs bcu'i rnam grangs mtha' yas pa'i dra bas khyab pa/_mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas mtha' yas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[274a.2\]]thams cad gzhi mnyam par chud pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par 'dus pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa/_'du shes kyi rnam pa la gnas pa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par phye ba la gnas pa thams cad du gtogs pa/_lhag ma med pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[274a.3\]]khams grangs dang tshul shin tu bstan pa dag tu sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i tshul shin tu bstan par gtogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis mngon par thugs su chud pa dag tu/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji 
[\[274a.4\]]snyed nub par gyur te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang yang da 
[\[274a.5\]]ltar byung ba'i dus na da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[274a.6\]]chub tu sems skye ste/_sems bskyed pa de skyes ma thag nas/_de dang der 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa dang /_sngon gyi mur gyur pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/_mngon par thugs su chud pa/_de dag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[274a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yid ches so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa de dang de'i dus su gtogs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur bstan pa dpag tu med pa'i mtha' dang /_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]dbus med par shin tu bstan pa dpag tu med pa dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches so/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang 
[\[274b.2\]]dbus med par bstan pa/_ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches shing yongs su 'dzin par byed yongs su rgyas par byed/_rab tu 'thob par byed/_
[\[274b.3\]]khong du chud par byed/_rab tu reg par byed/_shin tu bsgrub par byed/_rgyud gcig tu gyur par byed/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[274b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang pa'i phyir skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[274b.5\]]thams cad 'du ba dang /_'jig pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/
[\[274b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi srid pa gsum yongs su dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang /_bag chags thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/sems can 
[\[274b.7\]]thams cad kyi shi 'pho dang /_skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang /_sbyor ba yongs su shes pa bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yongs su shes par 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye ste/_sems bskyed pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dag dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[275a.2\]]'das ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o/_/ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi 
[\[275a.3\]]chos kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi chos kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi chos kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa 
[\[275a.4\]]rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 
[\[275a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i stobs la thub pa med 
[\[275a.6\]]par yang shin tu bstan par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi bstan 
[\[275a.7\]]par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su thob bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rjes su 'thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de ni sangs rgyas su shog shig ces bya 
[\[275b.2\]]ba'i sems bskyed pa des/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin/_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[275b.3\]]yul rnams dang mnyam pa yin/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yul thams cad dang mnyam pa yin/_gcig 
[\[275b.4\]]tu nges pa'i lus gcig tu gyur pas kyang dus gsum du mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dang /_'grogs pa yang thob pa ste/_ye shes de dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa'i 'byung ba de skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu na/_
[\[275b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/_/sems bskyed pa de nyid rten du mdzad de/_'dul ba ji bzhin du chos kyang yang dag par ston/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang 'dul ba tshad med pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_
[\[275b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bas rgyas par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ngan song yang rgyun chad par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 
[\[275b.7\]]yongs su dag par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi snang ba thams cad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_dus gsum du gtogs pa las sems bskyed pa der sangs rgyas sam/_sangs rgyas 
[\[276a.2\]]kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_nyan thos sam nyan thos kyi chos sam/_'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/_'jig 
[\[276a.3\]]rten las 'das pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/_sems can nam sems can gyi chos kyang rung ste/_ma 'dus pa gang yang med de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma gtogs so/_/de ltar na sems bskyed pa der ni chos 
[\[276a.4\]]kyi dbyings thams cad 'dus so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_de'i tshe phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur te/_g.yos so rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/
[\[276a.5\]]'gul to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go_/
[\[276a.6\]]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sems bskyed pa de'i yon tan yang dag par brjod pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi spos kyi char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phye 
[\[276a.7\]]ma'i char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i char yang mngon par bab po/_/lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnams kyang mngon par sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/lha rdzas kyi snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo /_/lha rdzas kyi 'od kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 
[\[276b.2\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros su mtshan btags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhal mngon par bstan te/_gsung brjod pa chos kyi blo gros legs so legs so/_/phyogs bcu na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[276b.3\]]zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos bstan pa de la ched du brjod pa mdzad do/_/nged kyis kyang chos bstan pa 'di nyid shin tu rnam par phye ste/_nged kyis ji ltar shin tu rnam par phye ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang shin tu rnam par phye'o/_/'di nyid 
[\[276b.4\]]du yang khyod kyis chos bstan pa des byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag kyang nged kyis lung bstan te/_de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa stong phrag brjod du med pa'i mthar thams cad 
[\[276b.5\]]kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ming tha dad pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gcig pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar sems rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur ro/_/nged kyis chos bstan pa 'di yang ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[276b.6\]]dus na/_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa rnams kyis thos par bya ba dang /_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams kyis shes shing gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur 
[\[276b.7\]]pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa/_dpag tu med pa/_sa mtshams med pa/_brjod du med pa/_chos 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu yang /_sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo/_/thams cad na yang chos bstan pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros shes 
[\[277a.2\]]bya ba sha stag_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang /_don gyis 'dul ba'i snang ba thob pa dang /_chos 
[\[277a.3\]]nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyud yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnyis su med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rab tu ston to/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[277a.4\]]sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/_'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_nam mkha'i khams rnams la ni rnam par dpyod/_sems can gyi khams ni yongs su smin par byed/_las dang rnam par smin pa'i khams 
[\[277a.5\]]ni 'gal bar mi byed/_nam mkha'i khams ni yongs su dag par byed/_kun nas nyon mongs pa las byung ba ni rab tu sel/_mos pa yangs pa las byung ba ni shin tu 'phel bar byed/_sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa la ni rab tu 'jug 
[\[277a.6\]]dus gsum ni mnyam par byed/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la ni yang dag par rtog cing /_rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su dag par bya ba la gzhol ba'i phyir/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[277a.7\]]gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ma lus rgyas byas shing /_/sems can zhing dang chos gsum dag kyang rtogs gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas mtsho mchog byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin te/_/de dag 'jig rten phan phyir sems kyi dam pa bskyed/_/
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i chos dbyings ji bzhin dang /_/ji ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams 'gro kun rjes song dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu khyab brnyes ji bzhin gyis/_/'gro ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog don du phan par rab tu zhugs/_/'jig rten rnams la byams 
[\[277b.2\]]pas rtag par rab gnas shing /_/'tshe ba med par 'gro la phan phyir su zhugs te/_/snang ba mi zad 'od byed gnas su gyur pa rnams/_/bsam gyis mi khyab stobs bcu mnga' bas byin gyis brlabs/_/de ni zhing rnams tha dad ma yin tshul yang rnyed/_/
[\[277b.3\]]de ni lus kyi rnam pa kun la rab tu zhugs/_/bsod nams ye shes de yang sangs rgyas byang chub bzhin/_/'di ni chags med gzhol ba ye shes rgyur skyes so/_/spyi'u tshugs rgyu ba'i 'gro ba sna tshogs ma lus par/_/gzhan yang zhing rnams 'byam klas 
[\[277b.4\]]chags [{]myed [,]med [}]mthar thug pa/_/de dag phra sbom rgya che yangs pa thams cad du/_/byang chub sems mchog de ni gcig pu kun tu 'gro/_/brjod du med pa shin tu phra zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mchog la rtag zhugs shing /_/
[\[277b.5\]]mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas chos mthong [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa/_/de dag chos rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam par chud pa yin/_/'jig rten lam rgyud kun la su zhig snying brtse zhing /_/'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar rtag tu zhugs pa rnams/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[277b.6\]]mthar thug sangs rgyas gdung gi rgyun mi gcod/_/de ni bdud kyi khyim yang rab tu bcom pa yin/_/dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang rgyud gcig dngos gyur cing /_/shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis lam la rtag brtson te/_/su zhig sangs rgyas yul la 
[\[277b.7\]]dad sems pa/_/de ni chags med thub pa kun gyis dbang yang bskur/_/rdo rje lta bur sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo'i mdzad pa rtag tu dran shes shing /_/'dren pa'i spyod yul snang rab shin tu rnyed pa rnams/_/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]gzhan gyi dring la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgyug byang chub sems kyang skye/_/'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rnam par mang shes shing /_/de bzhin las dang 'bras bu sems kyi rnams kyang ste/_/gzhan yang dbang po'i mthu dang khams rnams du ma dag_/kun 
[\[278a.2\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul gcig yin no/_/gang zhig chos kyi dbyings bzhin byang chub sems yangs shing /_/rtag tu chos la mi gnas nam mkha' ji bzhin pa/_/chags med sems ldan de dag sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs/_/de dag rtog 
[\[278a.3\]]med chos can yang dag mtha' la gnas/_/sems can bsam pa rnams 'byed sems can 'du shes med/_/chos kyi rnam rtog khrag khrig pha mthar rab tu phyin/_/de dag rtog la mos shing rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog ste/_/de dag zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 
[\[278a.4\]]zhugs/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rjes sems shing /_/gang zhig chos dbyings tshul gyi mdzod du zhugs gyur la/_/gang zhig sems can dbang po'i rnam par mthar phyin pa/_/de dag sems can gtso bzhin chos nyid shes pa yin/_/
[\[278a.5\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa dge dang rtag par mngon ldan zhing /_/skyes bu seng ge'i bsnyen bkur phyir ldog [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_/'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa mthong bas mi ngoms pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig bye bas byin gyis brlabs/_/zab mo'i chos rnams rnam par 
[\[278a.6\]]'byed kyang chags pa med/_/gnas pa med pas sems kyi dam pa rtag tu dag_/de dag bskal pa mtha' yas skyes bu'i seng ge rnams/_/dus gsum chags pa med par gtogs pa'i yid dang ldan/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs thub par mi nus yid kyi dbang po dang /_/
[\[278a.7\]]gsum pa rjes su song dang rtag tu ldan gyur cing /_/chos rnams 'byam klas shin tu bslabs pas rmongs med pa/_/de dag chos dbyings 'gengs kyang nam yang mi ngoms so/_/tshig gi lam 'das ji bzhin mkhas pa zhi ba shes/_/de bzhin nyid la nam yang 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas thams cad yul la rjes sems shing /_/dus gsum chags pa med par rtogs pa'i yid ldan 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang zhig sems bskyed 'byam klas chos kyi dbyings/_/'gengs shing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing 
[\[278b.2\]]du 'gro ba ni/_/de dag khrag khrig tshul rnams brjod du med pa yi/_/snang ba rnyed par gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras yin no/_/chos rab mu stegs snying rje'i tshul gyi rjes song zhing /_/byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa bar snang ji bzhin te/_/sems can khams la 
[\[278b.3\]]nam yang yongs su rtog med pa/_/de dag rnam rtog med la brtson zhing 'jig rten spyod/_/phyogs bcu dag tu bden pas 'gro ba yid 'bebs par/_/dong pas sems can gtso bo de dag kun tu rgyu/_/bden pa'i tshig brtson rtag tu nges pa'i sems ldan pa/_/
[\[278b.4\]]de dag phyogs bcu'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]yi mchog gis byin gyis brlabs/_/'das par gyur pa'i dus kyang de dag rjes su dran/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs dus la 'jug pa rnam par sgom/_/de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_/sems can phan dang sgrol phyir 
[\[278b.5\]]kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/ye shes 'od mchog dam pas chags pa med gyur la/_/rgyu yi rnam pa chos rab nem nur med brtan rnams/_/de dag the tsom thams cad rnam par ldog pa byed/_/chos kyi dbyings 'dir nem nur med par rab tu 'jug_/gang 
[\[278b.6\]]zhig bdud rnams kun gyi gnas rnams 'joms byed dang /_/gang yang sems can rab rib shin tu sel byed dang /_/gang rnams rtog pa 'jig cing rnam rtog mi 'grogs pa/_/sems can gtso bo de dag yul la the tsom med/_/dus gsum ma lus 
[\[278b.7\]]the tsom rnam par ldog byas shing /_/bsam pa'i mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung 'gro ste/_/dad pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing blo brtan rnyed pa rnams/_/de dag don rtogs khong du chud cing blo yang dag_/mkhas pa 'gro ba'i don du phyi ma'i mthar spro 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]ste/_/sems can don du rnam thar 'byam klas yongs su tshol/_/yun ring dus su skyo ba med cing zhum pa med/_/sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal mang po bzlog par byed/_/de dag bsod nams mi zad ye shes ldan/_/'gro ba'i 
[\[279a.2\]]dbang po sna tshogs bsam la rab tu 'jug_/skye dgu'i las kyi rgyud kyang shin tu shes byas shing /_/bsam pa ji bzhin tshul 'di'i chos rnams mtha' yas brjod/_/'gro la byams pa'i sems rnams kun dang rjes su ldan/_/bdag med nyid 
[\[279a.3\]]rtogs 'on kyang btang snyoms byed pa min/_/de dag snying brtse gcig tu gsal bar chos kyang brjod/_/'on kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mi gnas de dag 'jig rten rgyu/_/de dag 'od zer dra ba sna tshogs mdog bkye zhing /_/'gro ba'i mun pa bsal te kun tu 
[\[279a.4\]]snang byas nas/_/'od zer sgo yi pad mo dag la rgyal sras rnams/_/kun tu bstan te rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyang ston/_/spu gcig rtse la zhing rnams rgyal bas brgyan pa dang /_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras kyis brgyan pa mngon par mthong /_/
[\[279a.5\]]'khor rnams blo sems gzhan dang gzhan can dpe med pa/_/'gro ba de dag sems shes rmongs med ston pa byed/_/sems 'jug gcig gis phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad kyi/_/brjod du med pa khrag khrig zhing rnams kun bgrod cing /_/
[\[279a.6\]]song ste sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don du mchod byas nas/_/dri ba khrag khrig don dang ldan pa sna tshogs 'dri/_/bder gshegs rnams la pha yi 'du shes nyer bzhag cing /_/chos kyi gter mkhas rtag tu shes rab rnon po can/_/ye shes 'byung gnas mkhas 
[\[279a.7\]]pas sangs rgyas chags med phyir/_/'gro ba'i don 'dod byang chub mchog gi spyod pa sgrub/_/gang rnams chos dbyings rnam par phye zhing bsam byas kyang /_/bskal pa mang po 'das byas zad par ma gyur te/_/chos nyid gnas med gang la'ang 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]chud par ma gyur kyang /_/chags med ye shes can rnams skyo sems med par spyod/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i rigs su rigs dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/bder gshegs kun gyi sku las yang dag byung gyur pas/_/chos kyi lus can de dag 'gro la gzugs lus 
[\[279b.2\]]ston/_/sgyu mkhan mkhas pa yid 'ong sgyu ma ston pa bzhin/_/mkhas pa de dag la lar spyod pa mchog brnyes snang /_/la lar mkhas pa skye zhing mya ngan 'das par snang /_/byang chub dam pa'i mchog kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya snang /_/mya ngan 'da' 
[\[279b.3\]]ba ston pa'ang de bzhin la lar snang /_/rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rgyal ba'i sa min pa'i/_/chos nyid de la ji ltar rab tu gnas pa ltos/_/lus dang sgra med bsam med 'du shes ldan pa min/_/'on kyang bya ba sna tshogs du ma nye bar ston/_/'gro 
[\[279b.4\]]bar chos rnams rnam par 'byed cing skyer 'gyur te/_/'jig rten gtso bo mi bzhugs phyi na rgyal sras rnams/_/chags med mthar phyin pa yi ye shes mi gnas te/_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang ston/_/'jig rten 'di 
[\[279b.5\]]na de dag 'dra ba gang yang med/_/de dag bas kyang 'phags pas lta go ci zhig smos/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa ma thob par/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i thabs su rnam 'phrul mchog kyang thob/_/gang rnams chos rab 'phags par 
[\[279b.6\]]rtag tu 'jug byed pa/_de dag chos rab dam pa mchog gi theg pa yin/_/'jig rten dus dang dus min tshod kyang shes byas shing /_/de dag 'gro la phan phyir rnam par 'phrul pa ston/_/dpa' ba gang rnams zhing kun dag gi lus 'gengs shing /_/
[\[279b.7\]]gang rnams 'jig rten 'od zer dra ba mchog gtong ba/_/mun pa bstsal cing snang bas 'jig rten rgyas par byed/_/klu yi dbang po bzhin du chos kyi char pa 'bebs/_/rmi lam lta bu log pa'i sgyu ma 'dra ba yi/_/'du byed rab tu shes nas lam 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]rnams sbyor 'jug cing /_/'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos khyab byas nas/_/rang bzhin dag pas thar lam bya ba med par ston/_/gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhin tshad med dang /_/gang rnams mkha' ltar 'gro ba kun tu 
[\[280a.2\]]mtha' yas shing /_/gang rnams sems can khams kun yongs su dgrol brtson pa/_/de dag bskal pa bye bar grangs med spyad pa spyod/_/las mchog bla na med pa shin tu sbyangs pa yis/_/yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang kun sems shing /_/byang chub 
[\[280a.3\]]sems dpa' de dag spyod pa mchog [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rnam par lta/_/sems 'byung gcig gis 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'byam klas kun tu rgyu zhing 'gro ba rab tu snang /_/rtog dang rnam rtog [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed dag pa'i sems 
[\[280a.4\]]dang ldan/_/de dag gcig min lus la lus gcig ston pa byed/_/de dag 'jig rten kun la rtog par mi byed de/_/mgon po kun gyi chos nyid yongs su mi rtog go_/de dag chos kun rnam 'byed 'dod chags bral gyur pa/_/'gro ba thar bar bya ba yongs su mi gtong 
[\[280a.5\]]ngo /_/'jig rten kun gyi 'du shes rnam pa gang yod pa/_/bzang ngan 'bring dang de bzhin chung dang sna tshogs kyi/_/'du shes thibs po dag dang rab rgal rnam phye ste/_/de dag byin rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu ston/_/ji ltar sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med 
[\[280a.6\]]pa/_/de 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul pas chos dbyings 'di dag 'gengs/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas lus kyi bye brag gis/_/'gro ba rnams kyi mos pa ji bzhin ston pa byed/_/de dag gang la'ang ma chags rtog dang rnam rtog med/_/dog pa med cing nyon mongs 
[\[280a.7\]]de bzhin rlom sems med/_/de dag sangs rgyas chags pa'i blo med thar la min/_/'gro ba kun la'ang bde ba'i 'du shes rab tu skyed/_/'jig rten kun na shes la mkhas rab mi 'jigs pa/_/'jig rten 'du shes gnas la 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/de dag 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]chos kun 'di la 'du shes gang zhes rtog_/de ltar gzhig na dus gsum gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sngon gyi mthar thug pa yi dus la rab zhugs ste/_/phyi ma'i mthar thug ma 'ongs pa la rab zhugs nas/_/zhing rnams kun na ci yod kun kyang de bzhin du/_/shin 
[\[280b.2\]]tu shes kyang rtag par gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la'ang brtson par de bzhin gnas/_/nyon mongs med pa'i tshul gyis rjes song mi gnas te/_/de dag yang dag mtha' 'dra de la 'dra ba med/_/byang chub spyod pa las kyang dpa' bo 
[\[280b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog go/_/gang rnams byang chub brtan pa ri rab bzhin gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas rgyal sras mkhas pas chos dbyings thams cad dang /_/'gro ba kun tu shin tu gang byas pa/_/'di ni dpa' bo rnams kyi spyod pa'i mchog yin no/_/blo mchog dam pa gang 
[\[280b.4\]]zhig thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/rnam grol mdzes pa'i tshul mchog yangs pa 'dod pa ni/_/des ni gang las zag zad srid gsum bde 'byung ba'i/_/byang chub sems la rim pa med par 'jug par gyis/_/gang gis bsam pa rdul bral byang chub sems gnas pa/_/
[\[280b.5\]]de dag yon tan legs pa zad par brjod mi nus/_/'on kyang 'gro ba'i don du bde gshegs legs brjod phyir/_/yon tan ldan pa de yi spyod pa mchog kyang nyon/_/gang gis zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rdul byas te/_/phyogs rnams re re kun tu bkang ste bgrang 
[\[280b.6\]]byas shing /_/de yi rjes su dpag pas rnam 'dren zad byed na/_/'du shes rnams ni mthar thug zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sems can grangs mkhas sems can 'du shes med/_/spyod pa tsam du gzhol zhing sgra la ma chags dang /_/gang zhig 'jig rten 
[\[280b.7\]]khams 'byed chags pa med pa'i sems/_/de dag ldang dang grangs mkhas grangs dmigs med pa yin/_/yid kyis nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' yas rgya che dang /_/dus rnams 'jig rten kun tu rtogs pa'i mkhas pa gang /_/spar mos thal gtor bzhin du the 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]tshom rnam btong ba/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos rtogs yid can chags pa med/_/gang dag phyogs rnams mtha' yas zhing la rab 'jug cing /_/sems bskyed gcig gis blo nyams med par 'dod byed pa/_/de dag tha dad grangs la rtogs 
[\[281a.2\]]pas der zhugs te/_/skyo ba med pa'i chos la yang dag mtha' ltar mkhas/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas pa'i/_/'khor du nye bar phyin te zham ring 'khor gnas shing /_/gtso bo dag la 'dri ba'i thog mar gang 'gro ba/_/spyod yul mchog 
[\[281a.3\]]can de yi smon lam mchog 'di yin/_/gang zhig phyogs rnams kun gyi mgon po kun dran zhing /_/chos nyid de la nam yang gnas par ma gyur pa/_/khams gsum dge ba gang yod kun gyi rgyu yin te/_/de dag zhing rnams thams cad yongs su dag par 
[\[281a.4\]]spyod/_/gang rnams skye ba'i rgyud du srid gsum sna tshogs rnams/_/'jig rten kun na yod la ma chags mig gyur pa/_/de dag bag chags mkhas shing de bzhin dbang po mkhas/_/mos pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas de bzhin mkhas/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa ji 
[\[281a.5\]]bzhin gang gis shes gyur cing /_/shes rab chen po de dag de bzhin chos ston pa/_/de dag kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag tshul la mkhas/_/sems mang rnam par sbyong ba'i lam ldan ston/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brjod yas rnams/_/
[\[281a.6\]]sems kyi rgyu ba gcig gi rjes su zhugs gyur pa/_/de dag mtshan ma sna tshogs gnas pa rab tu shes/_/ldang ba'i rgyu la mkhas shing blo gros spyod yul shes/_/chags [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub de la mngon du gang zhugasashing /_/'gro la phan pa'i don du blo yongs su zhugs 
[\[281a.7\]]pa/_/ye shes 'byam klas 'di dang de dag ldan pa yin/_/de phyir de dag skyes bu mchog gi gsung yang sgrog_/gang zhig bskal pa ring dang bskal pa thung mkhas shing /_/nyin zhag mkhas shing de bzhin zla ba zla phyed mkhas/_/gang yang 'jig rten rtag tu skye ba 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mkhas gyur pa/_/zhing gi rnam pa mkhas shing rnam phye'i chos med pa'o/_/gang rnams phyogs la zhugs te phyogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing /_/phyogs kun tshad ni rjes su shes par ma gyur pa/_/de dag dbus mas phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro byed cing /_/zhing rnams sbyong yang yongs 
[\[281b.2\]]su dag rtogs chags pa med/_/stobs la 'jug pas rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs shes pa/_/'gro ba rnams kyi gnas dang gnas min bsam byas nas/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba'i las kyis/_/yang dag rtogs byas las kyi rnam par smin la gnas/_/
[\[281b.3\]]'jig rten kun mkhas sna tshogs tha dad ji bzhin du/_/srid gsum rnam par rgyu ba'i tshul yang ci bzhin dang /_/dbang po rnon po 'bring dang dbang po tha mar yang /_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi dbang po rnam par 'byed/_/mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs dge dang mi dge 
[\[281b.4\]]dang /_/bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring la rnam par sems byed cing /_/'gro ba kun na 'gro ba brtan pa rnam par 'byed/_/srid gsum rgyu yi rgyud kyang rab tu shes/_/bsam gtan rnam thar nyon mongs ji bzhin mtshan mthong zhing /_/nyon mongs mtshams sbyor rnam 
[\[281b.5\]]byang ci 'gyur dang /_/sngon chad gnas kyi bde dang sdug bsngal rgyud rnams kyang /_/brtan pa rnams ni sangs rgyas stobs rnams sbyong bar byed/_/ji ltar 'gro ba'i lam rgyud nyon mongs las 'jug dang /_/'gro rgyud thams cad 'jig cing zhig 'gyur 
[\[281b.6\]]thams cad dang /_/zag pa sna tshogs rnams kyang ji ltar skyes 'gyur ba/_/bag chags mtshams sbyor ci bzhin de bzhin rab tu 'jug_/ji ltar 'jig rten nyon mongs zad cing dag gyur pa/_/de la skyes bu khyu mchog spyod pa'i blo dang ldan/_/stobs 'chang 
[\[281b.7\]]dag ni stobs bcu rnams kyi 'od snang ste/_/rgyal ba'i stobs kyang thob min the tsom yod pa min/_/spu rtse gcig la gang rnams rnam par sems byed cing /_/la la nyon mongs la la dog dang yangs pa yi/_/sna tshogs zhing rnams tshad las 'das pa kun 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]mthong nas/_/las dang bya ba sna tshogs rgyud du rab tu shes/_/gang rnams rdul gcig rtse la rnam sems brjod med pa'i/_/zhing dang bde gshegs sras rnams sems can gtso mthong yang /_/zhing rnams 'khrugs shing 'dres pa'i nyes pa gang med pa/_/
[\[282a.2\]]gcig nas 'jug pas rnal 'byor ldan pa kun 'jug la/_/spu gcig rtse la phyogs bcu thams cad rnam phye ste/_/nam mkha'i dbyings thug 'jig rten khams rnams kun zhugs shing /_/phyogs 'ga' tsam yang rgyal bas stong par mthong ba med/_/de bzhin 
[\[282a.3\]]zhing dang 'jig rten 'byam klas de dag sbyong /_/de ltar brtan pas rgyal bas stong min zhing shes nas/_/'jig rten kun kyang spu rtse gcig la yod par 'jug_/dus gsum rgyud rnams mtshan nyid tha dad khams kun dang /_/nyin zhag dus dang zla phyed 
[\[282a.4\]]rgyud kyi rnam thar 'jug_/de ltar rgyal sras 'jigs med byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes rgyal srid thob zhugs pa/_/de dag 'di 'dra shes nas rjes su sems byed cing /_/bde gshegs rnams la dga' ba mtha' yas 
[\[282a.5\]]yangs pa 'thob/_/gang rnams bye ba khrag khrig sna tshogs lus sgyur cing /_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mngon par mchod pa'i phyir/_/rnam 'phrul dam pa bzang po kun tu ston byed pa/_/de dag mgon po rnams kyi spyod yul rab la zhugs/_/gang 
[\[282a.6\]]rnams sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drung bslabs shing /_/gang rnams chos kyi mdzod rtogs yid la ngoms med de/_/gang dag mgon po khyu mchog rnams la dga' sems pa/_/de dag chos kyi sprin yin spyod pa mang la spyod/_/ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[282a.7\]]chos kyi gnas mkhas pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas 'byung gnas ting 'dzin thob pa yin/_/ri rgyal lta bu de dag dad pa'i 'byung gnas rten/_/ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung gnas so/_/gnas pa med pa dam pa shin tu yangs pa dang /_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen la mngon gyur mya ngan med pa dang /_/sems can skyob cing nyon mongs rnyog pa med zhugs pa'i/_/byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba kun kyang 'gengs/_/de dag snying rje'i blo yang shin tu yangs pa yin/_/bdag la cir sems 
[\[282b.2\]]de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/_/gzhan du nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med par 'jug_/nyams par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams mthong phyir zhing rtsom/_/byang chub sems la mkhas pa dag gi tshad dag ni/_/bskal pa bye ba'i mthas kyang 
[\[282b.3\]]brjod par mi nus te/_/ci phyir zhe na de las sangs rgyas thams cad byung /_/dbang bdes rim gror byas dang rang rgyal kun kyang 'byung /_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams grangs med bcur ni bgrang gyur pa'i/_/sems can thams cad bskal pa gcig tu bder 
[\[282b.4\]]bkod cing /_/bslab pa bcu dang dge bcu bsam gtan 'thob pa dang /_/tshangs pa dag dang rnam grol zhi ba'i gnas bkod cing /_/de dag bskal pa bye bar bde bar rab bkod de/_/dgra bcom nyon mongs zhi la rab tu dgod byas kyang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[282b.5\]]dpa'i dge ba'i tshogs kyi char [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_/byang chub sems dpa' zhugs ma thag tu tshogs chen [{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/nyon mongs med cing shin tu phra lam rtogs pa yin/_/rang rgyal sems can bye ba khrag khrig bkod gyur kyang /_/bsod nams bsags pa des ni byang chub 
[\[282b.6\]]sems rab la/_/grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba'i rnam par nyer [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro/_/zhing gi rdul ni tshad kyis shes par rung yang srid/_/skad cig sems kyis zhing mang yongs su 'das byas shing /_/de ltar bskal pa brjod yas zad par 'gro byas na/_/zhing mtha' thug par rung 
[\[282b.7\]]srid byang chub sems mchog min/_/mtha' rnams kun tu bskal pa mang po'i mtha' med de/_/sngon gyi mtha' gyur bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa zad dang thub med pa'i/_/bskal pa de dag zad srid byang chub sems ma yin/_/ci phyir zhe 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]na 'di ltar phyogs rnams kun bkang shing /_/rtog dang rnam rtog yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_/skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rtogs par bya don tu/_/'gro ba'i don du 'dod cing sems mchog rin chen skye/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams 
[\[283a.2\]]stong mang kun tu mtha' yas pa'i/_/'gro ba rnams kyi mos pa bsam pa ci 'dra dang /_/sbyor ba gang dang sems dang spyod pa de bzhin te/_/mthar thug rung srid mkha' 'dra'i byang chub sems mtha' min/_/de ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu byams dang snying rje dang /_/bsam 
[\[283a.3\]]pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas byas shing /_/thar pa'i don du sangs rgyas yon tan kun spyod phyir/_/rin chen sems kyi stobs ni tshad med rab tu skyes/_/mos dang bsam pa yid bzhin yang dag sbyor ba dang /_/'gro ba'i dbang po sbyor bar sems dang spyod pa rnams/_/
[\[283a.4\]]skad cig gcig gis ji bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lta bu'i sems skyes so/_/'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs 'byam klas pa/_/gang gis khams gsum 'di dag tu ni skye 'gyur ba/_/de dag mtha' ni phyogs bcur rnyed 
[\[283a.5\]]par rung srid kyi/_/byang chub sems kyi mchog la kun tu mtha' med do/_/ci phyir zhe na 'di ltar nyon mongs las grol ba'i/_/sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i don du skye/_/nyon mongs grol byed de bzhin las kyi rgyud kyang gcod/_/dus gsum 
[\[283a.6\]]mun pa sel cing mi zad snying rjes byung /_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad dang /_/sems can mang po thams cad sems gcig bskyed pa yis/_/spos dang me tog phreng ba byug pa dam pa dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bza' btung na 
[\[283a.7\]]bzas mchod par byed/_/gzhan yang gdan gyi rnam pa 'chags dam pa dang /_/pho brang mang po sna tshogs tsan dan mchog bsangs pa/_/nor bu rin chen rnam par snang bas brgyan pa dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu yid 'ong brgyan pas mchod byas te/_/de ltar 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bde gshegs sems can mngon par mchod byed pas/_/bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par zad byas kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i bde bstsags mthar phyin bde ba nyid/_/gang bsgrubs byang chub sems la mnyam par nyer mi 'gro/_/ji snyed dper brjod byas pa 
[\[283b.2\]]'di dag thams cad kyang /_/yang dag skyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi char mi rung /_/de yang 'di ltar dus gsum bzhugs pa'i skyes bu mchog_/thams cad byang chub sems mchog de las byung ba yin/_/byang chub sems ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/_/
[\[283b.3\]]thams cad tshad la gnas kyang de la tshad yod min/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhol zhing tshad med stobs/_/sems can rang bzhin de bzhin byang chub mthar yang phyin/_/byang chub sems ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste/_/chos rnams kun 
[\[283b.4\]]la khyab pa chos dbyings ci bzhin no/_/tshad med de bzhin nyid kun de'i spyod yul gyur/_/des ni kun tu khyab pa'i sems can gtso bzhin no/_/de ni 'byam klas chos rnams kun la rjes su zhugs/_/des ni zhing rnams ma lus 'byam klas kun tu khyab/_/des ni 
[\[283b.5\]]shes pa 'byam klas thams cad rtogs par chud/_/des ni sangs rgyas 'byam klas kun dang 'gal med thob/_/rtag tu bsod nams bla na med pa dag dang ldan/_/de bzhin rtag tu tshul khrims rnam dag mi gnas ldan/_/rtag tu kun gtong rtag par rab tu 
[\[283b.6\]]dge ba ste/_/ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus mchog dang rab tu ldan/_/bsam gtan mdzod la rtag par bsam gtan 'jug par byed/_/shes rab shin tu yangs pa dang yang rtag tu ldan/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis rab dam pa gang yod pa/_/
[\[283b.7\]]de dag don du ye shes kun tu bzang po byung /_/'gro ba kun na skyes bu ye shes gang bzhugs pa/_/de dag gis ni byang chub sems rab byin gyis brlabs/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi dam pas rab tu brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rnam pas rab tu brgyan/_/'jig rten kun dang 'gro ba rnams kyi ji tsam tshad/_/nam mkha'i tshad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu ji tsam pa/_/de dag bas kyang byang chub sems 'di tshad med de/_/de las skyes bu'i seng ge kun kyang skyes shing 
[\[284a.2\]]byung /_/byang chub sems 'di stobs bcu rnams kyi rtsa ba ste/_/brten pa bzhi yi gnas yin so sor shes pa'i rtsa/_/rgyal ba'i chos rnams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yang dag 'byin pa ste/_/skyes bu'i gtso bos mkhyen par bya ba'i chos kun 'byin/_/gzugs kyi sku ni 
[\[284a.3\]]mtshan rab rnams kyis bstsags pa dang /_/chos sku mnyam nyid rtog pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' brnyes pa dang /_/'gro bas mchod pa'i ye shes chags med gang byung ba/_/kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems 'di yin/_/rang rgyal theg pa 'byung zhing nyan 
[\[284a.4\]]thos theg pa'ang 'byung /_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba gzugs kyi khams rnams dang /_/gzugs med khams rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba dag_/kun gyi rtsa ba byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/_/mi dang de bzhin lha yi dbang po'i bde ba dang /_/
[\[284a.5\]]lam rgyud sna tshogs kun kyang 'di la shin tu sbyangs/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po'i bde ba gang yod pa/_/kun gyi rtsa ba dang po byang chub sems 'di yin/_/ci phyir zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed cing /_/pha rol phyin drug brtson par 
[\[284a.6\]]spyad pa rab tu spyod/_/sems can rnams la'ang spyod pa yang dag rab tu ston/_/des ni khams gsum 'gro ba'i bde ba kun kyang 'byung /_/sangs rgyas chags med thugs chud don dam mkhyen pa rnams/_/chos kyi dam pa'i mchog rnams 
[\[284a.7\]]yang dag kun ston cing /_/rgya chen nyon mongs las las sems can grol mdzad de/_/mya ngan 'das pa dam pa mchog la dgod mdzad pa/_/ye shes 'od zer 'od yangs nyi ma lta bu ste/_/'gro bar spyod pa dkar pos yongs rgyas zla ba bzhin/_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]yon tan shin tu bsags pa tshad med chu lta bu/_/dri med chags pa mi mnga' tshad med mkha' dbyings 'dra/_/gang zhig yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems yangs pa/_/shin tu che zhing bde skyid tshad med smon byed cing /_/phyi ma'i mthar thug spyod par 
[\[284b.2\]]smon pas su brtson pa/_/de dag sems can gdul ba'i don phyir rtag tu brtson/_/'jig rten 'byam klas thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/_/smon lam bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/stong pa mtshan ma med pa smon med mi gnas pa'i/_/
[\[284b.3\]]smon lam bye ba brgyas ni sems de dag par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu sus rtogs shing /_/zhi dang rab zhi nyer zhir thams cad mnyam gzhog pa/_/de dag chos grangs khrag khrig bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i/_/grangs su 'gro 
[\[284b.4\]]la ston kyang de ni gnas pa med/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gtso bo ji snyed pa/_/de dag kun gyi byang chub sems mchog 'di bsngags te/_/yon tan brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pas kyang brgyan/_/sems can gtso bzhin yang dag pha rol phyin 
[\[284b.5\]]pa yin/_/bskal pa sems can snyed du gal te legs brjod kyang /_/byang chub sems rab de la mthar thug gang yang med/_/rgyal ba 'byung ba'i rin chen der ni gang skyes pa/_/de yi dpe ni khams gsum glongs kyang gang yang med/_/dus gsum 
[\[284b.6\]]rgyal ba kun gyis gang zhig rnam bstsags pa'i/_/byang chub sems rab de la smon lam kun gyis gyis/_/byang chub sems rab dam pa de ni bsod nams gter/_/des ni rgyal sras chags pa med pa rab tu 'thob/_/'gro ba'i sems dang spyod pa shes shing
