[\[284b.7\]]mthong rung srid/_/zhing rnams rdul du blags te bgrang bar nus kyang srid/_/bar snang skra yis mnyam par gzhal bar nus srid kyi/_//byang chub sems mchog yon tan mthar phyin [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'di las dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]byung /_/'di las 'jig rten 'gro ba kun gyi bde ba 'byung /_/'di las rgyal bas bsngags pa'i legs pa thams cad 'byung /_/'dis ni sems can gtso la the tsom med par 'gyur/_/'dis ni 'jig rten kun gyi sgrib 
[\[285a.2\]]pa zad par 'gyur/_/'dis ni zhing rnams yongs su dag pa'i mchog du 'gyur/_/'di las 'jig rten dam pa shes dang ldan pa 'byung /_/gang zhig phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba blta bar 'dod pa dang /_/gang zhig byin dang bsod nams [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad mdzod 'dod dang /_/
[\[285a.3\]]gang zhig 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zlog 'dod pa/_/des ni yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems bskyed bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dpe yang dag par bsags pa tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu gnyis so//_//
[\[285a.4\]{D44-23}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[285a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa rab tu thob pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas pa/_de ltar tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya chen po la yang dag par 'dzeg pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[285a.6\]]skyon med par shin tu chud pa/_'jig rten kun tu khrid par byed pa rnam par bzlog pa/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[285a.7\]]cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la shin tu nges pa/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu gzhol ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ji ltar brtson par byas pa'i rnam pa gang gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa las 'das par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[285b.2\]]gter chen po rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams la snod ji bzhin du sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[285b.3\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi gdung mi chad par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dmigs pa thams cad du sbyor ba don med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de la brtson par byas pas chos kyi yul 'di dag 
[\[285b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar ji ltar brtsams par bya ba de legs par bshad pa mdzod cig_/'khor 'di dag thams cad ni nyan par 'dod do/_/sems can chen po de dag gis brtson pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus ma rig pa'i mun nag thams cad bstsal te/_bdud 
[\[285b.5\]]kyi dkrugs ma'i 'khor thams cad las shin tu rgyal bar byas nas/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_sems kyi dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad kun nas bstsal nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 
[\[285b.6\]]shin tu bsgrubs te/_mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par byang bar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 
[\[285b.7\]]'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rgyas par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul 
[\[286a.2\]]rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_de ltar mngon par byang chub nas kyang bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub par gyur pa dag tu ji ltar yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems can dag la/_dus dang dbang po'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[286a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa 'byin par 'gyur ba de legs par shod cig_/'khor 'di dag thams cad ni nyan par 'dod do/_/ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[286a.4\]]chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi yul rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[286a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di yang yang dag par bsrung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas shing /_ston pa dang 'chad pa'i tshe/_bdud dang bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa dang /_
[\[286a.6\]]phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang skyo ba med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /_de yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/_lha'i dbang po rnams kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_
[\[286a.7\]]gzhung de bzhin du klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_dri za'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /_mi'i dbang po dang /_
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]tshangs pa'i dbang pos rim gror bya ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbang pos rim gro bya ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_de ltar rim gror byas nas kyang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyis 
[\[286b.2\]]mngon par mchod pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shin tu dgongs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis shin tu bsrungs pa/_rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_smon lam rab tu thob pa/_
[\[286b.3\]]chos dkar po chen po yang dag par spel ba rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'byed par 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rgya chen po rab tu 'byed 
[\[286b.4\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rim gyis spyod pa yongs su bsgrubs pa/_shin tu ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas dag yang dag par bstan pa mdzod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis don 'di nyid bstan te brjod pa'i phyir/_
[\[286b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_spyod la 'jug pa mtha' yas yangs pa dag_/rang 'byung ye shes bsgrub pa dge ba rnams/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan can/_/grags pa chen po rnams 
[\[286b.6\]]la legs par shod/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams sems thob cing /_/bsod nams ldan pa ye shes thob pa rnams/_/skyon med zhugs pa'i 'jig rten rnams bzlog cing /_/yang dag sangs rgyas chos mnyam nyid thob rnams/_/
[\[286b.7\]]de dag gis ni bde gshegs bstan pa la/_/brtson 'grus brtan pas ji ltar brtson par bya/_/gang gis phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes byas shing /_/yang dag sangs rgyas sa yang gnan bya dang /_/spyod pa dag dang smon lam yongs dag dang /_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ye shes gter chen rab tu thob 'gyur zhing /_/thob nas de dag 'gro kun mi gnas pas/_/yongs su blangs pa rtag tu gtong byed dang /_/gang yang pha rol phyin pa mchog gi lam/_/de dag mi gtong rab tu brjod pa dang /_/sems can ji ltar 
[\[287a.2\]]sgrol byed dam bcas shing /_/yang dag sangs rgyas bsam pa mnyam 'dzin dang /_/mig gi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa brtan pa thams cad kyi/_/'byung ba yon tan can la stobs 'gyur zhing /_/skyes bu khyu mchog de dag brtson gyur pa'i/_/rnam dag lam de khyu mchog 
[\[287a.3\]]khyod kyis ston/_/ji ltar de dag mun pa kun bstsal cing /_/'khrug pa'i 'khor rnams thams cad pham byas nas/_/dri ma bral ba'i dge ldan mkhas pa rnams/_/skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ldan 'gyur dang /_/mi khom ngan song lam rnams yongs 
[\[287a.4\]]spangs shing /_/ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor mchog spyod dang /_/yon tan bzang po thams cad ldan 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal ba'i ye shes stobs kyang thob gyur dang /_/skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes zhugs nas kyang /_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin 
[\[287a.5\]]ston byed cing /_/mtha' yas yangs pa'i zhing rnams bsam yas su/_/ston pa chen po'i las kyang byed pa dang /_/ci nas de dag spyod pa mchog thob nas/_/mi yi khyu mchog mdzod rnams ston byed de/_/zil gyis mi non gzhan gyis mi pham 
[\[287a.6\]]par/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid rtag tu 'dzin byed ston/_/seng ge bzhin du ji ltar 'jigs pa med/_/ji ltar zla bzhin dag pa'i mdog tu spyod/_/chu la pad mo bzhin du chags med pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan ji ltar spyod/_/de skad ces 
[\[287a.7\]]smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs shing /_rnam par dag pa brtsams te/_'dri zhing de ltar rgyal ba'i sras khyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'dri 
[\[287b.2\]]ba chos mang po la rab tu gnas pa/_brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu bstsags pa/_brtson 'grus ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas shin tu 'byung ba 'dri bar byed pa ni/_kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid 
[\[287b.3\]]la zung shig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs tsam bstan par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa thob pa rnams kyis thog mar sems bskyed pa de mi 
[\[287b.4\]]nyams par yongs su bsrung ba dang /_rim gror bya ba'i phyir bag yod par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la rnam pa bcus na byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu bsrung ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[287b.5\]]kyi sems mnyams shing shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa g.yo dang sgyu med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor ba phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rang gi sems bskyed pa shin tu rtogs pa dang /_phyogs khyim pa dang /_so so'i skye bo dang ma 'dres pa dang /_
[\[287b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las 'jig rten gyi 'du shes dang /_'dod pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spangs pa rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa nan tan rgyun chad pa med pa dang /_
[\[287b.7\]]bdag gi rgyud kyi stobs kyi shugs shin tu brtags pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa ni/_
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]rnam pa bcus na yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa yin/_shes bzhin gyi dran pa can yin/_khengs pa med cing g.yo ba med de/_bsam gtan 
[\[288a.2\]]zab mo la rab tu gnas pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo btsal ba la nan tan du byed cing rgyun mi gcod pa yin/_lhag mthong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtogs par zhugs pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi rjes su song ba'i 
[\[288a.3\]]sems kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo'i rjes su song ba yin/_sa dang mnyam zhing mthon dman dang bral ba yin/_sbyor ba bzang ngan dang bar ma la sems nyams pa med pa yin/_sems can kun gyi nang na chung ngu na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[288a.4\]]sems gcig bskyed pa la 'ang ston pa'i bsam pa thob pa yin/_mkhan po dang slob dpon dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_chos smra ba rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti'i ngang tshul can du gnas pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa 
[\[288a.5\]]bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa/_yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mos pa che ba rnal 'byor 
[\[288a.6\]]rgyun ma chad pa chos thams cad la mi gnas pa/_chos thams cad la brtson pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/_sems yangs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rjes su song ba rnams kyis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[288a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' chos bcus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thams cad la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /_'tsho ba'i rkyen la don du gnyer ba med pa dang /_chos thams cad rnam par bsgoms pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /_mi gnas 
[\[288b.2\]]pa'i chos rnam par bsgom pa'i phyag rgya dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam chen po dang /_yongs su sbyangs pa'i bzod pa shes pa'i snang ba dang /_rang gi dge ba'i chos bstsags pa dang /_ma bstsags pa shin tu brtags pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[288b.3\]]'du bya ba med pa'i sgo shin tu byang ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu la gnas pa rnams kyis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba yin te/_
[\[288b.4\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bag yod pa la gnas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i bzod pa la gnas pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang /_spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang /_smon 
[\[288b.5\]]lam mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa dang /_brtan pa'i stobs kyi shugs la gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la gnas pa dang /_len pa med pa la gnas pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras chos de 
[\[288b.6\]]dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sa rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_
[\[288b.7\]]bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shin tu bstsags pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i lam gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes snang ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rgyun ma chad pa dang /_brtson 'grus zhig pa med pa dang /_
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis legs par brlabs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas mi skyo ba dang /_theg pa'i rgyan shin tu bshams pa dang /_ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tu rno ba dang /_sa dang sa ram yin pa'i 
[\[289a.2\]]chos kyi sgo la mi gnas pa dang /_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras chos bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_
[\[289a.3\]]sa nas sar rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni thog ma nas/_sa rnam par dgod pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa yin te/_chos kyi sgo gang gis gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes kyi 
[\[289a.4\]]sgo gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bsgrub pa gang yin pa dang /_rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa dang /_spyod yul gang yin pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i khyad par gang yin pa 
[\[289a.5\]]dang /_ji ltar thob par bya ba thams cad kyi 'ang rnam par dpyod do/_/de dag la shin tu rnam par dpyad pas/_chos thams cad la mi gnas shing sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang dag par 'da'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[289a.6\]]sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di ltar bdag cag gis ji nas kyang myur du 'da' bar bya'o/_/snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag sa nas sa la rnam par gnas pas/_ji lta ji ltar yang dag 
[\[289a.7\]]par gnas pa de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs ches che ba skye bar 'gyur te/_ji lta ji ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po skyes par gyur pa/_de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pas nye bar gnas par 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]'gyur ro snyam ste de dag sbyor ba rgyun mi chad cing skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_tshogs kyi rgyan chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bkod pa las yang dag par 'da'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam pa bcus spyod 
[\[289b.2\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar byas te/_bcu gang zhe na yo byad yongs su gzung ba med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_bzod pa dang des pa mi zad pa'i sa'i rjes su 
[\[289b.3\]]song ba dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa'i stobs kyi shugs rmongs pa med pa dang /_gcig las rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang /_gnas med pa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' ba 
[\[289b.4\]]thams cad la sems ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang /_sems can thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'i mu stegs su gyur pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag 
[\[289b.5\]]gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong bar bya'o/_/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa de rnam pa bcus shin tu dag par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na sems can gyi gtso bo 'jig rten 
[\[289b.6\]]gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pas yang dag par dgongs pa dang /_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i grogs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[289b.7\]]la yang dag par brten pa dang /_mos pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_bag yod pa la rab tu gnas pa dang /_chos tha dad pa thams cad la tha mi dad par rtogs pa dang /_snying rje'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu che ba dang /_chos thams cad yang dag pa ji 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_thabs la mkhas par rnam par dpyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_sbyor ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag ste/_
[\[290a.2\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par dag pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste skyo ba med 
[\[290a.3\]]par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstsags pas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang /_lus dang srog gis bsngo zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam dang /_
[\[290a.4\]]ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba khong du chud pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis su med pas tshul gcig gi rgyud du 'gro ba'i smon lam dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo la 'jug pas chos 
[\[290a.5\]]thams cad khong du chud pa'i smon lam dang /_mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas blta na don yod pa'i smon lam dang /_phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas bskal par gnas pa'i smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i theg pa'i rgyan 
[\[290a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam par sbyang ba'i smon lam dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de ltar smon lam rnam par sbyong ngo /_/de dag rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na yongs su skyo 
[\[290a.7\]]ba med pa dang /_rgyan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thos nas/_
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]rang gi smon lam du mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_bsam pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar gtugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad du gnas par mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[290b.2\]]sdug bsngal thams cad kyis ji mi snyam pa dang /_bde ba thams cad la ye mi brngam pa dang /_bsam pa mnyam pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bsgrub pa dag ste/_de dag smon lam chen po de ltar yongs su sbyong zhing /_yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[290b.3\]]byed pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/gzungs 'khrul pa med pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/smon lam zad mi shes pas chos thams cad shin tu rtogs pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu 'thob bo/_/
[\[290b.4\]]snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob po/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob po/_/'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 
[\[290b.5\]]'thob po/_/chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa'i ye shes kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/rnam par smyin pa la gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' 
[\[290b.6\]]yas pa'i gter zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par gtogs pa la 'jug pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/de ltar gter rab tu thob cing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes 
[\[290b.7\]]pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pas/_sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter gyi sbyin pa byed do/_/de la rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar 'jug ce na/_sbyor ba ji lta bur rgyu ba dang /_rgyu dang rkyen ji lta ba dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba las/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/_de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[291a.2\]]pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing chos yang dag par ston te/_de dag 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir mi sdug pa yang dag par ston to/_/zhe sdang gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_byams pa chen 
[\[291a.3\]]po'i sbyor ba yang dag par ston to/_/gti mug gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yang dag par ston to/_/cha mnyam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to/_/
[\[291a.4\]]'khor ba'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa yang dag par ston to/_/gnas kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to/_/zhum pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i 
[\[291a.5\]]phyir/_rgya chen po'i yul yang dag par ston to/_/bdag gi nga rgyal gyis bcom pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_chos kyi mnyam pa nyid yang dag par ston to/_/g.yo dang sgyus mi mnyam pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[291a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_zhi ba'i gnas kyi bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par ston to/_/de dag ni de ltar sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter yang dag par ston to/_/de yang don dbyer med pa yang 
[\[291a.7\]]dag par ston te/_yi ge'i mtshams 'byor bar sbyar bas yang dag par ston to/_/shes pa rnam par dbye bas yang dag par ston to/_/bstan pa snga phyi ma 'dres pas yang dag par ston to/_/chos kyi tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i bye brag dbyer med pas 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]yang dag par ston to/_/mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya rnam par mi 'khrugs pas yang dag par ston to/_/chos rab tu dgod pa rgyun chad pa med pas yang dag par ston to/_/mtha' yas pa sbyang bas yang dag par ston to/_/the tshom thams cad shin tu gcad pa'i phyir 
[\[291b.2\]]yang dag par ston to/_/dbang po'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la dgod par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' mtshan nyid med pa rnam par mi 'khrug pas yang dag par ston to/_/
[\[291b.3\]]chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to/_/chos kyi rnga yang dag par brdung bas yang dag par ston to/_/gnas thams cad yang dag par spang bas yang dag par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mi 
[\[291b.4\]]gtong bas yang dag par ston to/_/tshig dang skad dang sgra dang ngag gi las thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pas yang dag par ston to/_/rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro bas yang dag par ston to/_/dpe thams cad rnam par dgod pas 
[\[291b.5\]]rgyud dang mi 'gal bas brtan par bya bas yang dag par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang gi lus su sems pa la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to/_/de ltar sems can la chos yang dag par 
[\[291b.6\]]ston pas/_rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par chos kyi nan tan gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rang gi don rting tshugs par byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs mi gtong bas rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa yang dag par bsgrub bo/_/
[\[291b.7\]]de la 'ang sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /_yo byad kyis yongs su bsdud pa dang /_sbyor ba mnyam par yongs su gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong ba dang /_gnas pa 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]med pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/nyes pa thams cad khyad du gsod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba dang /_mthon dman 
[\[292a.2\]]med pa dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i sa mnyam par 'dzin pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/brtsam pa chen po brtsams pa dang /_brtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa dang /_sbyor ba phyir mi ldog pa dang /_yid la byed pa phyir mi 
[\[292a.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_mthu mtha' yas pa dang /_stobs la thub pa med pa dang /_sngon du 'dor ba mi 'phrogs pa dang /_dad pa'i mthu chen po dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba med pa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nyams 
[\[292a.4\]]pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'du 'dzi yongs su sbyong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_rim gyis bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[292a.5\]]gnas med cing blang ba med pa shin tu rtogs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu sel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_rim gyis rnam 
[\[292a.6\]]par spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la rab tu 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gcig la sgo mtha' yas par rab tu 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul thams cad shes pa dang /_de'i yul gyi rjes su rab tu zhugs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms 
[\[292a.7\]]par 'jug pa thams cad ye shes kyi phyag rgya mi 'khrugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_blang ba dang /_bcang 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_chos thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_de la mngon sum du mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_sgro 'dogs pa'i lta ba thams cad 
[\[292b.2\]]dang bral ba dang /_chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya tha mi dad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo nas lhun gyis grub par sgom zhing bsgom pa dang /_stobs la 'jug pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[292b.3\]]shes la 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo kun dang ldan pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa dang /_sems 
[\[292b.4\]]can yongs su smyin pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_bsam pa bzhin du bya ba ston pa dang /_bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang /_byis pa'i spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i spyod pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /_'khor 
[\[292b.5\]]ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa dang /_sbyor ba thams cad shin tu brtags pas rgyu ba dang /_rgyan thams cad bstan pa gnas med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sems can thams cad sgrol 
[\[292b.6\]]ba'i spyod pas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ngo /_/sems can gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthar thug par 
[\[292b.7\]]mchod pa dang /_chos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug par rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug par spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par rab tu gnas pa dang /_sems bskyed pa'i 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]mthar thug par stobs la 'jug pa dang /_'gro ba dang ldog pa mthar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_zhing gi gnas kyi mthar thug par thams cad mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rab tu thob 
[\[293a.2\]]par bya bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang du gyur cing thub pa med pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i stobs skyo ba med pa dang /_byams pa chen po'i 
[\[293a.3\]]stobs snyoms pa'i sbyor ba can dang /_gzungs kyi stobs don thams cad kyi sbyor ba la bsgribs pa med pa dang /_spobs pa'i stobs 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs theg pa thams cad kyi rgyan byed pa dang /_smon lam gyi 
[\[293a.4\]]stobs gcad du mi rung ba dang /_mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzin pas/_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/'dod chags 
[\[293a.5\]]kyi spyod pa khong du chud pa dang /_zhe sdang gi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa dang /_gti mug gi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /_cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa rjes su shes pa dang /_slob pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /_skad cig gcig gis sems can 
[\[293a.6\]]mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par rtogs pa dang /_sems dang bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_chos 
[\[293a.7\]]kyi dbyings kyi sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khong du chud pas/_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/de dag de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_pha rol gyi phyogs 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]mi gtong bar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rgya chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa la gnas shing /_sems can gyi khams ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrol lo/_/de dag dge ba'i las shin tu bstsags pa ston pas/_ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can 
[\[293b.2\]]sgrol lo/_/brtsam pa chen po la gzud pas sems can gyi khams mi khom par 'gro ba sgrol lo/_/lhag mthong nye bar bstabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo/_/phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs pas gzugs med pa'i khams su 
[\[293b.3\]]skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgrol lo/_/zhi ba'i tshul nye bar bstabs pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo/_/stobs bcu'i rgyan chen po dang ldan pa bstabs pas/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can gyi 
[\[293b.4\]]khams sgrol lo/_/de ltar na sngon las dang po pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe/_sems can g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/_sgo sna tshogs nas gzung bar bya'o/_/zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob 
[\[293b.5\]]pa rnam sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa ni rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos kyi rigs dang dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_
[\[293b.6\]]de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la gzhol bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grel pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas/_dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa 
[\[293b.7\]]yin/_smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_snying po thob par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'dun gyi rigs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]mi gcod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa la mi 
[\[294a.2\]]skyo bas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mi gtong bas/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[294a.3\]]chos dang dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/_de dag de ltar skyabs gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pas rtsom pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te/_brtsams pa gang ci rtsom yang rung /_de dag thams cad du thogs pa med par thams cad mkhyen 
[\[294a.4\]]pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob par byed do/_/de dag de ltar lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa don yod par rtsom pa yin te/_sems can gyi don sbyor ba 
[\[294a.5\]]don yod par rtsom mo/_/sems can don yod par 'dul bar byed do/_/chos don yod par ston to/_/de'i chos ston pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba la thogs pa med pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de'i sems bskyed pa gcig 
[\[294a.6\]]tsam yang log par mi 'gyur te/_sems bskyed pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de ltar chos dkar po bstsags pa don yod pa de lta bu la gnas pas rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus 
[\[294a.7\]]sems bskyed pa thams cad yongs su bsngo ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar lus kyi rgyan sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang /_ngag gi rgyan the tsom thams cad gcod pa dang /_sems kyi rgyan skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin rjes su 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]rtogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'od kyi rgyan 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bkye bas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i 
[\[294b.2\]]tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang /_mya ngan las 
[\[294b.3\]]'das pa'i rgyan mngon par sangs rgyas pa gcig gis phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_chos byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyan yul dang /_dus dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dag ste/_de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa 
[\[294b.4\]]thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod pa dang /_ye shes chen po don yod pa rab tu 'thob ste/_de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir 
[\[294b.5\]]sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te/_thos pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_'grogs pa dang /_rjes su dran pa dang /_rjes su rab tu byung ba dang /_chos ston pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yid rang ba dang /_dad cing mos pa dang /_chung ngu na 
[\[294b.6\]]ming brjod pa tsam yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la don du 'gyur ba yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na rtsi'i ming mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can 
[\[294b.7\]]rnams kyi lus la zhen pa'am ltor zos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/_chos dkar 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid de lta bu dang ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas te/_shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas/_
[\[295a.2\]]bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i 'khor thams cad byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas te/_ye shes dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas/_sems 
[\[295a.3\]]kyi dri ma thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsal nas/_skyo ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu bsgrubs te/_sngon cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par spyod pa'i stobs dang 
[\[295a.4\]]shugs kyis mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas/_mngon par zhen pa med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/_rim gyis thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang /_shugs 
[\[295a.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/_chos dkar po thams cad kyi stobs dang shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[295a.6\]]mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te/_ye shes kyis shes par bya ba'i dbang dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[295a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon lam gyi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi byin 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan te/_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor cing /_mtha' yas 
[\[295b.2\]]pa'i sems can rnam par 'dul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos de lta bu dang ldan pa dag ni tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[295b.3\]]khams mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing /_chos smra ba chen po yang byed do/_/de ltar chos smra ba byed pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po 
[\[295b.4\]]gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir/_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gi lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs pas 
[\[295b.5\]]rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i mkhas pa mtha' yas pa dang /_ye shes mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang /_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_dbyangs gcig bsgrags pas 
[\[295b.6\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_shes pa'i sa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang /_lus kyi byin gyi rlabs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin 
[\[295b.7\]]kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang /_lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam par bstan pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang /_bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang /_tshig grol ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa dang chos 'chad 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]pa'i byin gyi rlabs la/_mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de/_stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i dbang zhum pa med pa dang /_chos kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang /_ye shes kyi dbang 
[\[296a.2\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa med pa dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i dbang mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chad pa med par bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dang /_gzungs kyi dbang chos thams cad rnam par 
[\[296a.3\]]gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ba la 'jug pa dang /_smon lam gyi dbang dpe sna tshogs kyis bstan pa'i tshul nye bar bsgrub pa shin tu bstan pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i dbang phyir mi ldog cing rgyun ma chad pa dang /_byams pa chen po'i dbang sngon shin tu bskyed pas bsam pa thams cad tshim 
[\[296a.4\]]par byed cing /_'od zer gyi dra ba chen po gtong bas chos kyi gtam chen po byed do/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos kyi gtam gsung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma gtogs 
[\[296a.5\]]par sems can gyi ris na/_byang chub sems dpa' de la phyir brgal ba'am/_spyi gtsug blta ba'am/_zil gyis gnan pa'am/_dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med de/_de ni gnas med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[296a.6\]]sras gal te byang chub sems dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig yod la 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum gyi bdag po'i gzi brjid thob pa sha stag gis gang ba zhig yin 
[\[296a.7\]]na yang /_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tu lus bstan pa'i dbang gis zil gyis mnan te/_byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gzhi tshim par byas nas ye shes chen po'i dbang gis sems dang bsam pa rnam 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]par shes par byas te/_mi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston par byed cing /_spobs pa chen po'i dbang gis sems can tshim par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med 
[\[296b.2\]]pa dang ldan/_chos rnam par 'byed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan/_dran pa'i stobs dang shugs ma nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan/_chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar bzung zhing blangs pas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan/_
[\[296b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mkhas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan/_chos kyi mtshan nyid bsgribs pa med pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang ldan/_mos pa la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs pa dang ldan/_dus gsum gyi 
[\[296b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi brlab la mkhas pa dang ldan/_sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i 
[\[296b.5\]]bsam pa bzang po rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/_chos smra ba chen po byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam par 'byed do/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[296b.6\]]kyi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang /_ye shes 'byam klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis yang 
[\[296b.7\]]dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bsod nams tshogs bstsags byang chub sems la gnas pa rnams/_/rtag tu bag 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dag_/dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab mi gtong bas/_/phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can/_/
[\[297a.2\]]'jig rten kun la rtag tu mi gnas mi ldog pa/_/zab pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan med pa'i tshul mkhas rnams/_/phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/_/brtson 'grus brtan pas bde gshegs mnyes par byas nas kyang /_/dus 
[\[297a.3\]]gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams/_/sa rnams gnon byed spyod mchog nyams pa med par byed/_/thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa'ang de bzhin byed/_/ye shes gcig la zhugs pa de dag thob bya ba/_/thob nas 'gro ba kun 
[\[297a.4\]]la sbyin pa rab tu gtong /_/bsam pa dag dang khams dang sbyor ba shes byas nas/_/dbang po ji bzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang ston/_/pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams/_/'gro ba rnams la chos ston bdag gi don mi gtong /_/
[\[297a.5\]]pha rol phyin rdzogs grol ba mthu chen ldan pa rnams/_/khyu mchog mthu yis 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol/_/de ltar nyin mtshan skyo ba med par brtson byed cing /_/drang srong rgyal ba chos rigs mi gcod zhugs pa yis/_/dkar po'i spyod pa 
[\[297a.6\]]gang yang rung ste spangs pa rnams/_/thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi sar 'gro'o/_/de dag ji spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang /_/rnam smin don yod nyon mongs dri ma sbyong bar 'gyur/_/'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsal byas 
[\[297a.7\]]shing /_/bdud 'khrugs 'khor lo pham byas byang chub thob par byed/_/de ltar brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bde gshegs sras/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi chos rab mdzod kyang rab tu ston/_/de dag chos smra'i bya ba kun kyang shin tu byed/_/bdud rtsi mchog 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]zhim sprin gyi char yang mngon par 'bebs/_/de dag snying rje byams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing /_/brtan pa de rnams 'khor gyi bsam pa shes byas nas/_/gang gi bsam pa blo gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos ni stong phrag du ma ston/_/
[\[297b.2\]]glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gros su 'gro ba rnams/_/seng ge'i rtsal ltar rtag tu sus kyang mi thub cing /_/ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu ri rab bzhin gnas pa/_/sprin ltar 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad 
[\[297b.3\]]ces smras pa dang /_de la ston pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/_/chos snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//[{D44-24}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[297b.4\]]khams thams cad dang /_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /_gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad na/_gling bzhi pa 'di la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gling bzhi pa re re na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs par 
[\[297b.5\]]snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par shes 
[\[297b.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshig ma btang bar byang chub kyi shing drung yang ma spangs par ri rab kyi rtse mo nas/_mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo /_/
[\[297b.7\]]ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang /_rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste/_byin gyis brlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin ma 'khrugs par snang ngo /_/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang pa nor bu sna tshogs logs su mngon par gshegs pa mthong nas/_rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[298a.2\]]gdan rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgrubs pa'i seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che las byas pa pog re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon par bres pa/_me tog gi bla re brgya stong 
[\[298a.3\]]phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa/_phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu brgyus pa/_spos kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun tu 'thul bar bdugs pa/_rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/_me tog gi gdugs 
[\[298a.4\]]brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/_phreng ba'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/_rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/_'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas snang bar byas pa/_rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po 
[\[298a.5\]]brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu gdud pa/_tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/_rol mo brdung ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra phyung ba/_chos kyi glu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs dang ldan 
[\[298a.6\]]pa/_me tog gi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/_phreng ba'i sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/_rgyan gyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/_gos kyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pas kun nas g.yogs pa/_nor bu rin po che'i sprin brgya stong 
[\[298a.7\]]phrag bcu'i char rab tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba/_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/_bsod nams brgya stong phrag bcus bstsags shing bsgrubs pa/_lhag pa'i 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu sbyangs pa/_smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par byas pa/_spyod pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bslang ba/_chos brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu brtan pa/_rnam par 'phrul pa brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa/_yon tan 
[\[298b.2\]]brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa/_brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu brjod pa bshams so/_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting ba/_de bzhin du 'jig 
[\[298b.3\]]rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi_/rab mtshe ma'i gnas su yang /_khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rgyan 'di 'dra ba dang /_bsham pa'i tshul 'di 'dra ba dag kyang bting bar gyur to/_/
[\[298b.4\]]de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bting nas/_zhe sa dang rim gror bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs su 
[\[298b.5\]]gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems spyan drangs pa bzhin du khang pa nor bu sna tshogs 
[\[298b.6\]]su gshegs so/_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di rab mtshe ma'i gnas su lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs par snang ngo /_/
[\[298b.7\]]de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i lha'i dbang po'i gnas thams cad du sgra bsgrags te/_lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa de rjes su dran nas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas grags pa'i 
[\[299a.2\]]dam par mtshan btags mtshan gsol pa/_/nor bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags pa/_/sbyangs pa'i lam du gshegs 
[\[299a.3\]]pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/bsgribs med gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i spyan du mtshan btags pa/_/rgyan gcig ldan par gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur 
[\[299a.4\]]cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten sgron ma mar me mdzad ces mtshan btags pa/_/rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/bde 
[\[299a.5\]]gshegs yang dag don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa/_/dri med rtse mor gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung mchog ces mtshan btags pa/_/
[\[299a.6\]]rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten sgron ma dbyig gi lha zhes mtshan btags pa/_/dri [{]myed [,]med [}]sna tshogs gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang 
[\[299a.7\]]bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa/_/thams cad tshul du gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]zhig gis/_/yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyis rgyal bar mtshan btags pa/_/dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa ltar/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten phan brtson dka' thub drag po mtshan 
[\[299b.2\]]btags pa/_/kun nas mdog du gshegs gyur pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig_/ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_sngon gyi rgyal ba gshegs pa brjod de mngon par bstod pa de bzhin 
[\[299b.3\]]du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po rab mtshe ma rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs pa brjod cing /_glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[299b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs nas gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang gdan gting ba de dag la bzhugs 
[\[299b.5\]]par snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu khang pa nor bu sna tshogs de 'di lta ste/_dper na rab mtshe ma'i lha'i ris thams cad tsam du che bar gyur pa snang ste/_'di na ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[299b.6\]]rab mtshe ma'i gnas na rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu bzhi pa//_/[{D44-25}]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang 
[\[299b.7\]]'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]zhes bya ba dag ste/_'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_blo gros dang ldan pa dang /_dpal dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_khrel dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_rig pa dang 
[\[300a.2\]]ldan pa dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_ye shes dang ldan pa dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa ste/_'di ltar gnyen dang ldan pa dang /_me tog dang ldan pa dang /_nor dang ldan pa dang /_dpal dang ldan 
[\[300a.3\]]pa dang /_sgron ma dang ldan pa dang /_rdo rje dang ldan pa dang /_bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_nyi ma dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba dang ldan pa dang /_tshangs pa dang ldan pa dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi 
[\[300a.4\]]zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar nyams pa med pa'i spyan dang /_gzhan ma yin pa'i spyan dang /_mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang /_mi skyod pa'i spyan dang /_chu'i spyan dang /_bcings pa med pa'i spyan dang /_kun tu spyod pa'i spyan dang /_'od kyi spyan 
[\[300a.5\]]dang /_dam pa'i spyan dang /_mthon thing gi spyan dag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/_gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i 
[\[300a.6\]]snying po can dag bshams te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs par gyur pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun tu yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi khang pa 
[\[300a.7\]]nor bu sna tshogs su yang lhags par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang de skad ces bya ba sha stag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kyang de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na/_tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]kyi bol gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong bkye ste/_phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi rab mtshe ma'i gnas 
[\[300b.2\]]thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[300b.3\]]'od zer 'od snang bas/_/phyogs rnams thams cad rnam par snang /_/des ni rab tu gsal byas pas/_/mig la rab rib gang yang med/_/mtshe ma rab kyi gnas 'di na/_/gang zag dam pa sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/de bzhin kun na'ang gsal bar snang /_/
[\[300b.4\]]de ni 'jig rten ngo mtshar to/_/sems can gtso bo bcu yi rnams/_/gshegs par gyur pa mngon par ston/_/de dag 'khor kyang ci 'dra ba/_/de bzhin kun na rab tu snang /_/phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad na/_/chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston/_/de kun ming yang 'di bzhin te/_/bdag cag 
[\[300b.5\]]rnams kyi kun rdzob bzhin/_/'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang /_/de zhes bya ba kun nas 'ongs/_/gang zag dam pa de dag ni/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa de na spyod/_/bdag cag rnams la gang brtags pa/_/kun gyi ming yang de dang mthun/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams 
[\[300b.6\]]phun ldan pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba'o/_/mi yi 'jig rten kun na yang /_/'di na rgyal ba bzhugs par shes/_/gzhan gyis de yi rgyal po yi/_/gnas na de bzhin bzhugs pa mthong /_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/_/gang zag 
[\[300b.7\]]dam pa de bzhugs kyang /_/rgyal ba mtshe ma rab gnas na/_/bzhugs par bdag cag kun kyang sems/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/_/sangs rgyas gzi brjid bsam mi khyab/_/de dag smon lam bskul ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten khams su rab tu 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]bkye/_/sems can gtso bo'i rnam 'phrul pa/_/'di dag de rnams kun gyis mthong /_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/_/'jig rten zang zing thub pas spangs/_/phyogs rnams thams cad kun tu rgyu/_/chags 
[\[301a.2\]]pa med pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/de ni gcig las shin tu 'das/_/mang po dag tu'ang mi dmigs so/_/mtha' yas legs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams/_/de dag shes par ji ltar rung /_/gnas pa med cing len pa med/_/chos dbyings rtogs par 
[\[301a.3\]]thugs su chud/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang ldan pas/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jig rten mgon po 'phrul chen rnams/_/rdul med gang zag dam 
[\[301a.4\]]pa dag_/'dus shing tshogs pa bsam yas pa'i/_/bskal pa dag tu shin tu dkon/_/de dag thams cad kun gzigs pa/_/sems can gtso bo 'od mdzad de/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'jig 
[\[301a.5\]]rten mun nag 'di dag tu/_/'jig rten mgon po byung gyur pa/_/'jig rten sgron ma de dag ni/_/blta bar shin tu dka' ba yin/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa'i dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang /_/shes rab sngon chad spyad pas 
[\[301a.6\]]na/_/'gro ba thams cad snang ba mdzad/_/sangs rgyas 'dra ba gang yang med/_/de phyir de yi mnyam pa med/_/chos rnams yod pa ma yin pas/_/skyes bu dam pa mthong ba med/_/sangs rgyas shes rab chen po rnams/_/mtshan gyi tshogs ni bsam 
[\[301a.7\]]mi khyab/_/sku yi tshogs kyis shin tu 'phags/_/chos rnams kun gyis yang dag byung /_/'jig rten grags chen dam pa'i rnams/_/dpa' bo chen po de dag snang /_/de dag mtshan tsam thos pas kyang /_/ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]bskal pa rnams ni brjod med par/_/byang chub don du 'khor byas kyang /_/'di yi tshul ni ma shes na/_/byang chub don du zhugs pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/bskal pa bye bar bkur ba dang /_/gang gis tshul 'di bsam pa gnyis/_/
[\[301b.2\]]'di ni de las khyad du 'phags/_/gang gis brjod byas zhing gi rnams/_/rin chen gang ste thub gsol kyang /_/'di yi tshul ni ma shes na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub de la ring /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[301b.3\]]gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/nam mkha' dri ma med pa la/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa/_/dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/_/phyogs bcu dag tu rab tu snang /_/de tshe smyig rgyu ci 
[\[301b.4\]]'dra ba/_/de dag bgrang bar mi nus te/_/mig can rnams kyang de la rmongs/_/long ba rnams kyi spyod yul min/_/de bzhin sems can gtso bo yis/_/yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/bskal pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab par/_/sus kyang shes par mi nus 
[\[301b.5\]]so/_/de dag gang nas blangs pa med/_/de bzhin sus kyang byas pa med/_/de ni ci las skyes pa med/_/rnam par bsgoms na yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'ong ba med pa'i chos rnams la/_/'gro ba de bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_/de phyir de dag rgyu yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de bzhin 'jig pa'ang yod 
[\[301b.6\]]pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin gang gis shes pas ni/_/gang la skye ba med pa yi/_/yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/_/skyes pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin dngos po mi dmigs te/_/de 'dra'i don du 
[\[301b.7\]]shes pas ni/_/dmigs pa med pa shes pa yin/_/'di la shes byed gang yang med/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur la/_/yongs su shes pa gang yang med/_/skye ba dag ni brjod pa ste/_/de phyir zhing rnams 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]rab tu brjod/_/zhing gi rang bzhin shes gyur pa/_/'khrug pa med pa rab tu shes/_/gang tshe 'jig rten zhing yin par/_/tshul bzhin du ni rtogs byed na/_/de tshe thams cad don bstan pa/_/byang chub sems dpas rab tu 
[\[302a.2\]]shes/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gnas 'di shin tu rgya che ste/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa yin/_/rtag tu 
[\[302a.3\]]kun tu song ba ste/_/yid du 'ong zhing gnas kyang med/_/de la yang dag brtags byas shing /_/rim gro yod par dad byed na/_/sdug bsngal nam yang mi mthong ste/_/ngan song rnams kyang mi mthong ngo /_/tshad med de bzhin grangs med pa'i/_/'jig rten 
[\[302a.4\]]khams su su 'gro bas/_/gang rnams 'di na snang ba yis/_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs thos par 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs/_/gang gis thos par gyur nas kyang /_/'di 'dra sangs rgyas chos so zhes/_/rtog med bla med byang chub 
[\[302a.5\]]bo/_/gang rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos nyid la ni yid ches pa/_/de kun 'jig rten sgron ma ste/_/rkang gnyis ldan pa'i dam par gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/_/la la zhig gis thos gyur cing /_/thos nas dad par 
[\[302a.6\]]byed gyur na/_/de dag mi yi dam par 'gyur/_/brtan pa gang rnams da ltar yang /_/sangs rgyas chos la dad byed pa/_/de dag don gzigs mi 'jigs pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/'di 'dra 
[\[302a.7\]]thos pa shin tu dkon/_/smon lam dbang ni ma gtogs par/_/blo gros 'di 'drar 'gyur ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sangs rgyas dam chos 'di las kyang /_/legs par bshad pa gzung byas shing /_/gzhan la ston pa su byed pa/_/de dag bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab 'gyur/_/de la 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]brtson 'grus bskyed byas shing /_/yid la go ca bgo byas te/_/gang las sangs rgyas brjod pa yi/_/shes pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' khrel dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_
[\[302b.2\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig thos nas 'di 'dra ba'i/_/dga' ba yangs pa skye ba dang /_/the tsom rnam par gcad pa ni/_/'jig rten na ni ngo mtshar che/_/'di ltar thams cad gzigs pa'i rnams/_/nyid kyis 'gro la bka' stsal na/_/sangs 
[\[302b.3\]]rgyas mi mkhyen gang yang med/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/mi shes pa yi rgyu las ni/_/ye shes 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_/mun pa'i mthu dang snang ba gnyis/_/lhan cig 'byung bar mi 'gyur bstan/_/ji ltar gzugs dang gzugs med pa/_/
[\[302b.4\]]bskal pa mnyam pa med par bshad/_/de ltar shes dang mi shes pa/_/'grogs par shin tu mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag_/ji ltar med las brtags pa ltar/_/de bzhin shes dang mi shes pa/_/mtshan nyid bzhin du dmigs pa med/_/
[\[302b.5\]]ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig pa dang /_/'du bar 'gyur ba ring ba ste/_/phan tshun 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba/_/shes dang mi shes de bzhin no/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/thog ma'i sems dang tha ma'i sems/_/lhan cig [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 'byung ba ltar/_/
[\[302b.6\]]shes dang mi shes de bzhin no/_/ji ltar lus dang rnam shes pa/_/gzhan dang gzhan las 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin shes dang mi shes gnyis/_/'grogs par 'gyur ba nam yang med/_/ji ltar dug la phan pa'i rtsi/_/'phral du dug ni dug [{]myin [,]min [}]byed/_/de ltar 
[\[302b.7\]]shes pa mi shes pas/_/shin tu sol ba byed pa brjod/_/sangs rgyas bla na gang yang med/_de dang 'dra ba'ang yod pa min/_/de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med/_/de bas rgyal ba shin tu dkon/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/chos rnams 'di dag 'gal [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_/mkhyen nas sangs rgyas thugs su chud/_/des ni mi mkhyen gang yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/ye shes kyi yang 
[\[303a.2\]]pha rol phyin/_/ji ltar gser dang sa le sbram/_/ngo bo nyid kyis 'gal ba med/_/de ltar chos min de bzhin chos/_/de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig_/sems can sems can ma yin pa/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/_/gdags su med las 
[\[303a.3\]]'byung ba ltar/_/chos rnams rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/ma 'ongs dus ni ji lta bur/_/'das pas brjod par bya ba ste/_/de la mtshan nyid yod pa min/_/de bzhin chos la mtshan nyid med/_/'brel bar skye dang 'gog pa dang /_/rang bzhin med dang rang bzhin dag_/
[\[303a.4\]]rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ltar/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/mya ngan 'das pa gzung [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/gnyis kyi dus na brjod par byas/_/de la bye brag gang yang med/_/de bzhin gzugs la rnam rtog pa'o/_/ji ltar ci zhig bgrang byas shing /_/bgrang bar 
[\[303a.5\]]byed ces brjod pa yang /_/de la tha dad gang yang med/_/de bzhin gzugs kyi rang bzhin no/_/ji ltar gcig nas gcig gi blar/_/mang po'i tshul du bgrang ba yis/_/dngos po grangs med 'gyur ba yang /_/blo yi rnam pa tha dad bstan/_/'jig rten 
[\[303a.6\]]khams rnams la la dag_/bsam gyis mi khyab tshig gyur kyang /_/nam mkha' 'jig par 'gyur ba med/_/rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'jig rten phyogs bcu yi/_/nam mkha' so sor brtags pa ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[303a.7\]]mthong ste/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rtog mi mnga'/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/ji ltar dus rnams gsum po yis/_/sems can 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]khams rnams brjod par 'gyur/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang /_/phung po lnga las shin tu brjod/_/de rnams las kyi phung chen yin/_/las kyi rtsa ba'ang sems yin te/_/sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du bshad/_/sgyu mar gyur pa'i 'gro 'di'o/_/gang 
[\[303b.2\]]na 'jig rten 'di 'byung zhing /_/yang na ldog par 'gyur ba yin/_/'jig rten 'jig rten [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_/gzhan gyi rgyus kyang byas pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'jig rten 'di ni 'byung ba 'byung /_/'jig rten 'dir yang ldog par 'gyur/_/'byung zhes brjod par mi bya ste/_/
[\[303b.3\]]de ni 'jig rten shes pa yin/_/gang la 'jig rten snang ba zhes/_/'du shes rnam par brtags pa yi/_/'jig rten zhes bya gang zhig yin/_/snang ba zhes bya 'ang ci zhig yin/_/dus gsum dag tu rgyu ba yi/_/phung po 'di ni 'jig rten yin/_/de dag 'gog 
[\[303b.4\]]pa snang ba zhes/_/'gro ba dag tu 'du shes 'gyur/_/phung po zhes bya 'di ni ci/_/phung po'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/_/phung po rnams ni mi 'jig phyir/_/dngos po med ces rab tu brjod/_/phung po 'di dag rnam brtags don/_/de dag rang bzhin stong pa yin/_/mi 
[\[303b.5\]]'jig don ni stong pa ste/_/dngos po med ces bya ba'o/_/'jig rten ci bzhin sangs rgyas te/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas rnams/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/_/ma nor yang dag ji bzhin pa'i/_/chos nyid 'di 
[\[303b.6\]]ni rtogs gyur nas/_/kun gzigs thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rig pa dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/rang bzhin 
[\[303b.7\]]dngos po med pa yis/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/_/sa yi khams rnams ci bzhin te/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar che/_/de yi rang bzhin 'di yin la/_/brjod cing bsngags pa mtha' yas te/_/'das pa'i 'jig rten khams 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]rnams su/_/sus kyang brjod pa ma yin na/_/gzhan du sems can las kyis na/_/shin tu bstan par brjod pa ste/_/sems can rnams ni ma gtogs par/_/las shes bya ba ci mi dmigs/_/de bzhin stong pa'i las kyis kyang /_/brjod 
[\[304a.2\]]pa rnams ni tshad med par/_/sems can kun gyi las su 'gyur/_/de la ma 'ongs gang yang med/_/ji ltar kha dog dbyibs kyi rnams/_/las kyi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/_/snang yang de dag de na med/_/rnam par rig pa'i dngos nyid 'dra/_/de bzhin sems 
[\[304a.3\]]can gtso bo yi/_/sku ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_/brjod pa rnams kyang tshad med par/_/zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang /_/sku ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas min/_/sangs rgyas rnams la sku mi mnga'/_/dpa' bo chen po chos sku ste/_/chos kun rtogs par 
[\[304a.4\]]thugs su chud/_/gang gis rang byung rnams kyi sku/_/yang dag ci bzhin mthong ba ni/_/sangs rgyas chos ni rnam kun dang /_/chos rnams la yang rmongs pa med/_/'das par gyur pa'i chos rnams kun/_/mya ngan 'das par shes gyur na/_/de dag 
[\[304a.5\]]shin tu mi gnas pa'i/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/_/yang dag sangs rgyas sus mthong zhing /_/dran pa shin tu bsgoms byas te/_/mtshan med tha dad med pa rnams/_/de dag chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan 
[\[304a.6\]]pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar ri mo'i las rnams la/_/tshon rnams sna tshogs kun 'du ba/_/kun kyang 'byung ba chen por mnyam/_/sems kyis yongs su brtags 
[\[304a.7\]]pa yin/_/khams la tshon rtsi de dag [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/tshon rtsi la yang khams med de/_/khams rnams ma gtogs gzhan na yang /_/tshon zhes bya ba gang yang med/_/sems la ri mo de med do/_/ri mo la yang sems med de/_/sems de ma gtogs 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]gzhan du yang /_/ri mo gang yang mi dmigs so/_/sems de rtag pa ma yin pa/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab tshad med cing /_/phan tshun shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yi/_/gzugs rnams thams cad ston par byed/_/ji ltar ri mo mkhan gyi rnams/_/sems ni 
[\[304b.2\]]gang gis ri mo de/_/bris pa'i sems kyang mi shes pa/_/de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin no/_/sems ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra/_/sems ni phung po byed pa ste/_/'jig rten khams na ji snyed pa'i/_/'jig rten 'di dag sems kyis bris/_/sems dang 
[\[304b.3\]]'dra ba sangs rgyas te/_/sangs rgyas ji bzhin 'gro ba'o/_/sems dang sangs rgyas dag la yang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis zad pa med/_/sems kyi rgyud rnams ci 'dra ba/_/de dag sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen/_/de phyir sangs rgyas rang bzhin gyis/_/'gro ba 
[\[304b.4\]]sna tshogs gyur par snang /_/lus kyi rnams la sems med de/_/sems la'ang lus rnams yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang rab tu byed/_/de ltar spyod pa ngo mtshar che/_/gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyi/_/rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod 
[\[304b.5\]]na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi dngos/_/chos kyi dbyings su blta bar gyis/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/gzung du med 
[\[304b.6\]]la 'dzin ces bya/_/snang ba med la snang ba ste/_/mnyan du med pa mnyan par byed/_/sems med pa yi sems dang ldan/_/tshad med pa la tshad ma yin/_/gang zhig 'dzin par mi 'dod pa/_/de ni tshad med tshad ma yin/_/nam yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[304b.7\]]brjod du med pa smra byed pa/_/bdag la shin tu bslu ba ste/_/de yi don kyang brjod mi byed/_/srog chags rnams kyang tshim mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin mtha' yas brjod ldan pa'i/_/brjod pa gang zhig smra 'dod pa/_/bskal pa grangs med zad byas kyang /_/rang 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]'byung rnams kyis brjod mi zad/_/yid bzhin nor bu dag pa ni/_/kha dog kun tu rab tu snang /_/de la kha dog yod pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sangs rgyas yon tan de bzhin no/_/ji ltar nam mkha' dri med cing /_/gzugs med bstan du med yin yang /_/gzugs 
[\[305a.2\]]rnams thams cad ston par byed/_/nam mkha' snang ba gang yang med/_/de bzhin thams cad gzigs pa rnams/_/yon tan kun dang ldan ston kyang /_/de ni sus kyang mthong ba med/_/sems la'ang de ni mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas sgra ni grag mod kyi/_/
[\[305a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sgra ma yin/_/sgra ni ma gtogs gzhan du yang /_/sangs rgyas shes par mi rung ngo /_/ji ltar bdag gi mthong tshul du/_/'di ni shes bya'i gnas ma yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub blang du med/_/de la rnam par rtog pa med/_/sangs 
[\[305a.4\]]rgyas chos rnams gang dag kyang /_/su la'ang sangs rgyas gsung pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/de la de 'dra ston pa mdzad/_/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/_rab mtshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems 
[\[305a.5\]]dpa' 'dus pas/_tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu lnga pa//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu lnga pa//_/[{D44-26}]de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yon 
[\[305a.6\]]tan dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[305a.7\]]rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu re rer yang /_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]ldan pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal bstan pa mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan dang ldan pa de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par 
[\[305b.2\]]phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa la mnyam par bzhag pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[305b.3\]]pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu brtan pas na 'di ltar chos bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[305b.4\]]khams la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang /_chags pa med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang /_kun nas rab tu sbyor ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa rab tu bsgrub pa dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[305b.5\]]khong du chud par bya ba dang /_dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu brtsam pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_byin gyis brlab pa mdzad kyis/_
[\[305b.6\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_chos bstan pa la spobs par gyis shig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa la chags pa med pa nyid nye bar 
[\[305b.7\]]bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/bsgrubs pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/byin gyis brlab pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/slob dpon med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/rmongs pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/tha dad pa med pa nyid nye 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/tshad med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/zil gyis mi non pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/zhum pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i 
[\[306a.2\]]phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[306a.3\]]gis de ltar reg ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i las ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 
[\[306a.4\]]kyis klas so/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/_/ma byon 
[\[306a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang la bsams te/_de skad du smras pa de dag gang 
[\[306a.6\]]zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba ste/_bcu gang zhe 
[\[306a.7\]]na 'di lta ste dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po dang /_bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnyis pa dang /_mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa dang /_mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhi pa dang /_rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa dang /_lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa dang /_gnas med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa dang /_thub par dka' ba 
[\[306b.2\]]zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgyad pa dang /_chos bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dgu pa dang /_bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/_bcu po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[306b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po 
[\[306b.4\]]dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa'i rjes su slob cing rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_yid zhum pa med pa dang /_yid 
[\[306b.5\]]dang bas kun tu 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yang dag par bstan pa dang /_rjes su rgya che bar byed cing /_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_
