[\[306b.6\]]'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba dang /_rnam par smyin pa la ye brngam pa med pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa med pa dang /_gnyan 'dod pa med pa dang /_khe 'dod pa med pa dang /_gzhan rjes su bsrung ba dang /_pha rol la phan gdags pa dang /_sems 
[\[306b.7\]]can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems kyis/_sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa byed pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po'o/_/spyod pa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba yin te 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]de ni sems can dbul po gang dang gang na yod pa de dang der smon lam gyi dbang gis rab tu skyes te/_skyes nas kyang zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod dang ldan zhing shin tu phyug pa yin te/_de la gal te dus gcig du/_slong ba'i srog chags bye ba 
[\[307a.2\]]khrag khrig brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig 'ongs te/_'di skad du kye shes par gyis shig_/bdag cag thams cad ni bkres pas 'chi'o/_/gal te bdag cag khyod kyi sha zos na ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes tshig tu smra bar gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa phun 
[\[307a.3\]]sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan te/_slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de snyed cig nye bar lhags kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zhum pa'i bsam pa mi 'gyur gyi/_sems can de dag 
[\[307a.4\]]thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu skye ste/_gzhan mang po zhig 'ongs kyang de bas ches dga' ba dang /_spro ba 'byung zhing 'di ltar bdag gis gsol ba ma btab par/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par stobs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug bsngal zhing slong 
[\[307a.5\]]ba sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa 'di lta bu dag dang 'grogs par gyur pa ni/_bdag gis thob pa legs par thob ste/_ji nas kyang sems can 'ga'i yid kyang mi nyams par bya ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o/_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa dang /_ci byed pa dang /_
[\[307a.6\]]ci byed par 'gyur ba des ji tsam gyis sems can de dag thams cad 'grangs shing dus byed par 'gyur ba de tsam du che ba'i lus su gyur cig_/sems can de dag 'grangs shing tshim par ma gyur gyi bar du gcad cing skye bas mi zad pa de tsam gyi lus su gyur 
[\[307a.7\]]cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrubs te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o/_/rnam grangs 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]khams thams cad kyi sems can de dag thams cad las 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi sha zos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrubs te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye 
[\[307b.2\]]shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas/_phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig_/bdag nyid kyang sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma byas kyi bar du/_bdag du 'du shes pa'am/_
[\[307b.3\]]sems can du 'du shes pa'am/_srid par 'du shes pa'am/_srog tu 'du shes pa'am/_so so'i skye bor 'du shes pa'am/_gang zag du 'du shes pa'am/_shed can du 'du shes pa'am/_shed bdag du 'du shes pa'am/_byed pa por 'du shes pa'am/_
[\[307b.4\]]tshor ba por 'du shes pas/_gzhan du chos kyi dbyings nye bar bzung ba dang /_sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_stong pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_
[\[307b.5\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_dngos po med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_gnas med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_gzhi med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba ma 
[\[307b.6\]]gtogs par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig ces te/_de ni bdag kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_bdag gis lus kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_len to zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_len pa yang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[307b.7\]]mi mthong /_sbyin pa'i gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ni las kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam par smin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'bras bu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'bras bu chen po'ang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]mi mthong /_'bras bu chung ngu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de 'das pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus zhig par yid la byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi lus 'jig par yid la byed do/_/
[\[308a.2\]]de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag rang gi lus grangs med pa zhig ni 'gags te/_'gag cing 'gag par 'gyur yang /_snying po med pa'i lus las snying po mi len pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/de lta yin gyis bdag gis sems can thams cad 
[\[308a.3\]]bde bas rim gror bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par sangs rgyas te/_chos thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/_chos nyid mi 'jig pa nye bar bzung ste/_dus gsum 
[\[308a.4\]]mnyam pa nyid du mthun pa'i tshul gyis zhi bar byas pas sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/_/snyam du sems te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po ste/_dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang 
[\[308a.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gnyis pa bde bskyed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni mi gnas pa yin/_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang /_reg la mi gnas pa ston pa 
[\[308a.6\]]yin/_rigs kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/_rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/_zas kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/_gzugs kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/_longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin te/_
[\[308a.7\]]de ltar de ni tshul khrims las yongs su nyams pa med cing /_'di ltar kun nas 'khor ba med pa dang /_kun tu btsal ba med pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_bar chad med pa dang /_gtse ba med pa dang /_'khrug pa med par bya'o/_/snad pa med 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ngo snyam du sems te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i drung du/_gal te nyin gcig tu bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhig 'ongs te/_bdud re re 
[\[308b.2\]]zhing yang lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa/_bde bar rim gror bya ba thams cad thogs pa/_lus kyi rgyan gyis yongs su rgyas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong re re bsnyen kyang /_byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa ni/_bla 
[\[308b.3\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bar du gcod pa yin par shes nas/_ston pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral lo/_/
[\[308b.4\]]'dod pa'i don du sems can 'ga' la yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba mi byed de/_chung ngu na srog gi dbang po 'gags par gyur kyang gzhan la mi dga' ba mi bskyed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/_
[\[308b.5\]]chung ngu na sems kyi rgyud gcig tsam gyis 'dod pa la mi spyod na/_gnyis kyis gnyis sbyar ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te 'di ni gnas med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar sems skye ste/_sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas de ltar gzhol ba dang /_
[\[308b.6\]]de ltar 'bab pa/_de ltar bab pa/_de ltar mos pa/_de lta bu'i spyod yul can/_de ltar nges pa/_de ltar bying ba/_de ltar non pa/_de ltar chags pa/_de ltar zhugs pa yin gyis/_bdag gis ni bdud 'di dag dang /_bdud kyi bu mo 'di dag dang /_
[\[308b.7\]]sems can thams cad ci nas kyang bla na med pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la bkod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byas te/_phung po'i lhag ma 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bslabs te/_mi bya ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang /_
[\[309a.2\]]lus kyis mi shes pa thams cad yongs su spang ba ma yin pa dang /_sems kyis kyang ma yin pa de ni bdag cag gi las yin gyis/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes kyis sems can thams 
[\[309a.3\]]cad kyi phyin ci log rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/_/phyin ci log ni sems can rnams las gzhan na'ang med de/_phyin ci log rnams las kyang sems can rnams gud na med do/_/phyin ci log tu yang sems can 'dus pa ma yin/_
[\[309a.4\]]sems can du yang phyin ci log 'dus pa ma yin no/_/phyin ci log rnams kyang sems can ma yin/_sems can rnams kyang phyin ci log ma yin no/_/phyin ci log rnams ni nang na yang med/_phyin ci log rnams ni phyi rol na yang med do/_/sems 
[\[309a.5\]]can rnams kyang nang na yang med/_sems can rnams ni phyi rol na yang med de/_chos de dag thams cad ni gsog gsob [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa bslu ba'i chos can te/_sgyu ma lta bu byis pa bslu ba dang /_ngan pa chung ba snying po med pa/_rmi lam lta bu/_mig yor 
[\[309a.6\]]lta bu ste/_de dag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rjes su rtogs pa'o/_/'du byed rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya bar byed de/_rgal bas ni sgrol bar byed/_grol bas ni 'gro 
[\[309a.7\]]bar byed/_zhi bas ni zhi bar byed/_dbugs phyin pas ni dbugs 'byin par byed/_bkrus pas ni 'khru bar byed/_dag pas ni dag par byed/_mya ngan las 'das pas ni mya ngan las 'da' bar byed/_bde bar gyur pas ni bde bar byed pa ste/_
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang skal ba mi mthun par gnas par mi bya ste/_bdag cag gis ni 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis 
[\[309b.2\]]ni bla na med pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas yang dag par 'jug par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni yul thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag cag 
[\[309b.3\]]gis ni yongs su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bag chags dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni rtogs pa thams cad dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni 'byung ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni bla na 
[\[309b.4\]]med pa'i ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa brjod du med pa/_mi gnas pa/_'phos pa med pa/_mtha' dang dbus med pa/_mi zad pa gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa la rab tu mos par bya'o/_/zhes zer te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[309b.5\]]dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnyis pa ste/_bde ba skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba 
[\[309b.6\]]gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid la brtson te/_bzod pa dang ldan zhing mngon par smra ba'i ngang tshul can yin te/_de yang bdag la gnod par ma yin/_pha rol la gnod par ma yin/_gnyis ka la gnod 
[\[309b.7\]]par ma yin/_bdag bsdu bar ma yin/_gzhan bsdu bar ma yin/_gnyis ka bsdu bar ma yin/_bdag yongs su gzung bar ma yin/_gzhan yongs su gzung bar ma yin/_gnyis ka yongs su gzung bar ma yin/_yang dag 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]par blangs pa grags pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems 'di ltar skye ste/_bdag cag gis sems can la mi dge ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/_/'dod chags spang ba dang /_
[\[310a.2\]]zhe sdang spang ba dang /_gti mug spang ba dang /_nga rgyal spang ba dang /_'chab pa spang ba dang /_phrag dog spang ba dang /_ser sna spang ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang /_bzod pa dang nges pa la gzhag pa'i phyir/_bdag cag gis sems can thams cad 
[\[310a.3\]]la chos bstan par bya'o/_/zhes te kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bur bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa yin pas/_de la gal te srog chags brgya stong bye ba grangs med pa zhig 'ongs la srog chags de dag re re zhing yang kha bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[310a.4\]]brgya stong grangs med par sprul te/_drung du phyin la kha re re nas kyang mi snyan par brjod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_mi tshul ba dang /_'phags pa ma 
[\[310a.5\]]yin pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pas brjod pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pas bsnyen pa dang /_yongs su spang bar bya ba sha stag du brjod de lag pa re re zhing yang 'thab cha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thogs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[310a.6\]]dpa'i lus la gnod par byas la nyin gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par yang mtshams med cing ngal mi shes/_skyo mi shes/_rgyun mi 'chad/_gtong ba med/_sdod pa med/_gcugs su med/_dbugs 'byin pa med/_phyir 
[\[310a.7\]]sri ba med par brtags kyang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de lta bu'i 'jigs pa chen po mi zad pa/_ma rungs pa/_skyi g.ya' ba/_sdug bsngal ba nyams su 'bab pa/_tsha ba rtsub pas phog ste/_srog la bab par 'chi ma khad kyang de la byang chub sems 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa 'di tsam dag gis phog pa la gal te bdag gis sems 'khrug pa zhig byas su zin na/_de ni ma dul ba dang /_mi bden pa dang /_mi mkhas pa dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_ma 
[\[310b.2\]]bsdams pa dang /_ma khugs pa dang /_byas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_bdag gi lus la brten pas gzhan gyi sems mgu bar bya bar mi nus kyis zhes te/_de lus dang sems rang bzhin shes nas/_thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[310b.3\]]par skye ba dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran nas/_chos 'di dag ni tshul gyis de bzhin no zhes nas/_phyir zhing sems dang bar byed/_rab tu dang bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_rab tu dga' bar byed/_tshim par byed/_gzengs mtho bar byed 
[\[310b.4\]]spro bar byed/_rab tu spro bar byed/_'dul bar byed/_yongs su 'dems par byed de/_de ltar bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag ste/_sems can thams cad la yang don 'di bstan par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[310b.5\]]lus 'di ni bdag dang bdag gis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid la bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_gnyis su brjod pa gang yang med do/_/gang stong pa de la ci yang med de/_chos thams cad ni ci yang ma yin pa yin 
[\[310b.6\]]gyis/_de bdag gis kyang yang dag par shes par byas te/_sems can thams cad la dngos por 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir chos thams cad bstan par bya dgos kyis/_de ltar bdag gis 'di dag la byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_
[\[310b.7\]]bde ba'i sems dang /_snying rje ba'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_phan par dga' ba'i sems dang /_yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang /_'tshang rgya ba'i sems dang /_byang chub pa'i sems dang /_mi 'phrogs pa'i sems 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi rjes su bsnyegs pa'i sems kyis bzod par bya'o snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa ste/_mi mthun 
[\[311a.2\]]pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bzhi pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_brtson 'grus 
[\[311a.3\]]mchog dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus rab dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus dam pa dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus phul dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus 'phags pa dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus gya nom pa dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus bla na 
[\[311a.4\]]med pa dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus mnyam pa med pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de la 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin med/_zhe sdang gi rang bzhin med/_gti mug gi rang bzhin med/_nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin med/_'chab pa'i rang bzhin med/_phrag dog 
[\[311a.5\]]gi rang bzhin med/_'jungs pa'i rang bzhin med/_sgyu'i rang bzhin med/_khrel med pa'i rang bzhin med do/_/de ni sems can gang la yang tho brtsam pa'i phyir/_brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/_gzhan du na nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[311a.6\]]cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bag la nyal ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bag chags thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can gyi khams yongs 
[\[311a.7\]]su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/shi 'pho dang skye ba thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can gyi 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bsam pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus rnam 
[\[311b.2\]]pa tha dad pa mchog dang tha ma'i rgyu yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i 
[\[311b.3\]]phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/
[\[311b.4\]]dus gsum la mkhas pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i snang ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par 
[\[311b.5\]]'gyur ba'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshul gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med 
[\[311b.6\]]pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs pa'i ye shes chen po la mkhas pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[311b.7\]]chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa dang bsgrub pa rab tu bstan pa'i rgyus yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]yin no/_/de gal te 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par sems can rnams kyi don du sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa grangs med par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal du 'dug par yang spro zhing 
[\[312a.2\]]mos te/_sems can de dag kyang de tsam gyi bar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur la/_de'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa zhig byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sus mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 
[\[312a.3\]]ba'i yo byad kun dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 
[\[312a.4\]]phyir/_sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba chen po na/_de snyed kyi sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du 'dug par spro ste/_de la la la zhig gis 'di skad du rgya mtsho chen po grangs med pa skra'i rtse 
[\[312a.5\]]mos gzhal te 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rdul du blags te/_bgrang ba de snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /_sems kyi skad cig tu yang mi 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na yang /_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[312a.6\]]sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' ni de la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa mi 'byung gi de ni 'di snyam ste/_de ltar bdag gi mthus sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu las yongs su grol bar gyur pa 
[\[312a.7\]]ni bdag gi 'thob pa legs par 'thob po/_/gal te thabs 'di 'dra bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na yang /_byang chub sems dpas sbyor ba de la spro bar bya ba yin no/_/
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]zhes te/_de bas kyang ches dga' ba dang spro ba skye'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhi pa ste mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[312b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/_dran pa'i dam pa 'khrug pa med pa/_rnam par 'khrug pa med 
[\[312b.3\]]pa/_brtan pa sra ba/_mi shigs pa/_zil gyis mi non pa/_yongs su dag pa/_che ba tshad med pa/_rmongs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin te/_dran pa des 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[312b.4\]]tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin la btags pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[312b.5\]]par shes pa la btags pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/_de 'jig rten 'di nas kyang rmongs pa med par shi 'pho'o/_/'jig 
[\[312b.6\]]rten pha rol tu yang rmongs pa med par skye ste/_ma'i mngal du yang rmongs pa med par 'gro/_/ma'i mngal nas kyang rmongs pa med par 'byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rmongs pa med pas gnas so/_/rmongs pa med par 
[\[312b.7\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mgu bar byed do/_/rmongs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos par byed do/_/rmongs pa med par bdud kyi las rnams rab tu shes so/_/rmongs pa med par bdud kyi las rnams spang bar byed do/_/
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]rmongs pa med par bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas so/_/de dran pa yongs su dag pa'i yan lag tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin te des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[313a.2\]]sems dpa' 'am/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las bskal pa grangs med pa na chos thos par gyur pa zab mo zab mor snang ba'am/_yangs pa'i chos rgyan rnam par phye ba'am/_chos sna tshogs tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs kyis bstan 
[\[313a.3\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyi chos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs snang ba can nam/_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba dang mos pas rnam par dag pa'am/_'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas 
[\[313a.4\]]pa'i chos 'jig rten gyi khong du chud pa dang 'thun pa'am/_chos yangs pa rgya chen po'i chos su bstan pa'am/_rab rib dang bral ba'i chos 'jig rten gyis shes par bya ba'am/_'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos 
[\[313a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'am/_bla na med pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyis rgya cher rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa de lta bu dag thos kyang bskal pa grangs med pas brjed par mi 'gyur/_nyams par mi 'gyur/_
[\[313a.6\]]rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can su la yang dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed/_chos rig pa thogs par mi byed/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[313a.7\]]ba'i blo gros 'jig par mi byed/_gzhan gyi blo la gnod par mi byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di lta bu'i sgra chen po mtho ba dag dang phrad par gyur te/_drag po'i sgra dang /_mi bzad 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]par bos pa'i sgra dang /_skyi g.ya' ba'i sgra dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rna ba'i spyod yul du 'ongs pa dang /_yid du mi 'ongs pa'i sgra rna ba'i yul du 'ongs pa dang /_sems 'khrug par byed pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'khrug par byed pa dang /_
[\[313b.2\]]dbang po drug 'phrog par byed pa dag dang 'grogs par gyur kyang /_sgra de lta bu dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems skad cig kyang rnam par 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/_/spyod yul rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[313b.3\]]mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bslad par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'di ltar sgra de lta bu dag yid du 'ong zhing 'thun par byed pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong zhing khong khro bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[313b.4\]]khams grangs med par grags par byed pa dag gis/_se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spyod yul las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos la 'jug pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi spyod pa la 
[\[313b.5\]]gcig tu 'dus pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsgom pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par brtags pa las ldang 
[\[313b.6\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su dag par bya ba'i gnas shes pa rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/don nges par shes pa rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis 
[\[313b.7\]]las kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig to'i las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par mi byed do/_/gang gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa bsdud par mi byed do/_/gang gis chos kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos la rim gror byed par mi byed do/_/gang gis chos 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]'jig par 'ong ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba dam pa'i chos yongs su spong bar mi byed do/_/de la de lta bu'i sgra'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par grags pa/_mi snyan pa dang snyan pa bskal pa grangs med par mi sdod pa/_'khrug par 
[\[314a.2\]]byed pa/_sems 'khrug pa/_lus 'khrug pa/_dbang po 'khrug pa/_myos par byed pa/_'khor bar byed pa/_rnyog par byed pa/_rnam par rnyog par byed pa/_kun tu rnyog par byed pas/_dkrugs par byas kyang /_de la byang chub sems 
[\[314a.3\]]dpa' 'di ltar sems skye ste/_bdag gis ni 'phags pa'i chos yongs su bsgoms pas nang du mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/_/snyam nas de sgra thams cad kyi skye ba la rab tu rtog go_/gnas pa la rab tu rtogs go_/'gog pa la rab tu rtog go_/
[\[314a.4\]]skye ba'i rang bzhin la 'jug go_/'gog pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug go_/gang gis sgra de dag brjod pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid du shes te/_sgras chags par mi 'gyur/_sgras khong khro bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de'i dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur 
[\[314a.5\]]ro/_/des sgra de dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing mtshan ma bskyed de/_sgras bsgo ba la mngon par chags par mi 'gyur/_sgra la gnas par mi 'gyur/_sgra la mngon par chags par mi skyed do/_des sgra de dag brtags na mi dmigs te/_
[\[314a.6\]]sgra de dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin rab tu shes so/_/rang bzhin de yang byas pa med par khong du chud do/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rgyas 'debs shing /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul du chags pa med pa'i mthar yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[314a.7\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug pa/_phyir mi ldog pa mtha' yas pa/_bsam gtan gyi tshul tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyud gcig gi tshul du zhugs pa/_chos 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu chud pa'i lus kyi las dben pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi las dben pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi las dben pa dang ldan pas/_shes pa rtogs pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ming dang sgra med pa/_zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[314b.2\]]'dzin grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang ldan pa 'thob ste/_snying rje chen po yang yangs shing tshad med par byed do/_/gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag grangs med pa sems kyi skad cig gcig gis thob par byed kyang /_byang chub 
[\[314b.3\]]sems dpa' sems ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de la de lta bu'i rnam par 'khrug pas dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi nus kyi/_de'i phyir zhing 'di snyam du sems skye'o/_/de ltar bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i rnam pa rnam par dag pa 
[\[314b.4\]]la rab tu bkod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/_/snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[314b.5\]]chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa ste/_rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/_
[\[314b.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su med cing bstan pa mi dmigs pa'i lus kyi las dben pa dang /_ngag gi las dben pa dang /_yid kyi las dben pa thob pa yin/_ma chags ma bcings pa'i 
[\[314b.7\]]lus kyi las dang /_ma chags ma bcings pa'i ngag gi las dang /_ma chags ma bcings pa'i yid kyi las ma chags ma bcings par bstan pa/_gnas med pa/_mi gnas pa/_sems ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa/_sems kyi 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]rang bzhin tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song ba/_mtshan nyid mi dmigs shing /_mtshan nyid bstan du med pa zab pa gting dpag dka' ba/_de bzhin nyid kyi rang 
[\[315a.2\]]bzhin gyi rjes su song ba/_rnam par smin pa dang /_bral ba'i skyon med pa/_mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_'gog pa dang /_mthun par gnas pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi spyod yul can/_zhi ba'i rgyud rab tu thob pa/_dngos po med 
[\[315a.3\]]pa'i tshul gyi gzhir gyur pa/_tshig gi lam chad pa/_'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/_gnas med pa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pa/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ma la mkhas pa/_rtogs pa bcings pa med pa la gnas pa/_de kho na nyid kyi 
[\[315a.4\]]chos gnas kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis mi brjod pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnas dang ldan pa thob pa yin te/_de 'di snyam du sems so/_/kye sems can 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin 'di lta bu ste/_'di ltar 
[\[315a.5\]]sems can med pa'i rang bzhin no/_/kye chos 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin 'di lta bu ste/_'di ltar 'dus byas pa med pa'i rang bzhin no/_/kye zhing 'di dag thams cad ni 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid de/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/kye dus 'di 
[\[315a.6\]]dag thams cad ni 'di ltar byung ba ste/_'di ltar tshig gi lam la gzhol zhing chos kun gyi rnam par tshig gi lam la shin tu gnas kyang /_chos thams cad ni tshig gi lam la mi gnas pa'o zhes/_de de ltar chos thams cad zab pa yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[315a.7\]]'jig rten thams cad dben pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma bskyed pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang 'jig rten gyi chos su rab tu 'jug go_/'jig rten gyi chos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su rab tu 'jug 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'jig rten gyi chos 'dres par mi byed do/_/'jig rten gyi chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad par yang mi byed do/_/'di ltar dus gsum la gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/byang chub 
[\[315b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyang nyams par mi byed de/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba las kyang mi ldog ste/_sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po yang phyir zhing rab tu 'dzin par 
[\[315b.3\]]byed do/_/sems can gyi khams bdag gis smin par ma byas pa ni su zhig smin par byed/_sems can gyi khams bdag gis dul bar ma byas pa ni su zhig dul bar byed/_sems can gyi khams bdag gis zhi bar ma byas pa ni su zhig zhi bar byed/_
[\[315b.4\]]sems can gyi khams bdag gis shes par ma byas pa ni su zhig shes par byed/_sems can gyi khams bdag gis dag par ma byas pa ni su zhig dag par byed de/_de ltar bdag gis de lta bur zab pa'i chos yang dag par mthong la/_gcig 
[\[315b.5\]]pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par grol bar bya ba 'di ni bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra ba ste/_sems can gyi khams 'di yang mya ngam chen po'i lam du zhugs pa/_nyon mongs pas kun nas bzung bas mdongs par 
[\[315b.6\]]gyur pa/_tshor ba nyams su bab pa mi zad pas nad par gyur pa/_sred pas bskor ba'i btson rar zhugs pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas ma g.yos pa/_sdug bsngal 
[\[315b.7\]]gyi phung pos mi skyo ba/_sdom pa gsum gyis bcugs su ma rung ba/_mun nag gi nang du rab tu zhugs pa/_ma rig pa'i mngal du skye ba dang /_'chi bas mnar ba 'byung ba ma mthong bar/_mi khom par gyur pa/_mi khom pa brgyad thob pa/_
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]sems kyi rab rib kyis dri ma can du gyur pa/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi yan lag gis btab pa/_mya ngam chen por 'khyams pa/_lta ba'i mya ngam gyis bskor ba'o/_/zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[316a.2\]]sems can gyi khams la rtog pa'i tshe/_sems 'di ltar skye ste/_de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs te/_ye shes kyi snang ba bla na med pa la zhugs nas/_sems can 'di dag ni yongs su ma smin cing 
[\[316a.3\]]rnam par ma dul bar bor te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni/_dus ma yin gyi bdag gis ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[316a.4\]]spyod pa la yongs su smin par bya'o/_/dus de lta bus sems can byang chub tu yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/ma dul ba rnams gdul bar bya'o/_/snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[316a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa de dag la gnas pas/_lha dang bdud dang /_tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_
[\[316a.6\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa dang /_lha dang dri za dang mi dang mi ma yin dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta na mdzes shing /_byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bas kyang /_sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[316a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro/_/dmigs pa gang gis kyang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'grogs 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu drug pa/_//_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[316b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa gnas med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnas med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la 'jug pa yin/_
[\[316b.3\]]sems bskyed pa re res zhing grangs med pa yongs su sbyong ste/_zhing la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa blta ba'i phyir 'gro zhing /_me tog grangs med pa dang /_spos grangs med pa dang /_phreng ba grangs med 
[\[316b.4\]]pa dang /_byug pa grangs med pa dang /_phye ma grangs med pa dang /_na bza' grangs med pa dang /_rin po che grangs med pa dang /_rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /_ba dan grangs med pa dang /_rgyan grangs med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba grangs 
[\[316b.5\]]med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang /_grangs med pa'i bsam pas bsam du med pa'i chos la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang 
[\[316b.6\]]bsnyen bkur ba'i don du 'gro zhing sems bskyed pa re re la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa mthong yang /_sangs rgyas de dag la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_mtshan rnams la gnas mi skyed 
[\[316b.7\]]pa yin/_dpe byad bzang po rnams la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_phyogs la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_phyogs mtshams la gnas mi skyed pa 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'dus pa la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan cing dga' ba skyed de/_bsam pa 
[\[317a.2\]]yangs par byed la/_byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'dzin cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shin tu gnas kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas mi skyed pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re bsnyen bkur la yang bskal pa brjod du med pa zad par 
[\[317a.3\]]byed cing /_sangs rgyas brjod du med pa mthong bas/_bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang /_sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bya ba dang /_chos nyan pas ngoms mi shes te/_sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[317a.4\]]pa'i chos nyan pa la gnas mi skyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa khong du chud par byed kyang gnas mi skyed/_chags pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[317a.5\]]pa la zhugs kyang khong khro ba mi skyed/_mos pa med pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/_shin tu khong du chud de/_de la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par 
[\[317a.6\]]byang ba yang med/_mun pa yang med/_snang ba yang med/_rnam par phye ba yang med/_rnam pa tha dad pa yang med/_rnam par rtog pa yang med/_gzhan du 'gyur ba yang med/_bde ba yang med/_mi bde ba yang med/_lam yang med/_lam 
[\[317a.7\]]ma yin pa yang med de/_byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa ni sems can gyi khams la yang 'jug ste/_de dag kyang yongs su smin par byed cing rnam par 'dul la sems can rnams la gnas skyed pa yang med do/_/chos rnams 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]kun nas thob par byed kyang /_chos la gnas mi skyed do/_/byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa'i yid kyis 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la yang rnam par spyod de/_'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la gnas mi skyed do/_/tshig gi lam yang brjod de/_tshig gi lam la gnas par mi 
[\[317b.2\]]byed do/_/sems can gyi rgyud la yang 'jug ste/_sems can gyi rgyud la yang gnas par mi byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu shes shing de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas kyi sems kyang mi skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[317b.3\]]brjod du med par 'gro zhing 'jug la de dag tu phyin te mthong zhing gnas kyang gnas kyi sems mi skyed do/_/de dag nas 'gro yang chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/_de dag sems 'di ltar bskyed do/_/kye sangs rgyas kyi chos de ltar gzung ba med/_sangs 
[\[317b.4\]]rgyas kyi byang chub de ltar bsgribs pa med/_chos dang 'dul ba de ltar legs par bstan/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de ltar legs par gnas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ltar legs par 'dug_/byang chub kyi sems de ltar legs par gnas/_
[\[317b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de ltar shin tu rtogs/_byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin de ltar chags pa med/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul de ltar gnas pa med/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam de ltar shin tu sbyangs/_byang chub sems dpa'i lung 
[\[317b.6\]]bstan pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs kyang /_byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni shes pa med pa/_mthong ba med pa/_dad pa med pa/_mos pa med pa/_mi mkhas pa'i gnas la spyod pa/_bsam pa rmugs pa/_'khor ba'i rgyud shin tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba/_
[\[317b.7\]]sangs rgyas blta ba la log par zhugs pa/_'dren pa'i sa las nyams pa/_lam shes pa'i drung nas gar ba/_kha lo sgyur ba mi tshol ba/_stobs bcu la rim gro med pa/_byang chub sems dpa' la drin du mi gzo ba/_dma' ba la gnas pa/_
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]dngos po med pas 'jigs pa/_rigs pas spangs pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa la zhugs pa/_mnyam pa nyid las log par lhung ba/_g.yang sa chen por rab tu lhung ba/_bdud kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa 
[\[318a.2\]]las ring du gyur pa/_srid pa la mngon par chags pa sha stag go_/zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams la 'jug cing snying rje chen po de bas kyang cher bskyed nas/_snying rje chen po rgya cher byas te gnas med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag 
[\[318a.3\]]par bstsags nas/_'di snyam du sems bskyed do/_/gal te sems can re re'i phyir yul re re dang /_phyogs re rer yang bskal pa brjod du med par sems can re re 'dul ba'i phyir 'dug la/_sems can gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can 
[\[318a.4\]]gyi khams thams cad kyi don du 'dug kyang bdag gis de'i phyir mi dga' ba mi skyed de/_yul de dang phyogs de nas kyang bdag gud du g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/gud du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/skra'i rtse mo tsam la chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'dus par byas te/_skra'i 
[\[318a.5\]]rtse mo'i tshul de lta bus skra'i rtse mor chud pa re re yang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba'i phyir/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas par bya'o/_/skra'i rtse mo gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mtha' 
[\[318a.6\]]dang dbus med pa thams cad la yang de ltar te/_se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang gnas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/gnas par mi bya'o/_/gnas kyi sems mi skyed do/_/skra'i rtse mo tsam re re la yang lus gnas med pa dang /_chos gnas 
[\[318a.7\]]med pa dang /_dran pa gnas med pa dang /_smon lam gnas med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa dang /_rtogs pa gnas med pa dang /_spyod yul gnas med pa dang /_sems can gyi khams 'dul ba gnas med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]la 'jug pa gnas med pas phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed do/_/bdag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad sgyu ma lta 
[\[318b.2\]]bur shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad [(]ba [,]bltar [)]med pa'i tshul du mig yor lta bur shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnas med pa'i phyir/_rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[318b.3\]]pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa brag cha lta bur shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis las kyi rnam par shes pa'i mthu las byung bas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis spyod pa'i mthu las byung bas lus ni yid kyi rgyu 
[\[318b.4\]]las byung bar shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis sna tshogs dang 'dres pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad ni sems lta bur shes par bya'o/_/rnam par 'gyur ba med pas bdag gis chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[318b.5\]]bdag gis phyogs bcur sems bskyed pas rgyas par bkang ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems yangs par bsgyur ba dang /_
[\[318b.6\]]dran pa gnas med pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud cing /_mkhas pa sems kyi skad cig gcig gis thob par bya'o zhes/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bdag dang sangs rgyas la bdag med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par blta zhing /_
[\[318b.7\]]sems can chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa/_tshig gi lam gyi sa la smin par byed pa'i tshe dga' ba mtha' yas pa thob po/_/sangs rgyas dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa/_tshad med pa yang yang dag par rab tu 'thob po/_
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du bdag gis skyo ba'i sems mi bskyed do/_/sems can gyi khams yongs su ma smin cing ma dul gyi bar du skyo ba'i smon lam mi bskyad do/_/bdag gis 'jig rten gyi 
[\[319a.2\]]khams thams cad las rnam par 'das par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu bar byas te/_smon lam gang la sems can gyi sgra yod pa dang /_sems can gyi las dang /_sems can nye bar len pa dang /_sems can rnam par gzhag pa 
[\[319a.3\]]dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang ldan pa dang /_sems can gyi glong dang /_sems can gyi 'du byed dang /_sems can gyi yul dang /_sems can gyi 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi ldog pa yod pa de la bdag gis gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[319a.4\]]sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du smon lam de las g.yo bar yang mi bya ste/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang gnas kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis gnas med pa dang /_mi gnas par bya ste/_bdag 
[\[319a.5\]]gi don yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa ste/_gnas med pa zhes bya'o/_/kye 
[\[319a.6\]]rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba brgyad pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[319a.7\]]kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thub par dka' ba/_gdul bar dka' ba/_rab tu gdul bar dka' ba/_phyed par dka' ba/_zil gyis mi non pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mi 'phrogs pa bdag nyid che ba/_rgyud kyi tshul gcig 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]tu gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zham ring na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu dad pa yin/_yangs par dad pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub la shin tu mos pa yin/_byang chub 
[\[319b.2\]]sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa yin/_bskal pa thams cad du mi skyo ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_sdug bsngal thams cad kyis sgyid lug par 'gyur ba med pa yin/_bdud thams cad kyis phyir brgal du med pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[319b.3\]]thams cad kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub thams cad kyis rnam par sbyangs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i brtul shugs kyis tshad mi shes pa yin/_theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog 
[\[319b.4\]]pa yin/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub par dka' ba la gnas te/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa grangs med par 'khor yang phyir mi ldog pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po yang rgyun mi gcod do/_/
[\[319b.5\]]de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang /_sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byed do/_/thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bas kyang /_sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[319b.6\]]phyir mi ldog par byed do/_/sems can thams cad sems can med par yang shes te/_sems can gyi khams yongs su gtong ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na mnyan pa ni pha rol tu 'gro ba yang ma yin no/_/tshu rol tu 'gro ba 'ang ma yin/_
[\[319b.7\]]chu klung gi gzhung la gnas pa 'ang ma yin/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir pha rol dang pha rol ma yin par sems can rnams kyang sgrol lo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor bar 'gro ba yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das par 'gro 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]ba yang ma yin/_'khor ba'i rgyud la gnas pa yang ma yin te/_tshu rol gyi mu nas sems can rnams bskyod de/_pha rol gyi ngogs bde ba/_'jigs pa med pa/_'tshe ba med pa/_'khrug pa med par rab tu bzhag kyang sems 
[\[320a.2\]]can gyi khams bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon par chags pa med do/_/sems can gcig las bskyod nas mang po la mngon par chags par yang mi byed/_mang po las bskyod nas sems can gcig la mngon par chags par yang mi byed/_sems can gyi 
[\[320a.3\]]khams 'phel bar yang mi byed/_bri bar yang mi byed/_sems can gyi khams skye bar yang mi byed/_'gog par yang mi byed/_zad par yang mi byed/[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par yang mi byed/_rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/_rnam pa gnyis su yang mi byed do/_/
[\[320a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams la zhugs shing khong du chud pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings ji lta bar sems can gyi khams kyang de bzhin te/_sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de la gnyis su med do/_/
[\[320a.5\]]gnyis su med pa'i chos la ni 'bri ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_'gag pa yang med de/_chos kyi rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis med par 'gyur ba'am/_len pa'am/_gnas pa'am/_mngon par chags pa'am/_gnyis su 'gyur ba med do/_/de 
[\[320a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings bstan pa'i tshul du gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings rab tu dbye ba'i mkhas pa khong du chud pa yin te/_mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i lus dang /_
[\[320a.7\]]dngos po med pa yongs su shes pa dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin yongs su rtogs pas mtshan nyid med pa la gnas pa yin/_de ni sems can rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shes/_sems can gyi grangs kyang shes te/_'jig rten gyi khams rnams 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]la 'ang mngon par chags pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jug cing khong du chud par byed de/_las la rnam par rtog par mi byed do/_/don kyang shin tu rtogs pa yin no/_/don gyi yi ge yang 
[\[320b.2\]]yongs su brjod do/_/chos 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad kyang shes so/_/rab tu shes so/_/khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang yang mi 'bral te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang phyir mi ldog go_/
[\[320b.3\]]chos kyi dbyings su bzung ba las dbang sgyur bar zhugs pas zad mi shes pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_gtsub ma las byung ba'i me'i rgyu tshad med pas/_me'i dgos pa las ma 'gags pa yin te/_de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[320b.4\]]sems dpa' yang /_'jig rten thams cad na sems can gyi don las 'gag pa med par zhugs pa yin te/_kun gyis mthar byas pa'ang ma yin/_kun gyi mtha' med par bya ba'ang ma yin no/_/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'ang ma yin/_
[\[320b.5\]]nye bar len pa med pa'ang ma yin no/_/gnas pa'ang ma yin/_mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/_/'jig rten gyi chos kyi rjes su song ba yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba yang ma yin no/_/so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/_'bras bu la 
[\[320b.6\]]gnas pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_spyad pa la spyod de/_de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa mi ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston pa med do/_/
[\[320b.7\]]'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi chos nye bar len pa med do/_/sems can dang sems can 'jig rten pa nye bar len pa med do/_/nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba nye bar len pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kun nas nyon 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]mongs pa med par byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad nye bar blangs pa med par byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad zhugs pa med par byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes so/_
[\[321a.2\]]chos thams cad ldog pa med par byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes so/_/de de ltar zhi zhing phra ba dang zab pa dang /_bzang po'i chos la spyod pa'i tshe/_spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyad par bya'o zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_khams 
[\[321a.3\]]kyi yul dang /_skye mched kyi yul dang /_nang gi snang ba dang /_phyi rol gyi snang ba dang /_phyi nang gi snang ba dang /_smon lam yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_chos thams cad du yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[321a.4\]]zhe na/_'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ni/_gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[321a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa 'am/_so so'i skye bo'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/_'khor ba'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/_mya ngan 
[\[321a.6\]]las 'das pa'i khams la zhugs pa'i chos gang yang med do/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di la chos gnyis shes bya ba gang yang med de mi gnyis pa yang med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni phyogs bcur ma rnyed/_mi rnyed/_
[\[321a.7\]]rnyed par mi 'gyur yang nam mkhar bgrang ba'i tshul yod do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang chos gang yang dmigs pa med de/_chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/zhes grangs su bgrang ba yang yod de/_de ni yang 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]dag par bden pa ste/_log pa ma yin no/_/de ni bya ba dang mi 'gal ba'i spyod pa yang ston to/_/smon lam yang mi gtong ngo /_/sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin pa dag gdul ba yang byed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor ro/_/rgyu dang 
[\[321b.2\]]'bras bu yang 'jig par mi byed do/_/chos nyid dang yang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[321b.3\]]rigs kyang rgyun chad par mi byed/_chos kyi tshul dang yang 'gal bar mi byed/_chos kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi spobs pa yang 'jig par mi byed/_chos thos pas kyang rlom sems med de/_chos kyi 'byung gnas kyang rab tu thob/_
[\[321b.4\]]chos brjod pa yang rab tu byed/_mi 'jigs pa la yang rab tu gnas/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang mi gtong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi tshul yang 'gog par mi byed/_'jig rten mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu ston te/_'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams la 
[\[321b.5\]]yang gnas pa med do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod de/_sems can gyi khams kyang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin 
[\[321b.6\]]rje'i 'jig rten nas gyen du skyod de/_de dag bskyod nas kyang yongs su smyin par byed do/_/'dul bar byed do/_rab tu gzhog par byed do/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam gyi 
[\[321b.7\]]rgyud las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/'jig rten gnas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba dang /_dgras yongs su gang ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pas yongs su gang ba dang /_mi mthun pas yongs su gang ba dang /_yid gzhag du mi rung 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]bas yongs su gang ba dang /_byis pas yongs su gang ba dang /_ma dad pas yongs su gang ba dang /_gzhan gyis dring la rgyug pas yongs su gang ba dang /_shes rab ngan pas shin tu byung ba dang /_'jig rten gnas pa 
[\[322a.2\]]sred pa'i bsam pa dang /_ma rig pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/_de 'di snyam du sems skye'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa drin du gzo bas yongs su 
[\[322a.3\]]gang ba dang /_mdza' bos yongs su gang ba dang /_mkhas pas yongs su gang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa lta ngo mtshar du yang ci che ste/_de ji lta zhe na/_bdag ni sems can mdza' ba 'am/_mi mdza' ba gang las kyang 
[\[322a.4\]]chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam 'am/_chung ngu na dge bar bya ba sbyin pa tsam yang mi 'dod mi tshol te/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod kyang /_gzhan du na sems can de dag yongs su 'grol ba dang /_
[\[322a.5\]]sems can de dag yongs su dad par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de dag las sems skad cig tsam du bde bar 'gyur ba yang mi tshol lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ni sems la len pa med 
[\[322a.6\]]cing /_thams cad la 'dod pa med pas/_sems can gyi gtso bor 'gyur bar byed pa ste/_'di ltar bdag gis ci nas kyang sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthas gtugs te/_shin tu bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[322a.7\]]par 'gyur bar nan tan du bya'o/_/snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa brgyad pa ste/_thub par dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dgu pa chos bzang po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs par bcas pa/_
[\[322b.2\]]dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang dri za dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa na/_chos kyi mu stegs bzang por gyur pa yin te/_de sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyir/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa yin/_
[\[322b.3\]]gzungs kyi snang ba rnam par dag pa thob pas/_gtam bya ba dang /_lung bstan pa la spobs pa yin/_chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pas don la spobs pa yin/_chos ji lta ba bzhin gyi gzungs chos yang dag par bskul ba thob pas/_
[\[322b.4\]]chos la spobs pa yin/_tshig dang smra ba thams cad kyi gzungs rab tu thob pas nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa yin/_tshig dang yi ge'i don kun tu mtha' yas shing zad mi shes pa la thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs thob pas spobs pa thogs pa 
[\[322b.5\]]med pa yin/_sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dbang bskur bas mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pas snang ba thob pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[322b.6\]]spobs pa thun mong ba'i tshul la zhugs pas thun mong gi spobs pa dang ldan pa yin te/_don mang po dang tshig mang po dang /_yi ge mang po de dang /_de dag la nges pa'i tshig gi gzungs kyi sgor tshud pas nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[322b.7\]]rgyud mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob pas mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin te/_des ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi don du bdag gis lus gser gyi mdog du mngon par sprul nas/_chos 'byam 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]klas pa thams cad dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad du chud pas sems can de dang de dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa dang /_dbang po 'byam klas pa mtha' yas pa rnams la/_lce 
[\[323a.2\]]yangs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang /_dus dang 'byor pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_snying rje chen po 'gal ba med pas shin tu bstan pa dang /_tshig gcig gi sgra brjod pas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim 
[\[323a.3\]]par 'gyur zhing /_mtha' yas par snang bar ston pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la spyod do/_/de ni gal te sems can re re zhing /_tshig gi rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshig gi cho ga las sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'du byas pa/_rnam par 
[\[323a.4\]]smyin pa brjod kyis mi lang zhing 'byam klas pas nye bar gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_grangs med pa rnam par phye ba/_rnam pa tha dad pa brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/_de lta bu'i sems can sha stag byang chub sems 
[\[323a.5\]]dpa'i 'khor du gyur la/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa zhig yin te/_'dul ba brjod du med pa zhig 'dus nas/_sems can re re la yang kha'i sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs 
[\[323a.6\]]med pa brjod du med pa yod par gyur te/_sems can gcig ji lta bar sems can de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin du de snyed kyi kha'i sgo dang ldan pa/_sems can de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' la skad du brjod pa/_bye ba khrag 
[\[323a.7\]]khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnam par brtags pas dus gcig tu dbyangs gcig tu byas te/_yongs su dri bar byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_de lta bu'i skad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]de lta bu'i brjod pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su dris pa la 'ang /_chos gzung ba la thogs pa med pa yin/_brjod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/_rnam par rtog pa med pa yin te/_dri bas the tsom yongs su dris pa la thogs pa med do/_/'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[323b.2\]]'khor gcig du ji lta ba de bzhin du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa de tsam thams cad du yang de bzhin te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so/_/gal te skra'i rtse mo re re las sems bskyed pa re re zhing /_'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[323b.3\]]'khor brjod du med pa zhig byung la/_sems skad cig re re la rtog pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/_skad gzhan dang gzhan du brjod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad gang bar byed cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa de lta bu sha stag cig skra'i rtse mo 
[\[323b.4\]]thams cad las byung ste/_de ltar byung bas phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa'i mur thug par byung yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag 'byung bas/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa zad par gyur te/_'khor de rnams ni zad mi shes par byung la skye ba'i 
[\[323b.5\]]rgyun mi 'chad pa zhig yod du zin na yang bstan par bya ba'i sa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems skad cig pa 'ga' tsam du yang zhum pa mi skye'o/_/snyom pa mi skye'o/_/sgyid lug dang /_khong snyom mi skye'o/_/the tsom dang yid gnyis mi skye'o/_/bag tsha 
[\[323b.6\]]ba dang 'jigs pa mi skye'o/_/rmongs pa dang 'khrul pa mi skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzang po la gnas pa de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang /_sems can gyi khams 
[\[323b.7\]]thams cad kyang tshig gi lam gyis yongs su mgu bar byas te/_chos bshad pa'i mthar thug par mi bya/_chos la rnam par thogs par mi bya'o/_/zhes nas/_des brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/_sems can de dag la brtag_
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]mi dgos par 'byung ba'i tshig dang /_tshig gi cho ga rnam pa tha dad pa brtag mi dgos par 'byung ba dang /_tshig gi rnam par gdags pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'byung bas chos ston par byed do/_/de brjod pa de dag 
[\[324a.2\]]thams cad kyang 'dzin la/_sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kyang /_tshig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbang bskur ba/_chags pa med pa'i snying po can/_chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzhol ba 
[\[324a.3\]]gcig gis sems can thams cad kyang go bar byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos bzang po la gnas pa ni/_mngon par chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis bdag rnam par dag pa yang rab 
[\[324a.4\]]tu 'thob po/_/sems can med par 'byung ba'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni dus gcig tu stong gsum pa bcu nas stong gsum pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i don du byin gyis brlabs shing /_
[\[324a.5\]]bdag gi lus gser gyi mdog du mngon par sprul te/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shes pa'i sgor chud pa/_chos thams cad du khyab pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug cing /_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrubs te/_
[\[324a.6\]]'jig rten thams cad du rgyu ba 'gags pas/_'gro ba med pa'i lus rnams dang 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas mtha' yas par 'gro ba'i lus rnams dang /_mi skye ba dang mnyam pa'i chos la brtson pas ma skyes pa'i lus rnams dang /_
[\[324a.7\]]'gog par brjod pa thams cad dmigs pa med pas 'gags pa med pa'i lus rnams dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pas bden pa med pa'i lus rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi bden pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pas/_bden pa med pa'i lus rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi bden pa bzhin du rnam 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]par dmigs pas mi slu ba'i lus rnams dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba las 'das pas mi 'pho ba'i lus rnams dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 'jig par mi byed pas/_mi 'jigs pa'i lus rnams dang /_dus gsum gyi tshig gi lam la brtson pas skad cig gcig 
[\[324b.2\]]gi lus rnams dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa'i mthar thug pas mtshan nyid med pa'i lus rnams dang /_lus rnam par phye ba 'byam klas pa bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pa 
[\[324b.3\]]la sems can thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/dbugs chen po phyin par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen yin no/_/gnas chen po thob par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi skyabs yin no/_/bla na med pa'i 'byung ba mthong bar bya 
[\[324b.4\]]ba la sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no/_/chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi 'dren pa yin no/_/las kyi rnam par smyin pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi me mar yin no/_/chos 
[\[324b.5\]]zab mo rab tu thob par bya ba la 'jig rten thams cad kyi snang ba yin no/_/chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rmongs pa med par khong du chud par bya ba la khams gsum thams cad kyi sgron ma yin no/_/snang ba'i sa rab tu thob par bya ba la 'jig 
[\[324b.6\]]rten thams cad kyi snang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' ba yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/_
[\[324b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dgu pa chos bzang po zhes bya ba ste/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la 'gro ba thams cad kyi mu stegs yin no/_/
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu pa bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[325a.2\]]bden pa'i tshig dam pa dang ldan pas/_bden pa'i tshig can yin te/_de ni gang smras pa de byed/_gang byed pa de smra'o/_/de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pa'i gsung la yang slob bo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[325a.3\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pa'i gsung la yang slob bo/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pa'i gsung la yang slob bo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs la yang 'jug go_/ma byon pa'i 
[\[325a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs la yang 'jug go_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs la yang 'jug go_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 'thob bo/_/ma byon pa'i 
[\[325a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 'thob bo/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 'thob po/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad dang /_dge 
[\[325a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba lhan cig tu gyur pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas gnyis su med par smra ba yin no/_/de sems can rnams kyi gnas dang /_gnas ma yin pa'i shes pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/de 
[\[325a.7\]]sems can rnams kyi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnam par smin pa shes pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa rdzogs pa dang /_ma rdzogs pa dang /_rab dang /_tha ma shes 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/khams tha dad pa dang /_khams du ma la yang rab tu 'jug go_/mos pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa du ma la yang rab tu 'jug go_/thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi ye shes la yang rab tu 'jug go_/bsam 
[\[325b.2\]]gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa/_sems can rnams kyi dus dang dus ma yin pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten 
[\[325b.3\]]gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa la 'ang rab tu 'jug go_/lha'i mig chags pa med par yang mngon par sgrub po/_/zag pa zad par shes pa'ang rab tu shes te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[325b.4\]]spyod pa nye bar gzung ba 'ang rgyun mi gcod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_de'i phyir zhing sems 'di snyam du skye'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[325b.5\]]'jig rten na gnas pa yongs su ma grol bar bdag rnam par grol ba'i tshul rab tu shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su ma bkrol cing smon lam rjes su ma bsrungs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[325b.6\]]chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba 'di ni bdag la mi cha la/_de bas na ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthas gtugs par 'gyur ba dang /_gang 'di phung po lhag ma ma lus 
[\[325b.7\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gzhol bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag cag ni sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_sems can 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]thams cad kyis ma bskul bar yang dag par zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la thog mar 'gro ba'o/_/bdag cag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir kha lo sgyur ba ste/_bdag cag 
[\[326a.2\]]gi ni 'gro ba kun gyis gos pa med pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bla na med par kha lo sgyur ba'i sa la dam par gyur pa'o/_/bdag cag ni sems can med pa'i mtha' la rab rib med pa'o/_/bdag cag ni sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[326a.3\]]gyis thob pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu sprul pa'o/_/bdag cag ni sangs rgyas 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/zhes te 
[\[326a.4\]]de sngon gyi smon lam yang 'jig par mi byed do/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan la yang rab tu 'jug go_/sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sngon gyi smon lam ji ltar btab pa yang thog ma dang /_
[\[326a.5\]]bar ma dang /_tha ma'i tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_chos thams cad shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'ang rab tu thob par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang 
[\[326a.6\]]phyogs bcur rgyas par 'gro ste/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug go_/sems bskyed pa re res kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ste/_de 
[\[326a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'ang yongs su ston to/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par lus byin gyis brlabs pa/_'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnas pa'ang rab tu shes te/_bdag gi lus de dag la'ang zhing thams cad yongs su 'dus par kun tu ston cing /_dus 
[\[326b.2\]]gsum gyi sems can thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rab tu ston to/_/sems can de dag gi 'du shes kyi rgyud dang mthu la'ang rab tu 'jug go_/sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang /_mos pa dang las dang /_
[\[326b.3\]]rnam par smyin pa rnam par dag par ji tsam pa de tsam du sems can gdul ba'i don du lus byin gyis rlob ste/_de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad kyis shin tu sprul pa ste/_mig yor lta bu'i sangs rgyas skye bar bya ba la pha 
[\[326b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'gro ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'i yid dang ldan pa'o/_/don dang yi ge'i tshogs la mi zad pa'i mdzod do/_/dran pas dbang bsgyur ba'i chos thams cad la nges par rtogs pa thob pa'o/_/shes rab che ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[326b.5\]]thams cad la yang rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/gnyis su med pa'i sa la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams gnyis la gnas pa la snying rje chen por gnas pa ste/_chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu'i mthar 
[\[326b.6\]]dben par gyur pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings mig 'phrul lta bu la rab tu 'jug cing gnas pa'o/_/chags pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob 
[\[326b.7\]]pa'o/_/thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rjes su spyod pa'i ye shes dang rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/_ye shes rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]'khor ba'i 'khor lo bzlog pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho'i tshul 
[\[327a.2\]]gyi rjes su zhugs zhing gting rnyed pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu pa ste/_bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[327a.3\]]rnams bden pas/_lha dang bdud dang /_tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa dang /_lha dang dri za dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang phrad par 'dong ngo /_/shes par byed do/_/tshim 
[\[327a.4\]]par byed do/_/yongs su dag par byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sa rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur to/_/g.yos so rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos 
[\[327a.5\]]so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/
[\[327a.6\]]kun tu shig shig go_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi phreng 
[\[327a.7\]]ba'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]yang mngon par byung ngo /_/lha rdzas kyi snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo /_/lha rdzas kyi sgra yang rab tu byung ngo /_/gling bzhi pa 'di'i lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na/_ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyang rgyas par byas te/_thams cad na yang 
[\[327b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos 'di nyid bstan par snang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[327b.3\]]'ongs te/_phyogs bcu rgyas par byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_bdag cag kun kyang ming yon 
[\[327b.4\]]tan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kun tu yon tan zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag nas phyin te/_thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'di 'dra ba dag na tshig 
[\[327b.5\]]'di dag dang /_yi ge 'di dag dang /_bstan pa 'di dag dang /_don 'di nyid brjod pas lhag chad med par chos bstan pa 'di ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar bdag cag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin te ji ltar 'khor 'dir 
[\[327b.6\]]bdag cag phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling gzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab mtshe ma'i gnas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba kun tu yang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[327b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyin par gyur to//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas phyogs 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]bcur bltas te/_'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par blta zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par gzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su spyod pa 
[\[328a.2\]]dang /_smon lam gyi rigs phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_spyod pa'i rigs rgyun tu bsab pa dang /_dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam par bya ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung 
[\[328a.3\]]ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa'i rgyud brjod pa dang /_dus dang ji ltar 'byor pa'i yan lag dang dbang po dang /_bsam pa dang mos pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags dang /_sems dang spyod pa dang /_rnam par g.yos pa'i 
[\[328a.4\]]rgyud thams cad yongs su brtag pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs thams cad snang bar byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/nam mkha'i lam gyi rgyud gshegs shing /_/
[\[328a.5\]]bsgribs pa med par gzigs pa rdul rnams sbyangs gyur pa/_/kun tu mtha' yas spyod yul can/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang yang rgyal ba mi yi mchog_/chags pa mi mnga' yon tan tshad med mnga' ba ste/_/'das 
[\[328a.6\]]dus mnyam pas mnyam gyur pa/_/rdul bstsal de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag na/_/don gyi dam pa gzigs pa brten pa bzhugs pa rnams/_/mtha' yas nyes pa kun bstsal pa/_/gnas med de dag 
[\[328a.7\]]spyod pa 'di yin no/_/chos dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/skyes bu seng ge gang rnams byon par ma gyur pa/_/thugs rje che bskyed rnam spyod pa/_/phan mdzad de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/dus gsum gzhal du med pa yi/_/rang byung 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]gti mug rnam par bstsal ba ji snyed pa/_/thams cad chos nyid mnyam pa ste/_/stobs mnga' de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/gang rnams mtha' dbus med pa yi/_/'jig rten khams kyi srid pa'i rgyud rnams rab gzigs shing /_/gzigs nas rtog 
[\[328b.2\]]pa mi mnga' ba/_/mi g.yo de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/gang rnams chos kyi dbyings mkhyen cing /_/rnam dag don gyi dam pa gzigs pa brtan pa rnams/_/gti mug tha ba nga rgyal sel mdzad pa/_/legs mnga' de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/
[\[328b.3\]]gang rnams sems can kun mkhas shing /_/chos kyi dbyings la ngo bo nyid kyis zhugs gyur pa'i/_/bde gshegs gzhan dring mi 'jog pa/_/mkha' mnyam de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa/_/nam mkha' klas pa 
[\[328b.4\]]yang dag thugs su chud gyur te/_/zil gyis mi non chos mnga' ba/_/thub mchog de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/ldog pa med pa de dag rnams/_/mi dma'i chos dang ldan pa thub par dka' ba dag_/smon lam stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/_/spyod 
[\[328b.5\]]legs mnga' ba'i spyod 'di mnyan par gyis/_/mtha' dang dbus ni med pa'i sar/_/rjes su zhugs shing thams cad gzigs par gyur pa rnams/_/spyod yul zab mo mnga' ba yi/_/smra ba'i seng ge'i spyod pa 'di yin no/_/rab tu dbye ba'i 
[\[328b.6\]]tshig rgyus la/_/rjes su zhugs shing rgol ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin/_/chos rnams rtog pa mnga' ba rnams/_/thub chen de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/'jig rten bde ba bskyed mdzad cing /_/sems can nyes med thugs dang ldan pa 
[\[328b.7\]]rnams/_/kha lo sgyur ba mnyam med pa'i/_/yon tan tshad med de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/'jigs pa med pa stob mdzad cing /_/sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa rnams/_/dang zhing rnyog pa med pa yi/_/dpe med de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/dge ba'i 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]thugs dang ldan pa rnams/_/bsam pa rnam par dag cing spros pa med pa yi/_/dpal gyi gzi brjid spungs rgyas pa/_/dpal mchog ldan pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/don gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams/_/yon tan 'byung gnas 
[\[329a.2\]]rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/shin tu sems pa'i blo ldan rnams/_/srid nas 'phags pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/bdag med nyams pa med pa rnams/_/rnga yi dbyangs rab mnga' ba zhing du gzhol ba dag_/chos kyi tshul la gnas pa 
[\[329a.3\]]rnams/_/tshig la nyams med de dag spyod 'di'o/_/sbyin pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams/_/bsod nams mtshan rab brgyas kyang rab tu brgyan pa dag_/'gro la phan par mdzad pa rnams/_/blo rab de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/ye shes shin 
[\[329a.4\]]tu zab pa'i sar/_/rjes su zhugs shing blo gros shin tu brtan pa rnams/_/mi g.yo brtan zhing gnas pa dag_/brtul shugs brtan pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis/_/rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin par gyur pa 
[\[329a.5\]]dag_/rnam par 'phrul la brtson pa rnams/_/chos kyi nyi ma de dag spyod 'di'o/_/mi mnyam mnyam pa'i blo mnga' rnams/_/mi gnyis yongs su bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pa/_/bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dag_/thams cad 
[\[329a.6\]]gzigs pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'jig rten khams la rab 'jug pa/_/phra dang yangs dang rgya che'i rnam pa thams cad du/_/spyod yul thob par gyur pa rnams/_/ye shes ri bo de dag spyod 'di'o/_/yongs su dag pa'i sems ldan pa/_/
[\[329a.7\]]khams rnams gsum po kun tu chags pa med pa dag_/tshul khrims brtul shugs mthar phyin pa/_/rnam dag sems ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i/_/ye shes 'byam klas mngon par brjod du med pa la/_/
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]zhugs te bslabs pa'i blo ldan pa/_/ye shes stobs can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/ye shes gsal ba'i phung po yis/_/dus gsum chos kyi dbyings rnams bkang ste bsgrub byed kyang /_/sgyid lug yid du mi 'gyur bar/_/sangs rgyas yul zhugs de dag 
[\[329b.2\]]spyod yul lo/_/kun tu 'gro bar song gyur cing /_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos rnams kun kyang shes pa rnams/_/lus kyi chos kyang chags med pa/_/yon tan dpal can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[329b.3\]]rten dag na rgyu bar gyur pa rnams/_/sems can kun gyi bdag ni skyabs yin pa/_/'jigs med de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/rtag par brtson 'grus gnas 'cha' zhing /_/nam yang sangs rgyas chos la zhum pa med pa rnams/_/de ni 'jig rten sbyang phyir 
[\[329b.4\]]te/_/klu chen de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/dbang po dag gi rgyus shes pa/_/mos pa'i tshul gyis pha rol phyin par gyur pa rnams/_/sna tshogs khams kyang rtogs gyur pa/_/mnyam med rtogs gyur de dag spyod 'di'o/_/phyogs rnams bcu po 
[\[329b.5\]]tshad med pa'i/_/mtha' dang dbus med rin chen mang pos 'gengs byed kyang /_/nam yang skyo ba'i yid med pa/_/dad par byed pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'od zer dra ba mtha' yas pa/_/kun tu 'gyed cing 'jig rten snang bar byed pa rnams/_/snang ba'i
