[\[329b.6\]]chos rnams rtogs gyur pa/_/blo gros bsgoms pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/gang zhig phyogs bcu'i zhing gi rnams/_/khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad skyod byed kyang /_/'jig par 'gyur bar mi byed de/_/'jig rten phan pa bskyed la rtag tu brtson/_/
[\[329b.7\]]tshig gi tshul la mkhas pa rnams/_/brjod pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/shes pa rmongs med mkhas pa dag_/mi 'gul sems ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/_/spyi'u tshugs rgyu la mkhas pa dag_/zhing 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]rnams rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol phyin pa'i rnams/_/mi zad sa la zhugs pa'i dag_/pham med blo gros de dag spyod 'di'o/_/yon tan khrag khrig tshad med pa/_/byang chub rab la gzhol zhing spyad pa spyod pa dag_/yon 
[\[330a.2\]]tan thams cad mthar phyin pa/_/legs pa mi zad de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'jig rten 'das pa smra ba'i rnams/_/smra ba'i dam pa smra ba'i seng ger gyur pa dag_/'gro ba dag bya'i mthar phyin pa/_/rnam dag sems ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/_/sangs 
[\[330a.3\]]rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur bas/_/chos kyi dam pa rab la mngon par dbang bskur zhing /_/chos kyi tshul gyi rjes su song ba rnams/_/yid yangs ldan pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'gro ba'i srid pa kun srung zhing /_/sems can thams cad rnam 
[\[330a.4\]]par bsgom pa'i yid ldan pa/_/shin tu rtogs pa'i mdzod 'chang rnams/_/chos kyi ri bo de dag spyod 'di'o/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gis kyang /_/'khor rnams brjod du med pa shes par byed pa dag_/dbyangs kyi tshul la zhugs 
[\[330a.5\]]pa rnams/_/chags med mthong ba de dag spyod 'di'o/_/gang zhig tshig lam rjes song zhing /_/ye shes shin du 'phags pas rnam par mi rtog pa/_/rnam par rtog med spyod yul can/_/rang bzhin med mthong de dag spyod 'di'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[330a.6\]]rgya mtshor gnas 'cha' zhing /_/chos rnams thams cad rgyu yis rab tu 'debs byed pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul ldan rnams/_/dpal gyi tshul can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing gcig tu/_/bsam gyis mi 
[\[330a.7\]]khyab pa yi dus rnams chud byed cing /_/bskal pa grangs med 'dzud byed pa/_/skyo med brtson pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/tha dad mtshan can mi yi dbang /_/skra yi rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod yas pa/_/gang gis de dag mthong gyur 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]rnams/_/spyod pa bzang ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/_/gang gis skra yi cha tsam la/_/brjod du med pa'i 'dren pa rnams ni mthong gyur cing /_/de bzhin chos dbyings thams cad de/_/rgyal sras de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/bskal pa brjod 
[\[330b.2\]]du med pa rnams/_/sems bskyed gcig gis rab tu shes par gyur pa rnams/_/ring dang thung bar nges med pa/_/rnam thar spyod pa de dag spyod 'di'o/_/lta zhing don med mi 'gyur la/_/sangs rgyas spyod pa dag la don yod las ldan 
[\[330b.3\]]rnams/_/chags pa med pa'i yid can dag_/rgyal ba dam pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/gang gis sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/_/bskal pa khrag khrig nam du'ang ngoms par mi 'gyur bar/_/dga' ba shin tu spyod pa rnams/_/blta na don 
[\[330b.4\]]yod de dag spyod 'di'o/_/sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa/_/sems shing bskal pa mang po zad par byed pa rnams/_/sems can med par shes pa dag_/sems can gtso bo de dag spyod 'di'o/_/bsod nams mang po bstsags pa 
[\[330b.5\]]rnams/_/ye shes skyob pa bsod nams chen po'i snying po can/_/bsod nams mu stegs 'gro ba yi/_/sems can dam pa'i spyod 'di'o/_/chos dbyings kun tu mtha' yas pa/_/nam mkha'i rnam pa bzhin du de dag tshad med pa/_/tshig 
[\[330b.6\]]gi lam la gnas pa rnams/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrog de dag spyod 'di'o/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin gcig pu la/_/ting nge 'dzin ni khrag khrig brjod du med pa yi/_/chos kyi gnas su zhugs gyur pa/_/smra ba'i zla ba de dag spyod 'di'o/_/
[\[330b.7\]]bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/_/de dag chos rnams thams cad zhi la bzod pa yin/_/mi sgul sems dang ldan pa'i rnams/_/mtha' yas shes can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'jig rten khams ni gcig nas kyang /_/de dag lus ni g.yo zhing 'pho bar 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]mi byed par/_/'gro ba kun tu'ang snang ba rnams/_/mtha' yas lus can de dag spyod 'di yin/_/gang zhig zhing gi tshul rnams kun/_/rjes su 'jug pa shin tu phra ba rab shes kyang /_/yongs su rgyas pa'i blo med pa/_/
[\[331a.2\]]mtha' yas sems dpa' de dag spyod 'di'o/_/gnas dang gnas min shes gyur cing /_/stobs la 'jug pa dag tu shin tu zhugs pa rnams/_/stobs kyi dam pa 'dzin pa dag_/stobs kyis stobs che de dag spyod 'di'o/_/'das pa dag 
[\[331a.3\]]dang ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i las rnams shin tu 'byam klas pa/_/rtag tu shes pa 'jug gyur pa/_/tshul shes de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/'gro ba'i dus dang dus [{]myin [,]min [}]pa/_/ji ltar sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin shes/_/
[\[331a.4\]]dus la 'bebs par mkhas pa rnams/_/shes pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/chos la spyod pa kun srung zhing /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rnams kyang srung byed pa/_/bdud kyi lam la ma zhugs pa/_/shes pa'i blo can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/
[\[331a.5\]]rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyus mkhas pa/_/chos rnams la ni ji ltar spobs par 'jug pa rnams/_/de bzhin nyid dang yul mnyam pa/_/bde gshegs spyod pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/chags med mdzod la brtson pa dag_/gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[331a.6\]]mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu shes pa rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yi/_/rjes su zhugs pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/ji snyed bzhugs pa kun dang gcig sems yid ldan pa/_/
[\[331a.7\]]rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa rnams/_/chags med rigs can de dag spyod 'di'o/_/bsgribs med ye shes tshul shes shing /_/bsgribs med ye shes phyag rgya dag la zhugs pa rnams/_bsgribs [{]myed [,]med [}{]myig [,]mig [}]kyang bdog byed pa/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]can de dag spyod 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]pa 'di yin no/_/gnyis su med la spyod pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par gzhog pa'i mgon po thams cad kun/_/rnam par 'phrul pa mkhyen pa rnams/_/gnyis su med spyod de dag spyod 'di'o/_/chos kyi sprin ni mtha' yas pa'i/_/char chen 
[\[331b.2\]]rab tu 'bebs shing zhing rnams yangs par rgyu/_/don rnams thams cad rtogs gyur pa/_/chos sprin de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/dad pa phyir ldog mi 'gyur zhing /_/rtsa ba shin tu tshugs shing dad pa rnam dag pa/_/rnam thar shes pa thams cad 
[\[331b.3\]]la/_/bslabs pa rnams kyi spyod yin mnyan par gyis/_/'gro ba 'di dag ji snyed pa/_/ma lus thams cad sems bskyed gcig tu chud byas te/_/sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa rnams/_/rang bzhin med pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/zhing rnams 
[\[331b.4\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu gang gis sprul byas shing /_/mnyam pa med pa der spyod pa/_/dpe med 'gro ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' yas te/_/de dag kun na 'jig rten mgon po gang 
[\[331b.5\]]bzhugs pa/_/de rnams dang ni mngon sum du/_/sangs rgyas zhabs kyi drung na 'khod gyur pa/_/de dag lus ni gcig pur yang /_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa rab tu ston/_/lus ni stong phrag mtha' yas pa/_/ting nge 'dzin las ldang na 
[\[331b.6\]]shin tu snang /_/spyod pa zab dang ldan byas nas/_/spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dag la rab spyod pa/_/dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa rnams/_/sems can kun la dga' bar byed pa yin/_/dbang po tha dad tshul rnams la/_/blo gros gnas shing shes 
[\[331b.7\]]pa rab tu thob pa rnams/_/dbang po dag ni mi gnas pa/_/ma dul 'dul ba de dag spyod 'di yin/_/tha dad chos kyi tshul rnams la/_/chos rnams thams cad kun la dbang bas shes gyur pa/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas mdzad pa la/_/dmigs pa'i 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]cho gas rab tu spyod pa yin/_/shin tu yangs pa'i ljags mnga' ba/_/de dag dbang po rnams dang legs pa'i spyod thos na/_/su yi sems shig dang mi 'gyur/_/nam mkha' lta bur de dag spyod 'di yin/_/kun tu 
[\[332a.2\]]mtha' yas shes ldan zhing /_/chos rnams kun tu mtha' yas mig yod pa/_/ye shes mtha' yas tshul ldan pa/_/mtha' yas shes can de dag spyod 'di yin/_/zad mi nus pa zad byed cing /_/bsod nams 'byam klas yod pas bsod nams mi 
[\[332a.3\]]zad pa/_/'gro ba dag pa'i mthar phyin rnams/_/'dra med de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/tshogs dang ldan zhing 'jig rten dang /_/de dag chos kyi lam la rab tu 'jug byas kyang /_/de dag sems can 'du shes med/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[332a.4\]]rab tu 'grel/_/nyon mongs med pa rtogs shes shing /_/spyod pa mngon par shes pa thams cad mthong ba rnams/_/bde ba'i lam rnams ston byed pa/_/mig can de dag tshul ni 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas ye shes spyod pa dang /_/tshad 
[\[332a.5\]]med yon tan dam pa thob par gyur pa'i rnams/_/mi 'jigs pa ni rnyed gyur pa/_/shes can de dag tshul ni 'di yin no/_/'jug pa kun la rab zhugs shing /_/zhing la 'jug dang chos kyi dbang la zhugs gyur pa/_/sems can zhugs la 
[\[332a.6\]]gnas byas nas/_/sems can dam pa sems can 'grol bar byed/_/phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyi rnga/_/brdung zhing 'jig rten 'di dag ston byed pa'i/_/chos rab sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams/_/nyams med rtogs [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag spyod 'di yin/_/
[\[332a.7\]]skyil mo krung 'dug gcig gis kyang /_/zhing yangs brjod du med pa kun tu rgyas byed kyang /_/su yi lus la gnod med pa/_/chos sku ldan pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/don dang yi ge gcig la yang /_/shin tu bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]'brang /_/de dag mtha' ni rnyed mi nus/_/mnyam med shes ldan de dag spyod 'di yin/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul shes pa/_/sangs rgyas rnam thar tshul bzhin bslabs pa rnams/_/'jigs pa med par gyur pa dag_/tshad med de dag tshul ni 'di yin 
[\[332b.2\]]no/_/de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho dang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par/_/shes pa rgya mtsho ldan pa yin/_/chos rnams rgya mtshos 'jig rten tshim par byed/_/gang rnams gshegs shing skyes gyur dang /_/byang chub rnam par 
[\[332b.3\]]'tshang rgya 'gro ba kun dag tu/_/su zhig mngon par snang gyur pa/_/mtha' dbus med pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/mya ngan 'da' ba du ma yang /_/zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig mngon par snang /_/'on kyang smra ba'i seng ge rnams/_/mya ngan mi 
[\[332b.4\]]'da' smon lam phyir mi ldog_/chos rnams lhun ni gcig gyur cing /_/sems can kun dang lus kyang gcig tu gyur pa rnams/_/rgyal bdag la rtog med pas/_/lus gcig gyur pa spyod 'di yin/_/tshig dang don rnams tha dad 
[\[332b.5\]]pas/_/'jig rten khams rnams mtha' dang dbus yod ma yin par/_/rang bzhin gcig la mos pa dag_/dus gsum shes pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/sems can dag dang rgyal ba dang /_/chos kyi tshul rnams kun la zad pa med rnyed pa/_/
[\[332b.6\]]sangs rgyas byin la mos pa dag_/rgyal bas byin brlabs de dag spyod 'di yin/_/chags pa med pa'i sku 'dra zhing /_/chags pa med pa'i mig gi pha rol phyin pa rnams/_/chags med rna ba mkhas pa dag_/chags med yid can de dag 
[\[332b.7\]]spyod 'di yin/_/mngon shes thams cad rnyed pa dang /_/ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rjes su song ba rnams/_/shes pa kun gyi dpal ldan pa/_/shes pa bzang can de dag spyod 'di yin/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag sems ldan zhing /_/
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]ye shes mtha' yas shes rab shin tu che ba rnams/_/kun tu spyod yul ldan pa dag_/thams cad gzigs pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin pa/_/sems can yangs pa gcig nas 
[\[333a.2\]]gcig brgyud sgrol ba rnams/_/yid ni yongs su nyams med pa/_/rtag tu brtson pa de dag spyod 'di yin/_/kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs pa dag_/sangs rgyas thams cad dus gsum gshegs pa mgon po yi/_/rigs dang rgyud 
[\[333a.3\]]du skyes pa rnams/_/rgyal sras de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/rjes su bstan la brtson byed pa/_/phas kyi rgol ba'i lam la 'jigs med spyod pa dang /_/mtha' yas blo yi spyod pa dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su zhugs pa rnams/_/mtha' 
[\[333a.4\]]dbus med pa zhing gi rnams/_/thams cad kun tu snang ba gcig gis gsal bar byed/_/thams cad snang bar byed pa rnams/_/mun pa sel ba'i spyod pa 'di yin no/_/gang du rgyal bas mdzad 'os pa/_/der ni sems can khrag khrig shin 
[\[333a.5\]]tu 'dul byed cing /_/sangs rgyas sku dang sangs rgyas zhing /_/sangs rgyas rgyan can khrag khrig snang bar byed/_/spyod pa dag ni mtha' yas la/_/su gnas brtan pa de dag shes par ji ltar rung /_/spyad pa thams cad shin tu ston/_/
[\[333a.6\]]'gro ba spyod pa thams cad mthar thug byed/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/_/bdag gi lus ni brjod du med par gyur pa yis/_/de dag legs pa brjod byas kyang /_/bskal pa khrag khrig dag gis mi 
[\[333a.7\]]zad do/_/yon tan kun tu mtha' yas shing /_/yon tan mchog rnams thams cad mtha' yas pa'i/_/yon tan kun ni brjod byas te/_/thub pas bskal par gsungs kyang zad mi 'gyur/_/rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos la/_/gzhol 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten gzhan gyi rnams kyis lta/_/bskal pa brjod yas brjod byas kyang /_/zad par mi nus de ni smos ci dgos/_/yon tan gyi me tog shin tu bstsags pa zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug 
[\[333b.2\]]pa//_//[{D44-27}]de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/_yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[333b.3\]]'das/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i gter dang /_tshul khrims kyi gter dang /_ngo tsha shes pa'i gter dang /_khrel yod 
[\[333b.4\]]pa'i gter dang /_thos pa'i gter dang /_gtong ba'i gter dang /_dam 'cha' ba'i gter dang /_rtogs pa'i gter dang /_blo gros kyi gter dang /_bla'i gter te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems 
[\[333b.5\]]dpa'i gter bcu po de dag ni/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la dad pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal 
[\[333b.6\]]ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad 
[\[333b.7\]]ma byas pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad ma brtags pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad gnas med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad tshad med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad bla na med 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad 'dar mi rung ba zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/_/de ni chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa yin te/_chos thams 
[\[334a.2\]]cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi 
[\[334a.3\]]dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/'das 
[\[334a.4\]]pa'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[334a.5\]]thams cad la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i dad pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du gcig tu nges par gyur pa yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi 
[\[334a.6\]]mtha' yang zad mi shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyang zad mi shes te/_'jig rten gyi khams re re yang mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[334a.7\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par byung ngo /_/yang dag par 'byung ngo /_/yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/yongs 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni 'bri ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_'pho ba'am/_'gro ba'am/_nye bar byed pa 'am/_ring par byed pa'am/_shes par byed pa 'am/_'byin 
[\[334b.2\]]par byed pa ma yin te/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang dag par gnas pas zad pa med cing /_mtha' yas pa'i dad pa'i gter dang ldan pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/dad pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mi zad 
[\[334b.3\]]pa/_phyir mi ldog pa/_myu gur gyur pa ma yin pa/_tha dad pa ma yin pa/_ma 'dres pa/_rtsa ba brtan pa/_'phags pa dang mthun pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yang dag 
[\[334b.4\]]par 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su song ba/_nges par rtogs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs la mkhas par 
[\[334b.5\]]gyur pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dad pa'i gter te/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos par gyur na/_bden par 
[\[334b.6\]]khong du chud de sems can thams cad la rnam par dbye ba'i phyir nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang 
[\[334b.7\]]chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_lhag pa'i lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]ldan pa yin/_'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[335a.2\]]pa yin/_skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_kye rgyal 
[\[335a.3\]]ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar sems pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_
[\[335a.4\]]mu stegs can gyi gnas dang /_mi 'dra ba'i tshul khrims yin te/_de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du go cha bgos shing spyod pa'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe 
[\[335a.5\]]na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/_gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/_
[\[335a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor de dag la bdag gir bya ba med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang 
[\[335a.7\]]ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa med pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar mtshams med pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed de/_tshul khrims lhod pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/_/
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma bcas pa ni 'cha' bar mi byed/_bcas 
[\[335b.2\]]pa ni gcod par mi byed de/_de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug tu ji ltar mthun pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no/_/gang gis pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol 'khrul bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims de lta bu dam bca' ba la 
[\[335b.3\]]dam bcas shing mi gnas te/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol gyi sems dang bar bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub 
[\[335b.4\]]sems dpa' sems can thams cad brtse ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba de lta bu mi sgrub kyi/_de ni sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/_
[\[335b.5\]]gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_'dres pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi byed de/_de ni 
[\[335b.6\]]'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len to/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_yon tan med pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi sems la 
[\[335b.7\]]blta zhing /_rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de ni 'di ltar chos kyis ngoms pa dang ldan pa yin te/_'byung ba'i lam tshol zhing sbyor ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims des log pa'i tshul khrims nye bar bzung ste/_gang gis pha rol po dma' ba'i tshul khrims can du 'gyur bar bdag la mi bstod gzhan 
[\[336a.2\]]la mi smod do/_/de ni 'di ltar g.yeng ba med pa nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems 
[\[336a.3\]]dpa' srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa yin te/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_ngag brlang pa dang /_tshig 'khyal pa dang /_chags sems dang /_
[\[336a.4\]]gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa yin te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_de 'di 
[\[336a.5\]]snyam du sems bskyed de/_gang ji snyam du sems can rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba can la yid ma 'cha' zhing /_spyod pa thams cad ni phyin ci log gi rgyu las byung ba ste/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs su chud de/_phyin ci 
[\[336a.6\]]log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams ni tshul khrims log pa la spyod kyis/_bdag gis ni ci nas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[336a.7\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi gter te gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa nye bar bzung ste/_gang 'di tshe rabs kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rgyas par ma dang 'grogs pa dang /_pha dang 'grogs pa dang /_zhang po dang 'grogs pa dang /_sring mo dang 'grogs pa dang /_spun dang 
[\[336b.2\]]'grogs pa dang /_bu dang 'grogs pa dang /_bu mo dang 'grogs par gyur kyang /_gcig la gcig 'tshe ba dang /_gcig la gcig kyal ka byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'khrig pa dang /_gcig 
[\[336b.3\]]la gcig sdo ba dang /_gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'bod pa dang /_gcig la gcig za ba dang /_gcig la gcig dbang ba dang /_gcig la gcig 'khol bar gyur pa de yang 'dod chags kyi dbang dang /_zhe sdang gi 
[\[336b.4\]]dbang dang /_gti mug gi dbang dang /_rgyags pa'i dbang dang /_nga rgyal gyi dbang dang /_'chab pa'i dbang dang /_gnya' drag gi dbang dang /_phrag dog gi dbang dang /_'jungs pa'i dbang dang /_g.yo'i dbang dang /_sgyu'i dbang 
[\[336b.5\]]dang /_mi dag pa'i las 'di rnams shin tu blangs pa'i phyir/_sems can gcig la gcig 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ngan pa dag nyams su myong bar gyur te/_thams cad kyang mi shes pa'i dbang gis gyur pa nas/_g.yo dang sgyu'i bar gyi dbang 
[\[336b.6\]]gis gyur te/_gcig la gcig bag mi byed/_rim gro mi byed/_gcig la gcig bkur sti mi byed/_gcig la gcig phu dud mi byed/_gcig la gcig btsam pa med pa dang /_gcig la gcig mi mkhas pa dang /_gcig la gcig 
[\[336b.7\]]gnod pa dang /_gcig la gcig gsod pa dang /_gcig la gcig dgrar byed par gyur to zhes ngo tsha bskyed do/_/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na bdag dang sems can rnams kyi rnam pa ngan pa 'di lta bu'i tshul byung ba/_de bzhin da ltar byung 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]ba'i dus na yang bdag dang sems can thams cad la rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu dag yod do/_/ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag dang sems can rnams la rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu dag yod pa de bzhin ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 
[\[337a.2\]]bdag dang sems can thams cad la rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang thugs su chud do/_/de ltar bdag gi ngo tsha med cing mi 
[\[337a.3\]]bzod la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyis thugs su chud bzhin du/_rnam pa ngan pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa ni mi rigs mi chas/_da ni bdag cag gis ci nas kyang /_bla na med pa 
[\[337a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_de bzhin nyid kyi don du sems can rnams la chos bstan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i 
[\[337a.5\]]gter te gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' med par tshol bas khrel bar 'dzin 
[\[337a.6\]]pa yin te/_gzugs btsal ba dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg btsal ba dang /_bu dang bu mo'i don du btsal ba dang /_nor dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_g.yog yid du 'ong ba btsal pa'i phyir/_bdag gis kyang mi 
[\[337a.7\]]tshul mi cha ba'i gcam bu bya bar 'gyur ro/_zhes te de ni 'tshol ba'i dbang du chags pa nye bar mi len to/_/zhe sdang nye bar mi len to/_/gti mug nye bar mi len to/_/de bzhin du nga rgyal dang /_'chab pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]'jungs pa dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu dang /_gnod par bya ba nye bar mi len to/_/de 'di ltar dran pa skye ste/_gang ci yang rung ste/_sems can rnams rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu nye bar 'dzin pa thams cad ni ma rig pa'i dbang nas/_g.yo dang /_sgyu 
[\[337b.2\]]dang /_gnod par byed pa'i dbang gi bar gyis byung ba ste/_de dag gcig la gcig bag mi byed/_rim gro mi byed/_bsti stang du mi byed/_phu dud du mi byed cing /_btsam pa med de/_grogs por mi shes shing /_gcig la gcig nyam nga ba dang /_
[\[337b.3\]]gcig la gcig gsod pa dang /_gcig la gcig dgrar len pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ngan pa de dag nye bar len to/_/mngon par dga'o/_/mngon par zhen to/_/tshol lo/_/kun tu tshol lo/_/kun tu btsal nas mngon par smon to/_/'jal lo/_/
[\[337b.4\]]kun tu 'jal lo/_/de ltar yang mig nyams pa de dag lam gang dang gang nas mngal gyi dri mas gos te byung ba/_de nyid du 'khrig pa'i chos la sten te mi gtsang ba 'byung ba ni kun gyis kyang shes so/_/de bas na de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang 
[\[337b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon la khrel med pa'i dbang du gyur nas/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bslu ba byed pa 'di ni mi rigs kyis/_da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang bla na med 
[\[337b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter te bzhi 
[\[337b.7\]]pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang ldan pa yin te/_'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo /_/'di med na 'di mi 'byung ngo /_
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]'di byung bas 'di skye'o/_/'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag go_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas 
[\[338a.2\]]kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni lung bstan pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos so/_/de la ci yod pas gang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed rnams 'byung ngo /_/ci med pas gang med par 'gyur zhe na/_rnam par shes 
[\[338a.3\]]pa med pas ming dang gzugs med par 'gyur ro/_/ci skyes pas gang skyes par 'gyur zhe na/_sred pa skyes pas sdug bsngal skye'o/_/ci 'gags pas gang 'gags par 'gyur zhe na/_srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go_/de la 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[338a.4\]]chos rnams gang zhe na/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab 
[\[338a.5\]]kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ste/_'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_
[\[338a.6\]]gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_sems can gyi khams te/_'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_nam mkha' dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_so sor brtags te 'gog 
[\[338a.7\]]pa dang /_so sor ma brtags par 'gog pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid de/_'di dag ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos so/_/lung bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_dge sbyong 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /_tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[338b.2\]]lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de/_'di dag ni lung bstan pa'i chos so/_/lung ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang /_'jig rten mtha' med pa dang /_mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/_mtha' 
[\[338b.3\]]med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/'jig rten rtag pa dang /_'jig rten mi rtag pa dang /_rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod pa dang /_
[\[338b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod pa'ang ma yin/_med pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/bdag dang 
[\[338b.5\]]sems can rnams yod pa dang /_bdag dang sems can rnams med pa dang /_bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa yang yin la/_med pa yang yin pa dang /_bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa yang ma yin la med pa yang ma yin/_
[\[338b.6\]]zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_nyan thos ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_sangs rgyas ji snyed cig ma byon/_
[\[338b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig ma byon/_nyan thos ji snyed cig ma byon/_byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs/_rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs/_nyan thos ji snyed cig bzhugs/_byang chub 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs/_sangs rgyas dag pas su snga/_rang sangs rgyas dag pas su snga/_nyan thos dag pas su snga/_byang chub sems dpa' dag pas su snga/_sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phyi/_rang sangs rgyas dag 
[\[339a.2\]]pas su 'phyi/_nyan thos dag pas su 'phyi/_sems can dag pas su 'phyi/_chos dag pas su snga/_'jig rten gang nas 'ongs/_'jig rten gang du 'gro/_'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig chags par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig gnas pa 
[\[339a.3\]]yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gang nas 'ongs/_'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig yongs su zad par 'gyur/_'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ni gang /_'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha' ni gang zhes bya ba/_'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/de 'di ltar dran pa skye ste/_
[\[339a.4\]]sems can gang su yang rung ste/_kun tu rgyug pa dang /_kun tu 'khor ba thams cad ni chos 'di dag mi shes pa'i phyir te/_de ltar thos pa dang mi ldan pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams kun tu rgyug go_/kun tu 'khor ro/_/de bas na de ni bdag gis ci nas kyang bsam 
[\[339a.5\]]pa thams cad thos pa'i mdzod bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba 'di ni/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[339a.6\]]rnams kyi thos pa'i gter te lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa 
[\[339a.7\]]yin/_nang gi gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_phyi rol gyi gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_phyi nang gi gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_thams cad gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_'das pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_ma 'ongs pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_da ltar 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]byung ba gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_shin tu gtong ba dang ldan pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bgo bsha' byed 
[\[339b.2\]]pa'i ngang tshul can yin te/_de rtag tu bgo bsha' byas shing bdag kyang shas kyis spyod pa yin te/_bdag bde bar bya ba dang /_bdag yongs su sbyang ba dang /_bdag rim gror bya ba'i phyir/_yo byad ji snyed du bstsags pa de dag thams cad kyang bgo 
[\[339b.3\]]bsha' byas shing spyod kyi/_ma bgos par ni ma yin no/_/de dag spyod pa'i tshe yang sems 'di snyam du bskyed de/_lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad cu gnas te/_de dag kyang bdag gi lus 'di bde bas ni bde bar 'gyur/_
[\[339b.4\]]bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal bas ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes de gang ci la spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang myong ba med pa'i sems kyis de dag mi 'chi ba dang /_de dag bde bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_yun ring 
[\[339b.5\]]po nas zas dang lus bde ba la chags par gyur gyis/_da ni bdag gis lus la chags pa las rnam par 'da' bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba 'di ni gtong ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' la/_
[\[339b.6\]]zas sam/_skom mam/_bza' ba 'am/_bca' ba'am/_bldag pa 'am/_btung ba'am/_gzhib pa'am/_myang ba 'am/_gos sam/_phreng ba 'am/_byug pa 'am/_rgyan tam ci yang rung ste/_gang spyad na ni 'tsho'i/_ma spyad na ni 'chi 
[\[339b.7\]]bar 'gyur ba zhig nye bar gnas par gyur la/_de'i tshe slong ba zhig 'ongs te/_de la ci nas kyang zad par 'gyur ba dang /_lhag ma med par bslangs kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon gyi mtha' de dag du bdag bkres 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]pas shi bar gyur pa'ang /_dmigs pas mi slebs te/_su la yang phan par ma gyur to/_/de 'di ltar rim pas sngon chad myong ba'i chos can dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyis dus byas par gyur la/_sems can de dag kyang bde bar 'gyur na/_bdag 
[\[340a.2\]]gis 'thob par bya ba legs par thob po/_/bdag gis 'di dag kyang zad kyang rung /_'chi ba'i mthar yang thug kyang rung ste/_sems can rnams 'tsho bar bya'o/_/zhes gtong ba 'di ni yongs su gtong ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i nang gi gtong ba gang zhe 
[\[340a.3\]]na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' dar zhing bzang por gnas pa/_gzugs mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog rgyas pa/_gya nom pa dang ldan pa/_khrus dang byug pa legs par byas pa/_phreng ba dang rgyan legs par btags pa/_gos sar pa ma 
[\[340a.4\]]babs pa bgos pa/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa/_de lta bu'i drung du slong bdag cig 'ongs te/_'di skad du bdag cag ni nad kyis gzer to/_/rgas so 'khogs so/_/
[\[340a.5\]]sdug bsngal gyis mnar to/_/nad tshabs che'o/_/nad g.yog med do/_/'chi la thug go/_/gal te khyod kyi lus las lag pa 'am/_rkang pa 'am/_sha 'am/_khrag gam/_mgo 'am [{]glad pa[,]klad pa[}]'am/_rus pa 'am/_rkang ngam/_su la ci dgos 
[\[340a.6\]]pa de dag khyer cig_/ces rgyal po la thag thogs med par rang gi lus bdag cag byin na/_lus 'dis bdag cag nad 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[340a.7\]]lus 'di lta zhig chos kyis de 'dra bar 'gyur yang su la yang phan par ma gyur gyis/_da ni de lta bu'i chos can gyi lus 'dis sems can 'di dag bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/zhes nas/_de la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]med pa 'di ni nang gi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi rol gyi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhung de bzhin du rgya cher dbang bskur ba dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i srid la gnas pa/_gling bzhi la dbang ba/_rin po che 
[\[340b.2\]]bdun dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa/_thog mar mngon par dbang bskur ba/_de lta bu'i drung du slong bdag cig lhags te/_'di skad du bdag cag ni bkren no/_/dbul lo/_/shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/nor dang mi ldan no/_/khyod ni bde 
[\[340b.3\]]ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan na/_byam bu gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid bdag cag la byin te/_phyis 'di la dbang mi sgyur bar byas na/_des ni bdag cag bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[340b.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni zad pa'i mthar 'gyur te de'i tshe ni su'i bsam pa yang yongs su mgu bar byas par mi nus kyis/_bdag gis da ni 'phral du sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o/_/zhes nas de'i rgyus sems 
[\[340b.5\]]bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par gtong ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi nang gi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid la de ltar dbang bskur ba/_
[\[340b.6\]]bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa/_bstsags par bya ba rnam par bstsags pa/_de lta bu'i drung du slong bdag cig 'ongs nas/_'di skad du khyod kyis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sngon chad kyang myong /_bdag cag ni dge ba ma myong ba yin 
[\[340b.7\]]na/_byam bu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid bdag cag byin la khyod kyis bdag cag rim gror bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bar gyis shig ces zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi lus kyi chos nyid dang /_
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]srid kyi chos nyid de dag thams cad kyang /_tha mar med par 'gyur ba ste/_lus kyang rjes su 'brang bar gnas la srid kyang che zhing slong ba rnams kyang mngon du gyur pa 'di'i tshe/_snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya'o 
[\[341a.2\]]zhes nas/_de'i rgyus sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par rim gro byed cing gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyi nang gi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub 
[\[341a.3\]]sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la de ltar dbang bskur zhing /_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu'i drung du slong bdag cig lhags te/_'di skad du bdag cag ni khyod kyi legs pa dang yon tan snyan pa thos nas/_grong dang grong khyer dang /_
[\[341a.4\]]ljongs dang khams dang rgyal po'i gnas du ma nas/_khyod ni gdon mi za bar bdag cag gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par byed par 'gyur snyam ste/_'dir phyin na byam bu khyod kyis bdag cag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces nas/_la la ni 
[\[341a.5\]]bdag cag la rin po che bdun dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la gling bzhi dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i bu dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i mig gnyis dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag 
[\[341a.6\]]cag la rgyal po'i lag pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i sha dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i khrag dgos so zhes zer/_
[\[341a.7\]]la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i mgo dgos so zhes zer/_la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i snying dgos so zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang bral zhing bye bar yang 'gyur te/_
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]sems can gang gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par ma gyur gyis/_da ni bdag gi lus 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i chos can 'dis sems can de dag gi chags sems rtse zhil bar bya ba'i phyir/_bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o/_/bcos pa dang 
[\[341b.2\]]ldan pa'i chos kyi gnas su ni sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/zhes nas/_de dag thams cad btang yang de'i phyir de la sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med de/_sems can gang la yang /_rim gro med par mi byed pa 'di ni 
[\[341b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa gtong ba gang zhe na/_
[\[341b.4\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_'das pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang /_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyan cing thos nas/_de dag thams 
[\[341b.5\]]cad la chags par mi byed/_'bral bar mi byed/_dmigs su med pas rab tu 'jug ste/_rtog par mi byed de/_rnam par rtog par mi byed/_yongs su rtog par mi byed/_smon par mi byed/_chags par mi byed/_zhen par mi byed/_rten 
[\[341b.6\]]pa'i sems kyis gnas par mi byed/_rmi lam gyi chos de lta bu thob par byed kyang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la snying po med pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rten pa'i 'du shes su mi byed do/_/'on kyang rten pa'i sems can 
[\[341b.7\]]rnams gzud pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brjod do/_/'chad do/_/ston to/_/'das pa'i chos nyid la brtags na shar phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]su rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ste/_
[\[342a.2\]]de 'di snyam du gang ci yang rung ma btang ba de ni btang ba'o snyam du sems te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'ongs pa gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[342a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi spyod pa nyan na/_mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dngos por 'dzin pas mi 'dzin te/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan la brtson par mi byed pa yin/_tshol ba mi mnga' ba yin/_'dod chags pa'i sems kyis mi 
[\[342a.4\]]smon pa yin/_de la sems mi sdud pa yin te/_myong bar mi byed do/_/smon par mi byed do/_/de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi gtong ngo /_/de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jug par mi byed de/_spyod pa yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do/_/
[\[342a.5\]]'on kyang dmigs pa des sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_tshogs sdud pa byed cing chos nyid kyang rab tu sdud do/_/chos de ni yul na yang mi gnas/_phyogs na yang mi gnas/_nang na yang 
[\[342a.6\]]ma yin/_phyi rol na yang ma yin/_rgyang ring po na'ang ma yin no/_/drung na 'ang ma yin no zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang du yang nam yang spyad pa med par bya'o/_/snyam pa 'di ni ma 'ongs pa gtong ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la 
[\[342a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i da ltar byung ba'i gtong ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_shin tu snang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung 
[\[342b.2\]]dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams nas/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[342b.3\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan te/_des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur/_shin tu rmongs par mi 'gyur/_rab tu rmongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_zhum par mi 'gyur/_kun nas zhum par mi 'gyur/_
[\[342b.4\]]rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur/_shin tu zhum par mi 'gyur/_dma' bar mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar de ni shes pas 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur mngon du byed do/_/de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni su'i yang ma yin no snyam 
[\[342b.5\]]ste/_ngan song gi lam nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de la sems rgyu ba med de/_'di ni da ltar byung ba'i gtong ba zhes 
[\[342b.6\]]bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dang /_rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang /_sna dang mi ldan pa dang /_lce dang mi ldan pa dang /_lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig 
[\[342b.7\]]gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci med pa de khyod kyis byin la/_nged mi ldan pa med par gyis shig_/khyod ni bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan par 'dug cig ces zer na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]par bsgrub ste/_bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len to/_/de ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe ji lta bur spyod pa dang /_mer mer por 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang rdos par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa 
[\[343a.2\]]dang /_'khregs par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /_dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /_skyes pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /_rgas pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /_na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang /_shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang /_lus kyi rang bzhin thog ma dang /_
[\[343a.3\]]bar ma dang /_tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes so/_ngom du mi rung ba dang /_ngo tsha skye ba 'phags pa ma yin pa/_dri mi zhim pa/_rjen pa'i dri can ror 'gyur ba/_rus pa [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa/_rma dgu nas rtag 
[\[343a.4\]]tu zag pa'o/_/zhes de ni sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang /_de don du gnyer bar mi sems te/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa mi bskyed do/_/de shin tu gtong ba des 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te/_lus 'di ni de 
[\[343a.5\]]ltar snying po med pa yin na/_bdag gis lus 'di snying po med par mthong ba bzhin du lus la chags pa ji ltar bya/_sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa de bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya'o/_/lus snying po med pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam 
[\[343a.6\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o/_/ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med/_sems kyi 'du shes kyang med de/_
[\[343a.7\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i gter te drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi gter gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rab tu shes so/_/
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi 'gog pa rab tu shes so/_/gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[343b.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji 
[\[343b.3\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ma rig pa rab tu shes so/_/ma rig pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/ma rig pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji 
[\[343b.4\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa rab tu shes so/_/sred pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so/_/sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos rab tu shes so/_/
[\[343b.5\]]nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so/_/
[\[343b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i kun 
[\[343b.7\]]'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar shes she na las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]gso ba dang /_gsog dang /_snying po med pa dang /_bdag med par rab tu shes te/_chos gang yang snying po can du shes pa med do/_/chos gang la yang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa med de/_ngo bo nyid mthas gtugs 
[\[344a.2\]]pa thams cad rab tu shes so/_/sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te de ci ston ce na/_'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston te/_gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_tshor ba 'jig pa 
[\[344a.3\]]med pa'i phyir/_'du shes 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[344a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos ni ma skyes pa/_'du ma byas pa/_byed pa po med pa/_rtsod pa med pa/_gnas med pa/_ma skyes pa/_mi 'byung ba/_ma blangs pa 
[\[344a.5\]]nye bar ma blangs pa/_byed pa med pa ste/_de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan pas las gron chung ngus chos thams cad la mkhas pa/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad 
[\[344a.6\]]pa yin te/_de yang shin tu bstan pa bcus mi zad pa yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_thos pa la mkhas pas mi zad do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas mi zad do/_/tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad do/_/chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[344a.7\]]'jug pa mngon par bsgrubs pas mi zad do/_/rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do/_/bsod nams thams cad shin tu bstsags pas mi zad do/_/skyo ba med par mngon par bsgrubs pas mi zad do/_/gzungs thams cad kyi 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]sgor zhugs pas mi zad do/_/sems can thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang brjod pa sna tshogs kyi phyir mi zad do/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang /_nem nur dang the tsom yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir mi zad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[344b.2\]]pa thams cad yongs su bstan pas/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang /_yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir mi zad de/_mi zad pa shin tu bstan pa bcu po de dag gis shes rab kyi gter te 
[\[344b.3\]]mi zad pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yin te/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang ye shes bla na med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[344b.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de yang rgyud rmongs pa med pa'i dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/_'di ltar tshe gcig 
[\[344b.5\]]kyang rjes su dran no/_/tshe gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_tshe brgya dang stong dang /_che brgya phrag du ma dang /_tshe stong phrag du ma dang /_tshe brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa'am/_'du ba'i bskal pa'am/_
[\[344b.6\]]'jig pa dang 'du ba'i bskal pa'am/_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'du ba'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa brgya stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /_bskal pa 
[\[344b.7\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa/_mu med pa/_sa mtshams med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_brjod du med pa/_gnyis 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_gzhung de bzhin du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /_sangs rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod pa gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_
[\[345a.2\]]lnga nas/_sangs rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod du med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /_sangs rgyas skye ba gcig bstan te/_de dang mtshams sbyor ba'i lung bstan pa gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga nas/_
[\[345a.3\]]sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu bstan te/_de dang mtshams sbyor ba lung bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /_mdo sde gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga nas/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang 
[\[345a.4\]]dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_'di ltar 'das pa'i sde dang /_skyes ba rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_chos rmad 
[\[345a.5\]]du byung ba bstan pa'i sde dang /_man ngag bstan pa'i sde gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga nas/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_'khor 'dus pa gcig dang /_chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig 
[\[345a.6\]]nas/_chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig nas/_dbang po rnam pa 
[\[345a.7\]]tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig nas/_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang dran pa dag pa/_dang ba rnyog pa med pa dang /_rnam par gsal ba rdul med pa/_rdul dang bral ba/_dri ma med pa/_'od gsal ba/_sang sang po/_bsgribs pa med pas rjes su dran no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[345b.2\]]dpa'i dran pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'khrug pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs par mi nus pa yin/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu sbyangs pa yin/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/_bdud 
[\[345b.3\]]dang mu stegs can dmigs pa la gnas pa gzhan gyis mi chod pa yin/_tshe rabs kun tu 'pho ba'i lus shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus pa yin/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba'i mthas rnam 
[\[345b.4\]]par mi chod pa yin/_'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba dang /_gnas pa thams cad kyis skyon du ma gyur pa yin/_sangs rgyas skyes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[345b.5\]]kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter te brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter gang zhe na/_
[\[345b.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de yang yi ge de bzhin gzhan ma yin pas/_mdo'i tshul gyi chos ston to/_/de ni tshe'i rgyud gcig pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/tshe'i rgyud brjod du med 
[\[345b.7\]]pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/bskal pa grangs med 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]pa bstan pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/bskal pa grangs med pa bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod pa gcig kyang yongs 
[\[346a.2\]]su 'dzin no/_/de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan par brjod pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/mdo gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/mdo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 
[\[346a.3\]]'dzin to/_/'dus pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/'dus pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i 
[\[346a.4\]]yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/nyon 
[\[346a.5\]]mongs pa sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du 
[\[346a.6\]]med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter te mi zad pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa dgang dka' ba/_gting rnyed par dka' ba/_bsgrub 
[\[346a.7\]]par dka' ba/_mi 'phrog pa/_thub pa med pa/_bdag nyid che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba ste/_'di ni gter dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi gter gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan zhing blo gros dang ldan pa yin te/_mdo sde thams cad dang mi 'gal bas de chos ston pa'i tshe/_dngos po yongs su ldog pa gcig kyang brtsams te/_chos ston pa nas dngos 
[\[346b.2\]]po yongs su ldog pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas tshul de bzhin du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig dang /_sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa 
[\[346b.3\]]gcig dang /_mdo gcig dang /_'khor 'dus pa gcig dang /_chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig dang /_dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig dang /_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig dang /_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang brtsams te/_
[\[346b.4\]]chos ston pa nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du brtsams te chos ston to/_/nyi ma gcig kyang zad par byed cing chos ston pa nas/_zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba gcig dang /_lo gcig dang /_lo brgya dang /_lo stong 
[\[346b.5\]]dang /_lo brgya phrag stong dang /_bskal pa dang /_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang /_bskal pa tshad med pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bskal 
[\[346b.6\]]pa dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /_mu med pa dang /_sa mtshams med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_brjod du med pa dag kyang zad par byed cing chos ston na/_
[\[346b.7\]]tshig dang yi ge gcig brtsams kyang don dang tshig dang yi ge'i mthar thug pa med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcu rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/_gter de dag thob pas gzungs kyi snying po'i sgo chos 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba/_gzungs brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor can mngon du gyur te/_de gzungs kyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa ston par byed do/_/chos snang ba shin tu bstan pa thob 
[\[347a.2\]]pas sems can thams cad la chos ston to/_/chos kyi sgo snang ba'i chos can lce yangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par go bar byed pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_dbang 
[\[347a.3\]]po ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang kun nas 'khor ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sgra dang tshig rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang /_yi ge thams cad kyi spobs pas ston pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_
[\[347a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi sa bon gang po yongs su shes pa'i bsam pa can du byed pas chos ston te thogs par mi byed do/_/skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i khams dang /_chos kyi 
[\[347a.5\]]dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rgyas par byed pa'i lus rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcus blo gros mi zad pa/_thub pa med pa 'dres pa med pa rnam par mi chod pa/_rgyun gcad par mi nus pa phyir mi 
[\[347a.6\]]ldog pa/_gting rnyed par dka' ba/_ring du gyur pa/_sgo kun dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la zhugs pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/_mi zad pa'i rnam 
[\[347a.7\]]pa bcus mi zad pa yin no/_/bla na med pa yin no/_/mthar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang /_bskal pa 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]thams cad kyi grangs gcad du med pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir/_sems tshad med pa dang /_'dus byas kyis ma gos pa'i phyir/_'dus ma byas la yongs su bsngos pa dang /_de ma thag pa'i yul du gyur 
[\[347b.2\]]pas chos thams cad zad mi shes pa dang /_smon lam chen po tha dad pa med pa dang /_spyod pa la gnas pa'i stobs shin tu 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa mtha' dang 
[\[347b.3\]]dbus med pa la zhugs pa ste/_mi zad pa'i rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis/_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa zad mi shes pa'i gter chen por 'gyur ro/_/gter mi zad pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste/_
[\[347b.4\]]nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//[{D44-28}]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[347b.5\]]mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gling bzhi pa 'di la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gling re re na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs 
[\[347b.6\]]par snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na'ang 'khod par shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 
[\[347b.7\]]de'i phyir ma brtul/_byang chub kyi shing drung yang phyir ma brtul/_ri rab kyi rtse mo yang phyir ma brtul bar rab mtshe ma'i gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]ngo /_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ba/_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ste 
[\[348a.2\]]byin gyi rlabs snga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis/_rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan par gshegs pa mthong nas/_rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis 
[\[348a.3\]]brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gdan nor bu rin po che las byas pa/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyu las grub pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu las yongs su grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba/_dge 
[\[348a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang pos byung ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/_bsod nams kyi stobs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smyin 
[\[348a.5\]]pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa/_mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis byung ba/_/gos pa med pa/_'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/_thub pa med pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa/_pog re bye ba brgya stong 
[\[348a.6\]]phrag bcus brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/_me tog gi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bres pa/_phreng ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas lding ba/_spos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos 
[\[348a.7\]]kun tu 'thul bar sbyar ba/_rin po che'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus steng nas bkab pa/_me tog gi gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bsgreng ba/_rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/_gdan bye ba 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bting ba/_rin po che'i pu shu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyan du bsgrubs pa/_nor bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye bas yog par byas pa/_rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 
[\[348b.2\]]'khor kun tu yog pa/_rin po che'i phreng ba 'phyang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu spyangs pas bkab pa/_lhab lhub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu klubs shing brgyan pa/_gdugs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs 
[\[348b.3\]]par bkab pa/_gos sna tshogs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su yog pa/_rin po che'i pad mo'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rgyas par bkram pa/_spos rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'thul zhing yid du 'ong bar dri zhim pa/_
[\[348b.4\]]rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyan chen po brgyan par bres pa/_rin po che'i dril bu'i rgyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/_tsan dan rin po che'i mdog lta bu'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar 
[\[348b.5\]]bkab pa/_rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog shin tu rgyas pa/_gos kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su snang bar bkab pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs 
[\[348b.6\]]su kun nas bkab pa/_gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu g.yogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba/_gser gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab cing rnam par dag par byas pa/_bai DUr+ya'i 
[\[348b.7\]]bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas dri ma med cing shin tu dag par byas pa/_snying po sna tshogs can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bla re bkab pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i nor bu rin po che bzang pos shin tu 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]mdzes shing khebs par bkab pa/_rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs thams cad bkang ba/_rin po che'i gzugs brnyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye zhing mdzes par brgyan pa/_rin 
[\[349a.2\]]po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phreng ba kun tu 'brel par brgyan pa/_spos kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par byas pa/_lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang /_bdug spos bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[349a.3\]]brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /_dri zhim por gtul ba'i mchod pa can/_lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par klubs shing dag par byas pa/_rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong 
[\[349a.4\]]phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/_dpal gyi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che sna tshogs su brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan du rnam par 
[\[349a.5\]]dag pa/_nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gdan gyi snying po shin tu brgyan pa/_dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu spras pa/_rin po che'i snam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spyangs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[349a.6\]]mtha' yas pa'i dbang po'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bzang bar brgyan pa/_gser gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgrubs shing dag par byas pa/_nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 
[\[349a.7\]]rdul med par snang bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po mtha' yas pa snang bar brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'bar bar bsgrubs pa/_
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]nor bu rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer snang bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che lha la mchog tu bya ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus skar khung gi shar bu mdzes par bres pa/_nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[349b.2\]]bcus kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/_dngul gyi rta babs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bres pas snying po dkar po rab tu rnam par phye ba/_'gro ba rgya mtsho'i zla gam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sbubs shin tu bsgrubs pa/_nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye ba 
[\[349b.3\]]brgya stong phrag bcus blta na mdzes par shin tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sems kyi rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'dab chags yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar kun tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong bye ba brgya stong 
[\[349b.4\]]phrag bcus shin tu spras pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa/_nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mthu brtan par shin tu brtan pa/_nor bu rin po che snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par 
[\[349b.5\]]byas pa/_nor bu rin po che dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang ba'i gdugs su bris pa/_nor bu rin po che dngul gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam pa sna tshogs su bkram pa/_nor bu rin po che ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba 
[\[349b.6\]]brgya stong phrag bcus snying po shin tu brgyan pa/_mu tig gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes par bres pa/_bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dra bar bres pa/_mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna 
[\[349b.7\]]tshogs su rnam par phye ba/_nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa/_rin po che shin tu snang ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye zhing rab tu bzung ba/_rin po che'i 'bru 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu brgyan pa/_mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar snang ba/_nor bu rin po che'i kha dog du ma'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying 
[\[350a.2\]]po kha dog sna tshogs shing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa/_dga' bar byed pa'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dag par sbyangs pa/_nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po rab tu 'thob 
[\[350a.3\]]pa thob par gyur pa/_nor bu'i gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs shin tu spa bar brgyan pa/_rin po che dbang po'i kha dog bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la gnas yongs su 'dzin pa/_dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 
[\[350a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par byas pa/_rim gro byed pa'i mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su song ba/_spos kyi thum po shin tu che ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu rgyas pa/_gzhan gyis pham pa med 
[\[350a.5\]]pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu rgyas pa/_spos kyi gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu 'byung ba/_yid du 'ong ba'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri rab tu 'byung ba/_snang ba ston pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dris 'gro ba 
[\[350a.6\]]kun tu gang ba/_dri sna tshogs kha dog mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog par zhim pa byug pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu byugs pa/_tsan dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[350a.7\]]bcus tshon du bskus shing mdzes pa/_spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri zhim por shin tu bsgos pa/_a ga ru nag po pad mo'i snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin gyi snying por byas pa/_bdug spos bye ba brgya stong 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]phrag bcus shin tu bdugs shing yog pa/_bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar zhim pa/_spos kun tu rgyu ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yid du 'ong bar zhim pa/_spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ro thams cad du bdugs/_
[\[350b.2\]]shing dri zhim pa/_spos rnam par tshor bar byed pa'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po mi 'khrugs par spos thams cad kyis mchod par byas pa/_spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shin tu brgyan 
[\[350b.3\]]pa/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi pad 
[\[350b.4\]]mo'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi uta pa la'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu yog par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas 
[\[350b.5\]]kyi rin po che'i me tog gi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi me tog pun da ri ka'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po rab tu 'bab pa/_
[\[350b.6\]]lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyun tu 'bab pa/_na bza'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bar snang kha dog sna tshogs su gyur pa/_nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu snang bar 'bab pa/_
[\[350b.7\]]gdugs kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog par 'bab pa/_ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs du mar 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi cod pan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/_lhab lhub 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu klub par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i se mo do'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por 'bab 
[\[351a.2\]]pa/_lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tsan dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog du mar 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi a ka ru dang /_tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu yog par 'thul zhing 'bab pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[351a.3\]]rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgreng ba/_rin po che'i ba dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu spyangs pa/_snam bu rin po che'i lda ldi bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bres pa/_spos kyi snod bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas shin tu 'thul ba/_
[\[351a.4\]]rin po che'i phreng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spyangs pa/_rin po che'i sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol zhing 'dzin pa/_lha rdzas kyi rdul yab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par rlob cing 'dzin pa/_rin po che'i dril 
[\[351a.5\]]bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol ba/_/rin po che'i stegs bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 'greng ba/_rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong 
[\[351a.6\]]phrag bcus lda ldir brgyan pa/_rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog cing 'khor ba/_khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gi rgyan du dkrigs pa/_rin po che'i khang bu bye ba brgya stong gi sgo la 
[\[351a.7\]]rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba bkye ba/_gser gyi dril bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba/_dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i phreng ba rab tu spyangs pas yongs su dag pa/_rin po che'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]bcu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba/_gser gyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag phod kyis kun tu bltas pa/_rin po che'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba/_rin po che'i rgyan bye ba 
[\[351b.2\]]brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba thams cad du rnam par bres pa/_rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa/_'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab 
[\[351b.3\]]tu 'tsher ba/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa/_spos kyi 'od gzer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib 
[\[351b.4\]]med par snang ba/_lha rdzas kyi pad mo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa/_rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa/_me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 
[\[351b.5\]]rgyas par bkram pa/_spos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa/_lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par 
[\[351b.6\]]bkram pa/_lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' bar 
[\[351b.7\]]bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog legs par bting ba/_spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]bsgos pa'i gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba/_rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba/_gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[352a.2\]]bcus bla gab tu bkab pa/_lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/_gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgra shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/_lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i 
[\[352a.3\]]rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa/_spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams 
[\[352a.4\]]cad kyi char du 'bab pa/_lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyod pa/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan par byas pa/_lha 
[\[352a.5\]]rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhub thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[352a.6\]]gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/_lha rdzas kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra snyan pa phyung ba/_lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnga chen po'i sgra shin 
[\[352a.7\]]tu phyung ba/_lha rdzas kyi pi wang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel pa'i sgra phyung ba/_lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra bsgrags pa/_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu dang rol 
[\[352b\]]
