[\[352b.1\]]mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa/_sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[352b.2\]]thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/_lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/_yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_glu'i 
[\[352b.3\]]dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/_lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba/_tshig gi rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchod pa/_bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya 
[\[352b.4\]]stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa/_zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa/_bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa/_
[\[352b.5\]]phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/_sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa/_dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstan cing bstod pa/_sngon 
[\[352b.6\]]gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par bstod pa/_chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa/_bstod pa rnam pa tha dad 
[\[352b.7\]]pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur brjod cing sbyar ba 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/_chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med 
[\[353a.2\]]par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glur blangs te sbyar ba/_dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/_sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing 
[\[353a.3\]]rna ba dang bar byas pa/_khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa/_dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang /_rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/_
[\[353a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/_gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 
[\[353a.5\]]ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par bstod pa/_chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang /_rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la 
[\[353a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya 
[\[353a.7\]]stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa'i bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa' phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub 
[\[353b.2\]]sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[353b.3\]]bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[353b.4\]]brgya stong phrag bcu 'thob par rnam par 'phrul pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgrub cing sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bskyed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong 
[\[353b.5\]]phrag bcu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel bar 
[\[353b.6\]]byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za bar nges par ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong 
[\[353b.7\]]phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba bskyed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byin gyis rlobs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i blo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yangs pa'i blo tshad 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gtong ba thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/_byang 
[\[354a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/_
[\[354a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa/_byang chub 
[\[354a.4\]]sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu snang zhing shes par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[354a.5\]]chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba gsal bar byed pa/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang bar byin gyis rlob pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos 
[\[354a.6\]]kyi tshul rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gti mug [{]myed [,]med [}]par ston pa/_chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'thob par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byam klas pa la 'jug par byed pa/_chos kyi lus bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[354a.7\]]bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrubs pa rab tu shes par byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrub pa'i 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]'byung gnas su gyur pa/_chos 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs rab tu bsgrub pa/_chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal tshab du gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye 
[\[354b.2\]]ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yang dag par ston pa'i spyod yul can/_lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba'i lus can/_klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[354b.3\]]bcu thal mo sbyar zhing spyi bo la gzhog pa/_dri za'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms par mos pas ldang ba/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nga rgyal gyi yid yongs su chad pa/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba 
[\[354b.4\]]brgya stong phrag bcu'i kha nas dar shin tu spyangs pa/_mi 'am ci'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dga' ba'i yid du blta ba/_tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[354b.5\]]bcu zhe sas phu dud du gnas pa/_'jig rten gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i spyi bo dang /_lus kyis btud pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu blta ba/_rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal 
[\[354b.6\]]po las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen po'i sgra phyung ba/_rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa/_rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bye ba brgya stong 
[\[354b.7\]]phrag bcus phyag bya ba/_dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba/_tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba/_dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod pa/_/
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/_lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa/_smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba/_sngon 
[\[355a.2\]]'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba/_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus thams cad kyis phyag bya ba/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btud pa/_tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha 
[\[355a.3\]]bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa/_tshangs pa chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sgra phyung ba/_kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[355a.4\]]bcus 'khor lngas phyag bya ba/_'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/_tshad med 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so zhes phyag bya ba/_
[\[355a.5\]]kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mthong bar dka' ba'i sgra phyung ba/_dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dang ba can du 'phags pa/_'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dang ba'i lus 
[\[355a.6\]]kyis mngon par btud pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas mthong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis btud pa/_dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rim gror bya ba/_che ba'i lha bye ba brgya 
[\[355a.7\]]stong phrag bcus dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par bya ba/_chung che'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes rab tu skyes shing lta ba/_tshad med che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i chos rtogs shing 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]rim gro cher bya ba/_'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu btud pa/_mi che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas te/_mngon par brjod cing lus btud pa/_mi gdung ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong 
[\[355b.2\]]phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga nas thal mo sbyar zhing ngoms mi shes par blta ba/_gya nom snang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bltas te lus btud pa/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas 
[\[355b.3\]]kyis bstan pa ngoms mi shes par lus dbul ba/_'og min gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btud cing mchod pa/_lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra phyung ba/_lha bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[355b.4\]]bcus shin tu bsams shing bsgrubs te brgyan pa/_lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi gdan bsgrub pa la byin gyis brlab rgyun mi gcad pa/_lha'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong 
[\[355b.5\]]phrag bcu me tog thogs pa dang /_spos thogs pa dang /_phreng ba thogs pa dang /_phye ma thogs pa dang /_byug pa thogs pa dang /_na bza' thogs pa dang /_gdugs thogs pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /_ba dan 
[\[355b.6\]]thogs pa dang /_rin po che thogs pa dang /_phyang 'phrul thogs pa dang /_lhab lhub thogs pas mngon par gtor zhing char du phab ste rab tu dgye ba/_lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas 
[\[355b.7\]]gcig tu brgyud pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba/_lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dad par bsu ba/_lha'i bu btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun shin tu bzung ba/_dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]phrag bcus lhun kun nas bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu legs par sems shing spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yid 
[\[356a.2\]]dga' bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye 
[\[356a.3\]]ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[356a.4\]]dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sgrub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ris bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su smin par 'dul ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bye 
[\[356a.5\]]ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byung ba/_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/_bsod nams bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su grub pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyangs 
[\[356a.6\]]pa/_smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu dag par byas pa/_spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par skyes pa/_chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar bstan pa/_rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rjes su 
[\[356a.7\]]song ba/_yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa bshams so//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_ji ltar gling bzhi pa chen po 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa chen po dag na yang dga' 
[\[356b.2\]]ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can dag tu rgyan 'di lta bu dang /_tshul 'di lta bu dang /_dad pa 'di lta bu dang /_mos pa 'di lta bu dang /_dga' ba 'di lta bu dang /_rab tu dga' ba 'di lta 
[\[356b.3\]]bu dang /_zhe sa 'di lta bu dang /_rim gro 'di lta bu dang /_spro ba 'di lta bu dang /_nye bar sems pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis stan bting nas/_zhe sa 
[\[356b.4\]]can gyi rim gro dang bcas par dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig du dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das bsu nas me tog yon tan grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/_spos yon tan bsam gyis 
[\[356b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i char ni rab tu phab/_phreng ba yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin ni rab tu bkye/_gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/_lha rdzas kyi gos rab tu phra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye/_rin po che yid du 'ong 
[\[356b.6\]]ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/_sems shin tu dang bas lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang /_phyang 'phrul gyi sprin gyi char ni kun tu phab/_bdug spos rnam pa du ma'i sprin gyis ni kun tu bdug_/lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi 
[\[356b.7\]]phye ma dang /_a ka ru'i phye ma dang /_spos dam pa thams cad kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/_lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi lus kyi sprin ni shin tu bkye/_dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]phrag bcu dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha'i ris nas 'dus pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas zhe sa rab tu bskyed nas/_shin tu btud de phyag 'tshal to/_/lha'i bu mo grangs med pa dag 
[\[357a.2\]]kyang dga' zhing mos pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na spyod pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas te/_sangs rgyas la mchod par brtson pa'i sems 
[\[357a.3\]]kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/rim gro byed do phyag 'tshal lo/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu mthun pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[357a.4\]]pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rol mo bkrol ba dang /_brdung ba'i tshogs grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa rnams dang /_lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni lta/_
[\[357a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba/_shin tu dkon par ni rjes su sems shing /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i chos can no/_/zhes yang dag par lta zhing de logs su 
[\[357a.6\]]mngon par lta bar gyur to/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang /_lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog gi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_spos thams cad kyi 
[\[357a.7\]]phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_rgyan thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi a ka ru 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi me tog thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog man dA 
[\[357b.2\]]ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams kyang dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas su gtogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang 
[\[357b.3\]]la 'khod de/_ye shes kyi spyod yul la gzhol ba'i sems kyis spos dang bdug pa'i sprin gyis bdug pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/sangs rgyas la dga' zhing gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 
[\[357b.4\]]gyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la zhe sa cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis bar snang yog par byas te brgyan par byas so/_/sangs rgyas la mchod par gzhol ba'i sems 
[\[357b.5\]]kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgye bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/sangs rgyas las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gyi dra ba grangs med pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas g.yog par byas te 
[\[357b.6\]]bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yon gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bla re grangs med pa las rin po che thams cad kyi se mo do'i sprin lding zhing /_'brul ba'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/
[\[357b.7\]]sangs rgyas la dge bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang grangs med par lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba phyung bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu 
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]dkon par dogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi na bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang /_na bza' mtshungs pa med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha' 
[\[358a.2\]]yas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi cod pan grangs med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi char chen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/_sangs rgyas yid la bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[358a.3\]]grangs med pa'i sprin las phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/_/lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_me tog zad mi shes pa'i 
[\[358a.4\]]mdzod rab tu bkye nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/mos pa'i spos zhim po rnyed cing sangs rgyas la dad par gnas pas lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[358a.5\]]phul lo/_/rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang 
[\[358a.6\]]zhing rin po che'i gdugs kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gebs so/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bas/_gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs 
[\[358a.7\]]med pa lag na thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na thogs shing /_bcom 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong ngo /_/sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang /_phyang 'phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_de bzhin 
[\[358b.2\]]gshegs pa la phul lo/_/dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel bas/_lha rdzas 
[\[358b.3\]]gyi ba dan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na 'dzin to/_/lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhi ba la_rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshad med 
[\[358b.4\]]pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs phyung nas/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med 
[\[358b.5\]]pa/_dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa'i rnams kyang lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa khams gsum las rnam par 'das pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i chos las byung ba/_rjen pa'i dri med pa/_chags pa med pa'i 
[\[358b.6\]]sems tshim par byed pa/_chos kyi tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa/_blo tshad med pa'i yangs pa las byung ba/_dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spel ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 
[\[358b.7\]]'phrul ba grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas yog par byas so/_/
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]lha rdzas las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas khebs par byas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pa rnam par dag pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[359a.2\]]yul rgyas par 'gengs pa'i na bza' sna tshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[359a.3\]]las byung ba'i dril bu tshom bur bcad pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gis bdug pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings 
[\[359a.4\]]brgyan par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du bting ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/
[\[359a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid 
[\[359a.6\]]kyis bsam pa tshim pas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho brang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas/_lha rdzas las 
[\[359a.7\]]'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]dang /_me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_na bza' kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang /_tsan dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 
[\[359b.2\]]rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang /_phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad 
[\[359b.3\]]kyi sprin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang /_
[\[359b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa las byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang /_tshig rnam 
[\[359b.5\]]par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngoms mi shes pas/_
[\[359b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/_tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /_
[\[359b.7\]]ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do/_/lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing /_
[\[360a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang /_sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i 
[\[360a.3\]]khams thams cad dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/_tshig gi lam thams cad las 
[\[360a.4\]]yang dag par 'das pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba/_sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa/_
[\[360a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba/_'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i 
[\[360a.6\]]lus kyi rjes su 'dal ba/_sku'i byin gyis rlabs las mtshams med pa/_yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 
[\[360a.7\]]'byung ba brnyes pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba/_khams dang mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]bsgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa/_chos kyi sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin 
[\[360b.2\]]gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa/_sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/_mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/_ye shes kyi rnam pa 
[\[360b.3\]]thams cad brnyes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa/_sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad pa/_'gro ba thams cad du kun tu bzang 
[\[360b.4\]]po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba 'gro ba dang zhing thams cad du khyab pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/_bsam 
[\[360b.5\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[360b.6\]]mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa khyab par mdzad pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can la rim gror mdzad pa/_ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/_sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul ba mdzad pa/_
[\[360b.7\]]mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/_gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa/_'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa/_spyod pa tha dad pa las 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing ma 'dres pa/_ye shes thams cad la rnam par spyod pa/_don 
[\[361a.2\]]dang tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa yang dag par ston pa/_ye shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/_yon tan gyi mchog ye shes snying pos byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba/_'gro ba thams cad du sngon 
[\[361a.3\]]gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyams pa brnyes pa/_bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas par mi mnga' ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[361a.4\]]thams cad 'byung zhing 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyis mi shes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mi shes pa chen po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa 'gro ba thams 
[\[361a.5\]]cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa/_'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa la rab tu gzhog pa/_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa 
[\[361a.6\]]thugs su chud pa/_dad par bya bar 'os pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang /_
[\[361a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]mtha'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas sems can dag par mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs su dbang bskur bas/_de 
[\[361b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du byung ba/_'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo mi ldog par 'khor ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad las 'phags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi mthas 
[\[361b.3\]]klas pa la mi gnas pa/_'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par dag pa/_'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa/_btsal 
[\[361b.4\]]ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi zla ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyis rlob pa/_mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam 
[\[361b.5\]]par ston pa/_rmi lam lta bur rjes su dran pa/_sprul pa dang mnyam par byung ba/_sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten sna tshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[361b.6\]]sems can gyi skye mched rnam par phye ba yang dag par ston pa/_sems can gyi dbang po dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas 
[\[361b.7\]]pa/_'jig rten thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_rnam par bstan pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par spyod pa/_ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa/_
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba/_mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing 'gro ba thams cad gdon par brtson pa/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa/_'jig 
[\[362a.2\]]rten dang zhing thams cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma bzung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba/_'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bstsal ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[362a.3\]]dmigs par 'byor par gyur pa/_'khrug pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pas/_chos thams cad kyi don grub pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba nyams pa med pa'i 
[\[362a.4\]]phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa/_ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[362a.5\]]cad du 'od gzer gyi dra bas gsal bar gyur pa/_phyogs bcu 'byam klas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas mi ngoms shing btang mi bra ba/_
[\[362a.6\]]yon tan chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba dang /_dbang po mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 
[\[362a.7\]]rgyas par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las shin tu sgrub pa/_nub cing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]'bebs pa/_bsam pa yangs pa'i bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig rten thams cad la mngon 
[\[362b.2\]]par ston pa/_sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi don gyis dag pa yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can yon tan gyi 'od gzer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa/_bsod 
[\[362b.3\]]nams kyi zhing du shar ba/_gzi brjid thams cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa/_'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/_'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/_
[\[362b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mnga' ba/_phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa/_'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa 
[\[362b.5\]]sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa/_'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba/_'gro ba dang zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa ye shes kyi spyan phugs rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par 
[\[362b.6\]]dag pa/_sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa yang dag par ston pa/_'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa/_'dul ba sna tshogs du ma la 'jug pa/_dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/_'gro ba thams cad la 
[\[362b.7\]]mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par spyod pa/_las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa/_bsam pa dang las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa/_
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/_
[\[363a.2\]]dga' ba chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' bar mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba/_sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa/_sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 
[\[363a.3\]]'brang bar mdzad pa/_'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas skye bas dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa/_sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa chen po stob pa mdzad pa/_'jig rten gyi lta ba 
[\[363a.4\]]thams cad la mi gnas pa/_ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa/_rab tu gzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa/_sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud 
[\[363a.5\]]pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa/_sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/_las 
[\[363a.6\]]kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba/_ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi smon lam rjes su 
[\[363a.7\]]srung ba mi shigs pa/_'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa/_snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa/_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sems can thams 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba/_grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par dag par mdzad pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba nyams pa med pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i 
[\[363b.2\]]rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba/_bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'joms par byung ba/_chags pa med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu 
[\[363b.3\]]dad par snang ba/_ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/_'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[363b.4\]]mnga' ba/_'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa/_bsam pa dang yang dag par rtog pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa/_yon gyi gnas dam pa mchog du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/_yon 
[\[363b.5\]]tan tshad med par 'gyur ba/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa/_zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i 
[\[363b.6\]]rtsa ba sems la rag las par yid ches pas tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang /_yon tan dag par mdzad pa/_ye shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o/_/zhes rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa rnam pa de lta 
[\[363b.7\]]bur/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba/_rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs las 'bab pa/_rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa/_rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]mkha'i rjes su 'gro ba rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bur shes pa/_rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i sgos lta ba/_rnam pa de lta bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam 
[\[364a.2\]]par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa/_rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa/_rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[364a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan par rjes su sems pa de dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[364a.4\]]rnam par dag pa/_grangs med par shin tu snang ba/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par bltar yod pa/_grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' bskyed pa/_grangs med pa'i spro ba skyed pa/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_grangs med pa'i lhag pa'i 
[\[364a.5\]]bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba/_grangs med pa'i dbang po sim par byed pa/_grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/'od kyi 'khor lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang de 
[\[364a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung ba/_kha dog bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_mdog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad 
[\[364a.7\]]rgyas par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_sems can rnam par dag pas/_dri zhim por rab tu byung ba/_tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa/_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]las rnam par 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba/_rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par ston pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab par yon tan mi zad pa/_
[\[364b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad mi shes pa las byung ba/_sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/_ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu yog pa/_don yangs pa shin tu ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/_brjod du med pa'i tshul yang 
[\[364b.3\]]dag par ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa/_
[\[364b.4\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i dpal yod pa/_rin po che'i 'od 'phro 
[\[364b.5\]]ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ltar byung ba mthong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan smon lam chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i spyod 
[\[364b.6\]]pas rnam par dag pa dang /_sngon gyi bag yod pa las yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems chags pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa dang /_
[\[364b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la sems can tshad med pa rab tu dgod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul zil gyis non pa med pa la rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gzud par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]bka' bzhin byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin 
[\[365a.2\]]gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang /_sems dad pa rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_sems rnam par 'phel ba 
[\[365a.3\]]rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_sems rnam par dag pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems yongs su smin pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang /_chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang /_ye shes snang ba mtha' dang 
[\[365a.4\]]dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_sems tshad med pa'i rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mthas mi skrag 
[\[365a.5\]]par bya ba dang /_de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs 
[\[365a.6\]]rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu bzang po'i tshul du mos par bya ba dang /_bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba dang /_ye shes bsam 
[\[365a.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang /_ye shes khong du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_sa mtshams med pa'i 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang /_shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang /_the tsom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[365b.2\]]brten pa so sor 'thob par bya ba dang /_chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 
[\[365b.3\]]'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[365b.4\]]bdag nyid che ba brjod pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po rab tu snang bas/_sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba/_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[365b.5\]]gshegs pa'i skus rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pa/_dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshegs stabs phun sum 
[\[365b.6\]]tshogs pa/_chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pas chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas shin tu skyangs pa mnga' ba/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[365b.7\]]ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po shin tu sbyangs pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dpes dper [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba/_mtshan thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'phags pa'i sku 
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]can/_stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gyi stobs chen po dang ldan pa/_bskal pa mi zad pa thams cad du blta bas mi ngoms pa/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa'i dbyangs kyi ye shes kyi nga ror gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[366a.2\]]thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa/_yon tan thams cad kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi srid la mnga' ba'i phyir dus gsum du snang bar byed pa'i gsung mnga' bas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan sngon gyi dge ba'i 
[\[366a.3\]]rtsa ba'i tshogs las yang dag par byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis tshul 'di lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro dang /_rgyan kun tu bshams pa byas te/_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha bye ba 
[\[366a.4\]]brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang lhan cig du/_zhe sa can rim gro dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/_bde 
[\[366a.5\]]bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis spyan drangs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam pa 
[\[366a.6\]]'di lta bu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba 'gro ba thams cad la mdzes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mos pa/_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad mngon par dga' ba/_lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis mi ngoms par 
[\[366a.7\]]rim gror bya zhing /_tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par brtson pa bskyed pa/_tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa/_dad pa dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis 
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]bstsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta ba dang /_mchod pas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_smon lam dang sems bskyed pa las byung 
[\[366b.2\]]bas khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs so/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi dang /_/dga' ldan gyi gnas dag du'ang gshegs par snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[366b.3\]]'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs ma thag tu de'i tshe/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang pa rin po che'i rgyan las shin tu 'das par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun 
[\[366b.4\]]nas yog par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis brgyan par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das 
[\[366b.5\]]pa'i gos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu gtong bar gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i tsan dan thams cad kyi sprin chen po rab tu gtong bar gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog dang /_bdug pa 'thul 
[\[366b.6\]]ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rnam pa tha dad pa'i char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog mang po'i sprin gyi tshogs kyi char rab tu 
[\[366b.7\]]'bab par gnas so/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sil snyan dang /_brdung ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyings su grag pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]par gnas par gyur te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs par 
[\[367a.2\]]snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab po zhes sgra brjod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la bar chad du mi 'gyur 
[\[367a.3\]]ba dang /_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /_tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa dang /_mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel ba dang /_shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_dga' ba chen po shin tu bskyed pa dang /_
[\[367a.4\]]dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas dga' bar bya ba dang /_chos la bar chad med pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang /_chos rnams mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gnas kyi glu dang /_rol mo 
[\[367a.5\]]brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba'i sgra rgyun mi chad par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[367a.6\]]bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa/_/pho brang mchog du rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang 
[\[367a.7\]]zhig gis/_/ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/_/kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/kun tu mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]btags pa/_/pad mo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/_/rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 
[\[367b.2\]]'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa/_/dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra 
[\[367b.3\]]shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa/_/me tog snying por rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/yan lag 'od 
[\[367b.4\]]gzer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/_/shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/mgon po the tsom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/_/
[\[367b.5\]]rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa/_/spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra 
[\[367b.6\]]shis legs gyur cig_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba/_/nor bus brgyan par rab gshegs pa/_/des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig_/ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' 
[\[367b.7\]]ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod de/_glu'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pas/_rgyal ba gshegs pa mngon par bstod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang lha'i 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]rgyal po rab dga' ldan rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis glu dbyangs su tshigs su bcad cing /_sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing rgyal ba gshegs pa'ang mngon par bstod 
[\[368a.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_rigs gcig tu gyur pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rgyud 
[\[368a.3\]]kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad la bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[368a.4\]]gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang /_dus bzhin du byung ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_
[\[368a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yang dag par spyod pa/_gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi 
[\[368a.6\]]mthu phyung bas/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs nas gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang bzhugs par gyur te/_
[\[368a.7\]]ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs pa dang byon pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang mchod pa byas shing /_rgyan gyis brgyan pa de dag thams cad pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs pa'i 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]tshe/_grangs med par gyur pa dang /_grangs med pa'i rnam par lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che dang /_rol mo 
[\[368b.2\]]brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba dang /_glu dang /_bstod pa dang /_zhe sa dang /_rim gro dang /_dad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyan dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i 
[\[368b.3\]]bstod pa dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i gdugs gcig nas gcig du brgyud de bsgreng ba dang /_lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyal mtshan la ba dan 
[\[368b.4\]]spyangs pa dang /_shin tu spyangs pa grangs med pas sbyar ba/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i yo byad kyi tshul dang /_bsam pa rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bas/_sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang /_mdzes pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dri 
[\[368b.5\]]thams cad dang /_phyogs brgyan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po dang /_rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rim gro la brtson pas de bzhin gshegs pa gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshe/_
[\[368b.6\]]grangs med pa'i gyur du mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa dang gshegs pa dang /_bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces 
[\[368b.7\]]bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//[{D44-29}]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu mngon par lhags te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig tu phyin to/_/
[\[369a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya bdag ste/_'di ltar rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dam pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[369a.3\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bdag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag 
[\[369a.4\]]nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/_'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang /_dngul gyi snying po dang /_gser gyi snying po dang /_nor bu'i snying po dang /_rdo rje'i snying po dang /_pad mo'i snying po dang /_ut+pa la'i snying po dang /_tsan 
[\[369a.5\]]dan gyi snying po dang /_spos kyi snying po zhes bya bdag go_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/_'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang /_g.yo ba med 
[\[369a.6\]]pa'i dpal dang /_bcings pa med pa'i dpal dang /_spyod pa'i dpal dang /_'od zer gyi dpal dang /_mtha' las rgal ba'i dpal dang /_mchog gi dpal dang /_dbang phyug gi dpal dang /_tshangs pa'i dpal dang /_shin tu bstsags pa'i dpal zhes bya 
[\[369a.7\]]ba dag go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/_gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten nas/_seng ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po can nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]te/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa'i lus dang /_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa gtong ba dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od gtong ba dang /_tshad med pa'i 'od rab tu skyed pa dang /_bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i rin po che yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[369b.2\]]pa'i gzugs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba dang /_blta na don yod par sems can gdul ba dang /_rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[369b.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par byang chub sems dpa'i rtse gcig du smon lam btab pas/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_chags 
[\[369b.4\]]pa med par spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_'di lta ste/_gnas med pa'i lus dang /_'di lta ste/_tshad med pa'i lus kyis kun tu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi lus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_'di lta ste/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs 
[\[369b.5\]]rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang /_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo 'byam klas pa/_tshad med par gyur pa dang /_'di lta ste/_chos la mi 'jigs par mkhas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa dang /_'di lta 
[\[369b.6\]]ste/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mi zad pa'i tha dad pa yang dag pa shes pa'i tshul bshad pa dang /_'di lta ste/_gzugs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa'i ye shes kyi phung po rab tu rgyas pa dang /_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings rgyas par gyur 
[\[369b.7\]]pa'i shes rab kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su gnas pa dang /_mtshams med cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa rab 
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]tu thob par gyur pa dag go_/ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang /_
[\[370a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad bya ba dag_/'jig rten gyi khams ming de skad ces bya ba dag nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de skad ces bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag 'ongs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pus mo'i 
[\[370a.3\]]lha nga gnyis nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ste/_phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa thams 
[\[370a.4\]]cad dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa mthong bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa 
[\[370a.5\]]dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[370a.6\]]la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs su gyur pa dag ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mos rnam par 'phrul pa la mos pa sha stag go_/chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song ba sha stag go_/gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[370a.7\]]zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes su song bas rab tu zhugs pa sha stag go_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa blta ba la rjes su gzhol ba sha stag go_/chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par byed pa sha stag go_/bsam pa rin po che rdul 
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]dang bral ba dang ldan pa sha stag go_/brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang 'grogs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go_/sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go_/yang dag par spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go_/
[\[370b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa sha stag go_/blo dang sems skad cig thams cad kyis cher 'phags pa rab tu thob pa sha stag go_/chung ngur zhugs shing cher gyur pa'i spyod pa la dbang ba sha stag 
[\[370b.3\]]go_/cher gyur pa la zhugs shing chung ngur 'jug pa'i rjes su chud nas ye shes kyis spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go_/de lta bu'i gnas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 
[\[370b.4\]]'grogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs ltar grub pa'i lus dang /_de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yul thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_ye shes chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye 
[\[370b.5\]]ba dang /_ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi mthu'i mchog thob pa dang /_rdo rje gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rab tu thob pa dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams yongs su smyin par gdul ba la rmongs pa 
[\[370b.6\]]med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du 'gro ba gdon mi za ba'i mchog thob pa dang /_bgrang ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa dang /_bgrang ba'i mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad shin tu bslabs pa dang /_
[\[370b.7\]]bgrang ba'i shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug cing chos rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa dang /_'di dag dang gzhan yang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dang /_yon tan bsngags pa rnam par dag pa mi zad pas/_byang chub sems 
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum gyi yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sha stag_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa thams cad blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus par 
[\[371a.2\]]gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yang dag sangs rgyas skye ba med/_/rgyal ba 
[\[371a.3\]]mya ngan mi 'da' ste/_/rgyu mthun pa yi smon lam gyis/_/des ni rnam par 'phrul pa snang /_/'di dag chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/'di dag sems kyi spyod yul min/_/gang gis ye shes pha rol phyin/_/des ni sangs rgyas spyod 
[\[371a.4\]]yul mthong /_/lus 'di yang dag sangs rgyas [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sgra yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/lus dang sgra las gzhan na yang /_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mi mthong /_/sngon gyi las rnams ma gtogs 
[\[371a.5\]]par/_/rang byung rnams kyi spyod yul gyi/_/mchog gi tshul rnams shes pa ni/_/blo zhan rnams kyis mi nus so/_/yang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di/_/gang dag nas kyang ma 'ongs te/_/gang du 'gro 
[\[371a.6\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag rang byung sku yin no/_/tshad med shin tu 'dren pa rnams/_/chos 'di rab tu bshad mdzad kyang /_/chos la gnas pa gang yang med/_/zhing rnams bye ba kun na snang /_/mkhyen pas 
[\[371a.7\]]mtha' dang dbus med de/_/chos kun thugs su chud cing rtogs/_/chos kyi dbyings la rab zhugs nas/_/rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa mdzad/_/chos rnams kun la chags pa med/_/'gro la de ni bsgribs mi mnga'/_/
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]tshad med pa yi yon tan gyis/_/zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang /_/gang zhig ye shes 'di dag dang /_/ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod pas/_/bsam pa rnam par spyad byas te/_/byang chub spyod pa spyad par bya/_/drang srong chen 
[\[371b.2\]]po'i byin gyi rlabs/_/'di 'dra gang gis mthong gyur cing /_/de ni the tsom mi byed na/_/dge bshes mchog la bsnyen pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs 
[\[371b.3\]]bcur rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/shin tu zab ste brjod du med/_/brjod du yod kyang 'da' bar dka'/_/tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/_/nam mkha' la ni rgyal ba snang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[371b.4\]]byin rlabs kyis/_/mi yi seng ge mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang dag sangs rgyas rtog med kyang /_/rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang /_/'jig rten mgon pos chos nyid dngos/_/zab mo 'di dag yang dag bstan/_/gang zag mtshungs pa med pa yi/_/des ni sku 'di 
[\[371b.5\]]rab tu 'byung /_/thams cad gzigs kyi spyod yul gyi/_/ye shes chen po 'di 'dra ste/_/'di la gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa/_/des ni rgyal ba mngon du byos/_/yid kyi dbang po rnam dag pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur zhing /_/'di yi tshul las 'da' 
[\[371b.6\]]byed tshe/_/nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o/_/mi zad pa yi bsod nams dang /_/byang chub sems kyis brtan pa rnams/_/the tsom rnam par bzlog byas te/_/de dag la ni skyo med ltos/_/rgyal sras gang gis chos dbyings kyi/_/shin tu bstan pa'i mthar phyin pa/_/des ni kun 
[\[371b.7\]]gzigs rnam 'phrul ba/_/'di dag shin tu 'da' bar bya/_/dad pa chos 'di'i rtsa ba zhes/_/chos kyi phung pos bshad mdzad kyis/_/dad pa shin tu cher bskyed la/_/byang chub spyod pa spyad par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bsti stang gang byed cing /_/de bzhin gshegs la drin gzo ba/_/
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]yang dag sangs rgyas dpal ldan las/_/de dag rgyang mar mi gnas so/_/bdag nyid che ba 'di lta bu/_/gang gis thos mthong mkhas pa rnams/_/spyod yul thob par cis 'gyur ba'i/_/smon lam su zhig sbyong mi byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' 
[\[372a.2\]]ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mthong gyur pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyis/_/dag pa'i 
[\[372a.3\]]sems ldan rgyal ba mthong /_/ji ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/_/rgya mtsho la ni 'jug par byed/_/de bzhin ye shes stobs ldan pas/_/bsam du med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong /_/ji ltar sa bon rnam pa dag_/zhing bzang la ni skyer 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin sems 
[\[372a.4\]]bsam rnam dag la/_/sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar nor gyi phung po yis/_/dbul ba thams cad spong byed pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'gyur/_/ji ltar dug tu gyur pa la/_/nad med dug sman 
[\[372a.5\]]rgyal bar byed/_/de bzhin nyon mongs rnam pa la/_/rnam dag tshul ni spyod yul lo/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bsngags pa'i/_/dge ba'i bshes la brten byas na/_/de yi mthus ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos nyid 'di dag thos par 'gyur/_/
[\[372a.6\]]bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/_/sbyin pa mchog rnams sbyin byas kyang /_/'di yi tshul la rab spyod pa'i/_/grangs dang char yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/_/mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris/_/brjod pas 
[\[372a.7\]]yang dag sangs rgyas rnams/_/rgyal ba shes par mi nus so/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/gnas nas g.yo ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bar/_/sku ni kun tu rnam rgyu zhing /_/chos kyi dbyings ni ston pa mdzad/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i khams 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]'di ni/_/nam yang rang bzhin mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang /_/ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs 
[\[372b.2\]]bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'di kun dang /_/lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang /_/'gro ba ma lus kun na yang /_/mi yi gtso bo shin tu snang /_/ji ltar sems dngos gcig 
[\[372b.3\]]pu las/_/rnam pa tha dad sems brjod pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sku gcig las/_/sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pa yin/_/byang chub gnyis su med pa brjod/_/byang chub de yang mtshan nyid med/_/mtshan gyis mngon par rnam bris pa'i/_/
[\[372b.4\]]sku rnams gnyis su snang bar gyur/_/mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/_/sgyu ma'i sa yang rab tu bstan/_/de phyir sangs rgyas de dag gi_/spyod yul blta ba zad pa med/_/yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/mgon po thams cad 
[\[372b.5\]]dus gsum du/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la/_/gzugs kyi sku yang rab tu snang /_/'di 'dra'i lus su bdag gyur ces/_/sangs rgyas rtog par mi mdzad de/_/ston la rnam rtog mi mnga' yang /_/byin gyi rlabs ni ston 
[\[372b.6\]]pa mdzad/_/dbyer med pa yi dbyings la yang /_/chos kyi dbyings ni yang dag gnas/_/'jig rten khams ni tshad med par/_/thub pas rnam par rtog pa bstan/_/sku ni sprul pa ma yin te/_/sprul pa [{]myin [,]min [}]pa'ang sku 
[\[372b.7\]]ma yin/_/sprul pa med pa'i chos 'di yis/_/sprul pa rnams ni rab tu bstan/_/yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pa/_/chos kyi dbyings la shin tu brten/_/mtha' dang dbus med rab tu zab/_/tshig gi lam gyis bzla bar 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]dka'/_/kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don des mkhyen/_/zhing rnams kun la chags mi mnga'/_/chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal 
[\[373a.2\]]mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kun mkhyen ye shes ma chags pa/_/de la zhugs par gang gyur pa/_/de yi sems ni tshad mi zin/_/
[\[373a.3\]]byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po rnams/_/yul dang yul du de dag snang /_/chos rnams phyogs gcig gang la yang /_/yang dag sangs rgyas gnas pa med/_/'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis/_/byin gyi 
[\[373a.4\]]rlabs ni gang bstan pa/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/'di yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'/_/dus gsum rnams ni ji snyed pa'i/_/sems can rnams kyi mthar thug pa/_/bgrang ba'i mthar ni phyin par nus/_/'dren pa la ni mthar 
[\[373a.5\]]thug [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de dag sku ni gcig tu snang /_/sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang /_/sku la gnyis su gyur pa med/_/ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/_/tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams/_/chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang /_/zla ba gnyis 
[\[373a.6\]]su gyur pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de bzhin chags [{]myed [,]med [}]mkhyen ldan rnams/_/chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/_/zhing rnams kun la rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med/_/'di la gcig kyang yod ma yin/_/sku ni gnyis sam gsum du med/_/
[\[373a.7\]]ji ltar sems can bsam pa bzhin/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par ni rab tu snang /_/sku ni 'das pa ma yin te/_/ma 'ongs pa'ang sku ma yin/_/skyes dang byang chub mya ngan 'das/_/skad cig gis ni rab tu snang /_/ji ltar sgyu mar gyur pa'i gzugs/_/skyes pa 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]ma yin 'ongs pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par shin tu bstan/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[373b.2\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yang dag sangs rgyas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_/tshad du sku yang rnam par bstan/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams/_/de bzhin 'dren pa rab tu mthong /_/sku la phyogs ni [{]myed [,]med [}]par brjod/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[373b.3\]]yul ni ma lus khyab/_/bar snang nam mkha' ji lta bar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/der ni sems la 'pho ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems la skye ba'ang yod ma yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/_/skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la rab tu gnas/_/ji ltar 
[\[373b.4\]]rab rib ldan pa'i [{]myig[,]mig[} ]/nang na [{]myed [,]med [}]cing phyi na'ang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag_/nang na [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzhugs phyi na'ang [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/'jig rten kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog byung ste/_/'jig rten du ni ma byung ba yang /_/'jig rten 
[\[373b.5\]]dag tu skye bos mthong /_/sangs rgyas rnams la zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas/_/rgyal ba dag la nyin mtshan med/_/skad gcig ma yin zla ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/rgyal ba la ni lo mi gnas/_/'jig rten dag na 'di skad brjod/_/nyi ma che ge mo zhig tu/_/rang byung byang chub rgyal 
[\[373b.6\]]bas thob/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma rjes mi 'brang /_/de la bskal pa yod ma yin/_/dus kyang ma lus med pa ste/_/dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mgon po rnams ni mnga' bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/nams kyang mtshan dang 
[\[373b.7\]]mi gnas te/_/nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab tu brjod/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid do/_/bskal pa gcig dang dus gsum du/_/'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin te/_/dus gsum zhes kyang rab tu brjod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]dpa' rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yang dag sangs rgyas sku gcig ste/_/'dren pa thams cad don 
[\[374a.2\]]gcig kyang /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/_/phyogs bcu kun nas rab tu snang /_/gang gis ma lus thams cad kyi/_/chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab pas/_/sems can gtso bo thub pa yi/_/spyod yul rnams ni ci 'dra ltos/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[374a.3\]]rnams kyi chos nyid ni/_/nang gi skus kyang snang ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/_/phyi rol skus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ngo /_/dus mang kun tu las rnams kyis/_/ji ltar las rnams bstsags pa bzhin/_/de bzhin so sor phye ba'i skus/_/rigs 
[\[374a.4\]]su byung bar rab tu bstan/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid ma gtogs par/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra ba/_/grangs su bgrang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_/bsam pas lta yang shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus/_/ji ltar bdag cag sems kyi las/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba/_/de bzhin 
[\[374a.5\]]sangs rgyas bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/sems kyi 'phrin las [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ji ltar zhing rnams bsam yas pa/_/sa la rnam par dag par mdzes/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/'gro ba dag na mdzes par snang /_/ji ltar las rnams 
[\[374a.6\]]'jug pa ni/_/rkyen gyis rab tu 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin rgyu rnams 'thun pa las/_/sangs rgyas shin tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni/_/ji ltar yid bsam rdzogs byed pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang /_/rtag tu 
[\[374a.7\]]smon lam rdzogs par sgrub/_/mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir/_/'jig rten mgon po 'dren par 'gyur/_/de yi smon lam de dag gis/_/phyogs bcu 'di dag rgyal bas gang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyal 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas te/_/'jig rten chos rnams rnam par sbyong /_/'jig rten chos rnams 
[\[374b.2\]]rnam sbyangs nas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/_/de ste sems can mnyam sangs rgyas/_/sems can la la bsam byas na/_/rgyal ba de dag thams cad mthong /_/sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa med/_/sangs rgyas la ni dmigs 
[\[374b.3\]]byas nas/_/sems kyis sangs rgyas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas na/_/sems bskyed pa dang rgyal mnyam par/_/de bzhin de dag rgyal ba mthong /_/dkar po'i chos kyis nyer brtan cing /_/gang gis grags pa rnam sbyangs pa/_/de dag thams cad sems bskyed 
[\[374b.4\]]la/_/shes rab ldan pa rab tu bzhugs/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dag dang byin gyi rlabs/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]yi gtso bo ston pa mdzad/_/de phyir [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa kun tu yang /_/sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs par brjod/_/'jig rten khams rnams 'di dag ni/_/sangs 
[\[374b.5\]]rgyas sku rnams bdag gi [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems la bdag gi med pa bstan/_/byang chub rtogs la bdag gi med/_/mi yi seng ge'i chos nyid dang /_/dpa' ba'i stobs la rab tu gnas/_/lus dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste/_/snang ba'i sems dang mnyam 
[\[374b.6\]]pa'i sku/_/ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin sku/_/ji bzhin skur yang rgyal ba ste/_/sku yi rang bzhin shes pa ni/_/sangs rgyas chags pa med ces bya/_/sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa ste/_/chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/_/sangs 
[\[374b.7\]]rgyas chos dang byang chub rnams/_/gang la'ang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa yin/_/sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te/_/yang dag sangs rgyas log pa med/_/de bzhin gshegs la len mi mnga'/_de nas byang chub 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]sems dpa' dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu khyab/_/zhing gcig la ni mi gnas te/_/
[\[375a.2\]]thams cad du ni sangs rgyas gshegs/_/zhing rnams kun tu rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad du/_/byin gyi rlabs dag rab tu 'byung /_/'tshang rgya chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_/bsam pa bzhin du mya ngan 'da'/_/sangs rgyas la ni su zhig 
[\[375a.3\]]sems/_/ci phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/yang dag sangs rgyas su yis mthong /_/rgyal ba sus kyang mthong mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar chos rnams chos nyid dang /_/ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul du/_/gang dag chos rnams gcig tsam yang /_/de 
[\[375a.4\]]bzhin nyid la mi 'jug go_/'di ni 'jig rten 'di rgyal zhes/_/'jig rten dag na rnam rtog yod/_/gang gis ngo bo nyid shes na/_/'jig rten [{]myed [,]med [}]de rgyal ba'ang med/_/'jig rten dad par bya ba'i phyir/_/mgon po dag ni mngon sum ston/_/de dag
