[\[375a.5\]]gi ni lta ba 'di/_/shin tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mi rung de/_/gang gis chags pa rnams bzlog cing /_/chags pa med pa dga' byed pa/_/chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog nas/_/chags med chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhes brjod gang yin dang /_/
[\[375a.6\]]gang gi rnam 'phrul snang gyur pa'i/_/chos ni dus gsum thams cad du/_/rnam pa kun du mi rnyed de/_/gang gis chos nyid 'di shes shing /_/gang gis 'di bzhin yid shes na/_/thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs kun pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa myur du 'gyur/_/
[\[375a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/_/'di dag thams cad tshig gis bstan/_/yang dag sangs rgyas tshig lam [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/tshig gi lam gyis rab tu brjod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang gis rnam par 'phrul snang ba'i/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa bas/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad ni/_/sdug bsngal phung po blangs kyang bla/_/'gro ba 
[\[375b.2\]]gang gis byang chub tu/_/sems ni nam yang ma bskyed pa/_/de dag gnas 'di thos gyur na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang gis bsam pa gcig gis kyang /_/'di la mos byed mkhas pa ni/_/mi yi mchog tu mi 'gyur zhes/_/des 
[\[375b.3\]]ni the tsom mi bya'o/_/de yi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba'i bar du dkon/_/su zhig 'di la mos byed pa/_/de dag bla na med par 'gyur/_/brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/skad cig skad cig bsnyen bkur kyang /_/'di yi tshul la ma 
[\[375b.4\]]gnas na/_/de dag bsnyen bkur byas ma yin/_/gang las sangs rgyas brjod 'gyur ba'i/_/chos 'di gang gis thos gyur pa/_/des ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde kun gyis kyang /_/spyad pa rnams ni blang bar bya/_/ji tsam chos kyi dbyings rnams dang /_/dus gsum gyi ni 
[\[375b.5\]]mgon po yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni rten pa yi/_/ye shes chen po gcig thos nas/_/phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba rnams/_/zhing rnams re rer zad byas shing /_/'di yi tshul ni brtson byed na/_/de la byang chub dkon pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sems can rnams kyi sngon 
[\[375b.6\]]mtha' yi/_/'khor bar mi rnams gnas gyur kyang /_/des ni sangs rgyas rab byung ba/_/chos nyid 'di ni shes ma gyur/_/chos rnams zhig par byas pa med/_/chos ni 'jig par mi 'gyur te/_/kun tu snang las rnam 'phrul pa/_/'jig rten dag tu 
[\[375b.7\]]thams cad bstan/_dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/_nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//[{D44-30}]sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po sum 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]cu pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[376a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag du/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 
[\[376a.3\]]phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal bstan pa mthong ste/_de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag go_/phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba ltar phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/_de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 
[\[376a.4\]]'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs 
[\[376a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa sha stag gis/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /_sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_khyod kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[376a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_spobs pa chags pa med par bya ba dang /_ye shes kyis bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sar 'jug par bya ba dang /_
[\[376a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yangs pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang /_bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos dkar po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas 'jug par bya ba dang /_
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i ye shes dang /_dran pa rgyun mi chod par rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs par bya ba dang /_
[\[376b.2\]]chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa bstan par bya ba dang /_shes pa kun tu gzung bar bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzung bar bya ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[376b.3\]]las 'das pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bstan par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi chod par bya ba dang /_smon lam chen po'i skabs dbye bar bya ba dang /_don shin tu bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes 
[\[376b.4\]]par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa la bsten par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung bar 
[\[376b.5\]]bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mdzad kyis/_kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis brtan pa dang /_gzungs kyi snang ba la zhugs pa dang /_
[\[376b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgribs pa med pa la zhugs pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i chos nyid du bya ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dkar po yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi spyod yul yangs pa la gnas pa dang /_bsgribs pa med pa'i chos 
[\[376b.7\]]snang ba la gnas pas chos bstan pa 'di brjod pa dang /_bstan pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes tshad med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/spobs 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]pa chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gcig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/tshad 
[\[377a.2\]]med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nyams pa med par 
[\[377a.3\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong mngon par bskyed pa la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas rgyun mi chad pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[377a.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyi phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag g.yas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi spyi bo la byug pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[377a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan la reg ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te langs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 
[\[377a.6\]]'di lta ste/_'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs 
[\[377a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo/_/
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba gang la bsams te de skad du smras pa de dag ni gang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs du zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/bsngo ba bcu po 'di dag 
[\[377b.2\]]ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 
[\[377b.3\]]skyob pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang /_mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems 
[\[377b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa dang /_bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba 
[\[377b.5\]]lnga pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 
[\[377b.6\]]bsngo ba bdun pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba brgyad pa dang /_chags pa med cing bcings pa dang dgrol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 
[\[377b.7\]]bsngo ba dgu pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu po de dag ni/_'das pa dang ma byon pa 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po sems can rnams kyi 
[\[378a.2\]]'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu sbyor ba'am tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyong ba'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[378a.3\]]pa la sems pa'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsom pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par dpyod pa'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa'am/_byams pa bsgom pa yang dag par skyed pa'am/_snying rjes snying 
[\[378a.4\]]brtse bar byed pa'am/_dga' ba la rab tu dga' bar byed pa'am/_btang snyoms la shin tu gnas pa byed kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu bsams nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par phye nas/_
[\[378a.5\]]'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun chad par 'gyur ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[378a.6\]]la rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par phan 'dogs pa gang yin zhes sems skyed do/_/de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bskyed pa na/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir 
[\[378a.7\]]bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig_/nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig_/'jigs pa kun las bsrung ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi lam du gyur cig_/shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig_/rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes snang ba 
[\[378b.2\]]yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur cig_/ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur cig_/shin tu dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_bdag sems 
[\[378b.3\]]can thams cad kyi mar mer gyur cig_/chos kyi tshul la gzud pa'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur cig_/bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bstan pa'i phyir/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur 
[\[378b.4\]]cig ces/_de de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar shin tu thug par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/_ji ltar mdza' ba bsrung ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba de ltar mi mdza' ba bsrung ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[378b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag tu bya ba'i bsam pas mi mdza' ba ni gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par byung ba ste/_de 'di snyam 
[\[378b.6\]]du byang chub sems dpa' la mi mdza' ba'i don byed pa de dag thams cad ni bdag gi rgyud la dgod dgod pa yin no zhes te/_de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi yul thams cad la zhe sdang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mig gis lta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[378b.7\]]dpa' chen po rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_sems can thams cad la dge ba'i chos yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 'jug go_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni dug thams cad kyis gdug par bya bar mi nus so/_/
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang drin mi gzo ba dang /_blo zhen pa dang /_sems 'khrug pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_mun par gyur pa dang /_rang bzhin stor ba dang /_rlom sems dang ldan pa dang /_sgrub pa nyams pa dang /_
[\[379a.2\]]sems rmus long lta bur gyur pa'i sems can byis pa thams cad kyis skyon can du mi nus so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba de ni rmus long gi skyon gyis 'char ba la thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dri za'i grong khyer gyi skyon gyis thogs 
[\[379a.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gling bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi skyon gyis thogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'khrigs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i 
[\[379a.4\]]gling gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/grib ma sna tshogs kyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dug gi ri'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khams kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[379a.5\]]dus yongs su 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa can yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa/_sems kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid shin tu zab cing yangs pa yid la yang dag par rtog pa/_
[\[379a.6\]]mi zhan pa yon tan spyad pas ye shes mthar gyur pa chos la shin tu dad pa'i sems mngon par skyes pa/_chos kyi snang ba'i 'od kyis rab tu snang ba don thams cad mthong ba chos mngon par shes pa ye shes rig pa spyod pa med pa lhur byed pa/_sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos spyod pa la rab 
[\[379a.7\]]tu sbyor ba/_sems can thams cad kyis nyes par sems bskyed pa la 'khrul pa med pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na/_gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon gyis thogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems can mi srun pa'i tshul gyis ldog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi lta ba'i rnyog pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi sems 'khrugs pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud stor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po 
[\[379b.2\]]bgos pa las ring bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dkrugs ma'i rnyog pa thams cad kyis bcil bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa chen po sems can drin du mi gzo ba mthong bas lhod par mi 
[\[379b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can mi srun pa'i dbang pos zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gzhan gyi skyon gyis skyo 
[\[379b.4\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dkyil 'khor 'di ni bsgribs pa med par 'gro ba thams cad/_rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba ste/_/sems can gcig la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[379b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ma yin/_'di lta ste/_zhing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing gcig la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par spro ba ma yin/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[379b.6\]]lta ba rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gcig la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye ba ma yin/_'di lta ste ye shes gcig rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir ye shes gcig la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[379b.7\]]smon lam skye ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]gror bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[380a.2\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi smon lam skye'o/_/de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa la sems yangs pa/_
[\[380a.3\]]bsam pa ma 'khrugs pa/_bskal pa thams cad du shin tu dkon pa'i sems rin po che dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu skyes te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[380a.4\]]dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par mthong nas/_sems dad pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang /_snying rje chen pos brtan pas bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste de yang tshig tsam du ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas 
[\[380a.5\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/de yang dga' ba'i sems dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_dad pa'i sems dang /_mos pa'i sems dang /_'jam pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_nye ba'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems 
[\[380a.6\]]dang /_phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnam par dag par gyur cig_/skye ba yongs su dag par gyur cig_/bsod 
[\[380a.7\]]nams kyi bdag nyid che ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/zil gyis mi non par gyur cig_/mi zad par gyur cig_/thub par dka' ba'i sems su gyur cig_/dran pa nyams pa med par gyur cig_/rtogs pa nges par gyur cig_/blo tshad med par 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]gyur cig_/lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kyi yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mnyes 
[\[380b.2\]]par byas nas kyang thugs 'byung ba med par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mi phyed pa'i dad pa yang thob par gyur cig_/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[380b.3\]]chos bstan pa thob par gyur cig_/thos nas kyang the tsom dang yid gnyis med par gyur cig_/yang dag par 'dzin cing nan tan gyis bsgrub par gyur cig_/sems can gyi dga' ba nyid kyang thob par gyur cig_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las kyang 
[\[380b.4\]]yang dag par grub par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la bdag rab tu gzhog par gyur cig_/shin tu dbul ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig_/nor bdun 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yang 
[\[380b.5\]]slob par gyur cig_/dge ba'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba'ang thob par gyur cig_/mos pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go yang rnyed par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad du nyams pa med 
[\[380b.6\]]pa'i mig kyang rnyed par gyur cig_/mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa yang thob par gyur cig_/yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i tshig rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/dbang po bsdams shing stobs bcu 
[\[380b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i sems dge ba yang yang dag par grub par gyur cig_/gnas med par spyod pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba'i rim gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim gro de dag sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig_
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob pas tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig_/sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba/_sgrib pa'i las de dag gis bsgribs pas sangs rgyas mi mthong ba 
[\[381a.2\]]dang /_chos mi thos pa dang /_dge 'dun mi shes pa'i bsgribs pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag bdag gi lus 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnas dang /_ngan song gi sa'i gnas de dang de dag du blang bar bya'o/_/
[\[381a.3\]]sems can de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de nas bton te/_bdag gis de dag gi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa de dag blang bar bya'o/_/spro bar bya'o/_/mi ldog par bya'o/_/de las mi 'bros par bya'o/_/mi skrag par bya'o/_/mi 'jigs par bya'o/_/
[\[381a.4\]]phyir mi ldog par bya'o/_/zhum pa med par bya'o/_/mi skyo bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sems can thams cad bsgral bar smon lam btab pas na sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur dgos so/_/'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad 
[\[381a.5\]]yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/_/skye ba'i dgon pa dang /_rga ba dang na ba'i dgon pa dang /_'chi ba'i dgon pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i dgon pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_
[\[381a.6\]]mi khom pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_'khod pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_lta ba'i thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad stong ba'i dgon pa dang /_mi shes pa las byung ba'i dgon pa dang /_dgon pa de dag thams cad 
[\[381a.7\]]nas bdag gis sems can srid pa'i dra bas 'khrigs pa/_ma rig pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa/_srid pa'i sred pa dang ldan pa/_zhen pa'i mthar gyur pa/_sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis bskor ba/_bdud kyi las la rten pa/_mi mkhas pa/_bsod nams 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]'gags pa/_the tsom du gyur pa/_rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa/_mi bde ba mthong ba/_'byung ba la mi mkhas pa/_tshub mas bskor ba'i lo ma lta bur 'khor zhing 'phyan pa de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/zhes de la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[381b.2\]]snying rje chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba mthong nas/_sems can de dag la snying brtse ba chen po skyes pa/_phan cher gdags pa'i sems rab tu bskyed pa/_sems can rnams kyi don chen 
[\[381b.3\]]po bya bar dga' ba sems can mang po rab tu 'grol bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba/_yongs su bsngo ba chen po la zhugs pa/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu zhugs pa/_
[\[381b.4\]]bsngo ba chen po'i mdos sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba/_sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya bar sems pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par 
[\[381b.5\]]yongs su bsngo ba de sems 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir bdag spyod de/_bdag ni bdag 'ba' shig yongs su dgrol ba la mngon par zhugs pa ma yin gyis/_bdag 
[\[381b.6\]]gis sems can 'di dag kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rab tu snang bas 'khor ba'i dgon pa brgal dka' ba nas gdon par bya'o/_/g.yang sa chen po nas blang bar bya'o/_/gnod pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/_/'khor ba'i rgyud 
[\[381b.7\]]las rab tu bsgral bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po blang bar spro bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i sa'i 'og nas drang bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]kyi mthar thug pa thams cad kyi ngan song kun gyi sdug bsngal thams cad blangs te nyams su myong bar bya ba la bdag gis spro bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las mi spang bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[382a.2\]]yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag ngan song gcig nas phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par gnas par spro bar bya'o/_/ngan song gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i ngan song thams cad du gnas par spro bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[382a.3\]]zhe na/_kyi hud sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi gnas su lhung babs ni bdag gcig pu sdug bsngal myong bar bla'i bdag gis der bdag nyid gtar bcug ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[382a.4\]]'jig rten gyi dgon pa nas/_'gro ba thams cad blus te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug bsngal tshor ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad bdag gis lus 'dis myong bar bya'o/_/bdag gis ni sems can thams cad kyi gnya' bden 
[\[382a.5\]]par smra ba dang /_yid ches shing mi bslu bar spro bar bya'i bdag la ni sems can thams cad kyis ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/_bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems/_sems 
[\[382a.6\]]can thams cad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa skye ste/_bdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs so/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing spyod pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/_/'dod pa'i yul la bsnyen pa'i phyir yang ma yin 
[\[382a.7\]]no/_/'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba mang po gzhan blang ba'i phyir yang byang chub kyi spyod pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi dga' ba 'di dag thams cad ni dgra yin no/_/'dod pa la bsten pa 'di ni bdud kyi yul lo/_/
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]'dod pa la bsten pa de ni blo ngan pas bstan pa'i lam mo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'i yul lo/_/de dag la bsten pa de las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de las sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye 
[\[382b.2\]]gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de las sems can rnams 'thab pa dang /_'tshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_gnad la 'bebs pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_kun tu 'khrug pa rnams kyang rab tu 'byung 
[\[382b.3\]]ngo /_/sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa la bsten pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las ring du gyur pa ste/_'dod pa de dag ni mtho ris su skye ba la yang bar du gcod na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci 
[\[382b.4\]]dgos te/_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang /_dga' ba thams cad kyi yang bar chad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag gis 'dod pa ni ro chung zhing tshad med pa'i nyes pa can du mthong na/_ci yang de dag spyod pa'i phyir 'jug gam/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[382b.5\]]bdag ni don 'di dag gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa ma yin no/_/'dod pa la dga' ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi spyod de/_de bas na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar zhugs pa'i 
[\[382b.6\]]sems bskyed de/_bdag ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de dag nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bsngo zhing bsgrub pa'i phyir don de la zhugs pa ste/_de bas na bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyi zhags 
[\[382b.7\]]pas bcings pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi zhags pa bcad de/_sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi rgyud las rnam par bzlog par bya'o/_/bdag gis ji lta ji ltar sems can 'di dag thams cad shin 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]tu bde ba dang /_phan par 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang /_tshor ba med pa'i bde ba dang /_zhi ba'i bde ba dang /_mi gnas pa'i bde ba dang /_mi g.yo ba'i bde ba dang /_tshad med pa'i bde ba dang /_mnyams pa'i bde ba dang /_mi 'gag pa'i 
[\[383a.2\]]bde ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/bdag kha lo sgyur ba dang /_bdag mgon po dang /_bdag me sgron 'dzin pa dang /_bdag lam bde ba ston pa dang /_
[\[383a.3\]]bdag khom pa rnyed pa dang /_bdag thabs la mkhas pa dang /_bdag don shes pa dang /_bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la thams cad mkhyen pa'i gru bo che'i mnyan par gyur pa dang /_bdag yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang /_bdag pha rol ston pas dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[383a.4\]]ba de dag ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang /_'khor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su rgal bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[383a.5\]]bdud kyi yul rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsten par 'gyur ba dang /_las rnam par dag pa la kha na 
[\[383a.6\]]ma tho ba med par 'gyur ba dang /_spyad pa chen po'i smon lam rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su 
[\[383a.7\]]bsngo ba na sems 'di snyam du bskyed de/_kye ma gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir/_gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma ni mi 'char gyi gling bzhi'i 'jig rten snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma 'di nyid 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]gcig pu 'char te/_sems can gling bzhir gtogs pa de dag rang rang gi lus las kyang snang ba gang gis de dag gis nyi ma'i grangs shes par 'gyur ba'am/_rang gi don bsgrub par 'gyur ba'am/_lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'am/_nyin gcig nyin 
[\[383b.2\]]gcig cing bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_grong khyer dag tu dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba'am/_phyogs snang bar 'gyur ba'am/_grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dag tu 'gro ba dang 'ong bar bya 
[\[383b.3\]]ba 'am/_spyod pa'i don sbyar bar bya ba'i snang ba mi 'byung ste/_sems can de dag rang rang gi lus la yang 'od gang gis de dag gi don bsgrub pa'i 'od de lta bu mi gtong ste/_'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med pa de ni gling bzhi'i 'jig 
[\[383b.4\]]rten gyi khams su sems can rnams la snang bar bya ba'i phyir 'char zhing rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di ltar skye ste/_sems can 'di dag thams cad la gang gis de dag bdag nyid yongs su 
[\[383b.5\]]bskyab par bya ba de nyid kyang med na/_gzhan bskyab pa lta ci smos kyi bdag nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pas/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad snang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[383b.6\]]cad gsal bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad gzung bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bskyed par bya 
[\[383b.7\]]ba dang /_sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsdu'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/bdag gis ni 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de lta bur bya ste/_gzhan las phan pa'i lan re bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha mi 'dor bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi don du spro ba mi bzlog par 
[\[384a.2\]]bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bsgrub pa'i yongs su bsngo ba las phyir ldog par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yang bsdu bar bya ste/_yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus yongs su bsngo zhing dga' bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba phan par mi 'gyur ba rnams ni 
[\[384a.3\]]sems can rnams la bsngo bar mi bya ste/_ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsngo'o/_/mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid la rten te/_yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs 
[\[384a.4\]]su bsngo bar bya'o zhes te/_de ni 'pho ba'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la gnas pa ma yin/_srid pa la mngon par chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mi gnas so/_/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/dngos po la 
[\[384a.5\]]mngon par chags pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa la yongs su mi rtog go_/phung po rnams kyi 'du shes la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/phung po 'jig pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/las rnam par rtog pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/rnam par smin pa la re bas 
[\[384a.6\]]ma yin no/_/brten pas bsnyems shing ma yin no/_/'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu rtog pas ma yin no/_/grags pa la gnas pas ma yin no/_/gnas kyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin no/_/gnas su rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no/_/chos la rnam par 
[\[384a.7\]]rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no/_/sems can gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin te/_khams kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad pa'i rjes su song bas yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/sems kyi kun tu rtog pa la gnas te/_yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/sems kyi phyin 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/'du shes phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/lta ba phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/tshig gi lam la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/de ni 'di ltar chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin rnam par 
[\[384b.2\]]dpyod cing yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid la sems shing yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyas btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba dang mnyam pa'i chos kyis yongs su brtags pa'i dge 
[\[384b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos thams cad la sgro gdags pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rjes su rtogs par byed do/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par lta zhing yongs su bsngo ba de dag la rab tu 'jug ste/_chos gang yang skye ba 
[\[384b.4\]]'am/_'gag par byed pa med do/_/de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/_gnyen pos yongs su dag pas bsngo ba de dag la yang dag par spyod do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mthong ste/_gnyis 
[\[384b.5\]]kyi tshul gyis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad khong du chud par mi byed do/_/las kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par mi spyod do/_/las las gzhan du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi bsngo'o/_/las gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen 
[\[384b.6\]]pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/las kyi lam dang bral bas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam thob par mi 'gyur te las kyi gzugs brnyan gyis rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan 
[\[384b.7\]]yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bsngo ba de g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang rnam par spyod pa dang bral bar yang rab tu shes so/_/des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba 'dis 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]yongs su bsngos pas sems can rab tu dgrol ba rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba na/_chos kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'ang mi gtod ste/_las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos 
[\[385a.2\]]thams cad la nyon mongs pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis las dang rnam par smin pa bsgrub pa la mngon par mkhas pa yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[385a.3\]]rjes su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste dang po'o_/
[\[385a.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas/_don dang tshig dang yi ge la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sems rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su 
[\[385a.5\]]bsgom pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung la sems yang dag par 'brel par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[385a.6\]]thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa yang dag par blta ba dang /_chos kyi las dang 'thun pa'i gzugs kyi lus 
[\[385a.7\]]yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig bsam yas bskal par spyod pa dag_/sems can phan 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]phyir rtag tu zhugs pa ste/_/de dag brtson brtan chags med yid ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu sbyor zhing tshol/_/gang zhig mtshungs med skyes bu 'dul drung du/_/bsam pa dri ma med par rnam sbyangs shing /_/chos mkhas 'gro ba 
[\[385b.2\]]bskyab pa'i sems ldan pa/_/de dag yongs bsngo'i mdzod du zhugs pa yin/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang de dag nyer ldan zhing /_/ye shes stobs kyis rnam dag yid gzhung ste/_/bzod pa'i stobs ldan sgul bar mi nus pa/_/de dag 'gro ba kun skyob mngon 
[\[385b.3\]]par brtson/_/shin tu yid brtan mtshungs pa med pa dang /_/bsam pa rnam dag dga' ba'i blo ldan pa/_/de dag sa dang 'dra ba'i bzod stobs kyis/_/'gro ba kun la phan phyir mngon par brtson/_/bdag la bde ba tshol bar mi byed de/_/snying rje 
[\[385b.4\]]can gyis bsam pa de 'dra'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab sems can/_/chags med gyur par de dag zhugs pa yin/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed gang yang rung /_/'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te/_/de dag don du brtan 
[\[385b.5\]]sems ldan pa rnams/_/de dag yongs su bsngo tshul bslabs pa yin/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong bar byed/_/skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims rnam dag pa/_/brtson 'grus stobs la brtan par gnas pa'i sems/_/de dag ye shes 
[\[385b.6\]]dge bas yongs su bsu bsngo/_/de dag blo gros yangs shing mtha' yas pa/_/bzod pa'i stobs la rtag par rab tu zhugs/_/bsam gtan stobs la rjes su sems pas na/_/mkhas pa de dag shes rab bsam mi khyab/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa'i/_/
[\[385b.7\]]dge ba de dag yang dag bsgrub pa na/_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyis/_/ye shes mkhas la de dag yongs su bsngo/_/dge ba de dag gang la tshad med pa/_/brtan pa de dag yongs su sdud pa'i tshe/_/de la rtag brtson dam pa'i blo gros can/_/
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]bsam yas ye shes la ni rab tu gzhog_/de dag 'gro ba'i don du mnar med par/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par spro/_/de dag yid ni zhum par mi 'gyur te/_/de dag bsngo rtogs bsam pa'i yid dang 
[\[386a.2\]]ldan/_/gzugs tshol mi byed sgra dang dri ma yin/_/ro dang reg pa de bzhin mi tshol te/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol sems kyis/_/ye shes dam pa'i stobs ni rtag tu tshol/_/mkhas pa de dag ye shes mkha' 'dra bas/_/
[\[386a.3\]]mtha' dang dbus med spyad pa spyod pa byed/_/rgyal ba'i chos kyi chos nyid ci 'dra ba/_/mtha' yas grags pa'i spyod pa de 'dra'o/_/de dag gang dang gang du 'dong byed pa/_/'gro la bde ba rgya chen rab tu sgrub/_/rtag tu mchog brtson dga' 
[\[386a.4\]]ba byed pa ste/_/byang chub spyod pas dga' ba tshol ba med/_/gdug med sems la gnas shing zhugs pa rnams/_/ye shes dam pa mchog la rjes su sems/_/de dag bdag la bde bar mi 'dod de/_/'gro ba kun la bde dang dga' phyir 
[\[386a.5\]]brtson/_/de dag yongs su bsngo ba mthar phyin dang /_/bsam pa gdug med rnam par dag yid kyis/_/dus gsum rgyal ba gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i/_/chos kyi grong rdal de na rab tu gnas/_/gzugs dang tshor ba dag la mi gnas shing /_/
[\[386a.6\]]'du shes 'du byed yid la 'dam yin te/_/srid pa gsum las yongs su yid bskyod de/_/bsod nams gter la de dag yongs su bsngo/_/sems can ji snyed rgyal bas sad byas pa/_/'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te/_/skyes bu dam 
[\[386a.7\]]pa de dag dgrol ba'i phyir/_/spyod pa'i mchog la gang zhig brtson byed pa/_/de dag rnam pa kun tu sems brtan te/_/de dag blo gros yangs pa gzhal du med/_/de dag dran pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa/_/de dag mnyam gzhag bsam pa rnam par 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]dag_/'jig rten 'di'i nang dang phyi rnams su/_/gang du'ang de dag gnas 'char mi byed de/_/mkha' la rlung dang rlung mar ci 'dra ba/_/phyogs rnams kun du sems ni de bzhin no/_/de dag lus kyi las rnams brtson byed pa/_/des ni 
[\[386b.2\]]rgyal ba mngon par mnyes par byed/_/rgyal ba rnams la ngag kyang bsdams pa ste/_/yid kyis de dag zhugs pa gang yang med/_/mi yi dbang po gang na bzhugs pa'i zhing /_/mtha' yas zhing du de dag 'dong byed cing /_/de dag kun tu thugs rje 
[\[386b.3\]]rgyal ba mthong /_/rgyal ba rim gro byas shing de nas 'dong /_/de dag rtag tu kha na ma tho med/_/'gro ba kun na de dag 'jigs pa med/_/de dag srid gsum 'di na mu stegs byed/_/de dag bde gshegs lam la gnas pa yin/_/de dag rnam 
[\[386b.4\]]par sgom zhing mngon brtson pa/_/skye dang 'jig pa'i tshul la rjes su sems/_/chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab tu zhugs/_/nyon mongs med pa'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa yin/_/gang gis spyod pa rab tu brtan gyur cing /_/'gro ba kun las shes pa mi ldog 
[\[386b.5\]]pa/_/de 'dra'i chos nyid de dag rjes su sems/_/des ni dus gsum chags pa med par 'gyur/_/gang rnams 'gro ba rnam par dag byed pa/_/de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin/_/de dag gnas rnams thams cad phyir bzlog pas/_/
[\[386b.6\]]de phyir de dag spyod la mi gnas so/_/'gro ba kun kyi tshig lam ji snyed dang /_/skye dgu thams cad smra zhing mngon brjod pa/_/de dag smra yang rlom sems med pa yin/_/chags med yid ldan spyod pa 'di 'dra'o/_/bsod nams tshul la blo 
[\[386b.7\]]gros mtha' yas pa/_/de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bas na/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa ji snyed pa'i/_/mi yi dbang po de dag mnyes pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste/_yongs su bsngo ba dang po'o/_/
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[387a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_rgyud kyi tshul 
[\[387a.3\]]gcig par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig thob pa yan chad kun la yang mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 
[\[387a.4\]]mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir/_de dang de dag du skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_sdang ba med pa'i mig 
[\[387a.5\]]rab tu 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya zhing /_yang dag par bsgrub 
[\[387a.6\]]pa'i phyir chos dkar po thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_ston pa'i 'du 
[\[387a.7\]]shes yongs su ma rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]cho 'phrul la mi phyed par dad pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa/_rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gzung ba dmigs pa kun tu rgyu ba/_gzhan dang gzhan can de dag thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin te/_de ltar 
[\[387b.2\]]mi phyed pa'i gnas rab tu thob pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ste/_sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'am/_
[\[387b.3\]]sems can rnams la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gang dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs sam/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa'am/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba 'am/_byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pas kyang rung ste/_
[\[387b.4\]]snying rje chen po yangs pa/_tshad med pa/_yang dag par mthong bas/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yangs par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bslab pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su nan tan du bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[387b.5\]]yang dag par bsdu ba dang /_don shes pa la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_sbyin pa'i tshogs rab tu brtsam pa dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang /_dus gsum 
[\[387b.6\]]mnyam pa nyid du rnam par dpyod par byed cing /_de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs bsag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba dang mi 'bral ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad 
[\[387b.7\]]dang mi 'bral ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mi 'bral bar 'grogs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]dang mi 'bral ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das par sems bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos smra ba thams cad phu dud 
[\[388a.2\]]du bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos kyi snang ba thams cad thob pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_smon lam chen po rab tu brtson par bya ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sgrub cing /_yang 
[\[388a.3\]]dag par sdud pa dang /_nye bar ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_sems pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa dang /_rab tu rtog pa dang /_yang dag par smon pa dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_nye bar ston pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su 
[\[388a.4\]]bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 'di ltar bsgrubs pa las/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu gang byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu des bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la brjod du med pa'i 
[\[388a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur cig_/de dag kyang mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang /_sangs rgyas kyi rim gro rgya chen po byed par gyur cig_/
[\[388a.6\]]rin po che grangs med pa dang /_me tog grangs med pa dang /_dri grangs med pa dang /_'phreng ba grangs med pa dang /_na bza' grangs med pa dang /_gdugs grangs med pa dang /_rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /_ba dan grangs med pa dang /_rgyan 
[\[388a.7\]]grangs med pa dang /_lhab lhub grangs med pa dang /_rim gro grangs med pa dang /_byug pa grangs med pa dang /_rnam par byug pa grangs med pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_spos thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]dang /_'phreng ba thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_tsan dan bzang po thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_gos thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_rdo rje thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_nor bu rin po che thams 
[\[388b.2\]]cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i spang leb thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i kha dog gi gdan grangs med pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi 
[\[388b.3\]]'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_spos thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_phreng ba'i rgyan thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_gos thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyis sna tshogs su 
[\[388b.4\]]spras pa'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi spang leb bting ba'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi shing ta la'i phreng ba bsgreng ba'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba'i 'chag 
[\[388b.5\]]sa grangs med pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog par byed pa'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas thams cad las shin tu 
[\[388b.6\]]'das pa'i me tog thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i phreng ba thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med 
[\[388b.7\]]pa dang /_lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan+dan thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i spos dang gdug pa mchog dam pa thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_lha rdzas thams cad 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]las shin tu 'das pa'i rdo rje'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_nor bu rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_spos kyi shing dang /_gos kyi shing dang /_rol mo'i shing dang /_lhab lhub kyi shing dang /_shing 
[\[389a.2\]]sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba'i shing grangs med pa dang /_snam bu rin po che sbyangs pa'i shing grangs med pa dang /_rin po che mang po'i shing grangs med pa dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[389a.3\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan thams cad grangs med pa dang /_shing thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang /_ba gam gyi rgyan grangs med pa dang /_skar khung gi 
[\[389a.4\]]rgyan grangs med pa dang /_rta babs kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang /_pu shu'i rgyan dang /_zla gam gyi rgyan dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan dang /_bla re'i rgyan grangs med pa dang /_gser gyi dra ba'i khab grangs med pa dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dam 
[\[389a.5\]]pa thams cad kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang /_gos thams cad gding bar bting ba'i rgyan gyis thams cad rab tu brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pas bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig_/de ltar mchod pa rgya chen po sbyar te/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[389a.6\]]cad la yid kyi dbang po shin tu dang bas mchod pa dang /_rim gro rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_sangs rgyas phu dud du bya ba'i phyir mi ldog pa las byung bas phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rim gro bya bas bskal pa 
[\[389a.7\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zad par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad dad par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems rgya chen po bskyed pa 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]la mos par bya ba dang /_rgyan chen pos yang dag par brgyan pa dang /_tshad med par rnam par bre ba'i rgyan dang /_brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon pa brjod par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[389b.2\]]stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mchod rten sna tshogs bsnyen bkur bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba la de lta bu'i rim gro byed pa dang /_
[\[389b.3\]]de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi sku gdung mchod pa la rab tu brtson par bya bas/_bskal pa grangs med pa zad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba'i rgyan dang /_brjod pa 
[\[389b.4\]]yon tan mtha' yas pa bsngags pas bsgrubs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsgrubs pa de dag mthar thug par ma gyur cig_/de ltar rim gror byed pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig_/rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig_/
[\[389b.5\]]sems yongs su skyo ba med par gyur cig_/mngon par chags pa'i 'du shes rnam par spangs pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i chos nyid dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rlom sems thams cad bcom pas/_rlom sems med par gyur pa dang /_chos 'gyur ba 
[\[389b.6\]]med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyis rgyas btab pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /_tshe dang skye ba thams cad du 'khor bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la spyod cing /_dmigs pa'i chos kyis rgyas btab pa'i sems bskyed 
[\[389b.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin la rab tu brtson pa'i yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i/_mngon par 'du bya ba med 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]par mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_dngos po thams cad kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bsngo ba'i tshul dang /_bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba srid pa kun las 
[\[390a.2\]]'phags pa dang /_bsgom pa'i sgo mtshan ma la mkhas pas gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i byin gyi rlabs can dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngo ba chen pos yongs su sbyangs 
[\[390a.3\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la/_gnas pa'i mos pa yongs su rgyas pas/_gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom par gyur cig_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[390a.4\]]dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang /_'khor ba'i rgyud du chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/_sems bskyed pa chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang srid pa'i 'du 'dzis chud zos par mi 'gyur 
[\[390a.5\]]ba dang /_ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bsgral ba dang /_ci nas kyang skye ba dang /_'chi 'phos skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi sgo stor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang byang chub sems 
[\[390a.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyu zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis kun tu blangs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas kyang 
[\[390a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa mun pa med pa dang ldan pa ni/_chos dkar po snang bar gyur 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]pas/_nye bar brtan cing yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog skyes bu dam pas spyad pa dang ldan pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis yang dag par rtog pa dang /_sems dang 'dra ba'i chos thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i las 
[\[390b.2\]]yongs su shes pa dang /_mig yor lta bu'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa la gnas pa dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu'i las la rten pa dang /_grib ma lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su song 
[\[390b.3\]]ba dang /_chags pa med pa'i chos kyi mig rab tu skyes pa dang /_bya ba med pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_zhi ba'i rigs rab tu thob pa dang /_gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos thams 
[\[390b.4\]]cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang /_chos ma nor ba'i mtshan ma thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_mtshan ma thams cad la zhen pa med pa dang /_thun mong gi las la mkhas pa'i rjes su song 
[\[390b.5\]]ba dang /_chos dkar po thams cad rgyun ma chad pa dang /_chags pa thams cad kyis mngon par ma zhen pa dang /_chags pa med par 'gro ba la rten pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu bsam pa'i 
[\[390b.6\]]blo dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la rmongs pa med pa/_chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa'i chos can rgyu dang las dang bya ba dang /_'gal ba med pa yang dag par mthong ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/_ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul dang 
[\[390b.7\]]las rnam par smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i/_pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing /_rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes chen po mngon par shes pa la shin tu rig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]ldan pa/_mngon par 'du bya ba med par spyod pa'i sems dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs bdud kyi las dang bral 
[\[391a.2\]]ba/_las kyi rnam par yongs su byang ba'i bdag nyid can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing /_rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/bsngo ba de yang tshad med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par mthong 
[\[391a.3\]]bar byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi yul dang rnam par bral ba nyon mongs pa thams cad dang rnam par bral bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo ste/_ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mthar 
[\[391a.4\]]thug par zab pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i chos kyis mi bskyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi dge ba mngon par 'byung bar sems bskyed pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe 
[\[391a.5\]]yang bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyi rgya yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba las rgyas 'debs par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyi phyir yang /_chos thams 
[\[391a.6\]]cad 'jig rten las 'das par khong du chud pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su grub pas/_'gyod 
[\[391a.7\]]pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo zhing /_sangs rgyas grangs med pa mngon sum du bya ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos brjod du med pa yongs su dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byed do/_/
[\[391b.2\]]chos thams cad la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa la yang rab tu 'jug go_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs/_bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yang yongs su sgrub bo/_/mngon par skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang 
[\[391b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/chags pa med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yang yang dag par 'grub bo/_/chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[391b.4\]]cad rjes su song ba'i 'du shes kyi gnas kyang rab tu rtogs par byed do/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su snang bar bya ba'i yongs su dag pa'ang yongs su sgrub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[391b.5\]]gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de dag yid ni dbye ba med bsgyur cing /_/ji snyed las rnams yang dag rtsom byed kun/_/ci nas rgyal ba mngon par mnyes 'gyur 
[\[391b.6\]]ba/_/de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la yongs su bsngo bar byed/_/sangs rgyas bsam du med pa bsnyen bkur cing /_/sbyin dul sdom pa mchog gi tshul khrims rnams/_/ci nas 'gro kun rnam par dag 'gyur ba/_/de ltar 'jig rten phan phyir yongs su bsngo/_/
[\[391b.7\]]ji snyed 'di ni spos kyi gzhal med khang /_/me tog rnam pa na bza'i rnam pa dang /_/lhab lhub rnam pa gdugs kyi rnam pa dag_/des ni ye shes mkhas la bsnyen bkur byed/_/de ltar skyes bu'i seng ge drang srong rnams/_/bskal pa bsam yas bsnyen 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]cing bkur byas kyang /_/rgyal ba skyes bu 'dul ba mchod byas pas/_/nam yang ngoms par tshor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dag rgyal ba kun la mos byed cing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/_
[\[392a.2\]]mi yi seng ge mtshungs med ji snyed du/_/'jig rten phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs par mthong /_/bskal pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab rnam mang du/_mi ngoms yid kyis sbyin pa gtong byed cing /_/dge ba de la rjes su sems byed pas/_/bskal 
[\[392a.3\]]pa brgyar yang ngoms par mi tshor ro/_/'gro ba'i 'du shes rnam rtog rab shes kyang /_/de la de ni mi rtog rnam mi rtog_/de dag 'gro ba'i dbang po ma lus shes/_/de dag phan phyir rtag tu 'jug par byed/_/de dag dga' zhing mnyam par 
[\[392a.4\]]gzhag pa'i sems/_/dad pa 'od gsal sri zhu ldan pa rnams/_/bsam yas bskal par 'jig rten 'gro phan phyir/_/yongs su dgrol ba'i sems kyis spro bar byed/_/de dag bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa las/_/sna tshogs rnam 
[\[392a.5\]]pa tha dad yid 'ong ba'i/_/mchod rten bsam gyis mi khyab rtsig byed cing /_/mchod pa byed kyang nam yang tshim pa med/_/mtshungs med de dag sku gzugs rnam dag pa/_/rab tu 'od 'bar gser gyi snying po can/_/rgyal ba'i sku gzugs 
[\[392a.6\]]ri rab mnyam pa dag_/bye ba brgya phrag mtha' yas rab tu byed/_/zil non dam pa rnyed pa de dag ni/_/bsod nams yangs pa'i stobs de sgrub pa na/_/de dag yongs bsngo'i shes pa rab rtogs shing /_/dngos dang dngos med thams cad 
[\[392a.7\]]rab tu bsgom/_/'di 'dra'i ye shes tshul la yongs bsngos pas/_/de phyir 'khor bas zad par mi 'gyur te/_/chos nyid ye shes mchog dang dam pa dag_/de la chos rnams skye ba gang yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/des ni 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnam dag 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]ltar/_/sems kyang rab tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/des ni mi zad mthar phyin tshul rtogs pa'i/_/'dus byas bsod nams zad par 'gyur ba med/_/gang rnams byang chub sems dang ldan 'gyur cing /_/'jig rten kun la gnas 
[\[392b.2\]]pa med pa dag_/'gro ba kun la chags pa med pa yin/_/phyogs rnams kun tu'ang mtha' yas rab tu 'gro/_/gang gis mi yi dbang po kun 'byung ba/_/de 'dra'i sems su yongs su bsngo ba byed/_/'gro ba thams cad sems dang mnyam 
[\[392b.3\]]rtogs kyang /_/'gro ba kun tu sems ni dmigs pa med/_/de dag dngos po thams cad ma lus par/_/chos rnams dngos med ji bzhin 'jug pa byed/_/ci nas 'jig rten lam du nyams med par/_/rnam dag mig can yongs 
[\[392b.4\]]su bsngo ba byed/_/des ni srid rnams yongs su dag par bsngo/_/dngos su srid la rtog par mi byed de/_/dngos dang dngos med tshul ni shes byed cing /_/'od gsal dang bas sems kyang tshim par byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing gcig 
[\[392b.5\]]gnas par mi byed de/_/zhing rnams ma lus kun la'ang gnas mi 'cha'/_/'dus byas chos kyis snyems par mi byed de/_/de dag rang bzhin la'ang mi gnas so/_/ci nas rgyal ba kun gyi kun mkhyen dang /_/ci nas bla med 
[\[392b.6\]]sangs rgyas rgyan thob cing /_/ci nas rgyal ba thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba/_/de ltar de dag las ni yongs su bsngo/_/ye shes dam pa'i rnam pa tshul shes pa/_/de dag rkang gnyis dam pa dran byed cing /_/de 'dra'i chos 
[\[392b.7\]]rnams gnas med rab shes pas/_/de 'dra'i bsod nams gnas pa med par 'gyur/_/de dag 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs yin te/_/las kyi mtha' rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyis/_/
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]'jig rten yongs su spang ba gang yang med/_/chos dang bar du mya ngan 'da' ba dag_/gang phyir gzhan min 'grangs pa'i sa la srung /_/gang gis rgyal 'gyur sangs rgyas gyur pa'i rnams/_/de ltar dge ba 
[\[393a.2\]]de dag yongs su bsngo/_/'jig rten 'gro ba'i rgyud la rlom sems med/_/'dus byas rnams la'ang de dag chags pa med/_/tshig gi lam la de dag gnas pa med/_/tshig med lam la'ang nams kyang mi gnas 
[\[393a.3\]]so/_/chos rnams thams cad ma lus bsdu mdzad de/_/mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas ji snyed pas/_/'gro rgyud thams cad rnam par phye bas mkhyen/_/thugs kyis rnam par dbye dang rtog mi mnga'/_/rgyan 
[\[393a.4\]]gcig las ni rgyan rnams kun 'byin kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i chos su mi byed de/_/de dag thams cad dngos med spyod med par/_/'jig rten rtog pa med par rab tu shes/_/mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste 
[\[393a.5\]]yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[393a.6\]]//_//_//_//
